flores_passage: Aw bɛ aw jija aw bolo ka lafiya cogo bɛɛ la ka a sɔrɔ aw bɛ fɔlisenw bɛɛ gosi ka ɲɛ hali bi - aw bɛ aw jija fana aw kana lamaga caman kɛ ni aw bolokɔnincininw ye. O cogo la, i bɛna i yɛrɛ sɛgɛn dɔɔni dɔɔni. Aw k’aw hakili to a la ko kun t’a la ka konnɛgɛw gosi ni fanga caman ye walasa ka mankan wɛrɛ sɔrɔ i n’a fɔ piano kan. Accordion kan, walasa ka mankan wɛrɛ sɔrɔ, i bɛ baara kɛ ni bellows ye ni degun walima teliya caman ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun tɛna jate laadilikan tigitigi ye walasa ka accordéon fɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: Walasa ka dɔ fara i ka kumakan kan, i bɛ dɔ fara fanga kan, i bɛ konnɛgɛw gosi ni fanga min ye
mc_answer2: Aw bɛ lamaga-lamagali kunntanw to a dɔgɔyalenba la walasa ka aw ka muɲuli mara
mc_answer3: Aw ye aw hakili to sɛbɛnniw gosi la k’a sɔrɔ aw bolo lafiyalen mara
mc_answer4: Aw bɛ dɔ fara aw bɛ bɛlɛkisɛw baara teliya kan walasa ka dɔ fara a kan

flores_passage: Aw bɛ aw jija aw bolo ka lafiya cogo bɛɛ la ka a sɔrɔ aw bɛ fɔlisenw bɛɛ gosi ka ɲɛ hali bi - aw bɛ aw jija fana aw kana lamaga caman kɛ ni aw bolokɔnincininw ye. O cogo la, i bɛna i yɛrɛ sɛgɛn dɔɔni dɔɔni. Aw k’aw hakili to a la ko kun t’a la ka konnɛgɛw gosi ni fanga caman ye walasa ka mankan wɛrɛ sɔrɔ i n’a fɔ piano kan. Accordion kan, walasa ka mankan wɛrɛ sɔrɔ, i bɛ baara kɛ ni bellows ye ni degun walima teliya caman ye.
question: Ni aw bɛ accordéon fɔ, ninnu la jumɛn bɛna dɛmɛ ka dɔ fara a mankan kan?

flores_passage: Gɛlɛya minnu ka teli ka sɔrɔ n’i b’a fɛ ka filimu dɔ sɛmɛntiya DVD cogo la, olu dɔ ye overscan ye. Telewisɔn fanba bɛ dilan cogo la min bɛ jama bɛɛ diyabɔ. O de kama, i bɛ fɛn o fɛn ye telewisɔn na, dancɛw tigɛlen tun don, sanfɛ, duguma ani kɛrɛw. O bɛ kɛ walasa ja ka se ka ekran bɛɛ datugu. O bɛ wele ko overscan (overscan). A fɔ man di nka, n’i ye DVD dilan, a ka c’a la, a danw fana bɛna tigɛ, wa ni o wideyow tɔgɔw tun ka surun kojugu duguma, u tɛna jira ka dafa.
question: Mun na ja minnu bɛ telewisɔn na, olu danw tigɛra?
mc_answer1: Walasa ka sira di subtitles ma
mc_answer2: O la sa, ja bɛ ekran bɛɛ fa
mc_answer3: Walasa ka sira di fɛn caman tigɛli ma ka kɛ cogo wɛrɛw la
mc_answer4: Walasa ka subtitles tigɛ ka surunya duguma kojugu

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nin gɛlɛya ninnu na, mɔgɔ bɛ se ka jumɛn sɔrɔ ni a bɛ filimu caman tigɛli kɛ DVD cogo la?
mc_answer1: Ja min tɛ ɛkran bɛɛ fa
mc_answer3: Ja min bɛ ekran bɛɛ fa

flores_passage: Ameriki ka laɲini tùn b’a Jira ka binkanniw Dabɔ ɲɔgɔn fɛ ka Bɔ sira saba wɛrɛw la. Jenerali John Cadwalder tun bɛna binkanni kɛ ka ɲɛsin tubabu ka kɛlɛbolo ma Bordentown, walasa ka fanga-dafalen si bali. Jenerali James Ewing tun bɛna milisi 700 ta ka baji tigɛ Trenton Ferry, ka Assunpink Creek kan bridge minɛ ani ka jugu sɔrɔdasi si bali ka boli. Binkannikɛla ŋana min tun ye cɛ 2400 ye, o tun bɛna baji tigɛ kilomɛtɛrɛ kɔnɔntɔn Trenton worodugu fɛ, ka sɔrɔ ka tila kulu fila ye, kelen bɛ Greene ka fanga kɔrɔ, kelen bɛ Sullivan ka fanga kɔrɔ, walasa ka binkanni daminɛ sani sɔgɔma ka se.
question: Tubabu ka kɛlɛbolo dɔ tun bɛ min?

flores_passage: "A ta kɔfɛ Kongresi fɛ zuluyekalo tile 4, bolonɔbila sɛbɛn dɔ min bolonɔ bilala Kongresi ɲɛmɔgɔba John Hancock ni sekeretɛri Charles Thomson fɛ, o kɔfɛ, o cilen don bloki damadɔw la ka taa John Dunlap ka sɛbɛnnikɛlan na. Su kɔnɔna na, sɛbɛn 150 ni 200 cɛ kɛra."(Alimankan na) kɛra, min bɛ wele sisan ko ""Dunlap broadsides"". Niyɔriki Zuluyekalo tile 9. A sɛbɛn dɔ sera Lɔnduru Awirilikalo tile 10. Dunlap broadside 25 minnu bɛ dɔn hali bi, olu ye sɛbɛn kɔrɔlen tɔw bɛɛ ye minnu bɛ balo la.
question: Jɔn bolonɔbila tun bɛ sɛbɛn bololasɛbɛn kan?

Dunlap broadside 25 minnu bɛ dɔn hali bi, olu ye sɛbɛn kɔrɔlen tɔw bɛɛ ye minnu bɛ balo la.
question: Nin yɔrɔ ninnu na, Dunlap broadside dɔ sera min laban na?

flores_passage: Kolonɛliw, k’o baara in ye, u tun ye wele bila fana ka fanga di u ma. Sɔrɔdasi minnu tun bɛ ɲɛfɛ jɔyɔrɔw barika bonya, olu tun ye New Hampshire kɛlɛbolo 1nan ni 3nan ye, cɛ 200 tun bɛ minnu kɔnɔ, Kolonɛli John Stark ni James Reed ka fanga kɔrɔ (u fila bɛɛ kɛra jeneraliw ye kɔfɛ). Stark ka cɛdenw ye jɔyɔrɔw ta kogo kɛrɛfɛ Kolonɛli jɔyɔrɔ woroduguyanfan fɛ. Tuma min na jikuruba dɔ ye yɔrɔ dɔ da wuli Mistik baji kɛrɛfɛ o gun worodugu-kɔrɔn fɛ, u ye kogo janya joona ni kabakurun kogo surun ye ka taa worodugu fɛ min bɛ ban ji da la kɔgɔjida fitinin dɔ la. Gridley walima Stark ye bere dɔ bila kogo ɲɛfɛ min janya ye mɛtɛrɛ 30 ɲɔgɔn ye, ka yamaruya di ko mɔgɔ si kana marifa ci fo ni mɔgɔ basigilenw tɛmɛna a fɛ.
question: Kolonɛli Stark ka sɔrɔdasiw tun bɛ min?

Gridley walima Stark ye bere dɔ bila kogo ɲɛfɛ min janya ye mɛtɛrɛ 30 ɲɔgɔn ye, ka yamaruya di ko mɔgɔ si kana marifa ci fo ni mɔgɔ basigilenw tɛmɛna a fɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, Stark ka cɛdenw y’u ka kogo janya tuma jumɛn?
mc_answer1: K’a sɔrɔ Kolonɛliw ye wele bila ka fanga di
mc_answer2: kɔfɛ, mɔgɔ minnu bɛ taa tuma bɛɛ, olu tɛmɛna jirisunba kan
mc_answer4: K’a sɔrɔ sɔrɔdasiw ye ɲɛfɛ jɔyɔrɔw ta

flores_passage: Sinuwa kɔrɔ tun bɛ ni waati danfaralenw jiracogo kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen ye; Sinuwa jamana ka dakun kelen-kelen bɛɛ walima denbaya kelen-kelen bɛɛ min tun bɛ fanga la, o tun ye masaya danfaralen ye. Fana masakɛ kelen-kelen bɛɛ ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ, marabolo tilalenw ka waati sabatibali tun bɛ yen. O waatiw la min lakodɔnnen don kosɛbɛ o ye Masaya saba waati ye min kɛra san 60 kɔnɔ Han ni Jin Mansamara cɛ. O waatiw la, kɛlɛ jugu kɛra faama caman ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ minnu tun bɛ kɛlɛ kɛ masasigilan kama. Masaya saba tun ye waati jolilenw dɔ ye Sinuwa kɔrɔlen tariku kɔnɔ mɔgɔ ba caman sara kɛlɛ la walasa ka sigi sigiyɔrɔ sanfɛla la masasoba kɔnɔ Xi’an.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn de tun ye Sinuwa jamana ka waati farinyalenw dɔ ye?

flores_passage: Sɔrɔdasi-ntumuw ka kuluw bɛ taama ka u ka denw Kɛ dakun wɛrɛw la fana. Yɛlɛma-yɛlɛma waati la, sɔrɔdasi-ntumuw bɛ taama su fɛ, ka jɔ ka sigi tile fɛ. Kolon bɛ daminɛ ka taa yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la ni dumuni sɔrɔlenw dɔgɔyara. O waati in na, koloni bɛ waati dɔɔnin kɔnɔw Kɛ minnu bɛ Yɛlɛma don o don. O 'yɔrɔ-yɔrɔ-ko walima taama-taama kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ Taa tile 17 ɲɔgɔn na.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun ye tiɲɛ ye sɔrɔdasi wuluw ka koloni donna yɔrɔ la min bɛ taa yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la?
mc_answer1: U bɛ denw Kɛ su fɛ
mc_answer2: Dumuni hakɛ man ca u bolo
mc_answer3: U bɛ denw Kɛ minnu bɛ Yɛlɛma tile 17 tɛmɛnen kɔ

flores_passage: Sɔrɔdasi-ntumuw ka kuluw bɛ taama ka u ka denw Kɛ dakun wɛrɛw la fana. Yɛlɛma-yɛlɛma waati la, sɔrɔdasi-ntumuw bɛ taama su fɛ, ka jɔ ka sigi tile fɛ. Kolon bɛ daminɛ ka taa yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la ni dumuni sɔrɔlenw dɔgɔyara. O waati in na, koloni bɛ waati dɔɔnin kɔnɔw Kɛ minnu bɛ Yɛlɛma don o don. O 'yɔrɔ-yɔrɔ-ko walima taama-taama kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ Taa tile 17 ɲɔgɔn na.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, kuma jumɛn bɛ sɔrɔdasi-ntumuw ka kuluw ka denso jɔcogo jira ka ɲɛ, taama-taama waati la?
mc_answer1: U bɛ denw jɔ su fɛ
mc_answer2: U bɛ taama tile 17 kɔnɔ k’a sɔrɔ u ma u ka denw kɛ
mc_answer3: U bɛ denw Yɛlɛma don o don
mc_answer4: U bɛ baara Kɛ ni ʃɛ kelenw ye fasa waati bɛɛ la

flores_passage: Fɛn caman minnu kɔlɔsira farikoloɲɛnajɛ ni kɛwalew la, tuma caman na, olu bɛ bɔ kosɛbɛ kɔnɔnafiliw sɔrɔli la ani u dilanni na ɲɛnamaya waatiw fɛ. Waati ni waati fɔlisenw, minnu tɛ jaabi dɔrɔn ye kɛnɛma waati-ni-waati taamasiyɛnw ma, olu sɛbɛnna fɛnɲɛnama fanba la, banakisɛw, ɲɛgɛnw, jiriw ani baganw fana sen bɛ o la. Biologique clocks ye yɛrɛ-yɛrɛ-yɛrɛ-yɛrɛ-yɛrɛw ye minnu bɛna t’a fɛ ka waati dɔ kɛ hɔrɔnya boli la hali ni kɛnɛma taamasiyɛnw tɛ yen.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn bɛna taa ɲɛ hali ni kɛnɛma taamasiɲɛw bɛ yen?
mc_answer2: Fɔlikan minnu bɛ Kɛ waati ni waati

flores_passage: Jamanadenw ye fɛnɲɛnama suguya kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ ka fɛnɲɛnamaw dalajɛli ye dugukolo yɔrɔ dɔ kɔnɔ. Ni jamanaden kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ kelen ye ka ɲɛsin fenotipiki jogo kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ ma u bɛ Weele ko monomorphique. Ni mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ ye jogo kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ suguya caman jira u bɛ kɛ fɛn caman ye.
question: Daɲɛ jumɛn bɛ mɔgɔ kelen-kelenw ɲɛfɔ minnu bɛ danfara jira fɛn dɔ la min bɛ kɛ ni fenotipi ye?

flores_passage: Jamanadenw ye fɛnɲɛnama suguya kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ ka fɛnɲɛnamaw dalajɛli ye dugukolo yɔrɔ dɔ kɔnɔ. Ni jamanaden kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ kelen ye ka ɲɛsin fenotipiki jogo kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ ma u bɛ Weele ko monomorphique. Ni mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ ye jogo kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ suguya caman jira u bɛ kɛ fɛn caman ye.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ye daɲɛ ɲuman ye fɛnɲɛnamaw ma minnu bɛ yɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ Minɛ?

flores_passage: Turisidi min sinsinnen bɛ sigida la, o bɛ mɔgɔw sama minnu b’a fɛ ka taa sigida laminiw na walasa ka yɔrɔw diyabɔ, jiriw ni baganw kungosogow fana sen bɛ o la. Misali minnu bɛ kɛ yɔrɔ la, olu ye sogo ɲinini, mɔni, fotota, kɔnɔw kɔlɔsili, ani nakɔsɛnɛyɔrɔw lajɛ ani kunnafoniw kalanni ye ɲɛnamaya kɛcogo kan. Misali dɔ ye ka taa bɔ, ka fotow ta, ani ka organatuangw dɔn Borneo.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛna kɛ misali ye turisimu baara la min sinsinnen bɛ sigida la?
mc_answer1: Taama kɛli ka taa jibɔyɔrɔ dɔ la
mc_answer3: Ka taa bɔ dɔnniya mise dɔ la

flores_passage: Sɔgɔma o sɔgɔma, mɔgɔw bɛ bɔ jamana dugu misɛnninw na mobili kɔnɔ ka taa u ka baarakɛyɔrɔ la, ka tɛmɛn mɔgɔ wɛrɛw fɛ minnu ka baarakɛyɔrɔ ye u bɔyɔrɔ ye sisan. Nin bolifɛnw bolicogo fangama in kɔnɔ, bɛɛ bɛ jɛ cogo dɔ la ni, ani ka dɛmɛ don, bolifɛnko siratigɛ la, min sinsinnen bɛ mɔgɔ kelen-kelen ka mobili kan. Sisan, dɔnniya b’a jira ko nin sɔrɔkoba in min kɛra kabon ye, o ye biyosfɛri bɔ a cogo sabatilen dɔ la min ye hadamadenw ka jiginni dɛmɛ san miliyɔn fila tɛmɛnenw kɔnɔ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na, jumɛn de ye bolifɛnko siratigɛ jusigilan ye?

flores_passage: Atomi bɛ Se ka Jate ko a ye fɛn bɛɛ jɔli jɔnjɔn dɔ ye. A ye fɛn ye min ka gɛlɛn kosɛbɛ min bɛ Kɛ, ka Kɛɲɛ ni Bohr ka misali nɔgɔman ye, cɛmancɛ-nucléaire (nucleus) ye min bɛ Lamini ni ɛlektrɔnikiw ye, min ni planete (planɛti) minnu bɛ tile Lamini dɔɔnin - aw ye ja 1.1 lajɛ. Nucleus (nucleus) bɛ Kɛ ni fɛn fla ye - neutrons ani protons. Protonw bɛ ni kuran charge positif ye k’a sɔrɔ neutrons tɛ charge (sara) sɔrɔ. Elektɔronw bɛ ni kuran charge négatif ye.
question: Fɛnɲɛnɛma minnu bɛ nucleus lamini, olu ka charge suguya jumɛn bɛ u la?

flores_passage: Atomi bɛ Se ka Jate ko a ye fɛn bɛɛ jɔli jɔnjɔn dɔ ye. A ye fɛn ye min ka gɛlɛn kosɛbɛ min bɛ Kɛ, ka Kɛɲɛ ni Bohr ka misali nɔgɔman ye, cɛmancɛ-nucléaire (nucleus) ye min bɛ Lamini ni ɛlektrɔnikiw ye, min ni planete (planɛti) minnu bɛ tile Lamini dɔɔnin - aw ye ja 1.1 lajɛ. Nucleus (nucleus) bɛ Kɛ ni fɛn fla ye - neutrons ani protons. Protonw bɛ ni kuran charge positif ye k’a sɔrɔ neutrons tɛ charge (sara) sɔrɔ. Elektɔronw bɛ ni kuran charge négatif ye.
question: Nucleus (nucleus) bɛ Kɛ ni fɛn jumɛnw ye?

flores_passage: Ɔridinatɛri minnu bɛ baara la bi, olu bɛɛ lajɛlen bɛ tali kɛ kunnafoniw labɛnni na minnu bɛ kodɔn ni jateden fila ye. Jateden fila bɛ se ka kɛ ni nafa fila la kelen dɔrɔn ye, n’o ye 0 walima 1 ye, wa o jateden ninnu bɛ wele ko jateden fila - walima bitiki, walasa ka baara kɛ ni ɔridinatɛri daɲɛw ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na, jumɛn ye misali ye min ye jateden duuru ye?

flores_passage: Ɔridinatɛri minnu bɛ baara la bi, olu bɛɛ lajɛlen bɛ tali kɛ kunnafoniw labɛnni na minnu bɛ kodɔn ni jateden fila ye. Jateden fila bɛ se ka kɛ ni nafa fila la kelen dɔrɔn ye, n’o ye 0 walima 1 ye, wa o jateden ninnu bɛ wele ko jateden fila - walima bitiki, walasa ka baara kɛ ni ɔridinatɛri daɲɛw ye.
question: Jatebla fila fana bɛ Weele ko mun?

flores_passage: "Bulɔguw fana bɛ se ka dɛmɛ don ka kalandenw ka sɛbɛnni ɲɛ. Hali ni kalandenw ka teli k'u ka bulɔgu dɔnniya daminɛ ni daɲɛgafe ni sɛbɛnnikɛcogo nɔgɔlen ye, a ka c'a la, lamɛnnikɛlaw ka kɛli bɛ o fɛn Changé. Ikomi a ka c'a la, kalandenw de ye lamɛnnikɛlaw ye minnu bɛ kɔrɔfɔ kosɛbɛ, bulɔgu sɛbɛnbaga b'a daminɛ k'a cɛsiri ka sɛbɛnni kɛcogo ɲɛ ka taa a fɛ."(Alimankan na) aw k’aw yɛrɛ tanga kɔrɔfɔli ma.Bulɔgudilan fana ""a bɛ kalandenw wajibiya u ka kɛ mɔgɔ ye min bɛ u lamini diɲɛ dɔn kosɛbɛ."" Mako min bɛ lamɛnnikɛlaw ka nafa balo la, o bɛ kalandenw bila ka kɛ hakilitigiw ye ani ka kɛ fɛn nafamaw ye (Toto, 2004). , ani ka kalandenw jija u ka kalan janya ka tɛmɛ bulɔguw baaracogo ɲuman kan "" bɛ se ka fanga di kalandenw ma u ka se ka jateminɛ kɛ ani ka u kɔrɔfɔ kosɛbɛ ka fara u yɛrɛ ka hakilinaw jirali kan ko kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw kan (Oravec, 2002)."
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ma fɔ tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ i n’a fɔ kalandenw ka bulɔgu nafa fɔlɔ?
mc_answer1: Yɛlɛma donna daɲɛgafe ni sɛbɛnni seko la
mc_answer2: Kɔrɔfɔli minnu bɛ bɔ ɲɔgɔn na, olu dɔgɔyali
mc_answer4: Kalan taabolo nege min bɛ ka bonya

flores_passage: "Bulɔguw fana bɛ se ka dɛmɛ don ka kalandenw ka sɛbɛnni ɲɛ. Hali ni kalandenw ka teli k'u ka bulɔgu dɔnniya daminɛ ni daɲɛgafe ni sɛbɛnnikɛcogo nɔgɔlen ye, a ka c'a la, lamɛnnikɛlaw ka kɛli bɛ o fɛn Changé. Ikomi a ka c'a la, kalandenw de ye lamɛnnikɛlaw ye minnu bɛ kɔrɔfɔ kosɛbɛ, bulɔgu sɛbɛnbaga b'a daminɛ k'a cɛsiri ka sɛbɛnni kɛcogo ɲɛ ka taa a fɛ."(Alimankan na) aw k’aw yɛrɛ tanga kɔrɔfɔli ma.Bulɔgudilan fana ""a bɛ kalandenw wajibiya u ka kɛ mɔgɔ ye min bɛ u lamini diɲɛ dɔn kosɛbɛ."" Mako min bɛ lamɛnnikɛlaw ka nafa balo la, o bɛ kalandenw bila ka kɛ hakilitigiw ye ani ka kɛ fɛn nafamaw ye (Toto, 2004). , ani ka kalandenw jija u ka kalan janya ka tɛmɛ bulɔguw baaracogo ɲuman kan "" bɛ se ka fanga di kalandenw ma u ka se ka jateminɛ kɛ ani ka u kɔrɔfɔ kosɛbɛ ka fara u yɛrɛ ka hakilinaw jirali kan ko kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw kan (Oravec, 2002)."
question: Nin bololabaara fan ninnu na, jumɛn de fɔra ka kɛ dusudon ye walasa kalandenw ka se k’u ka sɛbɛnni kɛcogo ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: Ka to ka jaabi di fɛnw ma ɛntɛrinɛti kan
mc_answer2: Nege min b’a la ka an yɛrɛ tanga kɔrɔfɔli ma

flores_passage: Kumaɲɔgɔnya min tɛ kɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ, o bɛ dusu don mɔgɔ kɔnɔ ka waati kɛ walasa ka miiri ani ka wale kɛ mɔgɔ wɛrɛw fɛ. A b’a to kalandenw bɛ se ka baara kɛ u yɛrɛ ka teliya la ani ka kalan kunnafoniw teliya kɔlɔsi. Ka fara o kan, waati dantigɛli bɛ dɔgɔya ni baarakɛwaati caman bɛ se ka wuli. (Bremer, 1998) Ɛntɛrinɛti ni diɲɛ ɛntɛrinɛti baara bɛ kɛ sababu ye kalandenw ka se ka kunnafoniw sɔrɔ waati bɛɛ. Kalandenw bɛ se fana ka ɲininkaliw di kalanfaw ma tile waati o waati, ani ka jaabi teliyalenw makɔnɔ, sanni u ka kɔnɔni kɛ fo ɲɛda ni ɲɛda lajɛ nata.

flores_passage: Laadala cɛmancɛla waatiw ka masadugu ye miirili lawuli kabini tuma jan, ka jousts, banquets ani Arthur ka sofaw jaw lawuli. flores_passage: Balocogo ɲuman dɔrɔn tɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka ɲɛnajɛ ɲumanw kɛ, nka u bɛ se ka nɔba bila farikoloɲɛnajɛla kamalenninw ka kɛnɛya bɛɛ lajɛlen na. Ni aw ye fanga balansi kɛnɛman mara, ka farikolojidɛsɛ kɛcogo ɲumanw dege, ani ka dumuni dafalanw kɛcogo suguya caman faamuya, o bɛ se ka farikoloɲɛnajɛlamɔgɔw dɛmɛ u ka baara kɛcogo ɲɛ ani ka dɔ fara u ka farikoloɲɛnajɛ diyabɔli kan.

flores_passage: MRI sinsinnen bɛ fizikiko dɔ kan min bɛ wele ko nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), o min sɔrɔla san 1930 waatiw la Felix Bloch fɛ (min bɛ baara kɛ Stanford Iniwɛrisite la) ani Edward Purcell fɛ (a bɛ bɔ Harvard Iniwɛrisite la). O rezɔn in na, magnɛti-yɔrɔ ni arajo-fiɲɛw bɛ kɛ sababu ye ka atomiw ka arajo taamasiyɛn misɛnninw bɔ. San 1970, Raymond Damadian, min ye dɔgɔtɔrɔ ye ani ɲininikɛla dɔnnikɛla, ye basigi sɔrɔ ka baara kɛ ni magnetic resonance imaging ye i n’a fɔ baarakɛminɛn min bɛ kɛ ka furakɛli sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛ. San naani o kɔfɛ, patenti dɔ dira, o min kɛra diɲɛ kɔnɔ patenti fɔlɔ ye min dira MRI siratigɛ la. San 1977, dɔgɔtɔrɔ Damadian ye “farikolo bɛɛ” MRI sɛgɛsɛgɛlikɛlan fɔlɔ jɔli dafa, a y’o wele ko ”Indomitable”.
question: Jɔn de ye nukliyɛri magɛnni rezɔn sɔrɔ?
mc_answer3: Bloch ni Purcell ye ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ

flores_passage: Hadamadenw ye suguw ye minnu ka seko ka bon kosɛbɛ mɔgɔ wɛrɛw hakili kalanni na. flores_passage: Hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ ko AI kɔrɔ ka bon dɔnniyako la, AI bɛ ɔridinatɛri dɔnniya bolofara nafamaba dɔ sigi sen kan, min bɛ tali kɛ kɛwalew, kalanni ani hakilimaya ladamuni na masin kɔnɔ. Sɛgɛsɛgɛli minnu bɛ kɛ AI la, olu bɛ tali kɛ masinw dilanni na walasa ka baara kɛ otomatiki la, baara minnu bɛ kɛ ni hakilitigiya ye. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, AI bɛ tali kɛ ninnu na jumɛn na tuma caman na?
mc_answer1: Kunnafoni minnu bɛ sɔrɔ kiliyanw fɛ

flores_passage: Miirili kɛcogo minnu bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ, olu ye gɛlɛyaw ɲɛnabɔcogo ye minnu bɛ hakilinaw walima forow danfaralenw fara ɲɔgɔn kan walasa ka fura sɔrɔ. O hakilina in sinsinnen bɛ teliya, hakilina ni tiɲɛni ye, fana tiɲɛw dɔnni, fɛɛrɛ kɔrɔw waleyali kokura, kunnafoniw lajɛli. O hakilina in nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ, o ye ko: jaabi ɲuman kelen de bɛ yen. I bɛ miiri jaabi fila dɔrɔn de la, n’o ye ko ɲuman walima ko jugu. O miiri sugu bɛ tali kɛ dɔnniya walima taabolo sariyalen dɔw la. Nin miiri sugu bɛ mɔgɔ minnu na, olu bɛ ni hakilina ye min bɛ bɛn hakili ma, u bɛ se ka misaliw to u hakili la, ka gɛlɛyaw ɲɛnabɔ ani ka baara kɛ dɔnniya sɛgɛsɛgɛliw kan.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na jumɛn ye fanga ye mɔgɔ dɔ ka miirili kɛcogo bɛ ɲɔgɔn na?
mc_answer1: Jaabi ɲuman caman sɔrɔli gɛlɛya dɔ kan
mc_answer2: Fɛɛrɛ kuraw tali gɛlɛya dɔ la
mc_answer3: U ka waati ta ka gɛlɛyaw ɲɛnabɔ
mc_answer4: Miirili kɛcogo minnu bɛ to i hakili la

flores_passage: Miirili kɛcogo minnu bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ, olu ye gɛlɛyaw ɲɛnabɔcogo ye minnu bɛ hakilinaw walima forow danfaralenw fara ɲɔgɔn kan walasa ka fura sɔrɔ. O hakilina in sinsinnen bɛ teliya, hakilina ni tiɲɛni ye, fana tiɲɛw dɔnni, fɛɛrɛ kɔrɔw waleyali kokura, kunnafoniw lajɛli. O hakilina in nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ, o ye ko: jaabi ɲuman kelen de bɛ yen. I bɛ miiri jaabi fila dɔrɔn de la, n’o ye ko ɲuman walima ko jugu. O miiri sugu bɛ tali kɛ dɔnniya walima taabolo sariyalen dɔw la. Nin miiri sugu bɛ mɔgɔ minnu na, olu bɛ ni hakilina ye min bɛ bɛn hakili ma, u bɛ se ka misaliw to u hakili la, ka gɛlɛyaw ɲɛnabɔ ani ka baara kɛ dɔnniya sɛgɛsɛgɛliw kan.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na, jumɛn tɛ jate hakilinata min bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ, o sinsinnan ye?
mc_answer1: K’a faamu ko jaabi ɲuman kelenpe de bɛ yen

flores_passage: Wideyow tali baara kɛra sababu ye ka sɔrɔ nafamaw sɔrɔ mikro-fɔcogo kɔrɔfɔli la, ɲɛda lamagacogo minnu bɛ mɛn milisekɔndi damadɔ kɔnɔ. Kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, a bɛ fɔ ko mɔgɔ bɛ se k’a dɔn ni mɔgɔ bɛ nkalon tigɛ ni mikro-fɔcogo kɔrɔfɔli ye ka ɲɛ. Oliver Sacks y’a ka sɛbɛn kɔnɔ min tɔgɔ ye ko The President’s Speech, o y’a jira cogo min na mɔgɔ minnu tɛ se ka kuma faamuya k’a sababu kɛ hakili tiɲɛni ye, o bɛɛ n’a ta, olu bɛ se ka tiɲɛni jateminɛ ka ɲɛ. A yɛrɛ b’a Jira ko o seko sugu minnu bɛ hadamadenw ka kɛwalew kɔrɔfɔli la, olu bɛ Se ka Kɛ baganw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ i n’a fɔ sokɔnɔ wuluw.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na jumɛn tɛna jate mikro-fɔcogo ye?
mc_answer1: Ka a ɲɛw bɔ yɔrɔ wɛrɛ la k’a to kuma na

flores_passage: Wideyow tali baara kɛra sababu ye ka sɔrɔ nafamaw sɔrɔ mikro-fɔcogo kɔrɔfɔli la, ɲɛda lamagacogo minnu bɛ mɛn milisekɔndi damadɔ kɔnɔ. Kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, a bɛ fɔ ko mɔgɔ bɛ se k’a dɔn ni mɔgɔ bɛ nkalon tigɛ ni mikro-fɔcogo kɔrɔfɔli ye ka ɲɛ. Oliver Sacks y’a ka sɛbɛn kɔnɔ min tɔgɔ ye ko The President’s Speech, o y’a jira cogo min na mɔgɔ minnu tɛ se ka kuma faamuya k’a sababu kɛ hakili tiɲɛni ye, o bɛɛ n’a ta, olu bɛ se ka tiɲɛni jateminɛ ka ɲɛ. A yɛrɛ b’a Jira ko o seko sugu minnu bɛ hadamadenw ka kɛwalew kɔrɔfɔli la, olu bɛ Se ka Kɛ baganw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ i n’a fɔ sokɔnɔ wuluw.
question: Nin kuma minnu fɔra mikro-fɔcogo kɔrɔfɔli kan, jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Wideyo minw minɛna, o kɛra sababu ye ka ɲɛtaa caman sɔrɔ
mc_answer2: Fasiri ɲuman bɛ se ka nkalon tigɛ
mc_answer3: Kuma ani ɲɛda cogoya fana bɛ kɔrɔfɔ
mc_answer4: A bɛ se ka dɛmɛ don ka kɔnɔnajɛya jateminɛ

flores_passage: Ni dɔnniya sɔrɔli ni kalan seko b’a Yɛlɛma cogo min na i n’a fɔ a fɔra cogo min na sanfɛ, dɔnniya sɔrɔli hakɛ basigilen b’a Yɛlɛma. Kunnafoni sɔrɔcogo tun tɛ kelen ye. Degun tun tɛ mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ ka hakilijigin kɔnɔ tugun, nka se min tun bɛ mɔgɔ la ka sɛbɛnniw hakili jigin, o kɛra fɛn ye min bɛ sinsin kosɛbɛ. A kunba ye, Renaissance ye fɛn caman Changé kalan taabolo ni dɔnniya jɛnsɛnni na.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn de nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ Renaissance sababu la?

flores_passage: Ni dɔnniya sɔrɔli ni kalan seko b’a Yɛlɛma cogo min na i n’a fɔ a fɔra cogo min na sanfɛ, dɔnniya sɔrɔli hakɛ basigilen b’a Yɛlɛma. Kunnafoni sɔrɔcogo tun tɛ kelen ye. Degun tun tɛ mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ ka hakilijigin kɔnɔ tugun, nka se min tun bɛ mɔgɔ la ka sɛbɛnniw hakili jigin, o kɛra fɛn ye min bɛ sinsin kosɛbɛ. A kunba ye, Renaissance ye fɛn caman Changé kalan taabolo ni dɔnniya jɛnsɛnni na.
question: Renaissance (Renaissance) kosɔn, sinsin ma kɛ kosɛbɛ ninnu la jumɛn kan?

flores_passage: Ɛntɛrinɛti bɛ jamanadenw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ kumaɲɔgɔnya yɔrɔ dɔw fara ɲɔgɔn kan. Ɛntɛrinɛti jogo danfaralenw bɛ na ni fɛn wɛrɛw ye baarakɛcogo n’a wasacogo siratigɛ la. Misali la, “kalan” ni “sosiyalisimu” bɛ jira iko dusudon nafamaw ɛntɛrinɛti baara la (James et al., 1995). “Mɔgɔ yɛrɛ sendonni” ani “jɛɲɔgɔnya tɛmɛnenw” fana jirala i n’a fɔ dusudon fan kura Eighmey ni McCord fɛ (1998) n’u ye lamɛnnikɛlaw ka kɛwalew sɛgɛsɛgɛ ɛntɛrinɛti yɔrɔw kan.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ dusu don mɔgɔ kɔnɔ ka baara kɛ ni ɛntɛrinɛti ye walasa ka jɛɲɔgɔnyaw taa ɲɛ?
mc_answer2: Ka to jɛɲɔgɔnya la ni denbaya ye

flores_passage: Ɛntɛrinɛti bɛ jamanadenw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ kumaɲɔgɔnya yɔrɔ dɔw fara ɲɔgɔn kan. Ɛntɛrinɛti jogo danfaralenw bɛ na ni fɛn wɛrɛw ye baarakɛcogo n’a wasacogo siratigɛ la. Misali la, “kalan” ni “sosiyalisimu” bɛ jira iko dusudon nafamaw ɛntɛrinɛti baara la (James et al., 1995). “Mɔgɔ yɛrɛ sendonni” ani “jɛɲɔgɔnya tɛmɛnenw” fana jirala i n’a fɔ dusudon fan kura Eighmey ni McCord fɛ (1998) n’u ye lamɛnnikɛlaw ka kɛwalew sɛgɛsɛgɛ ɛntɛrinɛti yɔrɔw kan.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ dusu don mɔgɔ kɔnɔ ka baara kɛ ni ɛntɛrinɛti ye walasa ka mɔgɔ yɛrɛ sen don a la?
mc_answer2: Ka sɛbɛnni kɛ ɛntɛrinɛti kan barokɛyɔrɔ dɔ kan

flores_passage: Gothique cogoya sera a dan na waati min bɛ san kɛmɛda 10nan - 11nan ni san kɛmɛda 14nan cɛ. A daminɛ na finidon tun bɛ nɔba bila Bizansi ladamu kɔrɔn fɛ. Nka, k’a sababu kɛ kumaɲɔgɔnya siraw ye minnu bɛ nɔgɔya, tilebin fɛ cogoyaw bɛ se ka to kɔfɛ san 25 fo san 30. cɛmancɛla waati laban fan fɛ Erɔpu tilebinyanfan y’a daminɛ k’u yɛrɛ ka cogoya yiriwa. o waati yiriwaliba dɔ kɛra kurusi kɛlɛw sababu la mɔgɔw y’a daminɛ ka butɔni kɛ ka finiw siri.
question: Tuma jumɛn na Erɔpu tilebinyanfan y’a dabila kosɛbɛ ka a jigi da fanga kan, ka daminɛ k’a yɛrɛ ka cogoya yiriwa?

flores_passage: Gothique cogoya sera a dan na waati min bɛ san kɛmɛda 10nan - 11nan ni san kɛmɛda 14nan cɛ. A daminɛ na finidon tun bɛ nɔba bila Bizansi ladamu kɔrɔn fɛ. Nka, k’a sababu kɛ kumaɲɔgɔnya siraw ye minnu bɛ nɔgɔya, tilebin fɛ cogoyaw bɛ se ka to kɔfɛ san 25 fo san 30. cɛmancɛla waati laban fan fɛ Erɔpu tilebinyanfan y’a daminɛ k’u yɛrɛ ka cogoya yiriwa. o waati yiriwaliba dɔ kɛra kurusi kɛlɛw sababu la mɔgɔw y’a daminɛ ka butɔni kɛ ka finiw siri.
question: Baara kɛli ni butɔni ye walasa ka finiw siri, o kɛra mun de nɔ ye?

flores_passage: An bɛ se ka ɲɛnamaya daminɛ sigida teriya siratigɛ la, an bɛ se ka fara sigida laminiko tɔn kan, wa an bɛ se ka kɛ hali walekɛlaw ye walasa ka dɔ bɔ tɔɔrɔ nataw la fo ka se hakɛ dɔ ma. O bɛ i n’a fɔ bana taamasiɲɛw furakɛli dɔrɔn a caman na. Nka, n’an t’a fɛ ka fura sɔrɔ waati dɔɔnin dɔrɔn na, o tuma na fɛ, an ka kan ka gɛlɛyaw ju sɔrɔ, wa an ka kan k’u dabila. A jɛlen don kosɛbɛ ko diɲɛ yeli caman kɛra hadamadenw ka dɔnniya ni fɛɛrɛbɔ yiriwali kosɔn, wa gɛlɛyaw bonyalen don kosɛbɛ k’a sababu kɛ jamanadenw caya kojugu ani hadamadenw ka ɲɛnamaya kɛcogo ye min bɛ tɛmɛn a dan kan.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na, jumɛn bɛ jate fura ye min bɛ se ka kɛ waatijan kɔnɔ sigida koɲɛw ɲɛnabɔli la?
mc_answer4: Ka kɛ sigida laminiko tɔnba jɛɲɔgɔn ye

flores_passage: An bɛ se ka ɲɛnamaya daminɛ sigida teriya siratigɛ la, an bɛ se ka fara sigida laminiko tɔn kan, wa an bɛ se ka kɛ hali walekɛlaw ye walasa ka dɔ bɔ tɔɔrɔ nataw la fo ka se hakɛ dɔ ma. O bɛ i n’a fɔ bana taamasiɲɛw furakɛli dɔrɔn a caman na. Nka, n’an t’a fɛ ka fura sɔrɔ waati dɔɔnin dɔrɔn na, o tuma na fɛ, an ka kan ka gɛlɛyaw ju sɔrɔ, wa an ka kan k’u dabila. A jɛlen don kosɛbɛ ko diɲɛ yeli caman kɛra hadamadenw ka dɔnniya ni fɛɛrɛbɔ yiriwali kosɔn, wa gɛlɛyaw bonyalen don kosɛbɛ k’a sababu kɛ jamanadenw caya kojugu ani hadamadenw ka ɲɛnamaya kɛcogo ye min bɛ tɛmɛn a dan kan.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nin fura ninnu na, jumɛn tɛna jate sigida koɲɛw furakɛli taamasiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Ka i sen don walew la
mc_answer3: Hakilina fɔli ɲɛnamaya kɛcogo sugandili tɛmɛnenw kan
mc_answer4: Ka ɲɛnamaya kɛ cogo la min bɛ sigida lakana kosɛbɛ

flores_passage: Fanga balansi tun ye sigida ye min kɔnɔ Erɔpu jamanaw tun b’a ɲini ka Erɔpu jamanaw bɛɛ ka jamana yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya mara. O hakilina tun ye ko Erɔpu jamanaw bɛɛ tun ka kan k’a ɲini ka jamana kelen bali ka kɛ fangatigi ye, wa o cogo la, jamana gɔfɛrɛnamanw tun bɛ to ka u ka jɛɲɔgɔnyaw Changé walasa ka balansi mara. Espaɲi ka ɲɔgɔn nɔfɛ kɛlɛ kɛra kɛlɛ fɔlɔ ye min ka ko cɛmancɛ tun ye fanga balansi ye. O kɛra yɛlɛma nafama ye, bawo Erɔpu fangatigiw tun tɛna kɛ ni dalilu ye tugun k’u kɛ diinɛ kɛlɛw ye. O cogo la, san bisaba kɛlɛ tun bɛna kɛ kɛlɛ laban ye min bɛna wele ko diinɛ kɛlɛ.
question: Jamana jumɛn na kɛlɛ fɔlɔ kɛra Erɔpu jamanaw na, a fɔra ko a cɛmancɛ ko ɲɛsinnen bɛ fanga balansi ma sanni ka kɛ ni diinɛko ye?

flores_passage: Fanga balansi tun ye sigida ye min kɔnɔ Erɔpu jamanaw tun b’a ɲini ka Erɔpu jamanaw bɛɛ ka jamana yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya mara. O hakilina tun ye ko Erɔpu jamanaw bɛɛ tun ka kan k’a ɲini ka jamana kelen bali ka kɛ fangatigi ye, wa o cogo la, jamana gɔfɛrɛnamanw tun bɛ to ka u ka jɛɲɔgɔnyaw Changé walasa ka balansi mara. Espaɲi ka ɲɔgɔn nɔfɛ kɛlɛ kɛra kɛlɛ fɔlɔ ye min ka ko cɛmancɛ tun ye fanga balansi ye. O kɛra yɛlɛma nafama ye, bawo Erɔpu fangatigiw tun tɛna kɛ ni dalilu ye tugun k’u kɛ diinɛ kɛlɛw ye. O cogo la, san bisaba kɛlɛ tun bɛna kɛ kɛlɛ laban ye min bɛna wele ko diinɛ kɛlɛ.
question: Tuma dɔw la, kɛlɛ jumɛn bɛ fɔ ko ‘diinan kɛlɛ’ laban?
mc_answer3: Kɛlɛ min kɛra Ɛsipaɲi ka ɲɔgɔn nɔfɛ

flores_passage: Erɔpu tariku waati nin waati la, Katoliki Egilisi min tun kɛra nafolotigi ye ani fangatigi ye, o kɛra sɛgɛsɛgɛli ye. San ba kelen ni kɔ kɔnɔ, Krecɛn diinɛ tun ye Erɔpu jamanaw siri ɲɔgɔn na hali ni danfara tun bɛ kanw ni laadalakow la. I A fanga min tun bɛ yɔrɔ bɛɛ, o ye nɔ bila bɛɛ la k’a ta masakɛ la ka taa a bila mɔgɔ gansanw na. Kerecɛnw ka sariyakolo jɔnjɔn dɔ ye ko nafolo ka kan ka kɛ ka tɔɔrɔ ni faantanya nɔgɔya ani ko egilisi ka wariko nafolo bɛ yen kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la o kun de kama. Eglisi ka fanga cɛmancɛ tun bɛ Romɛ kabini san ba kelen ni kɔ ani o fanga ni wari camanba in ye mɔgɔ caman bila ka ɲininkali kɛ ni o sariyakolo tun bɛ ka dafa.
question: Katoliki Egilisi yɔrɔ ninnu na, jumɛn tun tɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛ kosɛbɛ?
mc_answer1: Ni nafolo tila-tilacogo tun bɛnnen don Egilisi kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Ni diinɛ sariyakolo jɔnjɔnw ka kan ka ladilan
mc_answer4: Ni Egilisi ka sariyakolo jɔnjɔnw tun bɛ ka dafa

flores_passage: Masakɛ Louis XVI sirannenba, masakɛmuso Mari Antoinette u den fitinin fila (san 11 Marie Therese ani san naani Louis-Charles) ani Masakɛ balimamuso, Madamu Elizabɛti, Utikalo tile 6 san 1789, u wajibiyara ka segin Pari ka bɔ Versailles jamakulu dɔ fɛ ka sugu musow. Wotoro dɔ kɔnɔ, u seginna Pari k’u lamini ni jamaba ye min tun bɛ ka pɛrɛn ani ka pɛrɛn ka bagabagali kɛ Masakɛ ni Masamuso ma. Mɔgɔ jamakulu ye Masakɛ Ni Masamuso Wajibiya k’u ka wotoro finɛtiriw da wuli kosɛbɛ. Waati dɔ la, jamakulu mɔgɔ dɔ ye masakɛ ka kɔlɔsilikɛla dɔ kunkolo wuli min fagara Versailles, Masamuso sirannin ɲɛkɔrɔ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, jɔn fagara Versailles?

flores_passage: Masakɛ Louis XVI sirannenba, masakɛmuso Mari Antoinette u den fitinin fila (san 11 Marie Therese ani san naani Louis-Charles) ani Masakɛ balimamuso, Madamu Elizabɛti, Utikalo tile 6 san 1789, u wajibiyara ka segin Pari ka bɔ Versailles jamakulu dɔ fɛ ka sugu musow. Wotoro dɔ kɔnɔ, u seginna Pari k’u lamini ni jamaba ye min tun bɛ ka pɛrɛn ani ka pɛrɛn ka bagabagali kɛ Masakɛ ni Masamuso ma. Mɔgɔ jamakulu ye Masakɛ Ni Masamuso Wajibiya k’u ka wotoro finɛtiriw da wuli kosɛbɛ. Waati dɔ la, jamakulu mɔgɔ dɔ ye masakɛ ka kɔlɔsilikɛla dɔ kunkolo wuli min fagara Versailles, Masamuso sirannin ɲɛkɔrɔ.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ma wajibiya Masakɛ ni Masamuso ma jama fɛ?
mc_answer4: Taama dɔ kɛra ka segin Pari

flores_passage: Dɔɔni kɛlɛw daminɛ kɔfɛ, Angletɛri ye kɔgɔjida la kɛlɛ daminɛ Alimanjamana na. O fɛɛrɛ in kɛra nafama ye, ka sɔrɔdasi ni siwiliw ka fɛn nafamaw tigɛ, hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ o balili in ye diɲɛ sariyaw tiɲɛ minnu tun bɛ sɔn kosɛbɛ, n’u sɛbɛnna diɲɛ bɛnkan caman fɛ san kɛmɛ fila tɛmɛnenw kɔnɔ. Angletɛri ye jamana wɛrɛw ka jibɔyɔrɔw minɛ walisa kurun si kana don kɔgɔji yɔrɔ bɛɛ la, o kɛra sababu ye ka farati lase hali kurunw ma minnu tɛ u sen don a la. Ikomi jaabi danmadɔ tun bɛ o fɛɛrɛ in na, Alimanjamana tun bɛ o jaabi ɲɔgɔn makɔnɔ a ka jidagayɔrɔ kɛlɛ dan tɛ min na.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ma kɛ Angletɛri ka kɔgɔjida kɛlɛw la minnu tun tɛ laadalako ye?
mc_answer1: Alimanjamana b’a fɛ ka o kɛlɛ fɛɛrɛ suguw kɛ
mc_answer2: Kurun minnu sen tɛ o la, olu bilala kojugu sira la
mc_answer4: Fɛn nafamaw tun tɛ se ka sɔrɔ

flores_passage: Dɔɔni kɛlɛw daminɛ kɔfɛ, Angletɛri ye kɔgɔjida la kɛlɛ daminɛ Alimanjamana na. O fɛɛrɛ in kɛra nafama ye, ka sɔrɔdasi ni siwiliw ka fɛn nafamaw tigɛ, hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ o balili in ye diɲɛ sariyaw tiɲɛ minnu tun bɛ sɔn kosɛbɛ, n’u sɛbɛnna diɲɛ bɛnkan caman fɛ san kɛmɛ fila tɛmɛnenw kɔnɔ. Angletɛri ye jamana wɛrɛw ka jibɔyɔrɔw minɛ walisa kurun si kana don kɔgɔji yɔrɔ bɛɛ la, o kɛra sababu ye ka farati lase hali kurunw ma minnu tɛ u sen don a la. Ikomi jaabi danmadɔ tun bɛ o fɛɛrɛ in na, Alimanjamana tun bɛ o jaabi ɲɔgɔn makɔnɔ a ka jidagayɔrɔ kɛlɛ dan tɛ min na.
question: Kuma jumɛn tɛ Angletɛri ka kɔgɔjida-kɛlɛ-kɛlɛli ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ Alimanjamana kama?
mc_answer2: O ye Alimanjamana ka ji jukɔrɔla kɛlɛ bila
mc_answer3: O ye Alemaɲi ka fɛnw bolicogo tigɛ
mc_answer4: A y’a to kurun minnu tɛ mɔgɔ si ta ye, olu kana kɛ farati la

flores_passage: Ameriki jamana bɛɛ la, mɔgɔ 400.000 ɲɔgɔn bɛ yen minnu dɔnna ka kɛ sklerose multiple (MS) ye, o b’a to a bɛ kɛ hakilibana ye min ka bon kosɛbɛ baliku fitiniw ni baliku cɛmancɛw la. MS ye bana ye min bɛ farikolo yɔrɔw minɛ, o min bɛ kɛ ni kunsɛmɛ, kɔkolo ani ɲɛkisɛw ye. Sɛgɛsɛgɛliw y’a jira ko MS ka teli ka musow sɔrɔ ka tɛmɛ cɛw kan siɲɛ fila.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, sklerose multiple (Sclérose multiple) sɛgɛsɛgɛli bɛna kɛ jɔn bolo kosɛbɛ?
mc_answer1: Muso dɔ min si bɛ san 32 la
mc_answer2: Cɛ dɔ min si bɛ san 15 la
mc_answer3: Cɛ dɔ min si bɛ san 43 la
mc_answer4: Muso min si bɛ san 10 na

flores_passage: Nin ɲinini in y’a jira ko degun, siran ani balawu ye jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ dimi ni nalomanya cɛ kɔdimi bɛ mɔgɔ minnu na. Balawuli nɔw dɔrɔn de tun bɛ kɛ dɔgɔkun o dɔgɔkun PA kalan bolodalenw na tuma bɛɛ, degun ni siran tɛ. Minnu tun bɛ baara kɛ tuma bɛɛ, olu tun bɛ dɛmɛ caman de wajibiya dimi faamuyali jugu siratigɛ la min bɛ dimi basigilen ni dusukasi dusukunnataw danfara bɔ farikolo lamagacogo ɲuman na.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mɔgɔ minnu tun bɛ baara kɛ tuma bɛɛ, olu tun bɛ dɛmɛ caman de wajibiya mun na?

flores_passage: Bi farikoloɲɛnajɛ min ye nɛgɛso ye, o bɛ kɛ sanfɛyɔrɔ caman na, k’a ta kalandenw na minnu bɛ kalan kɛ inivɛrisite la ka se baarakɛlaw ni Olɛnpi ɲɔgɔndanw ma. O farikoloɲɛnajɛ in bɛ Kɛ fɔlɔ duel (duel) cogo la, fencer kelen bɛ duel (duel) wɛrɛ Kɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, a ka c’a la, fencing bɛ tulon kɛ cogo di?

flores_passage: Kɔnɔna baga bɛ se ka kɛ a tɛ ye o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ. Taamasiɲɛw, i n’a fɔ fɔɔnɔ, olu ka ca fo a tɛ se ka a sɛgɛsɛgɛ joona. Kɔnɔna baga jiracogo ɲuman bɛ se ka kɛ fura walima du kɔnɔ furakisɛ bagalenw minɛn dafalen dɔ sɔrɔli ye. Aw bɛ sɛbɛnfura lajɛ ni dɛmɛ fɔlɔ cikan kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw bɛ o baga kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen na.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na, jumɛn bɛna kɛ kɔnɔna baga jiralan barikama ye?

flores_passage: Walasa ka jatigɛwalekɛla Lajɛ, aw ka kan ka fɔlɔ ka yɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛ walasa ka a dɔn ko aw lakananen don. Aw ka kan ka jatigɛwalekɛla jɔyɔrɔ kɔlɔsi ni aw bɛ gɛrɛ a la ani darapo bilenman otomatiki otomatiki. Ni i dusu tiɲɛna k’a ɲini ka dɛmɛ don, i bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka ko juguya dɔrɔn.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, fɛɛrɛ fɔlɔ bɛnnen jumɛn bɛ kɛ ni i bɛ jatigɛwalekɛla dɔ jateminɛ?
mc_answer1: Aw ye o ko kɛlenw kɔlɔsi

flores_passage: Walasa ka jatigɛwalekɛla Lajɛ, aw ka kan ka fɔlɔ ka yɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛ walasa ka a dɔn ko aw lakananen don. Aw ka kan ka jatigɛwalekɛla jɔyɔrɔ kɔlɔsi ni aw bɛ gɛrɛ a la ani darapo bilenman otomatiki otomatiki. Ni i dusu tiɲɛna k’a ɲini ka dɛmɛ don, i bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka ko juguya dɔrɔn.
question: Nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn tɛ jatigɛwalekɛla dɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛli taabolo jira ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: Aw kana hami aw yɛrɛ joginw sɔrɔli la
mc_answer2: Aw bɛ yɔrɔ jateminɛ min bɛ kɛ ka kɔn mɔgɔ tɔɔrɔlen ɲɛ
mc_answer3: Aw bɛ mɔgɔ min tɔɔrɔla, o jɔyɔrɔ kɔlɔsi
mc_answer4: Aw ye aw jija ka aw janto darapo bilenman o bilenman na

flores_passage: Sosiyete ni politiki nɔ caman bɛ yen i n’a fɔ mɛtɛrɛko siratigɛ la, jiginni ka bɔ absolutismu la ka taa republicanisme la, fasodenɲumanya ani dannaya min b’a la ko jamana ye jamanadenw ta ye, a tɛ faama kelen ta ye. Fana Revolisiyɔn kɔfɛ baaraw dabɔra cɛ ɲininikɛlaw bɛɛ ye k’a to mɔgɔ minnu ka ŋaniya ka bon kosɛbɛ ani minnu ye ɲɛtaa sɔrɔ kosɛbɛ, olu ka se ka ɲɛtaa sɔrɔ. O cogo kelen de bɛ kɛ sɔrɔdasiw fana na bawo sanni sɔrɔdasiw ka jatew ka da kalasi kan u tun sinsinnen bɛ cailaber kan sisan. Franse ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya fana ye jamana wɛrɛw ka baarakɛlaw caman wɛrɛw bila ka wuli ka u yɛrɛ ka wuliliko daminɛ.
question: Yɛlɛma minnu kɛra The French Revolution fɛ, olu la jumɛn de ye nɔba bila baarakɛlaw ka jamanadenw na?
mc_answer1: Dɔ farala jamana ka dɛmɛ kan
mc_answer2: Sinsinnan jiginni ka bɔ kalanso la ka taa seko la

question: Faransi ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya kɔfɛ, ɲɛtaa sɔrɔli sɔrɔdasiya la ani baara wɛrɛw la, a tun man teli ka bɔ mun de la?

flores_passage: Bɛɛ b’a sen don jamana kɔnɔ, wa a bɛ baara kɛ ni bolifɛnw ye. A bɛ se ka fɔ ko bɛɛ bɛ ŋunan bolifɛnko siratigɛ la. Jamana yiriwalenw na, i man teli ka o ɲininkali suguw mɛn jiko walima bɔrɔw binni kan. Mun na bolifɛnw bɛ o ɲininkali suguw lawuli, mun na u bɛ dɛsɛ don o don? Yala bolifɛnko injiniyɛriw tɛ se dɔrɔn wa? Walima, yala fɛn dɔ bɛ sen na min ka bon kosɛbɛ wa?
question: A fɔra ko foroba baara jumɛn de bɛ wasabaliya lase jamana yiriwalenw ma kosɛbɛ?

flores_passage: Bɛɛ b’a sen don jamana kɔnɔ, wa a bɛ baara kɛ ni bolifɛnw ye. A bɛ se ka fɔ ko bɛɛ bɛ ŋunan bolifɛnko siratigɛ la. Yala bolifɛnko injiniyɛriw tɛ se dɔrɔn wa? Walima, yala fɛn dɔ bɛ sen na min ka bon kosɛbɛ wa?
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun bɛ se ka fɔ foroba bolifɛnw ko la?
mc_answer1: bɛ kanu kosɛbɛ mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ baara kɛ n’u ye
mc_answer2: U man jugu i n’a fɔ ji cogoya
mc_answer3: U bɛ ŋunan caman lase mɔgɔ ma minnu bɛ baara kɛ n’u ye
mc_answer4: U hɔrɔnyalen don jamana yiriwalen fanba la

flores_passage: Traffic Flow ye bolifɛntigi kelen-kelenw ni mɔbiliw ka taamacogo kalanni ye yɔrɔ fila ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ ani u bɛ jɛɲɔgɔnya minnu kɛ ni ɲɔgɔn ye. A fɔ man di nka, sirako taabolo kalanni ka gɛlɛn bawo bolifɛntigiw ka kɛwalew tɛ se ka fɔ ka ɲɛ ni dannaya ye kɛmɛsarada la. A nisondiyalen don ko bolifɛntigiw ka teli ka u yɛrɛ minɛ cogo la min bɛ bɛn ɲɔgɔn ma; o la, sirako siraw ka teli ka kɛ ni bɛnkan dɔw ye minnu bɛ se ka kɛ, wa u bɛ se ka jira jatebɔ siratigɛ la. Walasa ka sirako taabolo jira ka ɲɛ, jɛɲɔgɔnyaw sigira senkan jogoba saba ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ: (1) bolicogo, (2) density ani (3) teliya. O jɛɲɔgɔnyaw bɛ dɛmɛ don sirabakan-minɛnw labɛnni, u dilanni ani u baaracogo la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn bɛ se ka gɛlɛya ka jateminɛ kɛ k’a sababu kɛ bolifɛntigiw ka ko ye min tɛ se ka fɔ ka ɲɛ?

O jɛɲɔgɔnyaw bɛ dɛmɛ don sirabakan-minɛnw labɛnni, u dilanni ani u baaracogo la.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn bɛ baara kɛ ni sirako sira jirali ye jatebɔ siratigɛ la?

flores_passage: Hershey ni Chase ka kɔrɔbɔli kɛra hakilina fɔlɔ dɔ ye min b’a jira ko ADN ye fɛn ye min bɛ bɔ jamu la. Hershey ni Chase ye baara kɛ ni fagew walima banakisɛw ye walasa k’u yɛrɛ ka ADN don banakisɛ dɔ kɔnɔ. U ye kɔrɔbɔli fila Kɛ ka ADN min bɛ faji kɔnɔ, o taamaʃyɛn Kɛ ni fosiporozɛni ye min bɛ Se ka Kɛ ni fosiporozɛni ye walima faji ka poroteyini ni kisɛkisɛ ye.
question: Hershey ni Chase ye mun kɛ walasa k’u ka ADN don a kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Fosiporozɛni min bɛ kɛ ni radiyowaati ye
mc_answer2: Fɛn min bɛ kɛ ni jamu ye
mc_answer3: Kisɛkisɛ min bɛ kɛ ni radiyowaati ye

flores_passage: Yɛlɛma bɛ se ka nɔ suguya caman bila ka kɛɲɛ ni fɛn falen suguya ye, fɛn min bɛ sɔrɔ jamu yɔrɔ min na, o nafa ani ni farikolokisɛ minnu tɔɔrɔla, olu ye tumuw ye. Yɛlɛma minnu bɛ kɛ tumuw la, olu dɔrɔn de bɛ se ka lase denmisɛnw ma, ka sɔrɔ fɛn falen minnu bɛ yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la, olu bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka selilɛriw faga walima ka kansɛri bila mɔgɔ la.
question: Se min bɛ fɛn falen-falen dɔ lase denw ma, o bɛ bɔ mun de la?
mc_answer2: Nafa min bɛ sɔrɔ jamu fɛnw na
mc_answer4: Ni fɛn falen in bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka selilu-saya

flores_passage: Yɛlɛma bɛ se ka nɔ suguya caman bila ka kɛɲɛ ni fɛn falen suguya ye, fɛn min bɛ sɔrɔ jamu yɔrɔ min na, o nafa ani ni farikolokisɛ minnu tɔɔrɔla, olu ye tumuw ye. Yɛlɛma minnu bɛ kɛ tumuw la, olu dɔrɔn de bɛ se ka lase denmisɛnw ma, ka sɔrɔ fɛn falen minnu bɛ yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la, olu bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka selilɛriw faga walima ka kansɛri bila mɔgɔ la.
question: Ka da kunnafoniw kan minnu dira tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, fɛn falen-falen nɔ suguyaw tɛ u jigi da mun kan?
mc_answer1: Jɛnkulu ka fɛn hakɛ min bɛ nɔ bila a la
mc_answer2: Ni farikolokisɛ minnu banana, olu ye tumuw ye
mc_answer3: Fɛn min bɛ kɛ ni jamu ye, o nafa ka bon
mc_answer4: Mutation (fɛn falen-falen) suguya min bɛ a la

flores_passage: bɛ iko bakɔrɔnw fɔlɔla ka ladon a bɛ san 10 000 ɲɔgɔn bɔ Iran Zagros kuluw la. Ladamu kɔrɔw ni kabilaw y’a daminɛ k’u mara walasa ka nɔnɔ, kunsigi, sogo ani fari sɔrɔ nɔgɔya la. A ka c’a la, sokɔnɔbaganw tun bɛ mara kuluw kɔnɔ minnu tun bɛ yaala-yaala kuluw kan walima baganmarayɔrɔ wɛrɛw la, tuma caman na, bakɔrɔnw tun bɛ u ladon minnu tun bɛ to ka kɛ denmisɛnw walima funankɛninw ye, o ni sagagɛnna min tun bɛ dɔn kosɛbɛ. O baganmara fɛɛrɛ ninnu bɛ Kɛ hali bì.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tun tɛ kun ye min b’a to kɔrɔlenw ka laadalakow tun bɛ bakɔrɔnw mara?
mc_answer1: U ye sogo sɔrɔli sira Di
mc_answer2: U ye dɛmɛ don dugukolo baganmara la
mc_answer4: U ye nɔnɔ sɔrɔli sira Di

flores_passage: Gɔlf ye tulon ye min kɔnɔ, ntolatannaw bɛ baara kɛ ni berew ye walasa ka bolow gosi dingɛw kɔnɔ. Dingɛ tan ni segin bɛ Kɛ 'taama sabatilen dɔ la, a ka c'a la, ntolatannaw bɛ Daminɛ dingɛ fɔlɔ la sira kan, ka Ban tan ni seegin na. Furuɲɔgɔnma min bɛ sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛ, walima kuluba ka sɛgɛn fitininw ta, walasa ka kalan in dafa, o de bɛ se sɔrɔ. Tulon bɛ Kɛ bin kan, bin min bɛ dingɛ lamini na, o bɛ tigɛ ka surunya k'a Weele ko jirisunba.
question: Gɔlf laɲini ye ka mun hakɛ fitinin ta?

flores_passage: Dɔnniya kuntilenna jɔnjɔn ye ka diɲɛ baara kɛcogo dɔn dɔnniya fɛɛrɛ fɛ. O fɛɛrɛ in bɛ dɔnniya ɲinini fanba ɲɛminɛ tiɲɛ na. A kelen tɛ kɔni, kɔrɔbɔli, wa kɔrɔbɔli ye kɔrɔbɔli ye min bɛ Kɛ ka hakilina kelen walima caman Bɔ yen minnu bɛ Se ka Kɛ, ka ɲininkaliw Kɛ, ani kɔlɔsiliw fana bɛ dɔnniya ɲininiw ɲɛminɛ.
question: Kɔrɔbɔli dɔ kun ye min bɛ kɛ cogoya la?
mc_answer1: Walasa ka hakilina kelen walima caman bɔ yen minnu bɛ se ka kɛ
mc_answer2: Walasa k’a dɔn diɲɛ bɛ baara kɛ cogo min na

flores_passage: Dɔnniya kuntilenna jɔnjɔn ye ka diɲɛ baara kɛcogo dɔn dɔnniya fɛɛrɛ fɛ. O fɛɛrɛ in bɛ dɔnniya ɲinini fanba ɲɛminɛ tiɲɛ na. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun tɛ dɛmɛ ka dɔnniya ɲininiw ɲɛminɛ?
mc_answer3: Ka hakilinaw bɔ yen minnu bɛ se ka kɛ

flores_passage: Fɔɲɔba bɛ yɔrɔ fitinin dɔ minɛ ni i y’a suma ni fɔɲɔba jugu tɔw ye, nka u bɛ se ka fɛn bɛɛ tiɲɛ u ka sira kan. Fɔɲɔba bɛ jiriw wuli, ka pankurunw tigɛ ka bɔ sow kɔnɔ, ka mobili fili san fɛ. Fɔɲɔba kɛmɛsarada la, fila minnu ka jugu kosɛbɛ, olu bɛ tɛmɛ lɛri saba kan. O fɔɲɔba ninnu fiɲɛ bɛ Se kilomɛtɛrɛ 480 ma lɛrɛ kɔnɔ (133 m/s; 300 mph).
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, kuma jumɛn fɔra fɔɲɔba kan, o tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Fɔɲɔba bɛ se ka fɛn bɛɛ tiɲɛ u lamini na
mc_answer2: Fɔɲɔba bɛ yɔrɔ fitininw de minɛ ka tɛmɛ fɔɲɔba tɔw kan
mc_answer3: Fɔɲɔba fanba bɛ Tɛmɛ lɛri saba kan
mc_answer4: Fɔɲɔba dɔw bɛ se ka kɛ ni fiɲɛ ye fo ka se kilomɛtɛrɛ 300 ma lɛrɛ kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Fɔɲɔba bɛ yɔrɔ fitinin dɔ minɛ ni i y’a suma ni fɔɲɔba jugu tɔw ye, nka u bɛ se ka fɛn bɛɛ tiɲɛ u ka sira kan. Fɔɲɔba bɛ jiriw wuli, ka pankurunw tigɛ ka bɔ sow kɔnɔ, ka mobili fili san fɛ. Fɔɲɔba kɛmɛsarada la, fila minnu ka jugu kosɛbɛ, olu bɛ tɛmɛ lɛri saba kan. question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn bɛ fɔɲɔba fanba ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: A ka c’a la, u bɛ mɛn lɛri saba ni kɔ
mc_answer2: U bɛ fiɲɛw Dabɔ kilomɛtɛrɛ 480 ɲɔgɔn na lɛrɛ kelen kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: U bɛ nɔ bila yɔrɔbaw la ka tɛmɛ fɔɲɔba tɔw kan
mc_answer4: U bɛ se ka jiriw tigɛ ka bɔ duguma

flores_passage: Hadamadenw bɛ ka lensɛriw dilan ani ka baara kɛ ni u ye walasa ka fɛnw bonya kabini san ba caman ani san ba caman. Nka, teleskɔpu lakika fɔlɔw dilanna Erɔpu jamanaw na san kɛmɛ 16nan laban na. O teleskɔpuw tun bɛ baara kɛ ni lensɛri fila faralen ye ɲɔgɔn kan walasa ka fɛn yɔrɔjanw kɛ i n’a fɔ u ka surun ani u ka bon.

question: Hadamadenw bɛ ka fɛnw bonya kabini tuma jumɛn ni lensɛriw ye?

flores_passage: Muhamadu tun b’a mago don kosɛbɛ kow la minnu tun bɛ nin diɲɛ ɲɛnamaya gansan kɔfɛ. A tun bɛ to ka taa kɔba dɔ la min tɔgɔ dara ko “Hira’” “Noor” (yeelen) kulu kan walasa ka miiri. he cave yɛrɛ, min ye waatiw kisi, o bɛ Muhamadu ka hakilimaya negew ja ɲɛnamaba di. A lafiɲɛnen bɛ kulu dɔ sanfɛ Makka worodugu fɛ, o kɔ in yɔrɔ ka jan pewu diɲɛ tɔ la. Tiɲɛ na, a sɔrɔli man nɔgɔn fewu hali ni mɔgɔ tun b’a dɔn ko a bɛ yen. Ni a donna kɔdingɛ kɔnɔ, a bɛ kɛ yɔrɔ ye min bɛ a dan na pewu. Foyi tɛ se ka ye ni sankolo jɛlen ni cɛɲi tɛ sanfɛ ani kulu caman minnu bɛ a lamini na. Nin diɲɛ in ko fitinin dɔrɔn de bɛ Se ka Ye walima k’a Mɛn ka Bɔ kɔdingɛ kɔnɔ.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, Muhamadu ka kuluba bɛ mun fɔ a ka hakilimaya walew walima a ka nafaw kan?
mc_answer1: A bɛ hɛrɛ ni mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ jate fɛnba ye
mc_answer2: Kɛnɛma mankan bɛ se ka dɛmɛ don ka miiri
mc_answer3: A mago tun tɛ waati dɔɔnin dɔrɔn de la a kelen na
mc_answer4: A tun jɔrɔlen don walisa a ka ye ani ka mɛn

flores_passage: Wotoro siraw jɔra Angletɛri kabini san kɛmɛ 16nan na. Hali ni wotoro siraw tun ye jirisunw ye minnu bɛ taa ɲɔgɔn fɛ dɔrɔn, u tun b’a to sow minnu tun bɛ u sama, olu ka se ka teliyaba sɔrɔ ani ka doni belebelebaw sama ka tɛmɛ o waati siraw kan minnu tun ka gɛlɛn dɔɔnin. Crossties (kurunw) donna sen kan joona kosɛbɛ walasa ka siraw minɛ u nɔ na. Nka, dɔɔni dɔɔni, a y’a ye ko siraw bɛna baara kɛ ka ɲɛ ni nɛgɛdaga dɔ tun bɛ u sanfɛ. O kɛra ko ye min bɛ kɛ tuma bɛɛ, nka nɛgɛ ye wotoroninw ka jiriw sɛgɛn kosɛbɛ. A laban na, jiri wotoroninw bilala nɛgɛ wotoro nɔ na. San 1767, nɛgɛso dafalen fɔlɔw donna sen kan.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nɛgɛ tun bɛ kɛ mun na fɔlɔ?

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun na jiri wotoroninw bilala nɛgɛ wotoro nɔ na?
mc_answer1: A ye dɔ fara sow teliya kan
mc_answer2: U tun bɛ jate ko u bɛ baara kɛ ka ɲɛ
mc_answer3: U tun bɛ se ka doni belebelebaw ta
mc_answer4: Nɛgɛ min tun bɛ siraw kan, o tun bɛ ka u sɛgɛn

flores_passage: Romantiki tun bɛ ni fɛnba ye min tun bɛ laadalakow latigɛcogo la, min bɔra sɛbɛnnikɛlaw la i n’a fɔ Goethe, Fichte ani Schlegel. Romantiki hukumu kɔnɔ, dugukoloko ye mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ labɛn, wa waati tɛmɛnen kɔfɛ, laadalakow ni laadalakow minnu bɛ tali kɛ o dugukoloko la, olu wulila, wa ninnu, k’a sɔrɔ u bɛ bɛn jamana yɔrɔ ma, u tun ka fisa ni sariyaw ye minnu tun bɛ bila u yɛrɛ sago la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun ye mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ cogoya Romanticisme waati la?

flores_passage: "Fɛɛrɛko dantigɛli ye daɲɛ ye min bɛ hakilina caman lajɛ waleyali la, k'a ta fɛɛrɛtigɛ-push walima fɛɛrɛbɔ wajibiyalen na ka se hakilina gɛlɛn ma min b'a jira ko hadamaden ka siniɲɛsigi bɛ bila hakilina basigilen dɔ fɛ min bɛ tali kɛ dɔnniya sariyaw n'u jirali la fɛɛrɛtigɛ la. Fasiri fanba bɛ fɛɛrɛtigɛ dantigɛliw bɛ hakilina camanba fila ta : ko fɛɛrɛbɔ yɛrɛ bɛ tugu sira la min ka bon kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛ laadalakow walima politiki fanga kan, wa ko fɛɛrɛbɔ bɛ ""nɔ bila"" jamanaw na minnu bɛ danbe la, sanni ka kɛ sigida cogoya ye Misali la, mɔgɔ bɛ se ka kɛ k’a fɔ ko mɔbili bɛ taa ni siraw yiriwali ye wajibiya la Nka, jamana bɛɛ kɔnɔ sirako siratigɛ tɛ se ka kɛ mobili damadɔ dɔrɔn ye, o de kama, a dilanni fɛɛrɛ kuraw bɛ labɛn walasa ka dɔ bɔ mobili tigiyali musakaw la ka kasaara caya siraw kan, o min bɛ na ni fɛɛrɛ kuraw dabɔli ye kɛnɛyako la walasa ka farikolo tiɲɛnenw dilan."
question: Nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn tɛ hakilina caman jira min bɛ tali kɛ fɛɛrɛtigɛ dantigɛli la?
mc_answer1: Fɛnɲɛnɛmako bɛ nɔ minnu bila sigida la, olu bɛ tali kɛ sigida la
mc_answer2: Fɛnɲɛnɛma yiriwali tɛ nɔ bila ladamu la
mc_answer3: Fɛnɲɛnɛmako bɛ nɔ bila jamana kɔnɔ a danma
mc_answer4: Fɛnɲɛnɛma yiriwali tɛ sinsin politiki fanga kan

flores_passage: """sanfɛ bow"" taamasiyɛn bɛ i n'a fɔ V ani ""down bow mark"" i n'a fɔ staple walima square min tɛ a duguma fan fɛ. Sanfɛ kɔrɔ ye ko i ka kan ka daminɛ a kun na ka bow Gɛn, duguma kɔrɔ ye i ye ka kan ka daminɛ wulu la (o ye i bolo bɛ nɛgɛso minɛ yɔrɔ min na) ka bɔgɔdaga sama a ka c’a la, sanfɛla bɛ mankan nɔgɔlen bɔ, ka sɔrɔ jiginɛ bɛ mankan min bɔ, o barika ka bon ani a bɛ a yɛrɛ jira , nka aw hakili to a la ko bonya taamasiyɛn sɛbɛnnenw bɛ yen fɔli kun dɔ de kama, o la a ka c'a la, u ka kan ka bonya."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn tɛ tali kɛ bɔgɔdaga samali la?
mc_answer2: Taamaʃyɛn min bɛ i n’a fɔ fɛnba dɔ
mc_answer4: A bɛ daminɛ ni wulu ye

flores_passage: Hominids tɛ i n’a fɔ fɛnɲɛnama tɔw, u tɛ baara Kɛ n’u bolow ye tugun taama na walima ka girinya ta walima ka wuli jiriw cɛma. Simpanzi bolo ni sen bɛ ɲɔgɔn ta u bonya n’u janya la, o b’a jira ko bolo bɛ kɛ ka girinya ta nɛgɛbere taama na. Adamaden bolo ka surun ka tɛmɛ sen kan, a farilajiw tilennen don. flores_passage: San kɛmɛ mugannan ɲininiw y’a jira ko jamu caman ɲɔgɔnna caman bɛ yen: dogolenw ani minnu jiralen don. Yɛlɛma bɛ jamu caman ɲɔgɔnna kura fara a kan, wa sugandili b’a bɔ fɛn caman sɛgɛsɛgɛli jiralenw ka jidagayɔrɔ la. Danfara ni ɲɔgɔndɛmɛ bɛ ɲɔgɔn falen-falen ɲɔgɔn na ka taa ɲɛfɛ ka segin jidagayɔrɔ fila ninnu cɛ ni bɔnsɔn kelen-kelen bɛɛ ye.

flores_passage: "Kan savana kan, a ka gɛlɛn primate ma, dumunikɛcogo bɛ min na i n'a fɔ hadamadenw ta, k'a ka asidi aminiki wajibiyalenw wasa ka bɔ jiriw nafolo sɔrɔlenw na. mc_answer3: Bonya min bɛ mɔgɔ dusu tiɲɛ

flores_passage: Ladamuni fitininw bɛ mɔgɔ kelen-kelenw lajɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ minnu hakilina ye kelen ye, minnu b’a miiri ko jamana ka sariyaw ma u janto u la, wa u b’a to u ka se ka u yɛrɛ dɔn. Ladamuni fitininw bɛ se ka kɛ danfara ye k’a sababu kɛ tɔndenw si hakɛ, u siya, u ka kalasi, u sigiyɔrɔ ani/walima u cɛya ni musoya. Jogo minnu bɛ ladamu fitinin dɔ dantigɛ iko danfara, olu bɛ se ka kɛ kanko, cɛɲi, diinɛ, politiki, cɛnimusoya, dugukoloko walima fɛnw faralen ɲɔgɔn kan. Tuma caman na, ladamu fitinin dɔ kɔnɔmɔgɔw b’u ka tɔndenw jira ni baara kɛcogo danfaralen ni taamasyɛn ye, min kɔnɔ, finidoncogo, kɛcogo ani argot bɛ sɔrɔ.
question: Ladamu fitinin kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ kɔnɔmɔgɔw bɛ to k’u ka jɛɲɔgɔnya jira ni kulu ye cogo di?
mc_answer1: Ni a b’a ɲini ka fara ɲɔgɔn kan
mc_answer2: U kɛtɔ ka u lamini mɔgɔ bɛɛ ka dannayakow ta
mc_answer3: Ni u sɔnna jamana ka sariyaw ma
mc_answer4: Ni baara kɛra ni cogoya ye i n’a fɔ taamasyɛn sugu dɔ

flores_passage: Denmisɛnw bɛ siya ni siyako miiriyaw dɔn u denmisɛnman ani o siyako miiriyaw bɛ nɔ bila kɛwalew la. Misali la, denmisɛn minnu b’u yɛrɛ jira siya fitinin dɔ la, n’u bɛ miiri ko u tɛ se ka baara kɛ koɲuman lakɔli la, olu ka teli ka kɛ koɲuman lakɔli la ni u ye siyako dɔn min bɛ tali kɛ u siya la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni hakilina ye min jirala tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, mun bɛ se ka kɛ denmisɛnnin na min b’a yɛrɛ jira siya fitinin dɔ la min bɛ jate mɔgɔ ye min bɛ mɔgɔ bila ka bagabagali kɛ?
mc_answer1: Den bɛna a ɲini a kana a sen don bagabagali kɛcogo la
mc_answer2: Den bɛna a sen don kosɛbɛ bagabagali kɛcogo la
mc_answer3: Den bɛna a yɛrɛ bɔ a yɛrɛ la sigida cogoyaw la
mc_answer4: Den bɛna ban ka jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ ni siya fitinin wɛrɛw ye

flores_passage: Denmisɛnw bɛ siya ni siyako miiriyaw dɔn u denmisɛnman ani o siyako miiriyaw bɛ nɔ bila kɛwalew la. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, denmisɛn ka siyako dɔnniya bɛ se ka nɔ bila ninnu la jumɛn na?
mc_answer1: U bɛ siya fitinin min sugandi k’u yɛrɛ jira

flores_passage: "Fɛɛrɛ minnu bɛ kɛ ka sigidamɔgɔw ka jɛɲɔgɔnya nafa jira, olu dɔ la kelen ye ka denmisɛnninw ka ko jugu damadɔw ta minnu kɛra, ka da u ɲɛmajɔbaliya kan, ka balawu kɛ, walima ka u tɔɔrɔ ni laɲini ye, balikuw ma jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ ni u ye k'u to u ka bonya la. O denmisɛn suguw bɛ wele."(Alimankan na) ""kungo kɔnɔ"" walima kungo kɔnɔ denmisɛn dɔw bilala kaso la mɔgɔw fɛ (a ka c'a la, u yɛrɛ bangebagaw de ye ko dɔw la, o kɛra sababu ye bangebagaw ka ban den ka hakili walima farikolo dɛsɛ jugumanba la denmisɛnninw ka tɔɔrɔ jugumanba walima bɔnɛba sanni u ka bila walima ka boli, a fɔra ko dɔw lamɔna kungo kɔnɔ u yɛrɛ ma Ni bagan minnu tɛ hadamadenw ye, olu lamɔna pewu kɛwalew (farikolo dan kɔnɔ) a bɛ se ka fɔ ko u bɛɛ bɛ i n’a fɔ ladonni-bagan kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen ta, i n’a fɔ a ka siran walima a ka hami hadamadenw na."

mc_answer4: Jɔrɔnanko min bɛ sɔrɔ sigida la

flores_passage: "Fɛɛrɛ minnu bɛ kɛ ka sigidamɔgɔw ka jɛɲɔgɔnya nafa jira, olu dɔ la kelen ye ka denmisɛnninw ka ko jugu damadɔw ta minnu kɛra, ka da u ɲɛmajɔbaliya kan, ka balawu kɛ, walima ka u tɔɔrɔ ni laɲini ye, balikuw ma jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ ni u ye k'u to u ka bonya la. O denmisɛn suguw bɛ wele."(Alimankan na) ""kungo kɔnɔ"" walima kungo kɔnɔ denmisɛn dɔw bilala kaso la mɔgɔw fɛ (a ka c'a la, u yɛrɛ bangebagaw de ye ko dɔw la, o kɛra sababu ye bangebagaw ka ban den ka hakili walima farikolo dɛsɛ jugumanba la denmisɛnninw ka tɔɔrɔ jugumanba walima bɔnɛba sanni u ka bila walima ka boli, a fɔra ko dɔw lamɔna kungo kɔnɔ u yɛrɛ ma Ni bagan minnu tɛ hadamadenw ye, olu lamɔna pewu kɛwalew (farikolo dan kɔnɔ) a bɛ se ka fɔ ko u bɛɛ bɛ i n’a fɔ ladonni-bagan kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen ta, i n’a fɔ a ka siran walima a ka hami hadamadenw na."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na, jumɛn bɛ kungo kɔnɔkow ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ denmisɛnw na?
mc_answer1: Kungo-kɔnɔ-fɛnw kɛcogo fanba bɛ sɔrɔ farikolo-ɲɛnajɛ dɔ fɛ
mc_answer2: Kungoya kɛcogo bɛ se ka bɔ mɔgɔw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ jɛɲɔgɔnya dɛsɛ la
mc_answer3: Kungoya kɛcogo bɛ caya denmisɛnw dɔrɔn de la minnu bangebagaw y’u datugu
mc_answer4: Kungo-kɔnɔ-taama bɛɛ bɛ sɔrɔ hakili-la-dɛsɛ jugumanba fɛ

flores_passage: Sɛnɛ min bɛ balo balo la, o ye sɛnɛ ye min bɛ kɛ dumuni caman sɔrɔli kama walasa ka sɛnɛkɛla n’a ka denbaya magow dɔrɔn ɲɛ. Sɛnɛ min bɛ balo balo la, o ye fɛɛrɛ nɔgɔman ye, min ka teli ka kɛ fɛnɲɛnama ye, min bɛ kɛ ni kisɛ maralenw ye minnu bɛ bɔ sigida la, ka fara sɛnɛfɛnw cili kan walima fɛɛrɛ nɔgɔman wɛrɛw kan walasa ka sɔrɔ caya. Tariku la, sɛnɛkɛla fanba tun bɛ balosɛnɛ kɛ wa hali bi o bɛ kɛ jamana yiriwalen caman na.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, nin wale ninnu na, jumɛn tɛ bɛn sɛnɛ ma min ɲɛsinnen bɛ balo ma?
mc_answer1: Ka sinsin sɛnɛfɛn dɔ kan min bɛ sɛnɛkɛla ka denbaya mago ɲɛ
mc_answer2: Dumuni dilanni walasa ka feere mɔgɔ wɛrɛw ma
mc_answer3: Ka sinsin sɔrɔ caman kan ka tɛmɛ fɛɛrɛ kɔrɔw kan
mc_answer4: Kisɛw sɔrɔli sigida la sɛnɛkɛla ka yɔrɔ la

flores_passage: Sɛnɛ min bɛ balo balo la, o ye sɛnɛ ye min bɛ kɛ dumuni caman sɔrɔli kama walasa ka sɛnɛkɛla n’a ka denbaya magow dɔrɔn ɲɛ. Sɛnɛ min bɛ balo balo la, o ye fɛɛrɛ nɔgɔman ye, min ka teli ka kɛ fɛnɲɛnama ye, min bɛ kɛ ni kisɛ maralenw ye minnu bɛ bɔ sigida la, ka fara sɛnɛfɛnw cili kan walima fɛɛrɛ nɔgɔman wɛrɛw kan walasa ka sɔrɔ caya. Tariku la, sɛnɛkɛla fanba tun bɛ balosɛnɛ kɛ wa hali bi o bɛ kɛ jamana yiriwalen caman na.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn bɛ balosɛnɛ kɛcogo ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: O ye sigida ye min bɛ kɛ ni fɛnɲɛnamaw ye pewu
mc_answer2: A bɛ baara kɛ ni fɛɛrɛ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw ye walasa ka sɛnɛfɛnw caya
mc_answer3: b’a To sɛnɛkɛlaw b’u ka sɛnɛfɛnw Jɛ u ka mara bɛɛ kɔnɔ
mc_answer4: A bɛ baara Kɛ hali bì sɛnɛkɛlaw fɛ jamana dɔw la

flores_passage: Laala turisimu suguya min ka ca kosɛbɛ, o ye mɔgɔw fanba bɛ min ni taama ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ: Lafiya turisimu. O ye waati ye mɔgɔw bɛ taa yɔrɔ la min ni u ka don o don ɲɛnamaya kɛcogo kɔrɔ tɛ kelen ye kosɛbɛ walasa ka lafiya ani ka ɲɛnajɛ kɛ. A ka c’a la, kɔgɔjida laminiw, ɲɛnajɛyɔrɔw ani kanpaɲi yɔrɔw de ka teli ka taa ɲɛnajɛ turisiw fɛ. Ni mɔgɔ ka taama kɛli yɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ la, o kun ye k’a tariku n’a ka laadalakow dɔn o tuma na nin turisimu sugu in bɛ Weele ko laadala turisimu. Turisiw bɛ se ka taa jamana kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ ka taamasiyɛn suguya wɛrɛw la walima u bɛ se k’a sugandi dɔrɔn k’u sinsin yɔrɔ kelen dɔrɔn kan.
question: Ka taa misiri la, o bɛna don turisimu suguya jumɛn kɔnɔ?

flores_passage: Laala turisimu suguya min ka ca kosɛbɛ, o ye mɔgɔw fanba bɛ min ni taama ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ: Lafiya turisimu. O ye waati ye mɔgɔw bɛ taa yɔrɔ la min ni u ka don o don ɲɛnamaya kɛcogo kɔrɔ tɛ kelen ye kosɛbɛ walasa ka lafiya ani ka ɲɛnajɛ kɛ. A ka c’a la, kɔgɔjida laminiw, ɲɛnajɛyɔrɔw ani kanpaɲi yɔrɔw de ka teli ka taa ɲɛnajɛ turisiw fɛ. Ni mɔgɔ ka taama kɛli yɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ la, o kun ye k’a tariku n’a ka laadalakow dɔn o tuma na nin turisimu sugu in bɛ Weele ko laadala turisimu. Turisiw bɛ se ka taa jamana kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ ka taamasiyɛn suguya wɛrɛw la walima u bɛ se k’a sugandi dɔrɔn k’u sinsin yɔrɔ kelen dɔrɔn kan.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun bɛ se ka kɛ ɲɛnajɛ taamabagaw ka ɲɛtaa kunba ye?
mc_answer1: Ka u yɛrɛ su ji la sigida ka laadalakow la
mc_answer2: Ka lafiɲɛ u ka don o don kow la

flores_passage: Mɔgɔ kelen-kelen minnu tun bɛ o baara la kabini san tan caman, olu y’an dɛmɛ k’an ka fanga n’an diyanyekow waleɲumandɔn k’a sɔrɔ u tun bɛ gɛlɛyaw ni hali dɛsɛw jateminɛ k’a jɛya. K’a sɔrɔ an tun bɛ mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ lamɛn u bɛ u kelen-kelen bɛɛ, u ka denbaya ani jɛkulu ka maanaw fɔ, an ye hakilina nafamaw sɔrɔ waati tɛmɛnenw kan ani mɔgɔ dɔw kan minnu ye nɔ bila jɛkulu ka laadalakow la cogo ɲuman na walima cogo jugu la. Hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ ko mɔgɔ ka tariku faamuyali tɛ ladamu faamuyali ta, a dɔgɔyalenba la, a bɛ mɔgɔw dɛmɛ u ka se k’a dɔn u bɛ don yɔrɔ min na jɛkulu ka tariku kɔnɔ. K’a sɔrɔ u bɛ ɲɛtaa jateminɛ ani ka dɛsɛw dɔn, mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ ani mɔgɔ minnu bɛɛ sen bɛ o la, olu bɛ jɛkulu ka nafaw, a ka cidenyabaara ani a ka fanga minnu bɛ a bila sira, olu dɔn kosɛbɛ. Nin ko in na, ka hakili jigin baarakɛlaw ka kɛwale tɛmɛnenw na ani ɲɛtaa minnu bɔra o la, o ye mɔgɔw dɛmɛ u ka da mɔgɔw ɲɛ na fɛn kuraw yeli la ani sira kura ye sigida egilisi ye. O ɲɛtaa maana suguw ye dɔ bɔ siran na fɛn caman Changement, ka sɔrɔ ka ŋaniya ɲumanw lase mɔgɔw ma ka ɲɛsin fɛn caman Changement ma don nataw la.
question: Mun kofɔra tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ iko fɛn min ye dɛmɛ don ka siran dɔ bɔ fɛn caman Changement la sigida egilisi kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Ka hakili to baarakɛcogo ɲɛtaa misaliw la minnu kɛra baarakɛlaw ka kɛwalew la
mc_answer2: Ka hakilina sɔrɔ mɔgɔw kan minnu ye nɔ bila jɛkulu ka laadalakow la
mc_answer3: Jɛkulu ka fanga minnu bɛ a bila sira, olu sɔrɔli

flores_passage: Mɔgɔ kelen-kelen minnu tun bɛ o baara la kabini san tan caman, olu y’an dɛmɛ k’an ka fanga n’an diyanyekow waleɲumandɔn k’a sɔrɔ u tun bɛ gɛlɛyaw ni hali dɛsɛw jateminɛ k’a jɛya. Nin ko in na, ka hakili jigin baarakɛlaw ka kɛwale tɛmɛnenw na ani ɲɛtaa minnu bɔra o la, o ye mɔgɔw dɛmɛ u ka da mɔgɔw ɲɛ na fɛn kuraw yeli la ani sira kura ye sigida egilisi ye. O ɲɛtaa maana suguw ye dɔ bɔ siran na fɛn caman Changement, ka sɔrɔ ka ŋaniya ɲumanw lase mɔgɔw ma ka ɲɛsin fɛn caman Changement ma don nataw la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ka faamuyali sɔrɔ i yɛrɛ ka tariku kan, o bɛ se ka dɛmɛ don mun na?

flores_passage: Kalan taabolo min bɛ kɛ bi kɔfɛ, o bɛ hɔrɔnya di ka bɔ dafalenw na. Kalan kɛcogo ɲuman kelen tɛ yen. Tiɲɛ na, fɛn ɲuman kelen tɛ ka kalan.Kalan bɛ kɛ ko kɛlen na kalanden ni dɔnniya jiralen cɛ. An ka sisan ko kɛlenw ni telewisɔn ɲɛjiraliw bɛɛ ye minnu bɛ kɛ i yɛrɛ ye ani kunnafoniw jirali, minnu sinsinnen bɛ kalan kan, o b’o jira. O la sa, an caman b’an yɛrɛ sɔrɔ telewisɔn ka ɲɛjirali dɔ filɛli la min b’an kunnafoni taabolo walima ko kɛlen dɔ kan, an tɛna an sen don min na abada walima k’o dɔnniya waleya. An tɛna mobili labɛn kokura abada, ka jibolisira dɔ jɔ an ka kɔfɛla la, ka taa Peru ka taa tiɲɛni kɔrɔw sɛgɛsɛgɛ, walima ka an sigiɲɔgɔn ka so labɛn kokura.
question: Nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn bɛ bi kɔfɛla kalan taabolo ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: Kalan kɛcogo dɔw nafa ka bon ka tɛmɛ dɔw kan
mc_answer2: Kalan ka kan ka sinsin fɛnw kan an dalen b’a la ko an bɛna minnu sɔrɔ
mc_answer3: Kalan kɛcogo dɔw ka fisa ni dɔw ye

flores_passage: Kalan taabolo min bɛ kɛ bi kɔfɛ, o bɛ hɔrɔnya di ka bɔ dafalenw na. Kalan kɛcogo ɲuman kelen tɛ yen. Tiɲɛ na, fɛn ɲuman kelen tɛ ka kalan.Kalan bɛ kɛ ko kɛlen na kalanden ni dɔnniya jiralen cɛ. An ka sisan ko kɛlenw ni telewisɔn ɲɛjiraliw bɛɛ ye minnu bɛ kɛ i yɛrɛ ye ani kunnafoniw jirali, minnu sinsinnen bɛ kalan kan, o b’o jira. O la sa, an caman b’an yɛrɛ sɔrɔ telewisɔn ka ɲɛjirali dɔ filɛli la min b’an kunnafoni taabolo walima ko kɛlen dɔ kan, an tɛna an sen don min na abada walima k’o dɔnniya waleya. An tɛna mobili labɛn kokura abada, ka jibolisira dɔ jɔ an ka kɔfɛla la, ka taa Peru ka taa tiɲɛni kɔrɔw sɛgɛsɛgɛ, walima ka an sigiɲɔgɔn ka so labɛn kokura.
question: Nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn tɛ bi kɔfɛ kalan taabolo jira ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer2: Kalan kɛcogo dɔw ka kan ka bila jɔyɔrɔ fɔlɔ la ka tɛmɛ dɔw kan
mc_answer3: Kalan kɛcogo dɔ bɛ tali kɛ kalanden ni dɔnniya jiralen na
mc_answer4: Dɔnniya min bɛ se ka kɛ an tɛ baara kɛ abada, o nafa ka bon hali bi ka kalan kɛ

flores_passage: Sunɔgɔbaliya ye fɛɛrɛ ye min bɛ kɛ ka kunun ni laɲini ye i ka sunɔgɔ waati la ani ka sunɔgɔ waati kunkurunnin kɔfɛ (miniti 10–60). O bɛ se ka kɛ nɔgɔya la ni aw bɛ baara kɛ ni wulilan ye min mankan ka dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ walasa ka aw hakili lase aw ma k’a sɔrɔ a ma aw kunun pewu. Ni aw y’a ye ko aw bɛ wagati labɛn kokura aw ka sunɔgɔ la, a bɛ se ka bila so fan dɔ fɛ, ka aw wajibiya ka bɔ aw ka dilan kan walasa k’a faga. Sugandili wɛrɛ minnu bɛ kɛ ni biyɔriti ye, olu ye ka ji caman min (kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la ji walima te, sugunɛbilenni fura dɔnnen) sani i ka sunɔgɔ, o bɛ mɔgɔ wajibiya ka wuli ka koli kɛ.
question: Ni laɲini kɛra ka kunun sunɔgɔ waati bɛnnen na, ninnu la jumɛn bɛna sunɔgɔ tigɛcogo bali?
mc_answer1: Aw bɛ kalan kɛ lɛri kelen ni tila kɔnɔ sani aw ka segin ka sunɔgɔ
mc_answer2: Baara kɛ ni sanuyaso ye ani ka segin ka taa i da la joona
mc_answer3: Aw bɛ alarma dabila aw ka sufɛlan kan ani ka segin ka sunɔgɔ miniti mugan o kɔfɛ
mc_answer4: Aw bɛ kunun ka ji min ka bɔ buteli kɔnɔ aw ka sufɛlan kan

flores_passage: Sunɔgɔbaliya ye fɛɛrɛ ye min bɛ kɛ ka kunun ni laɲini ye i ka sunɔgɔ waati la ani ka sunɔgɔ waati kunkurunnin kɔfɛ (miniti 10–60). O bɛ se ka kɛ nɔgɔya la ni aw bɛ baara kɛ ni wulilan ye min mankan ka dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ walasa ka aw hakili lase aw ma k’a sɔrɔ a ma aw kunun pewu. Ni aw y’a ye ko aw bɛ wagati labɛn kokura aw ka sunɔgɔ la, a bɛ se ka bila so fan dɔ fɛ, ka aw wajibiya ka bɔ aw ka dilan kan walasa k’a faga. Sugandili wɛrɛ minnu bɛ kɛ ni biyɔriti ye, olu ye ka ji caman min (kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la ji walima te, sugunɛbilenni fura dɔnnen) sani i ka sunɔgɔ, o bɛ mɔgɔ wajibiya ka wuli ka koli kɛ.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ sunɔgɔ tiɲɛni ɲɛfɔli tigitigi ye?
mc_answer1: A bɛ se ka sinsin biyoritmɛ kan
mc_answer2: Laɲini ye ko i kana i yɛrɛ kunun kosɛbɛ
mc_answer3: O kɛcogo bɛ kɛ aw ka sunɔgɔ waati la min bɛ kɛ cogo la
mc_answer4: Kununni kɔfɛ, laɲini ye ka segin ka sunɔgɔ lɛri fila kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Mɔgɔ dɔw dalen b’a la ko ka sugo jɛlen caman kɛ minnu bɛ kɛ ni fɛn dilannenw ye tuma caman na, o bɛ se ka kɛ sɛgɛnba ye. O ko in sababuba ye sugo jɛlenw ye minnu bɛ waati janya bonya REM cogoyaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ. Ni REM dɔgɔyara su kelen kɔnɔ, nin cogoya in min na i bɛ sunɔgɔ yɛrɛ sɔrɔ ani ka i farikolo kɛnɛya, o bɛ kɛ fɛn ye min man teli ka kɛ fo ka kɛ gɛlɛya ye. O bɛ mɔgɔ sɛgɛn i n’a fɔ i bɛ kunun miniti mugan walima miniti bisaba o miniti bisaba ka telewisɔn filɛ. O nɔ bɛ bɔ i hakili la siɲɛ hakɛ min b’a ɲini ka sugo jɛlen kɛ su kelen kɔnɔ.
question: Ni hakili bɛ a ɲini ka sugo jɛlen kɛ ka caya, dɔ bɛ fara mun kan?
mc_answer4: Waati min bɛ REM jamanaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ

flores_passage: Mɔgɔ dɔw dalen b’a la ko ka sugo jɛlen caman kɛ minnu bɛ kɛ ni fɛn dilannenw ye tuma caman na, o bɛ se ka kɛ sɛgɛnba ye. O ko in sababuba ye sugo jɛlenw ye minnu bɛ waati janya bonya REM cogoyaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ. Ni REM dɔgɔyara su kelen kɔnɔ, nin cogoya in min na i bɛ sunɔgɔ yɛrɛ sɔrɔ ani ka i farikolo kɛnɛya, o bɛ kɛ fɛn ye min man teli ka kɛ fo ka kɛ gɛlɛya ye. O bɛ mɔgɔ sɛgɛn i n’a fɔ i bɛ kunun miniti mugan walima miniti bisaba o miniti bisaba ka telewisɔn filɛ. O nɔ bɛ bɔ i hakili la siɲɛ hakɛ min b’a ɲini ka sugo jɛlen kɛ su kelen kɔnɔ.
question: Sugo jɛlen minnu bɛ kɛ tuma caman na, olu la jumɛn bɛ se ka kɛ farikolo la?
mc_answer1: Waati janya dɔgɔyali REM cogoyaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ

flores_passage: Ekipu virtuelw bɛ minɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni seko ni dɔnko sariya kelenw ye i n’a fɔ ekipu kɔrɔw, nka danfara misɛnninw bɛ yen. Tuma caman na, ekipu virtuel kɔnɔmɔgɔw bɛ baara kɛ i n’a fɔ u ka farikoloɲɛnajɛ kulu teliyalenw ka ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔyɔrɔ. Tuma caman na, u ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya ka ca ka tɛmɛ ekipu mɔgɔ kɔrɔw kan bawo u ka kuluw bɛ se ka ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ ka kɛɲɛ ni waatibolodacogo caman ye minnu bɛ se ka kɛ u ka sigida ɲɛmɔgɔw tɛ faamuya. “Ekipu yebali” lakika sɔrɔli (Larson ni LaFasto, 1989, p109) fana ye ekipu virtuel yɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ ye. “Ekipu yebali” ye ɲɛmɔgɔya jɛkulu ye, tɔnden kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ u ka jaabi di min ma. Ekipu yebali bɛ sariyaw sigi tɔnden kelen-kelen bɛɛ ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ekipu kɔrɔlenw ni ekipu virtuelw bɛ ɲɔgɔn na cogo di?
mc_answer1: A ɲininen bɛ ekipu fila bɛɛ ka baara kɛ cogo kelen na
mc_answer2: Ekipu fila bɛɛ ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya hakɛ tɛ kelen ye u ka don o don kow la
mc_answer3: Ekipu fila bɛɛ bɛ u ka jaabi di ɲɛmɔgɔyaso dɔ ma min tɛ ye
mc_answer4: Ekipu fila bɛɛ bɛ baara kɛ waati kelen na

flores_passage: Ekipu virtuelw bɛ minɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni seko ni dɔnko sariya kelenw ye i n’a fɔ ekipu kɔrɔw, nka danfara misɛnninw bɛ yen. Tuma caman na, ekipu virtuel kɔnɔmɔgɔw bɛ baara kɛ i n’a fɔ u ka farikoloɲɛnajɛ kulu teliyalenw ka ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔyɔrɔ. Tuma caman na, u ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya ka ca ka tɛmɛ ekipu mɔgɔ kɔrɔw kan bawo u ka kuluw bɛ se ka ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ ka kɛɲɛ ni waatibolodacogo caman ye minnu bɛ se ka kɛ u ka sigida ɲɛmɔgɔw tɛ faamuya. “Ekipu yebali” lakika sɔrɔli (Larson ni LaFasto, 1989, p109) fana ye ekipu virtuel yɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ ye. “Ekipu yebali” ye ɲɛmɔgɔya jɛkulu ye, tɔnden kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ u ka jaabi di min ma. Ekipu yebali bɛ sariyaw sigi tɔnden kelen-kelen bɛɛ ye.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, kuma jumɛn bɛ kuma ekipu farikoloma ni ekipu lakikaw kan, o tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: A ka c’a la, ekipu kɔrɔlenw bɛ minɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni sariya ye min ka bon kosɛbɛ
mc_answer2: Tuma caman na, ekipu virtuelw bɛ kɛ i n’a fɔ ekipu kɔrɔlenw ka ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔyɔrɔ
mc_answer3: Ekipu kɔrɔlenw ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya ka dɔgɔn ka tɛmɛ ekipu virtuel kan
mc_answer4: Waatibolodacogo caman bɛ se ka nafa don ekipu virtuelw na

flores_passage: Kɔnɔkow miiriyaw sinsinnen bɛ fɛn ɲinini kan min bɛ mɔgɔw bila ka tigɛli kɛ walima ka diya u ye. O hakilinaw b’a jira ko mago dɔw bɛ mɔgɔw la ani/walima nege dɔw bɛ u kɔnɔ minnu donna u kɔnɔ ni u bɛ kɔgɔ fo ka se balikuya ma. O hakilinaw bɛ fɛn minnu lajɛ mɔgɔ dɔw kan minnu b’a to u b’a fɛ u ka fɛn minnu kɛ ani fɛn minnu bɛ u sigida la, olu bɛna a to u ka fɛn dɔw kɛ walima u tɛna u kɛ. Kɔnɔkow miiriya fila minnu bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ, olu ye Maslow ka Hierarchy of Needs Theory ani Hertzberg ka Two Factor Theory ye.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ fɛn ye kɔnɔkow miiriyaw sinsinnen bɛ min kan?
mc_answer1: Nege kura minnu bɛ kɛ balikuya waati la
mc_answer2: Mɔgɔ ka sigida bɛ nɔ bila u ka kɛwalew la cogo min na
mc_answer3: Mako minnu bɛ kɛ kɔnɔna na

flores_passage: Sariya min bɛ kɛ ka caya, wa a bɛ tulo geren tuma caman na, o ye laadilikan nɔgɔman ye min bɛ fanga dabɔ k’a sɔrɔ a bɛ sigikafɔ sumanikɛlan dɔ mara ja dɔ kɔnɔ. A b’a Fɔ ko yɔrɔ min bɛ nɔ Blà kosɛbɛ koɲɛba in na, o ye zana minnu bɛ ja tila tila sabananw cɛtigɛyɔrɔ la k’a jɔlen ni jɛgɛn (misali lajɛ).
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ sabananw ka sariya ka fɛn ye?
mc_answer1: Ka basigi dɔ dabɔ barokun bɛ se ka bila yɔrɔ min na
mc_answer2: Ɲɛnamaya ni fanga dabɔli foto kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Ka barokun mara yɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen na min bɛ nɔ bɔ
mc_answer4: Ka sigikafɔ sigi foto dɔ kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Misali la, ja jɔlen fototacogo min ka ca diɲɛ kɔnɔ, o ye milimɛtɛrɛ 35 ye, o min tun ye filimu hakɛ ye min tun bɛ fanga la filimu analozi waati laban na. A bɛ dilan hali bi, nka min nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ, o ye a ɲɛda cogoya ciyɛn ye kamera numérique ja sensor formats fɛ. 35mm cogoya ye tiɲɛ na, a bɛ mɔgɔ hakili ɲagami dɔɔnin, a bonya ye milimɛtɛrɛ 36 ye, a janya ye milimɛtɛrɛ 24 ye. O cogoya in ɲɛda hakɛ (k’a tila ni tan ni fila ye walasa ka jateden dafalen hakɛ nɔgɔman sɔrɔ) o la, a bɛ fɔ ko 3:2. Foroko caman minnu bɛ kɛ tuma caman na (misali la, APS denbaya ka cogoyaw) bɛ bɛn o fan hakɛ ma walima u bɛ gɛrɛ ɲɔgɔn na kosɛbɛ.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ 35mm fototacogo ɲɛfɔ?
mc_answer1: A bɛ baara la hali bi
mc_answer2: A minɛna kamera nimɔrɔma cogoyaw fɛ
mc_answer3: A ɲɛda cogoya tɛ kelen ye ni cogoya caman ye minnu bɛ Kɛ tuma caman na
mc_answer4: O ye cogoya ye min ka ca diɲɛ kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Zoom lensɛriw nafa ye ko focal complexity ani lens elements hakɛ min ka kan ka kɛ walasa ka focal lengths hakɛ dɔ sɔrɔ, o ka bon kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛ prime lenses kan. O bɛ ka dɔgɔya ka kɛ ko ye bawo lensɛri dilannikɛlaw bɛ se ka sariya caman sɔrɔ lensɛri dilanni na. O y’a to zoom lensɛriw ka ja dɔw dilan minnu ka ɲi, minnu bɛ se ka suma ni lensɛriw ye minnu ɲɛ jɔlen don. Zoom lensɛriw nafa wɛrɛ ye ko a ka c’a la, lensɛri ka dakun (teliya) hakɛ maksimali bɛ dɔgɔya. O b’a to zoom lensɛri minnu sɔngɔ man gɛlɛn, olu baara ka gɛlɛn yeelen dɔgɔya yɔrɔ la ni flash tɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ikomi fɛn dilannikɛlaw bɛ dɔ fara lensɛri dilanni nafa kan, zoom lensɛriw ɲɛnabɔra cogo di?
mc_answer1: U ka lensɛri teliya ka bon
mc_answer2: U baara ka nɔgɔn yeelen man ca yɔrɔ minnu na
mc_answer3: U ka foto cogoya bɛ tali kɛ lensɛriw la minnu ɲɛ jɔlen don
mc_answer4: U ka focal complexité ka dɔgɔn ka tɛmɛ prime lenses kan

question: Ka da kunnafoniw kan minnu bɛ tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, tuma jumɛn na zoom lens bɛ se ka fisaya ni prime lens ye?
mc_answer1: Ni aperture maximale haute ye fɔlɔ ye
mc_answer2: Ni aw b’a fɛ ka lensɛri fɛnw dɔgɔya
mc_answer3: Ni aw t’a fɛ ka baara kɛ ni flash ye dibi la
mc_answer4: Ni aw bɛ ka focal complexité caman ɲini

flores_passage: Gundo ye jɛɲɔgɔnya ɲinini ye ni tiɲɛ laban dɔ ye, ka kɛɲɛ ni a ye, walima ka a dɔn ni hakili ye, alaɲɛsiran, hakili ta fan fɛ tiɲɛ dɔ, walima Ala. Dannabaa bɛ ko kɛlen tilennen ɲini, ka a dɔn, walima ka a dɔn Ala ka tiɲɛ/ala walima dumuniw kan. Tubabukanbagaw bɛ tugu ɲɛnamaya kɛcogo dɔw kɔ, walima wale dɔw minnu kun ye k’o ko kɛlenw ladon. Gundo bɛ se ka danfara don ni diinɛ dannaya ni bato suguya wɛrɛw ye, a kɛtɔ k’a sinsin mɔgɔ yɛrɛ ka ko kɛlen tilennen kan, min bɛ kɛ hakili cogoya kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ la, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, hɛrɛ, hakilitigi, nisɔndiya, walima hali nisɔndiya cogoya.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛna jate Mistiki ɲɛfɔli tigitigi ye?
mc_answer1: Sinsin bɛ kɛ ka hakili cogoyaw sɔrɔ minnu bɛ hɛrɛ ni nisɔndiya sɔrɔ
mc_answer2: Mistiki tugubagaw bɛ hakili ta fan fɛ tiɲɛ dɔ dɔnni ɲini ni hakili ye
mc_answer3: Mistiki tugubagaw bɛ se ka kɛwalew ta minnu bɛna dɛmɛ k’u ka faamuyali sabati Ala ka tiɲɛko kan
mc_answer4: Sinsin min bɛ kɛ ka ɲɛsin mɔgɔ yɛrɛ ka ko kɛlen tilennen ɲinini ma, o bɛ se ka suma ni diinɛ dannaya ni bato suguya caman wɛrɛw ye

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn tɛ Mistiki sinsinnan ye?
mc_answer1: Ka intuition ɲini ka don Ala ka tiɲɛ na
mc_answer2: Ka tugu hakilinaw kɔ ni ko kɛlenw ye minnu bɛ kɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ, jɛkulu ka ko kɛlenw fɛ
mc_answer3: Sinsin kɛli hakili cogoya nisɔndiyalen kan
mc_answer4: Ka tugu Ala dɔnniya hakili la

flores_passage: Waati jan kɔnɔ san kɛmɛ tan ni kɔnɔntɔnnan ni mugannan kɔnɔ, a tun dalen b’a la ko Nuwɛlika sigibaga fɔlɔw tun ye Maorikaw ye, minnu tun bɛ kɔnɔba dɔw ɲini minnu bɛ wele ko moas. O kɔfɛ, o hakilina ye hakilina sigi senkan ko Maorikaw bɔra Polinezi jamana na kurunba dɔ kɔnɔ ani ka Nuwɛlika ta ka bɔ Moriori bolo, ka sɛnɛ jɛkulu sigi sen kan. Nka, dalilu kura b’a jira ko Morioriw tun ye dugukoloba Maoriw kulu ye minnu bɔra Nuwɛlika ka taa Chatham gunw na, ka u yɛrɛ ka laadalakow yiriwa minnu tun bɛ danfara la, hɛrɛ la. Kabila wɛrɛ fana tùn bɛ Chatham gunw kan ninnu tùn ye Maoriw ye minnu Bɔra Nuwɛlika. U y'u yɛrɛ Weele ko Morioriw Kɛra 'kὲlɛ damadɔw ye wa a laban na, Morioriw Dɔgɔyara
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, n’a sɔrɔ jɔn de ye sɛnɛko tɔn dɔ daminɛ?
mc_answer2: Morori ka bɔ Chatham gunw na

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, kulu min tun bɛ moas ɲini, olu de tun ye yɔrɔ jumɛn sigibaga fɔlɔw ye?

flores_passage: Pureland origami ye origami ye ni dantigɛli ye ko foli kelen dɔrɔn bɛ se ka kɛ waati kelen na, foli gɛlɛnw i n’a fɔ kɔsegin foli tɛ sɔn, wa foli bɛɛ bɛ yɔrɔ tilennenw na. A dabɔra John Smith fɛ san 1970 waatiw la walasa ka folikɛlaw dɛmɛ minnu tɛ se kosɛbɛ walima minnu ka farikoloɲɛnajɛ seko danma.
question: Ni an bɛ baara kɛ ni Pureland ka origami fɛɛrɛ ye, o bɛna nafa don foli la cogo jumɛn na?
mc_answer1: Foli ka fisa a ma ka foli caman kɛ siɲɛ kelen
mc_answer2: Foli bɛ ni motɛri seko kɔrɔlenw ye
mc_answer3: Foli bɛ ka origami Dabɔ min bɛ kɔsegin foli de wajibiya
mc_answer4: Foli in y’a lajɛ siɲɛ kelen walima siɲɛ fila dɔrɔn ka kɔn o ɲɛ

flores_passage: Pureland origami ye origami ye ni dantigɛli ye ko foli kelen dɔrɔn bɛ se ka kɛ waati kelen na, foli gɛlɛnw i n’a fɔ kɔsegin foli tɛ sɔn, wa foli bɛɛ bɛ yɔrɔ tilennenw na. question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ Pureland origami ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: A dabɔra foli minnu bɛ se kosɛbɛ
mc_answer2: Fɛɛrɛ in tɛ kɔsegin foli sen don a la
mc_answer3: Foli ka kan ka kɛ yɔrɔ tilennenw ye
mc_answer4: ye fɛɛrɛ ɲuman ye foli minnu bɛ ni farikoloɲɛnajɛ seko danma ye

flores_passage: Indus gun siwili tun ye Bronze waati siwili ye India worodugu-tlebi jamana kɔnɔ min tun bɛ bi Pakistan fanba minɛ ani mara dɔw Ɛndu worodugu-tlebi ani Afganistan worodugu-kɔrɔn. Siwili in yiriwara Indus bajida la o de y’a tɔgɔ sɔrɔ. Hali ni dɔnnikɛla dɔw b’a miiri ko ikomi o siwili tun bɛ Sarasvati baji min jalen don sisan, o baganmarayɔrɔw fana na, a ka kan ka wele cogo bɛnnen na ko Indus-Sarasvati Sivilizasiyɔn, k’a sɔrɔ dɔw b’a wele ko Harappan Sivilizasiyɔn Harappa kɔfɛ, a yɔrɔ fɔlɔ min sɛgɛsɛgɛra san 1920 waatiw la.

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn bɛ nafa kuntaalajan lase?
mc_answer1: Ka jɛkafɔ kɛ ni mɔgɔ wɛrɛw ye
mc_answer2: Ka mɔgɔ yɛrɛ nafaw bila jɔyɔrɔ fɔlɔ la

flores_passage: Ameriki mansamara ka kɛlɛ musaka minnu kɛra Filipine jamana minɛni na, olu sarala Filipine jamanadenw yɛrɛ fɛ. U wajibiyara ka impositi sara Ameriki koloniyali fanga ma walasa ka musakaw fanba sara ani tɔnɔ min tun bɛ bonw kan, o tun bɛ wuli Filipine gɔfɛrɛnaman tɔgɔ la Wall Street bankiw fɛ. Tiɲɛ don, tɔnɔba minnu bɛ sɔrɔ Filipine jamanadenw ka nafabɔli jan kɔnɔ, olu bɛna kɛ Ameriki imperyalisimu ka tɔnɔ jɔnjɔnw ye.

flores_passage: Romɛ mansamara ka sɔrɔdasiya cogoya ye dɛmɛ don furakɛli ɲɛtaa yiriwali la. Dɔgɔtɔrɔw y’a daminɛ ka minɛ masakɛ Ɔgɔsitɔ fɛ, wa u yɛrɛ ye Romɛkaw ka Dɔgɔtɔrɔso kulu fɔlɔ sigi senkan walisa ka baara kɛ ni u ye kɛlɛw kɔfɛ. Operelikɛlaw tun bɛ dɔnniya sɔrɔ hakiliɲagamifura suguya caman na i n’a fɔ mɔrini min bɛ bɔ pɔmutɛri kisɛw la ani skɔpolamini min bɛ bɔ binkɛnɛ kisɛw la. U kɛra setigiw ye bolo tigɛcogo la walasa ka banabagatɔw kisi gangrene ma ka fara tourniquet ni joli siraw sirili kan walasa ka joli bɔli bali. San kɛmɛ caman kɔnɔ, Romɛ mansamara ye tɔnɔba sɔrɔ furakɛli siratigɛ la, wa a ye dɔnniya caman dilan an bɛ minnu dɔn bi.
question: Furakɛcogo walima fɛɛrɛ jumɛn ma fɔ ko dɔgɔtɔrɔw ni operelikɛlaw tun bɛ baara kɛ ni o ye Romɛ Mansamara waati la?
mc_answer1: Degun kɔfɛ degun furakɛli ni hakiliɲagamifura suguya caman ye
mc_answer2: Aw bɛ furabulu kisɛw bɔlenw kɛ skopolamini na
mc_answer3: Joli bɔli dabila ni joli siraw sirilanw ye

flores_passage: Romɛ mansamara ka sɔrɔdasiya cogoya ye dɛmɛ don furakɛli ɲɛtaa yiriwali la. U kɛra setigiw ye bolo tigɛcogo la walasa ka banabagatɔw kisi gangrene ma ka fara tourniquet ni joli siraw sirili kan walasa ka joli bɔli bali. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn tɛ bɔ ɲɛtaa minnu kɛra furakɛli siratigɛ la Romɛ Mansamara waati la?

flores_passage: Yeli, walima se ka yeli kɛ, o bɛ bɔ ɲɛnayeli kɛcogo dusukunnataw walima ɲɛw la. Ɲɛw jɔcogo suguya caman bɛ yen, u ka gɛlɛya bɛ daminɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni fɛnɲɛnama ka ɲininiw ye. O jɔli suguya wɛrɛw seko tɛ kelen ye, u bɛ 'sèn Bɔ jikuru-janya danfaralenw na wa u ka 'sènbɔli hakɛ tɛ kelen ye, fana u bɛ baarakɛcogo wɛrɛw Лini walasa ka donnakow kɔrɔ Sɔrɔ ani jatebla danfaralenw walasa ka baara Kɛ ka ɲɛ.
question: Se min bɛ mɔgɔ ye ka yeli kɛ, o bɛ bɔ mun de la?
mc_answer3: Sensitivity (sɛgɛsɛgɛli) min bɛ Kɛ ni wave-length dɔw ye
mc_answer4: Acuité (ɲɛnajɛ) hakɛ caman tɛ kelen ye

flores_passage: Yeli, walima se ka yeli kɛ, o bɛ bɔ ɲɛnayeli kɛcogo dusukunnataw walima ɲɛw la. Ɲɛw jɔcogo suguya caman bɛ yen, u ka gɛlɛya bɛ daminɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni fɛnɲɛnama ka ɲininiw ye. question: Ɲɛ jɔcogo caman ɲɔgɔnna min bɛ fɛnɲɛnamaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ, o bɛ bɔ mun de la?

flores_passage: "Sikh diinɛ ye diinɛ ye min bɔra Ɛndujamana kɔnɔ. A daminɛna Panjab mara la san kɛmɛda 15nan kɔnɔ ka bɔ diinɛkuluw ka faranfasi la Ɛnduw ka laadalakow kɔnɔ. Sikhw b'u ka dannaya jate diinɛ danfaralen ye ka bɔ Ɛndu diinɛ na hali n'u sɔnna a ka Ɛnduw jujɔ n'a ka laadalakow ma."(Sikhism) .Sikhw b'u ka diinɛ wele ko Gurmat, o ye Panjabikan ye min kɔrɔ ye ko ""guru sira" Guru ye Ɛndu diinɛw bɛɛ ka ko jɔnjɔn ye nka Sikhw la, a ye nafa sɔrɔ min bɛ kɛ Sikhw ka dannayakow kɔnɔko ye san kɛmɛ 15nan na Guru Nanak (1469–1539) fɛ Guru 9 wɛrɛw tugura ɲɔgɔn kɔ."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, kuma jumɛn min bɛ Sikh diinɛ kan, o tɛ diinɛ jira ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: Sikh diinɛ kɛra diinɛkuluw ka farali sababu ye Ɛnduw ka laadalakow kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Guru ye fɛn jɔnjɔn ye min ɲɔgɔn tɛ Sikh diinɛ na
mc_answer3: Guru 9 tugura o diinɛ sigibaga kɔ, n’o ye Guru Nanak ye
mc_answer4: Sikh diinɛ laada dɔw ju bɔra Ɛndu diinɛ na

flores_passage: "Sikh diinɛ ye diinɛ ye min bɔra Ɛndujamana kɔnɔ. A daminɛna Panjab mara la san kɛmɛda 15nan kɔnɔ ka bɔ diinɛkuluw ka faranfasi la Ɛnduw ka laadalakow kɔnɔ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn bɛ jate Sikhw ka dannaya sira koloma ye?
mc_answer3: Banni ka sɔn Ɛndu diinɛ wɛrɛw ma

flores_passage: "Attention Deficit Disorder ""ye hakiliɲagami bana ye min taamasiɲɛ saba ɲɛfɔlenw klasiki ye i n'a fɔ impulsivité, distractibility, ani hyperactivité walima excess energy"". denmisɛnw bɛɛ la, laala Ameriki denmisɛn miliyɔn 2 ɲɔgɔn"". taamasiyɛnw.O denmisɛnw ka teli ka gɛlɛya caman sɔrɔ, bawo u ""u bɛ kɛwalew kɛ minnu bɛ farati la, ka don kɛlɛw la, ka fanga sɔsɔ"" walasa k'u hakili lawuli, bawo u hakili tɛ se ka lawuli ni ADD ye bɛ nɔ bila jɛɲɔgɔnyaw la ni u tɔɲɔgɔn tɔw ye bawo denmisɛn tɔw tɛ se k’a faamu mun na u bɛ kɛ cogo min na walima mun na u b’u sɛbɛn cogo min na walima ko u ka kɔgɔ hakɛ tɛ kelen ye."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, denmisɛn minnu bɛ ni hakilijagabɔ ye, a bɛ se ka gɛlɛya olu ma ka u sinsin mun kan?
mc_answer4: Fɛn minnu ka di u ye ka kɛ

flores_passage: "Attention Deficit Disorder ""ye hakiliɲagami bana ye min taamasiɲɛ saba ɲɛfɔlenw klasiki ye i n'a fɔ impulsivité, distractibility, ani hyperactivité walima excess energy"". denmisɛnw bɛɛ la, laala Ameriki denmisɛn miliyɔn 2 ɲɔgɔn"". taamasiyɛnw.O denmisɛnw ka teli ka gɛlɛya caman sɔrɔ, bawo u ""u bɛ kɛwalew kɛ minnu bɛ farati la, ka don kɛlɛw la, ka fanga sɔsɔ"" walasa k'u hakili lawuli, bawo u hakili tɛ se ka lawuli ni ADD ye bɛ nɔ bila jɛɲɔgɔnyaw la ni u tɔɲɔgɔn tɔw ye bawo denmisɛn tɔw tɛ se k’a faamu mun na u bɛ kɛ cogo min na walima mun na u b’u sɛbɛn cogo min na walima ko u ka kɔgɔ hakɛ tɛ kelen ye."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun na denmisɛn minnu bɛ ni hakiliɲagami bana ye, olu ka teli ka kɛwalew kɛ minnu bɛ farati lase u ma?
mc_answer1: Walasa ka dɔ bɔ farikoloɲɛnajɛ caya kojugu la
mc_answer2: Walasa k’u dɛmɛ u ka jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ ni u filankuruw ye
mc_answer3: Walasa ka u bangebagaw hakili sama

flores_passage: Hali ni poroze kalanni ka kan ka kalan nɔgɔya ani ka diya, sɛgɛsɛgɛli bɛ tɛmɛ o kan. Scaffolding tɛ kalan kɛcogo ye nka a ye dɛmɛ ye min bɛ dɛmɛ don mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ ma minnu bɛ kalan kura dɔ la i n’a fɔ ka baara kɛ ni ɔridinatɛri porogaramu kura ye walima ka porozɛ kura daminɛ. Scaffolds bɛ se ka kɛ virtuel ye ani real, o kɔrɔ ye ko karamɔgɔ ye scaffold sugu dɔ ye nka papierclip cɛ fitinin min bɛ Microsoft Office kɔnɔ, o fana bɛ ten. Virtuel Scaffolds bɛ don porogaramu kɔnɔ, wa u dabɔra ka ɲininkali kɛ, ka ɲininkali kɛ, ani ka taabolo dɔw ɲɛfɔ minnu bɛ se ka kɛ gɛlɛya ye kalanden bolo a kelen na.
question: Ka da kunnafoniw kan minnu bɛ tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, ninnu na jumɛn tɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛcogo misali ye?
mc_answer1: Kalan min bɛ kɛ ɔridinatɛri tulon daminɛ na

mc_answer1: Scaffolds bɛ se ka kɛ yen tiɲɛ na
mc_answer2: ka ca ni dɛmɛ ye ka tɛmɛ kalan kɛcogo kan
mc_answer3: A bɛ fɔ fana ko poroze basigilen kalan
mc_answer4: Scaffolds bɛ kɛ ka dɛmɛ di kalan daminɛ na

flores_passage: MySpace ye siti sabanan ye min ka di kosɛbɛ Ameriki jamana na, wa a ka kunnafonisɛbɛn miliyɔn 54 bɛ yen sisan. O siti ninnu ye mɔgɔw ɲɛnajɛ kosɛbɛ, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la kalanko siratigɛ la. Fɛn ɲumanw bɛ nin siti ninnu na, minnu ye, ka se ka kalanso ɲɛ dɔ sigi sen kan nɔgɔya la min bɛ se ka bulɔguw, wideyow, fotow, ani fɛn wɛrɛw sɔrɔ. Nin ɲɛ in bɛ se ka sɔrɔ nɔgɔya la ni ɛntɛrinɛti ladɛrɛsi kelen dɔrɔn dilen ye, o b’a to kalandenw hakili ka to u hakili la, wa u sɛbɛnni ka nɔgɔn kalandenw bolo minnu bɛ se ka gɛlɛya sɔrɔ klaviyeti baara la walima sɛbɛnnikɛcogo la. A bɛ se ka ladilan walasa a kalanni ka nɔgɔya ani fana ni kulɛri caman walima dɔɔnin ye i n’a fɔ a b’a fɛ cogo min na.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, MySpace fɛɛrɛ jumɛn bɛ se ka nafa don kalandenw na minnu ka kalan gɛlɛya bɛ u la?
mc_answer1: Ka kɛɲɛ ni mɔgɔw sago ye

flores_passage: Nka, san 1956 Zuwɛnkalo la, Krushchev ka layiduw kɛra kɔrɔbɔli ye tuma min na yurukuyuruku minnu kɛra Pologne jamana na, baarakɛlaw tun bɛ ka u ka ɲɔgɔn sɔsɔ yɔrɔ min na dumuni dɛsɛko ni sarako dɔgɔyali kama, o jiginna ka kɛ mɔgɔw bɛɛ ka sɔsɔli ye kominisi kɛlɛli la. Hali ni a laban na, Krushchev ye pankurunw ci walasa ka sigida labɛn kokura, a ye sira di sɔrɔko ɲinini dɔw ma, wa a sɔnna ka Wladyslaw Gomulka min tun bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ, o sigi minisiriɲɛmɔgɔ kura ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn tun tɛ Krushchev ka jaabi dɔ ye baarakɛla ka yurukuyurukuw kan?
mc_answer2: Aw bɛ baara kɛ ni tankiw ye walasa ka sigida labɛn kokura
