flores_passage: Alimanjamana tun ye jugu kelen ye diɲɛ kɛlɛba filanan na, min kɛra sababu ye ka jɛkafɔ kɛ URSS ni USA cɛ. Kɛlɛ bannen kɔfɛ, sigida, taabolo ani laadalakow ka ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔli kɛra sababu ye ka jamanaw bin. Kὲlɛ bannen sàn fla kɔ fɛ, jɛɲɔgɔn kɔrɔw Kɛra juguw ye sisan ani Kὲlɛ Nɛnɛ Daminɛna. A tun ka kan ka mɛn san 40 nataw kɔnɔ, wa a tun bɛna kɛlɛ tiɲɛ na, proxy kɛlɛbolow fɛ, kɛlɛyɔrɔw la k’a ta Afiriki la ka taa Azi, Afganistan, Kuba ani yɔrɔ caman wɛrɛw la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na, jumɛn ma nɔ bila URSS ni USA cɛsiraw la?
mc_answer3: Taabolo minnu bɛ danfara don ɲɔgɔn na
mc_answer4: Kɛlɛ minnu bɛ kɛ sistɛmuw kan

flores_passage: Nɛrɛmuguma bɛ omɛostasis (homéostasis) mara ni farikolo-ɲɛnajɛ-yɔrɔw cili ye farikolo fan bɛɛ fɛ walasa joli bolicogo ka taa ɲɛ ani fana a kana tiɲɛ. O nɛrɛmuguma ninnu bɛ se ka ci joona farikolo fan bɛɛ la min bɛ dɛmɛ ka farikolo tanga bagabagali fɛn o fɛn ma min bɛ se ka kɛ.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ farikoloɲɛnajɛw cili kun ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ farikolo fan bɛɛ la?
mc_answer4: Ka i yɛrɛ tanga farikolo bagabagali ma minnu bɛ se ka kɛ

flores_passage: "Piramidi belebele min bɛ Giza, o kelenpe de ye kabako wolonwula ye min jɔlen bɛ hali bi. Misirakaw ye a jɔ san kɛmɛ sabanan na Krisita tile ɲɛ, Piramidi belebeleba ye piramidi belebele caman dɔ ye minnu jɔra ka bonya da Faraon salen kan. Giza kuluba, walima ""Giza Necropolis"" min bɛ Misira Suw ka kɔdingɛ kɔnɔ, piramidi caman bɛ yen (minnu piramidiba ye a belebele ye), kaburu misɛnnin caman, batoso caman, ani Sfinx belebele Piramidiba in dabɔra ka bonya da Faraon Khufu kan , ani piramidi misɛnnin caman, kaburuw ani batoso caman jɔra walasa ka Khufu musow n'a ka denbaya kɔnɔmɔgɔw bonya."
question: Mun bɛ se ka sɔrɔ The Giza Plateau la?

mc_answer1: Ka kɛ diɲɛ kabako wolonwula dɔ ye

mc_answer4: Ka mɔgɔw ka kaburuw mara minnu tɛmɛna

flores_passage: Artemis ka batoso min tun bɛ Efese, o tiɲɛna Zuluyekalo tile 21 san 356 K.Ɲ., tasuma donna Herostratus fɛ. Ka kɛɲɛ ni maana ye, a ka dusudon tun ye tɔgɔba sɔrɔli ye cogo o cogo. Efesekaw dimina, u y’a fɔ ko Hɛrɔsitɔsi tɔgɔ tɛna sɛbɛn abada. Gɛrɛki tarikusɛbɛnbaga Strabo ye o tɔgɔ kɔlɔsi kɔfɛ, an bɛ o tɔgɔ dɔn cogo min na bi. Alabatoso tiɲɛna o su kelen na, Alɛkisandiriba wolola. Alɛkisandiri, iko masakɛ, a y’a fɔ ko a bɛna wari sara walisa ka Alabatosoba jɔ kokura, nka u ma sɔn a ka fɔta ma. Kɔfɛ, Alɛkisandiri salen kɔfɛ, Alabatoso jɔra kokura san 323 K.Ɲ.
question: Jɔn de bɛ an ka dɔnniya sɔrɔ tasumafagalan ko la min ye Alabatosoba tiɲɛ?

question: Kuma tigitigi jumɛn de fɔra ka ɲɛsin Artemis ka batoso jɔli ma kokura?
mc_answer2: A jɔra kokura Alɛkisandiriba ka masaya kɔfɛ
mc_answer3: U ye yamaruya di Herostratus ma ko a ka so jɔli musakaw sara

flores_passage: Bololabaara fɔlɔ min dɔnna o ye taama ye, hadamadenw y’a daminɛ ka taama jɔlen na a san miliyɔn fila ye nin ye ni Homo Erectus (o kɔrɔ ye ko cɛ tilennen) bɔli ye. U ɲɛfɛmɔgɔw, Australopithecus tun tɛ taama ka jɔ i n’a fɔ a delila cogo min na. Sen fila kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw bɛ sɔrɔ Australopithecus fɛnɲɛnamaw la kabini a bɛ san miliyɔn 4,2-3,9 bɔ, hali ni Sahelanthropus bɛ se ka taama sen fila kan kabini a san miliyɔn wolonwula ye nin ye.
question: Ka Kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, tuma jumɛn de Kɛra fɔlɔ ye ko sugu dɔ bɛ Se ka Taa sen fla kan?
mc_answer1: A bɛ san miliyɔn wolonwula bɔ
mc_answer2: A bɛ san miliyɔn fila bɔ
mc_answer3: A bɛ sàn miliyɔn 3,9 Bɔ bì
mc_answer4: A bɛ sàn miliyɔn 4,2 Bɔ bì

flores_passage: Bololabaara fɔlɔ min dɔnna o ye taama ye, hadamadenw y’a daminɛ ka taama jɔlen na a san miliyɔn fila ye nin ye ni Homo Erectus (o kɔrɔ ye ko cɛ tilennen) bɔli ye. U ɲɛfɛmɔgɔw, Australopithecus tun tɛ taama ka jɔ i n’a fɔ a delila cogo min na. Sen fila kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw bɛ sɔrɔ Australopithecus fɛnɲɛnamaw la kabini a bɛ san miliyɔn 4,2-3,9 bɔ, hali ni Sahelanthropus bɛ se ka taama sen fila kan kabini a san miliyɔn wolonwula ye nin ye.
question: O sugu jumɛnw tun bɛ taama tuma bɛɛ sen fila kan?
mc_answer2: Homo Erectus (banakisɛ min bɛ wele ko Homo Erectus).

flores_passage: Baara kɛli ni kurunw ye walasa ka fɛnw ta, o ye fɛɛrɛ ɲumanba ye min bɛ se ka mɔgɔw ni fɛn caman ta kɔgɔjiw kan. Kɔgɔjidala sɔrɔdasiw ka baara kɛra laada la k’a lajɛ k’a to i ka jamana ka se ka i ka mɔgɔw ni fɛnw lamaga, k’a sɔrɔ o waati kelen na, k’i jugu ka se ka a ka mɔgɔw n’a ka fɛnw lamaga. O misali minnu kɛra kɔsa in na minnu kɔlɔsira kosɛbɛ, olu dɔ ye Atlantiki woroduguyanfan kanpaɲi ye kɛlɛba filanan na. Amerikikaw tun b’a ɲini ka cɛw ni fɛnw lasegin Atlantiki Kɔgɔji cɛ walasa ka Angletɛri dɛmɛ. O waati kelen na, Alemaɲi kɔgɔjidala sɔrɔdasi minnu tun bɛ baara kɛ ni U-boats ye kosɛbɛ, olu tun b’a ɲini ka o taama in jɔ. Ni jɛɲɔgɔnw tun ma se, n’a sɔrɔ Alimanjamana tun bɛna se ka Angletɛri minɛ i n’a fɔ a ye Erɔpu tɔ minɛ cogo min na.
question: Alemaɲi kɔgɔjidala sɔrɔdasikulu tun b’a ɲini ka mun kɛ kɛlɛba filanan wagati la?
mc_answer1: Fɛn minnu bɛ bɔ Angletɛri, olu minɛni
mc_answer2: Ka Angletɛri bali ka mɔgɔw ni fɛnw sɔrɔ
mc_answer4: Ka Ameriki bali ka mɔgɔw ni fɛnw sɔrɔ

question: Ka da kunnafoniw kan minnu dira tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, jɔn de ye ɲɛtaa sɔrɔ kosɛbɛ kɔgɔjida la kɛlɛ la Atlantiki woroduguyanfan kanpaɲi waati la?

flores_passage: Spoke wotoro dabɔli ye Asiri wotoroninw nɔgɔya, u teliyalen don, ani u labɛnna ka ɲɛ ka tɛmɛ sɔrɔdasiw ni wotoro wɛrɛw kan. U ka nɛgɛbere minnu bɛ mɔgɔ faga, olu tun bɛ se ka don sɔrɔdasi minnu tun bɛ ɲɔgɔn kɛlɛ, olu ka kɛlɛkɛminɛnw kɔnɔ. San 1000 ɲɔgɔnna Krisita tile ɲɛ, Asirikaw ye sofaw fɔlɔ don. Sotigi ye kɛlɛbolo ye min bɛ kɛlɛ kɛ so kan. Sɔgɔlan tun ma dabɔ fɔlɔ, o de la Asiri sofaw ye kɛlɛ kɛ u ka sow kɔkolon kan.
question: Mun tun tɛ yen tuma min na Asirikaw ye sofaw baara waleya?

flores_passage: Spoke wotoro dabɔli ye Asiri wotoroninw nɔgɔya, u teliyalen don, ani u labɛnna ka ɲɛ ka tɛmɛ sɔrɔdasiw ni wotoro wɛrɛw kan. question: Kɛlɛ minnu bɛ baara kɛ ni kalisi ye, olu bɛ kɛ cogo di?
mc_answer4: Ni sɔrɔdasi minnu tun ka dɔgɔ

flores_passage: Babilonɛkaw y’u ka ala kelen-kelen bɛɛ jɔ batoso fɔlɔ la min tun bɛ jate ala ka so ye. Mɔgɔw tun bɛ na ni sarakaw ye ala ma ani sarakalasebagaw tun b’a ɲini ka ala magow ɲɛ seliw ni seliw fɛ. Alabatoso kelen-kelen bɛɛ tun bɛ ni Alabatosoba kɛnɛba ye, o kɔfɛ, kɔnɔna yɔrɔ senuma tun bɛ yen, sarakalasebagaw dɔrɔn tun bɛ se ka don min kɔnɔ. Tuma dɔw la, sankanso kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw tun bɛ jɔ minnu bɛ i n’a fɔ piramidi, n’u bɛ wele ko ziggurats, walisa ka kɛ batosow yɔrɔ dɔ ye. O sankanso sanfɛla tun ye yɔrɔ senuma kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen ye ala bolo.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, i tɛna Babilonɛ jamanaden gansan dɔ sɔrɔ min?
mc_answer1: Ka na ni sarakaw ye Alabatosoba kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Ka taa seli dɔ la batoso fɔlɔ dɔ la
mc_answer3: Seli dɔ la Alabatoso dɔ kɔnɔ
mc_answer4: Ka na ni sarakaw ye kɔnɔna yɔrɔ senuma dɔ la

flores_passage: Babilonɛkaw y’u ka ala kelen-kelen bɛɛ jɔ batoso fɔlɔ la min tun bɛ jate ala ka so ye. question: Ninnu la jumɛn tun dabɔra sarakalasebagaw kama kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la?

flores_passage: "Ɔwɔ! Masakɛ Tutankhamun, min bɛ wele tuma dɔw la ko ""Masakɛ Tut"" walima ""Cɛdennin masakɛ"", ye Misira masakɛ kɔrɔ dɔ ye min lakodɔnnen don kosɛbɛ bi waati la. A ka di kosɛbɛ, a tun ma jate ko a nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ kɔrɔlen waatiw la ani a ma sɛbɛn masakɛ kɔrɔw ka lisi fanba kan Nka, a kaburu sɔrɔli san 1922, o y’a to a kɛra mɔgɔ tɔgɔba ye K’a sɔrɔ waati tɛmɛnenw kaburu caman sonyalen don, a bɛ fɔ ko nin kaburu in tora a la maralen don kosɛbɛ, fɛn ba caman minnu dilannen don ni nɛgɛ nafamaw ye ani kabakurunw ye minnu man ca."
question: Masakɛ Tutankhamun tɔgɔ bɔra tuma jumɛn?
mc_answer4: A kofɔlen kɔ masakɛ kɔrɔw ka lisi kan

flores_passage: "Ɔwɔ! Masakɛ Tutankhamun, min bɛ wele tuma dɔw la ko ""Masakɛ Tut"" walima ""Cɛdennin masakɛ"", ye Misira masakɛ kɔrɔ dɔ ye min lakodɔnnen don kosɛbɛ bi waati la. A ka di kosɛbɛ, a tun ma jate ko a nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ kɔrɔlen waatiw la ani a ma sɛbɛn masakɛ kɔrɔw ka lisi fanba kan Nka, a kaburu sɔrɔli san 1922, o y’a to a kɛra mɔgɔ tɔgɔba ye K’a sɔrɔ waati tɛmɛnenw kaburu caman sonyalen don, a bɛ fɔ ko nin kaburu in tora a la maralen don kosɛbɛ, fɛn ba caman minnu dilannen don ni nɛgɛ nafamaw ye ani kabakurunw ye minnu man ca."
question: Mun de y’a to masakɛ Tutankhamun kɛra Misira masakɛ lakodɔnnenba ye?
mc_answer1: A ka kaburu min ma jɔrɔ, o sɔrɔli
mc_answer2: A jɔyɔrɔ min bɛ masakɛ kɔrɔw ka lisi kan
mc_answer3: Fɛn ba caman sonya ka bɔ a kaburu kɔnɔ
mc_answer4: nafa tun ka bon Misira kɔrɔlenw ka waati la

flores_passage: An bɛ Gɛrɛsi politikikɛlaw, dɔnnikɛlaw ani dɔnnikɛla caman dɔn. N’a sɔrɔla o laadalakow mɔgɔ min lakodɔnnen don kosɛbɛ, o ye Homɛri ye, fiyentɔw ka poyikɛla min bɛ fɔ nsiirin na, min ye Gɛrɛkikan sɛbɛnni baara ɲuman fila da: poyi Iliad ani Odyssey. Sophocles ni Aristophanes ye tulonkɛla ŋanaw ye hali bi wa u ka tulonkɛw bɛ jate diɲɛ sɛbɛnni baarabaw cɛma. Gɛrɛkikan tɔgɔla wɛrɛ ye jatebɔla Pitagori ye, min lakodɔnnen don kosɛbɛ a ka teworem tɔgɔba fɛ min bɛ kuma kɛrɛ saba kininfɛw ka jɛɲɔgɔnyaw kan.
question: Gɛrɛki poyikɛla Homer ma se ka mun kɛ?

question: Gɛrɛkikan tɔgɔba jumɛn bɛ dɔn fɛn wɛrɛ fɛ ni sɛbɛnni tɛ?

flores_passage: Moyen-Orient jamanaw ka waati duman na, so tun nafa tun man bon ten. Heburuw ka denbaya ka ɲɛnamaya fanba kɛra kɛnɛ kan. Musow tun bɛ tobili kɛ foro kɔnɔ; maganw tun ye jatebɔlanw da wulilenw dɔrɔn de ye minnu tun bɛ nbɛda lajɛ. Kabakurun tun bɛ kɛ ka sow jɔ. Kungo belebelebaw tun tɛ Kanan jamana na, o la sa, yiri sɔngɔ tun ka bon kosɛbɛ.
question: Heburuw ka denbaya tun b’u ka waati fanba kɛ min?

flores_passage: Moyen-Orient jamanaw ka waati duman na, so tun nafa tun man bon ten. Heburuw ka denbaya ka ɲɛnamaya fanba kɛra kɛnɛ kan. Kungo belebelebaw tun tɛ Kanan jamana na, o la sa, yiri sɔngɔ tun ka bon kosɛbɛ.
question: Mun tun nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ Heburuw ka denbaya bolo?

flores_passage: Gronland tun sigilen tɛ kosɛbɛ. Norse sagaw kɔnɔ u b’a fɔ ko Erik the Red gɛnna ka bɔ Islande fagali kosɔn, ani tuma min na a taara tilebin fɛ ka taa a fɛ, a ye Gronland sɔrɔ k’a tɔgɔ da ko Gronland. Nka a mana fɛn o fɛn Sɔrɔ, Eskimo kabilaw tùn bɛ yen kaban o waati la. Hali ni jamana kelen-kelen bɛɛ tun ye ‘Skandinavian’ ye, danfara caman tun bɛ Danmakɛ, Suwɛdi, Norvege ani Islande jamanadenw, masakɛw, laadalakow ani tariku cɛ.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ma ɲɛfɔ iko danfara min bɛ Skandinavi jamanaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ?

question: Jɔn de Sìgira Gronland fɔlɔ?

flores_passage: Hali n’u ka dumuni fanba tun bɛna dɔn an bolo, Romɛkaw tun bɛ u niyɔrɔ sɔrɔ selifɛnw na minnu tɛ fɛn ye walima minnu tɛ deli ka kɛ, i n’a fɔ kungosogow, wuluwuluw, wuluw ani sogo sugu dɔ min bɛ wele ko dormouse Danfara wɛrɛ tun ye ko k’a sɔrɔ faantanw ni muso u tun bɛ u ka dumuni dun k' u sigilen to sigilanw kan , a tun ka di nafolotigiw ye ka dumuni kɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ u tun bɛ lafiɲɛ yɔrɔ min na u kɛrɛ fɛ k' u to u ka dumuni dunni na . Romɛkaw ka dumuni kɔrɔw tun tɛ se ka kɛ dumuniw ye minnu tun bɛ na Erɔpu ka bɔ Ameriki walima ka bɔ Azi san kɛmɛ nataw la. Misali la, ɲɔ tun t’u fɛ, ni tomati, ni pɔmitɛri, ni kakawo, wa Romɛ kɔrɔ si ma deli ka diden nɛnɛ.
question: Jɛkulu jumɛn b’a fɛ ka dumuni kɛ ni sigilanw tɛ?

question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛna kɛ Romɛkaw ka seli kɔrɔ dɔ kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Dunan faantanw bɛ dumuni kɛ sigilanw kan
mc_answer2: A ye sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛw ka dumunikɛminɛn ye
mc_answer3: Nafolotigi cɛw dalen bɛ sufɛdumuni waati la

flores_passage: Siwili ye ladamu kelen ye min bɛ tila mɔgɔw kuluba nafama dɔ fɛ minnu bɛ sigi ɲɔgɔn fɛ ani ka baara kɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ, jamana. Daɲɛ min ye siwili ye, o bɔra latigɛkan na civilis, min kɔrɔ ye siwili ye, min bɛ tali kɛ latigɛkan na civis, min kɔrɔ ye jamanaden ye, ani civitas, min kɔrɔ ye dugu walima dugu-jamana ye, wa o fana bɛ jamana bonya ɲɛfɔ cogo dɔ la. Dugu-jamanaw ye jamanaw ɲɛfɛmɔgɔw ye. Siwili ladamu kɔrɔ ye dɔnniya tɛmɛnni ye mɔgɔw bɔnsɔn caman kɔnɔ, laadala sennasanbara min bɛ to senna ani a jɛnsɛnni tilennenya la. Tuma caman na, laadalakow misɛnninw bɛ tunun k’a sɔrɔ u ma tariku daliluw to minnu bɛ bɛn o ma, wa u tɛ jate siwili bɛnnenw ye.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, a ka c’a la, ninnu la jumɛn tɛna nɔ banbali bila?

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun bɛ kɔn jamana ɲɛ?

flores_passage: Drukgyal Dzong ye dugu barikama tiɲɛnen ye ani Budadiinɛ ka batoso min bɛ Paro mara sanfɛla la (Phondey dugu kɔnɔ). A fɔra ko san 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel ye kɛlɛbolo in da walasa k’a hakili jigin a ka sebaaya la Tibet-Mongol kɛlɛbolow kan. San 1951, tasuma dɔ y’a to Drukgyal Dzong ka fɛn tolen dɔw dɔrɔn tora, i n’a fɔ Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal ja. Tasuma kɔfɛ, o kɛlɛbolo in maralen don ani a lakananen don, a tora ka kɛ Butan jamana ka ɲɛnajɛyɔrɔ dɔ ye min bɛ mɔgɔ ɲɛnajɛ kosɛbɛ.
question: Kuma jumɛn bɛ The Drukgyal Dzong kan, o tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: A jɔra walasa ka Tibet-Mongol kɛlɛbolow ka sebaaya seli kɛ
mc_answer3: Tasuma dɔ ye foro in fɛn caman tiɲɛ
mc_answer4: A dabɔra Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel fɛ

A fɔra ko san 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel ye kɛlɛbolo in da walasa k’a hakili jigin a ka sebaaya la Tibet-Mongol kɛlɛbolow kan. San 1951, tasuma dɔ y’a to Drukgyal Dzong ka fɛn tolen dɔw dɔrɔn tora, i n’a fɔ Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal ja. Tasuma kɔfɛ, o kɛlɛbolo in maralen don ani a lakananen don, a tora ka kɛ Butan jamana ka ɲɛnajɛyɔrɔ dɔ ye min bɛ mɔgɔ ɲɛnajɛ kosɛbɛ.
question: Kuma jumɛn bɛ tasuma min kɛra Drukgyal Dzong la, o kɔlɔlɔ ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: Fɛn kelen min tora, o tun ye Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal ja ye
mc_answer2: Tibet ni Mongol kɛlɛbolow ye se sɔrɔ
mc_answer3: jatigɛwale in diyabɔli ma nɔ bila o la
mc_answer4: A maralen bɛ Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel fɛ

flores_passage: San kɛmɛda 18nan na, Kamboja y’a yɛrɛ sɔrɔ a sirilen bɛ sigiɲɔgɔn barikama fila cɛ, Tayilandi ani Vietnam. Tayilandikaw ye Kamboja binkanni kɛ siɲɛ caman san kɛmɛda 18nan na ani san 1772 u ye Phnom Phen tiɲɛ. San kɛmɛda 18nan labanw na, Vietnamkaw fana ye Kamboja kɛlɛ.
question: Nin kuma minnu fɔra Kamboja ko la, jumɛn ye tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer3: Kambodja binna Vietnamkaw fɛ san kɛmɛda 18nan daminɛ na

flores_passage: San kɛmɛda 18nan na, Kamboja y’a yɛrɛ sɔrɔ a sirilen bɛ sigiɲɔgɔn barikama fila cɛ, Tayilandi ani Vietnam. Tayilandikaw ye Kamboja binkanni kɛ siɲɛ caman san kɛmɛda 18nan na ani san 1772 u ye Phnom Phen tiɲɛ. San kɛmɛda 18nan labanw na, Vietnamkaw fana ye Kamboja kɛlɛ.
question: Nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn bɛ Kamboja binkanniw ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: Vietnamkaw ye Kambodja kɛlɛ siɲɛ caman
mc_answer2: Tayilandikaw ni Vietnamkaw ye binkanni kɛ Kamboja san 1772
mc_answer4: Tayilandikaw ye Kamboja jamana minɛ siɲɛ caman

flores_passage: Tayiwani daminɛ bɛ daminɛ kabini san kɛmɛ 15nan na yɔrɔ min na Erɔpu kurunbolilaw tɛmɛnenw bɛ gun in tɔgɔ sɛbɛn ko Ilha Formosa, walima gun cɛɲi. San 1624,Dutch East India Company ye basigi dɔ sigi Taiwan saheli-tlebi fɛ, ka fɛn dɔ daminɛ aborigɛnw ka suman sɛnɛcogo la ani ka Sinuwa baarakɛlaw bila baara la walasa ka baara kɛ a ka tiga ni sukaro sɛnɛyɔrɔw la. San 1683, Qing mansamara (1644-1912) kɛlɛbolow ye Tayiwani tlebi ani worodugu kɔgɔjida yɔrɔw mara ani ka Taiwan jate Qing Mansamara ka mara ye san 1885. San 1895, a dɛsɛlen kɔ Sino-Japon kɛlɛ fɔlɔ la (1894-1895) , Qing gɔfɛrɛnaman ye a bolonɔ bila Shimonoseki bɛnkansɛbɛn na, o min fɛ a ye Tayiwani ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya di Japon ma, min ye gun in mara fo san 1945.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn na Hollande Ɛndujamana kɔrɔnyanfan tɔn ma kɛ u ka waati la Tayiwani?
mc_answer1: Aw ka basigi sɔrɔ gun in saheli-tlebi fɛ
mc_answer2: Aw bɛ aborigɛnw ka suman sɛnɛni dege
mc_answer3: Sinuwa baarakɛlaw bila baara la a ka forow la
mc_answer4: sɔnna ka Tayiwani ka fanga di Qing ka masaya ma

question: Shimonoseki ka bɛnkan ye mun sigi sen kan?
mc_answer1: Japon ka se sɔrɔli Sinuwa ni Japon kɛlɛ fɔlɔ la
mc_answer2: Tayiwani ka jɔyɔrɔ min ye mara ye Qing ka masaya kɔrɔ
mc_answer3: Tayiwani ka se ka fanga ta kokura a ka kɔgɔjida laminiw kan
mc_answer4: Japon ka fanga min bɛ Tayiwani kan

flores_passage: O bɛ Weele ko kemikɛli ka pH. Aw bɛ se ka taamasiɲɛ dɔ kɛ ni kaba bilenman ji ye. Kabaji bɛ kulɛri Changé ka kɛɲɛ ni a furakisɛ asidi walima basi (alkaline) ye cogo min na. pH hakɛ bɛ jira ni Idɔrozɛni (H min bɛ pH la) ionw hakɛ ye furakisɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛlen kɔnɔ. Idɔrɔzi ionw ye porotɔnw ye minnu ka ɛlektrɔnikiw bɔra u la (k’a masɔrɔ Idɔrɔzɛni atomuw bɛ kɛ porotɔn kelen ni ɛlektrɔni kelen ye).
question: Fura dɔ pH hakɛ bɛ suman cogo di?
mc_answer1: Fura in basigilen walima asidi ye cogo min na
mc_answer3: Idɔn ionw hakɛ min bɛ kemikɛli la

flores_passage: Warabilenw ye wuluw ye minnu bɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ kosɛbɛ, u bɛ sigi kulubaw kɔnɔ minnu bɛ wele ko kuncɛbaya. Prides bɛ Kɛ cɛkɔrɔba kelen fo saba ye minnu bɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ, ka Fàra muso ni denmisɛnnin bisaba ɲɔgɔn kan. A ka c’a la, musomanninw bɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ kosɛbɛ, u ye balimamuso ni denmusow ka denbayaba ye. Warabilenw ka yɛrɛbonya bɛ Kɛ i n’a fɔ waraba walima wulu kuluw, bagan minnu ni warabilenw bɛ Taa ɲɔgɔn fɛ cogo kabakoma na (nka u tɛ wuluba wɛrɛw ye) u taamacogo la, wa u fana bɛ mɔgɔ faga kosɛbɛ u ka fɛnɲɛnɛmaw ma.
question: Nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn tɛ warabilenw ka kuncɛbaya ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: U taamacogo bɛ i n’a fɔ wuluw ka kuluw
mc_answer2: Cɛ ni muso hakɛ tɛ kelen ye
mc_answer3: Cɛ ni muso bɛɛ bɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ kosɛbɛ
mc_answer4: U fila bɛɛ bɛ mɔgɔ faga ani u bɛ mɔgɔw la

flores_passage: Warabilenw ye wuluw ye minnu bɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ kosɛbɛ, u bɛ sigi kulubaw kɔnɔ minnu bɛ wele ko kuncɛbaya. Prides bɛ Kɛ cɛkɔrɔba kelen fo saba ye minnu bɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ, ka Fàra muso ni denmisɛnnin bisaba ɲɔgɔn kan. A ka c’a la, musomanninw bɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ kosɛbɛ, u ye balimamuso ni denmusow ka denbayaba ye. Warabilenw ka yɛrɛbonya bɛ Kɛ i n’a fɔ waraba walima wulu kuluw, bagan minnu ni warabilenw bɛ Taa ɲɔgɔn fɛ cogo kabakoma na (nka u tɛ wuluba wɛrɛw ye) u taamacogo la, wa u fana bɛ mɔgɔ faga kosɛbɛ u ka fɛnɲɛnɛmaw ma.
question: Nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn tɛ warabilenw ka kɛwalew ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer2: U ka kɛwalew bɛ se ka suma ni waraw ta ye
mc_answer3: Cɛmanninw ni musomanninw bɛɛ bɛ mɔgɔ faga kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛn fɛnɲɛnɛmaw kan
mc_answer4: taamacogo bɛ i n’a fɔ wuluba tɔw

flores_passage: U jukɔrɔ, wulu minnu ka bon kosɛbɛ, olu bɛ fɛnɲɛnɛma cɛmancɛw dun k’a ta laɲɔ na ka taa a bila wuluw ni sagaw la. A laban na, wulu misɛnnin caman bɛ yen (sokɔnɔbaganw lafiyalenw fana b’u la) minnu bɛ fɛn misɛnninw dun minnu ka ca kosɛbɛ i n’a fɔ fɛnɲɛnamaw, wuluw, wuluw ani kɔnɔw. U ka ɲɛtaa gundo ye nisɛ hakilina ye, baara kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen min bɛ pusi kelen-kelen bɛɛ bolo min b’a to a tɛ se ka ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ ni mɔgɔ wɛrɛw ye.
question: Laɲɔw ye fɛnɲɛnɛma sugu jumɛnw ka fɛnɲɛnɛma ye?
mc_answer3: Pusi minnu bonya ye cɛmancɛ ye

flores_passage: U jukɔrɔ, wulu minnu ka bon kosɛbɛ, olu bɛ fɛnɲɛnɛma cɛmancɛw dun k’a ta laɲɔ na ka taa a bila wuluw ni sagaw la. question: Tuma misɛnninw ka teli ka ninnu la jumɛn de ɲini?

flores_passage: ka di ocelotw ye ka bagan misɛnninw dun. U bɛna sonsannin, sa, sogo ani kɔnɔw Minɛ n'u bɛ Se. Ocelot bɛ bagan minnu ɲini, a bɛ se ka fɔ ko olu bɛɛ ka dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛ a kan. Dɔnniyakɛlaw hakili la ko ocelotw bɛ tugu baganw kɔ ka u dun (minɛ) u kasa fɛ, u bɛ u kɛ yɔrɔ min na duguma, u bɛ u fiyɛ. U bɛ se ka yeli kɛ kosɛbɛ dibi la ni sufɛ yeli ye, wa u bɛ lamaga sonyali la kosɛbɛ, olu fana. Ocelotw b’u ka fɛnɲɛnɛmaw Kùnbɛn n’u bɛ Dòn u lamini na o kɔ fɛ k’u ka fɛnɲɛnɛmaw Dòn.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ ocelot ka sogo ɲinini fɛɛrɛ dɔ ye?
mc_answer1: Ka camouflage kɛ u lamini na
mc_answer3: U bɛ tugu u ka fɛnɲɛnɛmaw kɔ su fɛ
mc_answer4: Bagan minnu bonya ka dɔgɔn, olu dɔrɔn de minɛni

question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ ocelot ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: U bɛ se ka sogo ɲini kosɛbɛ su fɛ
mc_answer2: U bɛ taa yɔrɔ wɛrɛ la ni dususuma ye
mc_answer3: U ka kasadɛsɛ barika ka dɔgɔ
mc_answer4: A ka di u ye ka bagan misɛnninw Kùnbɛn

flores_passage: Fɛnɲɛnɛmakɛla min lamininen dòn kosɛbɛ, jara bɛ Se ka Yɛlɛn (hali n’a ma Kɛ koɲuman), ka jɛgɛn, ka pan yɔrɔ janw na ani ka sama ni hadamaden barikama fanga ye siɲɛ duuru. Jara bɛ kulu kelen na (Genus Panthera) ni warabilenw, ntoriw ani jaguaw ye. Nin wulu naani ninnu dɔrɔn de bɛ Se ka mankan Bɔ. Jara ka mankan tɛ i n’a fɔ waraba kan dafalen mankan, nka a bɛ i n’a fɔ kumasen min bɛ fɔ ni sɔgɔsɔgɔ ye, kumakan minnu bɛ pɛrɛn.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛna jate jara fanga belebeleba ye?

flores_passage: Fɛnɲɛnɛmakɛla min lamininen dòn kosɛbɛ, jara bɛ Se ka Yɛlɛn (hali n’a ma Kɛ koɲuman), ka jɛgɛn, ka pan yɔrɔ janw na ani ka sama ni hadamaden barikama fanga ye siɲɛ duuru. Jara ka mankan tɛ i n’a fɔ waraba kan dafalen mankan, nka a bɛ i n’a fɔ kumasen min bɛ fɔ ni sɔgɔsɔgɔ ye, kumakan minnu bɛ pɛrɛn.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, danfara jumɛn bɛ waraba ni waraba cɛ?

flores_passage: Kɔnɔnatumu ye fɛnɲɛnama (fɛn) dɔ jɔcogo ni a baarakɛcogo fitinin ye. Cell bɔra latigɛkan daɲɛ cella la min kɔrɔ ye so fitinin ye. N’i ye fɛn ɲɛnamaw lajɛ mikroskɔpu fɛ, i b’a ye k’u dilannen don ni kɛnɛ misɛnninw walima bololanɛgɛw ye. Robert Hooke, min ye ɲɛnamayako dɔnbaga ye ka bɔ Angletɛri, ale ye kɛnɛ misɛnninw ye kɔri kɔnɔ ni mikroskɔpu ye. U tun bɛ iko sobaw. Ale de ye mɔgɔ fɔlɔ ye min ye seli salenw kɔlɔsi
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, Robert Hooke ye mun kɛ ka kɔn ɲɛnamayako dɔnbaga tɔw ɲɛ?
mc_answer2: Aw bɛ baara kɛ ni mikroskɔpu ye walasa ka fɛnɲɛnama dɔ lajɛ
mc_answer4: Fɛnɲɛnɛma dɔ ka baarakɛcogo fitininw Sɔrɔ

flores_passage: Kɔnɔnatumu ye fɛnɲɛnama (fɛn) dɔ jɔcogo ni a baarakɛcogo fitinin ye. Cell bɔra latigɛkan daɲɛ cella la min kɔrɔ ye so fitinin ye. N’i ye fɛn ɲɛnamaw lajɛ mikroskɔpu fɛ, i b’a ye k’u dilannen don ni kɛnɛ misɛnninw walima bololanɛgɛw ye. question: “Seli” daɲɛ bɔyɔrɔ kɔrɔ ye mun ye?

flores_passage: Baganw dilannen don ni selilu caman ye. U bɛ fɛnw dun k’u sɔgɔ u kɔnɔ. Bagan fanba bɛ se ka lamaga. Baganw dɔrɔn de bɛ ni kunkolo ye (hali ni hali bagan bɛɛ tɛ o sɔrɔ; misali la, jeliw tɛ ni kunkolo ye). Baganw bɛ Sɔrɔ dugukolo fan bɛɛ la. U bɛ dugukolo sɔgɔ, ka jigin kɔgɔjiw la, ka pan sankolo la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, se bɛ bagan fanba ye ka mun kɛ?

flores_passage: Baganw dilannen don ni selilu caman ye. U bɛ fɛnw dun k’u sɔgɔ u kɔnɔ. Bagan fanba bɛ se ka lamaga. Baganw dɔrɔn de bɛ ni kunkolo ye (hali ni hali bagan bɛɛ tɛ o sɔrɔ; misali la, jeliw tɛ ni kunkolo ye). Baganw bɛ Sɔrɔ dugukolo fan bɛɛ la. U bɛ dugukolo sɔgɔ, ka jigin kɔgɔjiw la, ka pan sankolo la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun tɛ bagan dɔw la?
mc_answer2: Se min bɛ a la ka dumuni kɛ
mc_answer4: Dumuni seko min bɛ a la

flores_passage: Fɛnɲɛnɛmaw bɛ oksizɛni dilan hadamadenw bɛ min fiyɛ, wa u bɛ gazi ɲuman ta hadamadenw bɛ min fiyɛ (o kɔrɔ ye ko u bɛ ninakili bɔ). Fɛnɲɛnɛmaw b’u ka dumuni Kɛ tile fɛ ni fotosintezi ye. U bɛ biɲɛ fana Di. An b’an ka sow dilan ni jiriw ye, ka finiw dilan ni jiriw ye. An bɛ dumuni minnu dun, olu fanba ye jiriw ye. Ni jiriw tun tɛ yen, baganw tun tɛ se ka balo.
question: Mun bɛ jiriw dɛmɛ u ka kɛnɛyako la?

flores_passage: Fɛnɲɛnɛmaw bɛ oksizɛni dilan hadamadenw bɛ min fiyɛ, wa u bɛ gazi ɲuman ta hadamadenw bɛ min fiyɛ (o kɔrɔ ye ko u bɛ ninakili bɔ). Fɛnɲɛnɛmaw b’u ka dumuni Kɛ tile fɛ ni fotosintezi ye. U bɛ biɲɛ fana Di. An b’an ka sow dilan ni jiriw ye, ka finiw dilan ni jiriw ye. An bɛ dumuni minnu dun, olu fanba ye jiriw ye. Ni jiriw tun tɛ yen, baganw tun tɛ se ka balo.
question: Adamadenw bɛ mun fiyɛ jiriw bɛ min fiyɛ?

flores_passage: Ni fɛnɲɛnamaw kulu fitinin dɔ (jamanaden fitinin) farala ɲɔgɔn kan ni jamanadenba ye u bɔra min na (i n’a fɔ n’u taara kuluba dɔ kan walima baji dɔ kan, walima n’u taara gun kura la walasa u kana se nɔgɔya la kɔsegin) u bɛna u yɛrɛ sɔrɔ tuma caman na sigida wɛrɛ la ka tɛmɛ u tun bɛ cogo min na fɔlɔ. Nin sigida kura in nafolo tɛ kelen ye ani ɲɔgɔndan wɛrɛw, o la jamanaden kura mago bɛna kɛ fɛn wɛrɛw la walima ladamuni wɛrɛw la walasa ka kɛ ɲɔgɔndan barikama ye ka tɛmɛ u mago tun bɛ min na fɔlɔ. Jamanaden fɔlɔ ma Changé fewu, hali bi u mago bɛ ladamuni kelenw na i n’a fɔ fɔlɔ. Waati tɛmɛnen kɔfɛ, ni jamanaden kura bɛ daminɛ ka ladamu u ka sigida kura la, u bɛ daminɛ ka dɔgɔya ka taa a fɛ i n’a fɔ jamanaden tɔw. A laban na, san ba caman walima hali miliyɔn caman tɛmɛnen kɔfɛ, jamanaden fila ninnu bɛna kɛ danfara ye fo u tɛ se k’u wele ko sugu kelen. An b’o wale in Weele ko ‘speciation (sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛ), o kɔrɔ ye dɔrɔn ko suguya kuraw jɔli. Kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, o ye kɔlɔlɔ ye min tɛ Se ka Lajɔ, wa a nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ fɛnɲɛnamaw ka fɛnɲɛnamayali la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nin misali ninnu na, jumɛn bɛna fɛnw jiginni taabolo bali?
mc_answer1: Jɛkulu fitinin dɔ min tɛ se ka ɲɛtaa sɔrɔ yɔrɔ kura la
mc_answer2: Jamanaden kelen yɔrɔ dɔ bɛ taa sigida kura la
mc_answer3: Jamanaden min b'a ka ladamuni ladilan sigida kura kɔnɔ
mc_answer4: Jamanaden kelen labanna ka Kɛ fla ye

flores_passage: Ni fɛnɲɛnamaw kulu fitinin dɔ (jamanaden fitinin) farala ɲɔgɔn kan ni jamanadenba ye u bɔra min na (i n’a fɔ n’u taara kuluba dɔ kan walima baji dɔ kan, walima n’u taara gun kura la walasa u kana se nɔgɔya la kɔsegin) u bɛna u yɛrɛ sɔrɔ tuma caman na sigida wɛrɛ la ka tɛmɛ u tun bɛ cogo min na fɔlɔ. Nin sigida kura in nafolo tɛ kelen ye ani ɲɔgɔndan wɛrɛw, o la jamanaden kura mago bɛna kɛ fɛn wɛrɛw la walima ladamuni wɛrɛw la walasa ka kɛ ɲɔgɔndan barikama ye ka tɛmɛ u mago tun bɛ min na fɔlɔ. Jamanaden fɔlɔ ma Changé fewu, hali bi u mago bɛ ladamuni kelenw na i n’a fɔ fɔlɔ. Waati tɛmɛnen kɔfɛ, ni jamanaden kura bɛ daminɛ ka ladamu u ka sigida kura la, u bɛ daminɛ ka dɔgɔya ka taa a fɛ i n’a fɔ jamanaden tɔw. A laban na, san ba caman walima hali miliyɔn caman tɛmɛnen kɔfɛ, jamanaden fila ninnu bɛna kɛ danfara ye fo u tɛ se k’u wele ko sugu kelen. An b’o wale in Weele ko ‘speciation (sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛ), o kɔrɔ ye dɔrɔn ko suguya kuraw jɔli. Kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, o ye kɔlɔlɔ ye min tɛ Se ka Lajɔ, wa a nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ fɛnɲɛnamaw ka fɛnɲɛnamayali la.

mc_answer1: A bɛ kɛ ni jamanaden kura ma se ka ladamu
mc_answer2: O ye 'yɔrɔba ye 'yɔrɔ la min bɛ 'yɔrɔ la min bɛ 'yɔrɔ la min bɛ 'yɔrɔ la min bɛ 'yɔrɔ la min bɛ 'yɔrɔ la

Fotonw yɛrɛ ka dɔgɔ ni fɛn ye min bɛ atomiw dilan !"
question: Ka Kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, fɛɛrɛ jumɛn bɛ Kɛ min b’a To atomiw bɛ fanga tɛmɛnen Bɔ yeelen na?

flores_passage: "Walisa ka Segin u ka fanga hakɛ kɔrɔ la, u ka kan ka fanga wɛrɛ Bɔ u ye min Sɔrɔ yeelen na. U b'o Kɛ ni yeelen-yɔrɔ fitinin dɔ bɔli ye min bɛ Weele ko ""foton"". Dɔnniyakɛlaw b'o wale in Weele ko ""stimulated emission of radiation"" bawo atomiw bɛ lawuli yeelen jɛlen fɛ, o bɛ kɛ sababu ye ka yeelen foton dɔ bɔ, wa yeelen ye radiyo suguya dɔ ye Ja nata bɛ atomiw jira minnu bɛ fotonw bɔ tiɲɛ na, fotonw ka dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛ minnu bɛ ja in na. Fotonw yɛrɛ ka dɔgɔ ni fɛn ye min bɛ atomiw dilan !"
question: Mun de bɛ kɛ sababu ye ka atomi dɔ bɔ foton dɔ la?
mc_answer2: Lawulili min bɛ sɔrɔ yeelenba fɛ
mc_answer4: A kɔlɔlɔ jugu min bɛ sɔrɔ fiɲɛ bilali la

flores_passage: Lɛrɛ kɛmɛ caman baara kɔfɛ, anpulu kɔnɔ fila bɛ laban ka jeni ani anpulu tɛ baara kɛ tuguni. O kɔfɛ, anpulu ka kan ka wuli. A ka kan ka aw janto anpulu falenni na. Fɔlɔ, yeelenbɔlan ka switch ka kan ka faga walima ka kabali tigɛ. O bɛ kɛ barisa kuran min bɛ don sosɛti kɔnɔ, anpulu nɛgɛyɔrɔ sigilen bɛ yɔrɔ min na, o bɛ se ka kuranba di i ma ni i magara sosɛti kɔnɔna na walima anpulu nɛgɛda la k’a sɔrɔ a yɔrɔ dɔ bɛ sosɛti kɔnɔ hali bi.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun bɛna laban ka kɛ sababu ye ka anpulu dɔ ka baara dabila?
mc_answer2: Ka anpulu nɛgɛ basigilen kɛ a yɔrɔ dɔ dɔrɔn na sosɛti kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Filament min bɛ anpulu kɔnɔ, o bɛ ka jeni
mc_answer4: Kuran doncogo min bɛ don sosɛti kɔnɔ, o bɛ ka sumaya

flores_passage: Fisiyɔn bɔnbu bɛ baara Kɛ ni sariya ye ko fanga bɛ de wajibiya walasa ka nucleus (nucleus) dɔ fara ɲɔgɔn kan ni proton ni neutron caman ye. A bɛ i n’a fɔ ka wotoro girinman dɔ wuli ka wuli kulu kan. Ni nucleus (nucleus) tilalen don kokura o kɔfɛ, o fanga dɔw bɛ Bɔ. Atomu dɔw ka nucleus (nucleus) sabatibaliw bɛ yen o kɔrɔ ye k’u ka teli ka kari ni nudging (wuli) dɔɔnin ye walima ni nudging (wuli) tɛ u la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun bɛ kɛ ni nukili dɔ farala ɲɔgɔn kan?
mc_answer3: Atomuw bɛ kɛ fɛn ye min tɛ sabati

flores_passage: Ni i ye mɔgɔ wele min ni kilomɛtɛrɛ ba caman cɛ ye, i bɛ baara kɛ ni sateliti ye. Sateliti min bɛ sankolo la, o bɛ weleli sɔrɔ, ka sɔrɔ k’a jira ka segin duguma, a bɛ se ka fɔ ko o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ. Sateliti in cilen don sankolo la ni misiri ye. Dɔnniyakɛlaw bɛ baara Kɛ ni teleskɔpuw ye sankolo la bari Dugukolo fiɲɛbɔ bɛ an ka yeelen n’an ka filɛli dɔw Lakodɔn. A bɛ kɛ ni misiri belebeleba dɔ ye min janya bɛ tɛmɛ mɛtɛrɛ 100 kan walasa ka sateliti walima teleskɔpu bila sankolo la.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn bɛ yɔrɔjan weleli jira ka segin ka jigin Dugukolo kan

mc_answer4: Sateliti minnu janya bɛ tɛmɛ mɛtɛrɛ 100 kan

flores_passage: Waati ye fɛn ye min bɛ an lamini na, wa a bɛ nɔ bila an ka kɛtaw bɛɛ la, o bɛɛ n’a ta, a faamuyali ka gɛlɛn. Diinan, filozofi ani dɔnniya dɔnnikɛlaw ye waati sɛgɛsɛgɛ kabini san ba caman. An bɛ waati ye i n’a fɔ ko minnu bɛ tugu ɲɔgɔn na, minnu bɛ tɛmɛ siniko la ka taa bi waati la ka taa waati tɛmɛnenw na. Waati fana ye an bɛ ko kɛlenw kuntaala (janya) suma cogo min na. I yɛrɛ bɛ se ka waati tɛmɛni taamasiyɛn kɛ ni i ye ko kɛlen dɔ seginni kɔlɔsi. Ko min bɛ kɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ, o ye fɛn ye min bɛ kɛ siɲɛ caman tuma bɛɛ.
question: Mun de ka kan ka kɔlɔsi ko kɛlen dɔ kan min bɛ kɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ walasa ka waati tɛmɛnenw nɔfɛtaama?

flores_passage: Laada la, masasigilan ciyɛntala tun bɛ taa sɔrɔdasiya la joona lakɔli bannen kɔfɛ. Nka, Charles taara inivɛrisite la Trinity College, Cambridge a ye Anthropology and Archaeology kalan yen, ani kɔfɛ Tariku, ka 2:2 sɔrɔ (diplomu filanan min ka dɔgɔn). Charles tun ye Angletɛri masakɛ denbaya mɔgɔ fɔlɔ ye min ye diplomu sɔrɔ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn bɛ jate fɛn ye min bɛ kɛ masasigilan ciyɛntabaga fɛ?
mc_answer2: Ka ban inivɛrisite la walasa ka don sɔrɔdasiya la
mc_answer4: Ka taa inivɛrisite la ka sɔrɔ ka don sɔrɔdasiya la

flores_passage: Laada la, masasigilan ciyɛntala tun bɛ taa sɔrɔdasiya la joona lakɔli bannen kɔfɛ. Charles tun ye Angletɛri masakɛ denbaya mɔgɔ fɔlɔ ye min ye diplomu sɔrɔ.
question: Ka da kunnafoniw kan minnu dira o tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, Charles de kɛra mɔgɔ fɔlɔ ye ka mun kɛ?
mc_answer1: Aw ka don sɔrɔdasiya la sanni aw ka lakɔli ban
mc_answer4: Aw ye taa Trinity College la

flores_passage: Angletɛri tun ye hɛrɛ waati jan sɔrɔ Danelaw minɛni kɔfɛ. Nka san 991 Ethelred ye Vikingw ka kurunba dɔ kunbɛn min ka bon ni kurun tɔw bɛɛ ye kabini Guthrum ta san kɛmɛ ka kɔn o ɲɛ. O kurunba in ɲɛmɔgɔya tun bɛ Olaf Trygvasson bolo, Norwij jamanaden min tun b’a fɛ k’a ka jamana segin Danmakɛ ka fanga ma. Sɔrɔdasi kɔtigɛwale fɔlɔw kɔfɛ, Ethelred sera ka bɛn bɛnkanw ma ni Olaf ye, min seginna Norvege walasa k’a ɲini k’a ka masaya sɔrɔ ni ɲɛtaa ɲagaminen ye.
question: Trygvasson ka kurunba tun bɔra jamana jumɛn na?

flores_passage: "San kɛmɛda 15nan lamini na, Ɛsitoni worodugu tun bɛ Alimanjamana ka laadala fanga kɔrɔ. Alemaɲi mɔnikɛ dɔw tun b'a fɛ ka Ala gɛrɛ jamanadenw na, o de la u ye Ɛsitonikan daɲɛ kɔrɔ dabɔ. A tun sinsinnen bɛ Alemaɲi sɛbɛnnibolo kan ani taamasiyɛn kelen ""Õ /õ"" farala a kan. Waati tɛmɛnen kɔfɛ, daɲɛ caman minnu juru donna Alemaɲikan na, olu farala ɲɔgɔn kan.
question: Tariku waati jumɛn na Alimanjamana ye nɔba bila Ɛsitoni jamana na ka ɲɛsin laadalakow ma?

Alemaɲi mɔnikɛ dɔw tun b'a fɛ ka Ala gɛrɛ jamanadenw na, o de la u ye Ɛsitonikan daɲɛ kɔrɔ dabɔ. A tun sinsinnen bɛ Alemaɲi sɛbɛnnibolo kan ani taamasiyɛn kelen ""Õ /õ"" farala a kan. Waati tɛmɛnen kɔfɛ, daɲɛ caman minnu juru donna Alemaɲikan na, olu farala ɲɔgɔn kan.
question: Mun de ye nɔ bila Ɛsitoni kan na?

flores_passage: Jateminɛ suguya caman bɛ kɛ mɔgɔ hakɛ kan min bɛ hindikan fɔ. A jate la, a bɛ kan flanan ni naaninan 'cɛ min bɛ Fɔ kosɛbɛ diɲɛ kɔnɔ. Fasokanfɔlaw hakɛ bɛ Yɛlɛma ka Kɛɲɛ ni kanhakɛ minnu ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ ka surun kosɛbɛ, olu jate bɛ Kɛ walima n’u tɛ jate. Jateminɛw y’a Jira ko mɔgɔ miliyɔn 340 fo miliyɔn 500 bɛ yen, wa mɔgɔ miliyɔn 800 ɲɔgɔn bɛ Se ka kan in Faamu. Hindikan ni urdukan daɲɛw bɛ ɲɔgɔn na nka u sɛbɛnni tɛ kelen ye; don o don barow la, a ka c’a la, kan fila fɔbagaw bɛ se ka ɲɔgɔn faamuya.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, Hindikan fɔbagaw hakɛ bɛ wuli ka bɔ ɲɔgɔn na ka da fɛn jumɛn kan?
mc_answer1: Ni kanhakɛ minnu ni hindikan bɔlen don kosɛbɛ olu bɛ jate
mc_answer2: Ni Urdukan fɔbagaw bɛ ka jate
mc_answer3: Ni mɔgɔ minnu bɛ se ka kan faamu, olu bɛ jate
mc_answer4: Ni mɔgɔ minnu bɛ se ka kan kalan, olu bɛ jate

flores_passage: Jateminɛ suguya caman bɛ kɛ mɔgɔ hakɛ kan min bɛ hindikan fɔ. A jate la, a bɛ kan flanan ni naaninan 'cɛ min bɛ Fɔ kosɛbɛ diɲɛ kɔnɔ. Jateminɛw y’a Jira ko mɔgɔ miliyɔn 340 fo miliyɔn 500 bɛ yen, wa mɔgɔ miliyɔn 800 ɲɔgɔn bɛ Se ka kan in Faamu. Hindikan ni urdukan daɲɛw bɛ ɲɔgɔn na nka u sɛbɛnni tɛ kelen ye; don o don barow la, a ka c’a la, kan fila fɔbagaw bɛ se ka ɲɔgɔn faamuya.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ye kuma tiɲɛnen ye Hindikan ni Urdukanw kan?
mc_answer1: A ka c’a la, jɛɲɔgɔnya bɛ tigɛ kan fila bɛɛ fɔbagaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ
mc_answer3: U bɛ ɲɔgɔn Bɔ daɲɛw ni sɛbɛnnibolow bɛɛ la
mc_answer4: U tɛ kelen ye daɲɛw fɔcogo la

flores_passage: "Hangeul ye alfabe kelen ye min dabɔra laɲini na don o don baara la min bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ. Alfabe in dabɔra san 1444 masakɛ Sejong ka masaya waati la (1418 – 1450). Masakɛ Sejong tun ye Joseon ka masaya masakɛ naaninan ye ani a ye min bonyalen don kosɛbɛ. A ye Hangeul alfabe tɔgɔ da fɔlɔ Hunmin Jeongeum, o kɔrɔ ye ko ""mankan ɲumanw jamanadenw ka kalan kama"".
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye Hangeul alfabe kan?
mc_answer1: dabɔra masakɛ Sejong ka masaya daminɛ na
mc_answer2: O alfabe tɔgɔ fɔlɔ tun ye Hunan Jeongeum ye
mc_answer3: A dabɔra Joseon Dynasty ka masakɛ naaninan fɛ

flores_passage: "Hangeul ye alfabe kelen ye min dabɔra laɲini na don o don baara la min bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ. Alfabe in dabɔra san 1444 masakɛ Sejong ka masaya waati la (1418 – 1450). Masakɛ Sejong tun ye Joseon ka masaya masakɛ naaninan ye ani a ye min bonyalen don kosɛbɛ. A ye Hangeul alfabe tɔgɔ da fɔlɔ Hunmin Jeongeum, o kɔrɔ ye ko ""mankan ɲumanw jamanadenw ka kalan kama"".
question: Alfabe Hunmin Jeongeum labanna ka Changé ka kɛ mun ye?

flores_passage: Miiriya caman bɛ yen minnu bɛ Sanskrikan Nàna cogo min na. U dɔ bɛ kuma Aryanw ka bɔli kan ka Bɔ tlebin fɛ ka Nà Ɛndujamana na min Nàna n'u ka kan ye. Sanskrikan ye kan kɔrɔ ye, wa a bɛ se ka suma ni Latinkan ye min bɛ fɔ Erɔpu jamanaw na. Gafe fɔlɔ min lakodɔnnen don diɲɛ kɔnɔ, o sɛbɛnna sanskrikan na. Upanishadw dalajɛlen kɔfɛ, Sanskrikan Dɔgɔyara dɔrɔn k’a sababu Kɛ ɲɔgɔndan ye. Sanskrikan ye kan ye min ka gɛlɛn kosɛbɛ ani min nafa ka bon, min kɛra sababu ye ka kɛ bi Ɛndukan caman sɔrɔyɔrɔ ye, i n’a fɔ Latin ye Erɔpu kanw sɔrɔyɔrɔ ye i n’a fɔ Faransikan ani Ɛsipaɲɔlikan.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, kan jumɛnw de ye nɔ bila Sanskrikan na?

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, sanskrikan baara dɔgɔyara mun de kosɔn?

flores_passage: Io ka girinya tun bɛna ne sama cogo di? Ni i tun jɔlen bɛ Io sanfɛ, i girinya tun bɛna dɔgɔya ka tɛmɛ i girinya kan Dugukolo kan. Mɔgɔ min girinya ye kilo 200 ye Dugukolo kan, o girinya bɛ kilo 36 ɲɔgɔn bɔ Io kan. O la sa, tiɲɛ na, girinya tɛ i sama dɔɔnin.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn ye kuma tigitigi ye ka ɲɛsin girinya ma min bɛ Io kan?
mc_answer1: Dugukolo girinya tun bɛna i sama dɔɔnin ka tɛmɛ Io girinya kan
mc_answer2: Io ka girinya bɛ sama ka caya, o de y’a to i tun bɛna dɔgɔya kosɛbɛ
mc_answer3: Io ka girinya bɛ sama ka caya, o de y’a to i tun bɛna girinya ka tɛmɛ
mc_answer4: Dugukolo girinya tun bɛna i sama ka tɛmɛ Io girinya kan

flores_passage: Kalo sanfɛla bɛ Kɛ ni faraw ni buguri ye. Kalo kɛnɛma-yɔrɔ bɛ Weele ko kuru. Kurukuru in janya bɛ Taa bam 70 ɲɔgɔn na kɛrɛfɛ, a janya bɛ Taa bam 100 ɲɔgɔn na yɔrɔ jan. A ka fin maria jukɔrɔ, a ka bon kuluw jukɔrɔ. Mariya bɛ se ka caya kɛrɛfɛ fan fɛ barisa a kuru ka fin. A tun ka nɔgɔn lava ka wuli ka taa sanfɛ.
question: Ka Kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn bɛ Kalo kɛnɛma-yɔrɔ ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: Kɛrɛfɛ fan fɛ, a kuru ka bon
mc_answer2: A kurukuruw ka fin kuluw jukɔrɔ
mc_answer3: Mariya bɛ se ka dɔgɔya yɔrɔ jan na
mc_answer4: Mariya bɛ se ka dɔgɔya kuluw jukɔrɔ

flores_passage: Kalo sanfɛla bɛ Kɛ ni faraw ni buguri ye. Kalo kɛnɛma-yɔrɔ bɛ Weele ko kuru. Kurukuru in janya bɛ Taa bam 70 ɲɔgɔn na kɛrɛfɛ, a janya bɛ Taa bam 100 ɲɔgɔn na yɔrɔ jan. A ka fin maria jukɔrɔ, a ka bon kuluw jukɔrɔ. Mariya bɛ se ka caya kɛrɛfɛ fan fɛ barisa a kuru ka fin. A tun ka nɔgɔn lava ka wuli ka taa sanfɛ.
question: Tɛmɛsira in fɛ, Kalo kurukurunin ka bon yɔrɔ jumɛn na?
mc_answer2: Yɔrɔ min na maria ka ca yen

flores_passage: "Mɔgɔ caman bɛ siko don min na hadamadenw bɛ se ka taa dolow wɛrɛ la ka diɲɛ wɛrɛw sɛgɛsɛgɛ, mɔgɔ dɔw b'u yɛrɛ ɲininka mun bɛ kɛnɛma dɔw dalen b'a la ko dunanw walima ɲɛnamaya wɛrɛw bɛ se ka balo jiri wɛrɛ kan. Nka, ni nin kɛra don dɔ n'a sɔrɔla o tɛna kɛ."(Alimankan na) kabini waati jan kosɛbɛ.Dolow jɛnsɛnnen don fo kilomɛtɛrɛ miliyari caman bɛ dolow ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ minnu ye ""sɔrɔɲɔgɔnw"" ye Laala don dɔ, i mamadenw bɛna jɔ dunan diɲɛ dɔ sanfɛ k'u yɛrɛ ɲininka u bɛnbaw la wa?
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, nin fɛn ninnu na, mɔgɔ dɔw dalen bɛ jumɛn na?
mc_answer1: Hadamadenw ye taama kɛ ka taa dolow wɛrɛw la
mc_answer2: Hadamadenw tɛ se ka diɲɛ wɛrɛw sɛgɛsɛgɛ
mc_answer4: Kilomɛtɛrɛ miliyari caman tɛ dolow ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ

flores_passage: Revolutionnaire kɛlɛ waati la, jamana tan ni saba ye fɔlɔ ka cɛmancɛ-gofɛrɛnaman barikama dɔ sigi senkan — ni Kongresi kelenpe de tun ye a yɔrɔ ye — Confederation sariyaw kɔnɔ. Kongresi tun tɛ se ka impositi bila, wa, ikomi jamana ɲɛmɔgɔyaso walima kiritigɛlaw tun tɛ yen, a tun bɛ a jigi da jamana ɲɛmɔgɔw kan, minnu tun tɛ jɛ ka baara kɛ tuma caman na, walasa k’a ka walew bɛɛ waleya. Fanga tun t’a la fana ka impositi sariyaw ni tarifuw tiɲɛ jamanaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ. Sariyasenw tun b’a ɲini jamanaw bɛɛ ka sɔnni bɛɛ fɛ sanni u ka se ka ladilan ani jamanaw tun bɛ cɛmancɛ-gofɛrɛnaman ta nɔgɔya la fo u ka lasigidenw tun tɛ yen tuma caman na.

flores_passage: Faransi kɛlɛ bannen kɔ, Alimanjamana y’a daminɛ k’a labɛn ka bin Angletɛri gun kan. Alimanjamana ye binkanni in tɔgɔ da ko “Operation Sealion”. Angletɛri sɔrɔdasikulu ka marifa girinmanw ni a ka fɛnw fanba tun tununna tuma min na u bɔra Dunkirk, o la kɛlɛbolo barika tun ka dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ. Nka Masakɛ ka kɔgɔjidala sɔrɔdasikulu barika tun ka bon hali bi kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛ Alemaɲi kɔgɔjidala sɔrɔdasikulu kan (“Kriegsmarine”) ani a tun bɛ se ka binkannikɛla kulu o kurunba ci ka tɛmɛ Angilɛw ka kɔgɔjida la, o tiɲɛ. Nka, Royal Navy kurun damadɔ dɔrɔn de tun sigilen bɛ binkanni siraw kɛrɛfɛ minnu bɛ se ka kɛ bawo amiraliw tun bɛ siran ko u bɛna jigin Alemaɲi ka fiɲɛ binkanni fɛ.

flores_passage: Ka kɔn o ɲɛ, Ring ka ɲɛmɔgɔba, Jamie Siminoff, y’a jira ko sosiyete in daminɛna waati min na a ka da sɔgɔli ma mɛn ka bɔ a ka butiki kɔnɔ a ka garazi kɔnɔ. A ye WiFi da bɛlɛkisɛ dɔ jɔ, a ko ten. Siminoff ko feereli cayara a ka san 2013 bɔli kɔfɛ Shark Tank yɔrɔ dɔ la, yɔrɔ min na yiracogo jɛkulu banna ka wari di o daminɛ ma. San 2017 laban na, Siminoff bɔra sannifeere telewisɔn QVC la. Ring ye kiritigɛ dɔ fana ɲɛnabɔ ni lakanatɔn ye min bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔsɔ, n’o ye ADT Corporation ye.
question: Tuma jumɛn na Ring ye dɔ fara feereli kan?
mc_answer1: A jirali kɔfɛ Shark Tank kan
mc_answer4: Kiiritigɛso dɔ ɲɛnabɔlen kɔfɛ ni ADT ye

flores_passage: "PBS ka jirali in bɛ ni Emmy jaabi tan ni fila ni kɔ ye, wa a boli ka surun dɔrɔn ka tɛmɛ Sesame Street ni Mister Rogers ka sigida kan. Ɲɛjirali in tilayɔrɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ tun bɛna sinsin barokun dɔ kan gafe kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ kɔnɔ, ka sɔrɔ k'o barokun sɛgɛsɛgɛ maana caman fɛ." . Ɲɛjirali kelen-kelen bɛɛ tun bɛna ladilikanw di fana gafew kan, denmisɛnw ka kan ka minnu ɲini n’u taara u ka gafemarayɔrɔ la John Grant, ka bɔ WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow ka so gare) y’a fɔ ko ""Reading Rainbow ye denmisɛnw kalan mun na u ka kan ka kalan kɛ,... kanu kalan — [o jirali] ye dusu don denmisɛnw kɔnɔ u ka gafe dɔ ta ani ka kalan kɛ."" Dɔw dalen b'a la, John Grant fana sen bɛ o la, ko wariko gɛlɛya ani kalanko telewisɔn porogaramuw hakilila caman cili fila bɛɛ kɛra sababu ye ka gafe in ban. " " .

flores_passage: Kibaruyaw jɛnsɛnna Red Lake sigida la bi, k’a sɔrɔ Jeff Weise ni mɔgɔ 9 minnu fagara, olu la saba sudon kɛra, ko kalanden wɛrɛ minɛna ka ɲɛsin lakɔlidenw ka marifaciw ma marisikalo tile 21. Faamaw ma kuma caman fɔ foroba la ka tɛmɛn bi minɛni in tiɲɛni kan. Nka, kunnafonisɛbɛn dɔ min bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli in dɔn, o y’a fɔ Minneapolis Star-Tribune ye ko Louis Jourdain de don, n’o ye Red Lake Tribal ɲɛmɔgɔ Floyd Jourdain denkɛ ye, n’a si bɛ san 16 la. A ma dɔn nin waati in na jalaki jumɛnw bɛna da walima mun de ye faamaw bila cɛnin in na nka denmisɛnninw ka koɲɛw daminɛna fédéral kiritigɛso la.

flores_passage: ɲɔgɔnye in labɛnbagaw y’a jira ko mɔgɔ 100.000 ɲɔgɔn nana Alimanjamana dugubaw kɔnɔ i n’a fɔ Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg ani Hanover. Mɔgɔw ye ɲɔgɔn sɔsɔ fana Pari, Sofia Bulgari, Vilnius Litwanie, Valetta Malte, Tallinn Estonia, ani Edinburgh ani Glasgow Ekɔsi jamana na. flores_passage: Ni medaliw tan ni segin dɔrɔn de bɛ sɔrɔ tile kɔnɔ, jamana damadɔ ma se ka medaliw kɛ podiyɔmu na. U dɔw ye Ɔsitarali jamana ye, n’o ye Anna Jochemsen ye musow ka jɔyɔrɔ 9nan na Super-G la kunun, ani Finlande ni Katja Saarinen ye jɔyɔrɔ tannan Sɔrɔ o ntolatan kelen in na. Ɔsitarali jamanaden Mitchell Gourley ye jɔyɔrɔ tan ni kelen sɔrɔ cɛw ka Super-G jɔyɔrɔ la. Tcheki jamana ka ɲɔgɔndankɛla Oldrich Jelinek ye jɔyɔrɔ tan ni wɔɔrɔnan Sɔrɔ cɛw ka sigiyɔrɔma Super-G la. Arly Velasquez min bɛ bɔ Mɛkisiki, ale ye jɔyɔrɔ tan ni duurunan sɔrɔ cɛw ka sigiyɔrɔma Super-G la. Nuwɛlika ka Adam Hall ye jɔyɔrɔ 9nan Sɔrɔ cɛw ka Super-G jɔyɔrɔ la. Pologne cɛw ka ɲɛnajɛla ŋana Maciej Krezel ni ɲɛjirabaga Anna Ogarzynska ye jɔyɔrɔ tan ni sabanan Sɔrɔ Super-G la. flores_passage: "Nizeriya y'a jira ka tɛmɛn ko a b'a fɛ ka don AfCFTA la dɔgɔkun min bɛ kɔn lajɛba ɲɛ. AU jago ni izini komisɛri Albert Muchanga y'a jira ko Benin bɛna don a la. Komisɛri ko ""An ma bɛnkan sɔrɔ fɔlɔ bɔyɔrɔ sariyaw ni tarifu kan con[c]essions, nka framework min b'an bolo, o bɛ se ka jago daminɛ zuluyekalo tile fɔlɔ san 2020""."

mc_answer1: Ni Benin tun bɛna fara AfCTA kan
mc_answer2: Jago tun bɛ se ka daminɛ don min na

flores_passage: ye tanuli sɔrɔ kɔrɔfɔlaw fɛ a ka waati la Atlanta ani a lakodɔnnen don dugu kalanko kura la. 2009 sàn a ye jamana ka sàn ɲɛmɔgɔba tɔgɔ Sɔrɔ. O laada in di waati la, Atlanta lakɔlisow tun ye ɲɛtaa caman ye sɛgɛsɛgɛli jatew la. Dɔɔni o kɔfɛ, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution ye kunnafoni dɔ bɔ min b’a jira ko gɛlɛyaw bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli jaabiw la. Raporo in y’a jira ko sɛgɛsɛgɛli jatew cayara teliya la cogo min tɛ se ka da a la, wa a y’a jira ko lakɔliso kɔnɔna ye gɛlɛyaw sɔrɔ nka a ma wale kɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni sɔrɔlenw ye. Dalilu minnu sɔrɔla o kɔfɛ, olu y’a jira ko sɛgɛsɛgɛli sɛbɛnw tiɲɛna Hall la, ka fara kalanko ɲɛmɔgɔ 34 wɛrɛw kan, olu jalakilen don san 2013.

mc_answer2: Ka dɛsɛ ka dugu kalanko kura don
mc_answer3: Ka wale kɛ kɔnɔna gɛlɛyaw kan minnu kɔlɔsira

flores_passage: "Duvall, min furula ni den baliku fila ye, o ma hakilinaba to Miller kan, o maana in tun bɛ tali kɛ min na. Ni a ɲinina a fɛ a ka kuma fɔ, Miller ko, ""Mike bɛ kuma caman fɔ ɲɔgɔnye waati la...Ne tun bɛ ka sɔrɔ labɛnnen don o la ne tun tɛ a ka kuma mɛn tiɲɛ na."""

flores_passage: "Minisiriɲɛmɔgɔ Stephen Harper sɔnna ka gɔfɛrɛnaman ka 'fiɲɛ saniyalen sariya' ci parti bɛɛ ka jɛkulu dɔ ma walasa a ka lajɛ, sanni a ka kalan filanan kɛ, taratadon miniti 25 lajɛ kɔfɛ ni NDP ɲɛmaa Jack Layton ye PMO la. Layton tun ye fɛn caman ɲini ka fɛn caman Changements to conservateurs ka sigida sariyasun in ka lajɛ senfɛ ni PM ye, k'a ɲini ka ""sɛbɛnni kura ni dafalen"" Conservateur parti ka sigida sariyasun kan Kabini Fɛderasiyɔn gɔfɛrɛnaman y'a sen don a la walasa ka Mersey dɔgɔtɔrɔso nafolo ta Devonport, Tasmanie, jamana gɔfɛrɛnaman ni fédéral depite dɔw ye nin wale in kɔrɔfɔ k’a fɔ ko a kɛra fɛn ye min kɛra fédéral kalata daminɛ na min bɛna wele ka se nowanburukalo ma Nka minisiriɲɛmɔgɔ John Howard y’a jira ko nin wale in kɛra dɔrɔn ka dɔgɔtɔrɔso in yɔrɔw lakana walasa u kana jigin Tasmanie gɔfɛrɛnaman, ka AUD$45 miliyɔn wɛrɛ di."
question: Jɔn y’a jira ko sɛgɛsɛgɛliw ka kɛ ‘fiɲɛ saniyalen sariya’ kan?

Tom Duxbury, min ye Stardust ka porozɛ ɲɛmɔgɔ ye, o y’a fɔ ko: “A bɛna taa Kalifɔrni woroduguyanfan tilebin yanfan fɛ, wa a bɛna sankolo yeelen ka bɔ Kalifɔrini ka tɛmɛ Oregon cɛmancɛ fɛ ka tɛmɛ Nevada ni Idaho fɛ ka don Utah kɔnɔ.”

flores_passage: "O kuma minnu fɔra, telewisɔn na, olu kɛra a siɲɛ fɔlɔ ye Iran jamana ɲɛmɔgɔba dɔw ka sɔn a ma ko sankɔrɔta in bɛ nɔ foyi bila 80% a ka jamana kɔkan sɔrɔ la, a ka kalolabɔ laban na, OPEP y’a jira ko petoroli feereli jigira ka se u hakɛ dɔgɔmannin ma san tan fila kɔnɔ, n’o ye barili miliyɔn 2,8 ye tile kɔnɔ iko ""jaan"" min bɛ daminɛ ka kɔn Iran silamɛya wuliliko ɲɛ san 1979 ani jamana ka kan k'a yɛrɛ hɔrɔnya ka bɔ min na."

flores_passage: Faransi, wote kɛra laada la, ko min tɛ kɛ ni fɛɛrɛ kuraw ye : wotekɛlaw b’u yɛrɛ bɔ ɲɔgɔn na bugu dɔ kɔnɔ, ka papiye dɔ bila anwɛlɛki kɔnɔ min b’u ka kandida sugandilen jira, n’o sɛbɛnna ka kɔn o ɲɛ. Faamaw ye wotekɛla tɔgɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛ kɔfɛ, wotekɛla bɛ anwɛlɛki fili wotekɛyɔrɔ la, ka bolonɔ bila wotesɛbɛn na. Faransi kalata sariya bɛ koɲɛw kɛcogo ɲɛfɔ kosɛbɛ. Kabini san 1988, wotekɛyɔrɔw ka kan ka kɛ kɛnɛ kan walasa wotekɛlaw ni kɔlɔsilikɛlaw ka se ka seereya kɛ ko anwɛlɛki si tɛ yen wote daminɛ na, wa ko anwɛlɛki si tɛ fara a kan fo wotekɛlaw minnu jatera ka ɲɛ ani minnu yamaruyara. Kandidati bɛ se ka lasigidenw ci ka taa baara in yɔrɔ bɛɛ seereya. Sufɛ, wotew bɛ jate bolomafaraw fɛ minnu bɛ kɔlɔsiliba kɛ, ka tugu taabolo kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw kɔ.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ Faransi ka wote taabolo dɔ ye?
mc_answer2: Lasigiden minnu cilen don kandidaw fɛ
mc_answer3: Ka bolonɔ bila wotesɛbɛn dɔ la
mc_answer4: Wotew jate bɛ kɛ kandidaw ka lasigidenw fɛ

flores_passage: Tariku dɔnbagaw ye FBI ka politiki tɛmɛnenw kɔrɔfɔ, k’a sababu kɛ u ye nafolo sinsin ko dɔw kan minnu ɲɛnabɔli ka nɔgɔn, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la mobili sonyalenw koɲɛw, n’u laɲini ye ka dɔ fara o baarada ka ɲɛtaa hakɛ kan. flores_passage: San 1960 waatiw bɛɛ la, Brzezinski ye baara kɛ John F. Kennedy fɛ a ka ladilikɛla ye ani o kɔfɛ Lyndon B. Johnson ka fanga. flores_passage: "Hesperonychus elizabethae ye Dromaeosauridae denbaya sugu dɔ ye wa a ye Velociraptor balimakɛ dɔ ye. flores_passage: Mɔgɔ kɛmɛ ni kɔ tun nana o ɲɛnajɛ in na, walasa ka furuɲɔgɔnma dɔ ka san fɔlɔ seli kɛ, furuɲɔgɔnma minnu ka kɔɲɔ kɛra salon. mc_answer4: Marifaci in kɛra Bufalo dugu kɔnɔ

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, fasa caman cili kɛra tuma jumɛn?
mc_answer4: Dɔgɔkun min ka kɔn o ɲɛ

flores_passage: Kalo lamini-minɛn min tɛ mɔgɔ ye, n’o ye Chandrayaan-1 ye, o y’a ka Kalo-yɔrɔ-ko-sɛgɛsɛgɛli (MIP) Bɔ, n’o ye kalo sanfɛla Tɛmɛ ni kilomɛtɛrɛ 1,5 ye segin kɔnɔ, wa a Sera ka Bìn Kalo saheliyanfan kɛrɛfɛ. Ka fara dɔnniya minɛn nafama saba ta kan, kalo sɛgɛsɛgɛlikɛlan in tun bɛ Ɛndu jamana darapo ja fana ta, min jalen don a fan bɛɛ fɛ.
question: Nin kuma minnu fɔra Chandrayaan-1 ka kalo sɛgɛsɛgɛli kan, jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Orbiter min ye sonda in bila, o tun bɛ ni baarakɛlaw ye
mc_answer2: Minɛn nafamaw tun bɛ o sonda kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Nin waati in na, bana in sɔrɔ fɔlɔ kɛra zuluyekalo laban na. Bana in bɛ taa donsokɛw fɛ, o kɔfɛ, u bɛ taa hadamadenw fɛ sosow sababu fɛ. Nin bana in ye Ɛndujamana gɔfɛrɛnaman bila ka fɛɛrɛw tigɛ i n’a fɔ donsokɛ minɛni bilali yɔrɔw la, sosow ka rido ba caman tila-tila ani ka fɛnɲɛnamafagalanw fiyɛ. Gofɛrɛnaman ye layidu ta fana ko kunsɛmɛnasumaya boloci fiyɛli miliyɔn caman, o bɛna dɛmɛ ka kɛnɛyasow labɛn san nata kama. Boloci bolodalenw ka kan ka lase tariku kɔnɔ yɔrɔw la minnu tɔɔrɔla kosɛbɛ ɲinan, olu bilala kɔfɛ ka da nafolo dɛsɛ kan ani fɔlɔfɔlɔko dɔgɔyali fɛ ni i y’a suma ni bana tɔw ye.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, bana in lakanani fɛɛrɛ jumɛn bɛna waleya laban na?

flores_passage: """Panama Papers"" ye parasol daɲɛ ye min bɛ fɔ sɛbɛn miliyɔn tan ɲɔgɔn ma ka bɔ Panama sariyaso Mossack Fonseca fɛ, min bɔra kunnafonidilaw la san 2016 kaban. Sɛbɛnw y'a jira ko banki tan ni naani ye nafolotigiw dɛmɛ ka Ameriki dɔrɔmɛ miliyari caman dogo walasa ka u yɛrɛ tanga impositi ma ani sariya wɛrɛw Angilɛw ka kunnafonisɛbɛn The Guardian y’a jira ko Deutsche Bank tun bɛ marifatigiw ka tɔn 1200 la, minnu tun bɛ kɛ ka o kɛ, olu tilancɛ ɲɔgɔn tun bɛ fanga la, mɔgɔw ye ɲɔgɔn sɔsɔ diɲɛ fan bɛɛ, kojugubakɛlaw jalakilen don kosɛbɛ, ani Islande ni Pakistan gɔfɛrɛnamanw ɲɛmɔgɔw fila bɛɛ y’u ka baara bila.

mc_answer1: Banki suguya caman ka kiliyan ɲumanw

flores_passage: Fiɲɛ kasaara ka ca Iran jamana na, min ka kurunba kɔrɔlen don, min ladonni man ɲi siwili ni sɔrɔdasi baara bɛɛ kama. Duniya jamanaw ka sankɔrɔta kɛra sababu ye ka awiyɔn kuraw san. Dɔgɔkun daminɛ na, polisiw ka ɛlikopɛri binna ka mɔgɔ saba faga, ka saba wɛrɛ jogin. Kalo tɛmɛnen Iran y’a ka fiɲɛ balawu juguba ye san caman kɔnɔ, n’o ye awiyɔn dɔ ye min tun bɛ taa Armeni jamana na, o binna, ka mɔgɔ 168 faga minnu tun bɛ a kɔnɔ. O kalo kelen in na, awiyɔn wɛrɛ ye awiyɔn boliyɔrɔ dɔ minɛ Mashhad, ka kogo dɔ gosi, ka mɔgɔ tan ni wolonwula faga.
question: Nin awiyɔn kasaara ninnu na, jumɛn de ye mɔgɔ caman faga?
mc_answer1: Avion in binna a ka sira kan ka taa Armeni ka bɔ Iran
mc_answer3: Avion in binna a ka sira kan ka taa Iran ka bɔ Armeni
mc_answer4: Avion in binna Mashhad dugu la

mc_answer2: Budjet dɛsɛ min bɛ sira di awiyɔn kura sanni ma
mc_answer3: Sankɔrɔta minnu bɛ awiyɔn kura sanni bali
mc_answer4: Avion kulu min ma ladon koɲuman

flores_passage: Irak kalanjɛkulu y’a ka kunnafoni di bi 12h waati la. A bɛ lasɔmi Mɔgɔ si tɛ se k’a Jira ko wale o kɛcogo bɛ Irak jamana na nin waati in na, o bɛna kɛ sababu ye ka diinɛkuluw ka kɛlɛw, fariyakow minnu bɛ ka bonya, walima ka sɛgɛn ka taa ɲagami na, olu dabila. Raporo in bɛ daminɛ ni delili ye walasa ka sɔsɔli dafalen kɛ ani ka bɛnkan dɔ sigi senkan Ameriki jamana na, politiki min ɲɛsinnen bɛ cɛmancɛ kɔrɔnfɛla ma. Raporo in bɛ kɔrɔfɔba kɛ kosɛbɛ, a bɛ se ka fɔ ko jamanakuntigi ka sisan politiki min bɛ Iraki jamana kan, wa a bɛ ɲini ka sira caman cili teliya. A ka ladilikan 78 la fɔlɔ ye ko diplomasi fɛɛrɛ kura ka kan ka ta ka kɔn ɲinan san laban ɲɛ walasa ka Irak dancɛw lakana ka bɔ juguya walew la ani ka diplomasi jɛɲɔgɔnyaw sigi senkan kokura n’a sigiɲɔgɔnw ye.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ma don Iraki kalanjɛkulu ka kunnafoni kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Kɔrɔfɔli min bɛ kɛ sisan politiki kan
mc_answer2: Jateminɛ min b’a jira ko ni fɛn dɔw Changé, fariyako min bɛ ka bonya Irak jamana na, o bɛ se ka bali
mc_answer3: Ladilikanw di walasa ka Irak jamana dancɛw lakana
mc_answer4: Delili dɔ min kɛra walasa Ameriki ka bɛnkan sɔrɔ

mc_answer2: Yɛlɛma donna yɔrɔ min na o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ
mc_answer3: Baara kɛli ni sɔsɔli dafalen ye

flores_passage: Japon judoka Hitoshi Saito, n’o ye Olɛnpi sanu-medali fila sɔrɔ, o sara a si bɛ san 54. A ka saya sababu fɔra ko a ye kansɛri ye sugunɛbilenni na. A sara Osaka dugu la taratadon. Ka fara Olɛnpi ni diɲɛ ntolatantɔn ŋana kɔrɔ kan, Saito tun ye Japon bɛɛ ka Judo tɔnba ka degeliw jɛkulu ɲɛmɔgɔ ye a ka saya waati.

mc_answer2: cJapon bɛɛ ka Judo tɔnba ka jɛkulu ɲɛmɔgɔ

flores_passage: Kalo 3 tɛmɛnenw na, mɔgɔ minɛlen 80 ni kɔ bilala ka bɔ Central Booking yɔrɔ la, k’a sɔrɔ u ma jalaki fɔlɔ. Ɲinan awirilikalo la, kiritigɛla Glynn ye yamaruya di waati dɔɔnin kɔnɔ, ka ɲɛsin o yɔrɔ ma, walasa ka wajibiya ka mɔgɔ minnu bila ka tɛmɛ sanga 24 kan u donna kɔfɛ, n’olu ma kiritigɛso komisɛri dɔ ka ɲɔgɔnye sɔrɔ. Komisɛri bɛ kason sigi, ni a dira a ma, ka jalaki minnu binna mɔgɔ minɛbaga fɛ, a bɛ olu kɛ cogo la min bɛ kɛ cogo la. O kɔfɛ, jalakiw bɛ don jamana ka ɔridinatɛri kɔnɔ, ko in bɛ tugu yɔrɔ min na. O ɲɔgɔnye in fana bɛ don min jira, o min bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka mɔgɔ siguilen in ka kiritigɛ teliya la.

flores_passage: "Jamanakuntigi kɔrɔ Newt Gingrich, Texas jamanakuntigi Rick Perry, ani Kongresi muso Michele Bachmann ye jɔyɔrɔ naaninan, duurunan ani wɔɔrɔnan sɔrɔ. flores_passage: Northern Rock banki tun ye jamana ta san 2008, a jirali kɔfɛ ko a ka baarakɛda ye dɛmɛ kɔrɔtɔlen sɔrɔ Angletɛri gɔfɛrɛnaman fɛ. Northern Rock tun ye dɛmɛ ɲini k’a sababu kɛ a jirali ye subprime mortgage gɛlɛya waati la san 2007. Sir Richard Branson ka Virgin Group tun ye banki ɲinini dɔ kɛ min banna sani banki ka kɛ jamana kɔnɔ. San 2010, k’a sɔrɔ a kɛra jamana ye, sisan nbɛdaba banki min bɛ wele ko Northern Rock plc, o tilalen don ka bɔ ‘banki jugu’ la, n’o ye Northern Rock (Asset Management) ye. Virgin ye Northern Rock ka ‘banki ɲuman’ dɔrɔn de san, a ma kɛ nafolo mara sosiyete ye.

mc_answer1: Banki in kɛra jamana ta kɔfɛ
mc_answer2: Tuma min na banki farala ka bɔ nafolo mara sosiyete la
mc_answer3: Virgin kulu ye banki san kɔfɛ

flores_passage: """Ka da nin fɛnɲɛnɛma in kan, o kɔrɔ ye ko farali ka kɔn kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛn a tun bɛ miiri min na molekiyɔmu daliluw fɛ. O kɔrɔ ye ko fɛn bɛɛ ka kan ka bila kɔfɛ,"" ɲininikɛla min bɛ Rift Valley ɲinini baarada la Etiyopi ani a ni sɛbɛnnikɛla dɔ, o y'a fɔ ka kalan in kɛ, Berhane Asfaw."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun kɛra joona ka tɛmɛ u tun bɛ miiri min na?
mc_answer3: Dalilu minnu bɛ sɔrɔ molekiyɔmuw fɛ, olu sɛgɛsɛgɛli

flores_passage: Lafiɲɛbɔdon Tokyo tulonkɛ jiraliba la, Nintendo ɲɛmɔgɔba Satoru Iwata ye a ka baarakɛda ka Nintendo Revolution konsolɛ kura ka kunnafonisɛbɛn dilancogo jira. A bɛ i n’a fɔ telewisɔn yɔrɔjan, o kunnafonisɛbɛn bɛ baara kɛ ni sensɛri fila ye minnu bilalen bɛ baarakɛla ka telewisɔn kɛrɛfɛ walasa k’a jɔyɔrɔ kɛ kɛrɛ saba ye yɔrɔ saba la. O bɛna kɛ sababu ye tulonkɛlaw ka se ka walew ni lamaga-lamagaliw kɔlɔsi videyo tulonw na, u kɛtɔ ka minɛn in lamaga fiɲɛ fɛ.
question: Tulonkɛla bɛna mun kɛ walasa ka se ka lamaga-lamagaliw sɛgɛsɛgɛ videyo tulon kɛtuma na?
mc_answer1: Aw ye aw jija ka a lajɛ ni kunnafonisɛbɛnw (contrôleur) ka sensɛriw bilalen bɛ konsolɛ kɛrɛfɛ
mc_answer2: U jɔyɔrɔ kɛ kɛrɛ saba ye
mc_answer3: Aw bɛ sensɛriw bila u ka telewisɔn kɛrɛfɛ
mc_answer4: Aw bɛ kunnafonisɛbɛn lamaga fiɲɛ fɛ

question: Mun dabɔra walisa a ka kɛ i n’a fɔ telewisɔn ka yɔrɔjan?

flores_passage: Ka kɔn o ɲɛ, Sinuwa jamana kunnafonidi-tɔn Xinhua y’a Jira ko awiyɔn dɔ bɛna Minɛ. O kɔfɛ, kunnafoniw y’a Jira ko awiyɔn in ye bombe (bɔnba) bagabagali Sɔrɔ, wa a y’a Lasegin Afganistan, ka Jigin Kandahar. Laseli fɔlɔw y’a jira ko awiyɔn in bilala sira wɛrɛ kan ka segin Afganistan, a ma sɔn ka jigin kɔrɔtɔlen na Ürümqi.
question: Mun ma fɔ kunnafoni laban na min bɔra Xinhua kunnafonidiso la?
mc_answer1: Avion in ye bombe bagabagali sɔrɔ
mc_answer3: Avion in jiginna ka taa Afganistan

question: Mun ma fɔ Xinhua baarakɛda kura ka kunnafoni fɔlɔ kɔnɔ?
mc_answer2: U ma sɔn ka awiyɔn in jigin kɔrɔtɔko la
mc_answer3: Avion in jiginna ka segin Afganistan
mc_answer4: Avion in ye bombe bagabagali sɔrɔ

flores_passage: "Lumandi don, Sara Danius, n'o ye Nobɛl jɛkulu ka sɛbɛnnikɛla banbali ye Suwɛdi Akademi la, o y'a jira foroba la arajo porogaramu dɔ senfɛ Sveriges arajo la Suwɛdi jamana na, jɛkulu in, n'a ma se ka se Bob Dylan ma k'a ɲɛsin san 2016 Nobɛl ka laadalata sɔrɔli ma sɛbɛnniko la, o y'a jira."(Alimankan na) a y'a ka cɛsiriw dabila walasa ka se a ma Danius ko ""Sisan an tɛ foyi kɛ ne ye wele kɛ ka bataki ci a jɛɲɔgɔn gɛrɛgɛrɛ ma ani ka jaabiw sɔrɔ teriya siratigɛ la kosɛbɛ.
question: Sara Danius ye mun fɔ arajo porogaramu senfɛ?
mc_answer1: Nobɛl ka laadalata sɔrɔbaa min ye sɛbɛnniko la
mc_answer2: Komite ma jaabi foyi sɔrɔ jɛɲɔgɔnw fɛ
mc_answer3: 2016 sàn mɔgɔ minnu ye Nobɛl ka laadalata Sɔrɔ sɛbɛnniko la
mc_answer4: Komite bɛna cɛsiriw dabila walasa ka jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ ni Bob Dylan ye

flores_passage: "Lumandi don, Sara Danius, n'o ye Nobɛl jɛkulu ka sɛbɛnnikɛla banbali ye Suwɛdi Akademi la, o y'a jira foroba la arajo porogaramu dɔ senfɛ Sveriges arajo la Suwɛdi jamana na, jɛkulu in, n'a ma se ka se Bob Dylan ma k'a ɲɛsin san 2016 Nobɛl ka laadalata sɔrɔli ma sɛbɛnniko la, o y'a jira."(Alimankan na) a y'a ka cɛsiriw dabila walasa ka se a ma Danius ko ""Sisan an tɛ foyi kɛ ne ye wele kɛ ka bataki ci a jɛɲɔgɔn gɛrɛgɛrɛ ma ani ka jaabiw sɔrɔ teriya siratigɛ la kosɛbɛ.
question: Jɔn ma se ka sɔrɔ?

flores_passage: "Amerika jamanakuntigi George W. Bush ye o laseli in bisimila. Bush ka kumalasela Gordon Johndroe ye Kore Worodugu ka layidu wele ko ""senba ye ka ɲɛsin laɲini ma, n'o ye ka Kore jamana ka nukliyɛri bɔli ye min bɛ se ka sɛgɛsɛgɛ."
question: Jɔn y’a fɔ ko layidu in ye “senba ye”?
mc_answer2: George W. Bush ye o baara kɛ

flores_passage: "San 1956, Słania taara Suwɛdi, san saba o kɔfɛ, a ye baara daminɛ Suwɛdi Laseso la, ka kɛ u ka jagokɛla kuntigiba ye. A ye timbre 1000 ni kɔ dilan Suwɛdi ani jamana 28 wɛrɛw ye. A ka baara ye jogo ni fɛn fitinin dɔnnen ye fo a bɛ ten."(Alimankan na) ""du tɔgɔ"" damadɔw dɔ la kelen ye filɛlikɛlaw cɛma.Dɔw kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen don a ka baara dɔrɔn dalajɛli la A ka timbre 1000nan tun ye ""Swedi masakɛw ka walebaw"" kabakoma ye David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl fɛ san 2000, min tɔgɔ sɛbɛnnen bɛ Guinness Book of World Records A tun bɛ warijɛ sɛbɛnni fana na jamana caman ye, a ka baara misali kɔsa in na i n’a fɔ Minisiriɲɛmɔgɔ ka ja minnu bɛ Kanada dɔrɔmɛ 5 ni dɔrɔmɛ 100 warijɛ kura ɲɛfɛ.
question: Słanie ye timbre joli dilan jamana suguya caman ye?
mc_answer3: A bɛ se ka kɛ mɔgɔ 2 000 ye

flores_passage: Trans-Alaska Pipeline System kilomɛtɛrɛ 800 datugulen don, petoroli barili ba caman bɔli kɔfɛ Fairbanks saheliyanfan fɛ, Alaska. Kuran tiɲɛni min kɛra tasuma-cikan-sitɛmu sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛcogo kɔrɔlen kɔfɛ, o kɛra sababu ye ka dɛmɛn-minɛnw da wuli ani tulu sɛnɛbaliw falenna Fort Greely pɔnpe jɔyɔrɔ kɛrɛfɛ 9. Kuran dabɔli ye sira di degun bɔli ma sistɛmu kɔnɔ ani tulu tun bɛ woyo pad dɔ kan ka taa jidagayɔrɔ dɔ la min bɛ se ka minɛ barili 55.000 (galon miliyɔn 2,3). Kabini karidon wulada fɛ, jidagayɔrɔ fiɲɛbɔyɔrɔw tun bɛ ka bɔn hali bi n’a sɔrɔla ka bɔ funteni bonya la jidagayɔrɔ kɔnɔ. Yɔrɔ filanan wɛrɛ min bɛ jidagayɔrɔw jukɔrɔ, n’o bɛ se ka barili 104 500 ta, o ma fa fɔlɔ fo ka se a seko ma.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, a bɛ se ka kɛ ko mun de bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka ji bɔ ka taa a fɛ ka bɔ tanki fiɲɛbɔyɔrɔw la?
mc_answer1: Kɔnɔnafiliyɔrɔ filanan bɛ ka fa fo ka se a seko ma
mc_answer4: Tasuma ye Fort Greely ka pɔnpe jɔyɔrɔ dɔ la

question: Mun na dɛmɛnanw dabɔra?
mc_answer1: Sumaya-yɔrɔ-ko tùn bɛ Kɛ jidagayɔrɔw kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Kuran tiɲɛni kɛra sistɛmu sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɔfɛ
mc_answer3: Tankiw tun bɛ u seko bɛɛ la
mc_answer4: Kɔnɔnafiliyɔrɔ filanan tun tɛ se ka barili caman minɛ

flores_passage: Ameriki ka Ɛntɛrinɛti ɲɛmɔgɔso y’a jateminɛ ko sanji min bɛ na ni santimɛtɛrɛ 6 ye, o bɛ se ka bajiw tiɲɛ minnu tun tiɲɛna fɔlɔ. Wari kɔnɔntɔnnan min ye sanjiba ye fo ka se mɛtɛrɛ 20 ma sanfiɲɛba Katrina waati la, o bɛ ji la sisan min janya bɛ se cɛmancɛ ma, bawo bajida min bɛ kɛrɛfɛ, o tɛmɛna. Ji bɛ ka woyo bajida la yɔrɔ dɔ la min bonya ye mɛtɛrɛ 100 ye.
question: Sisan, ji min bɛ The Ninth Ward kɔnɔ, o ka bon cogo di?

question: Sanfiɲɛba Katrina waati la, mun kɛra The Ninth Ward kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Sanjiba ji bonya tun ye mɛtɛrɛ 100 ye
mc_answer2: Ji min tun bɛ se cɛsirilan ma, o tun bɛ bajida sanfɛ
mc_answer3: Sanjiba ji janya tun ye mɛtɛrɛ 20 ye
mc_answer4: Sanji insi 6 ye levee tiɲɛnen tiɲɛ

flores_passage: Hamilton y’a jira ko Howard Iniwɛrisite dɔgɔtɔrɔso ye banabagatɔ in don a ka kɛnɛya sabatili la. Banabagatɔ in tun taara Nizeriya, Ebola banakisɛ dɔw sɔrɔla yen. Dɔgɔtɔrɔso ye sariyaw labato banakisɛw kɛlɛli la, o la, ka banabagatɔ faranfasi ka bɔ mɔgɔ wɛrɛw la walasa ka banakisɛw bali minnu bɛ se ka sɔrɔ mɔgɔ wɛrɛw la.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ma Sɛmɛntiya Hamilton fɛ?
mc_answer1: Banabagatɔ tun taara yɔrɔ min na
mc_answer2: Banabagatɔ wɛrɛw ka se ka banakisɛ in sɔrɔ
mc_answer4: Banabagatɔ ka cogoya min bɛ a la sisan

flores_passage: N’a sɔrɔ komɛtiw tun ye ji lase dugukolo ma ka fara fɛnɲɛnamaw kan minnu bɛ se ka farikolojɔlifɛnw dilan ani ka ɲɛnamaya dɛmɛ. Dɔnniyakɛlaw jigi b’a kan k’a Faamu dugukolo-yɔrɔw bɛ Sɔrɔ cogo min na, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la Dugukolo dabɔcogo, k’a masɔrɔ komɛtiw ni Dugukolo Blà ɲɔgɔn na kabini tuma jan.
question: Dɔnniyakɛlaw b’a fɛ ka fɛn jumɛn dɔn?
mc_answer1: Tuma min na jirisunw ye ɲɔgɔn Dòn ni Dugukolo ye
mc_answer2: Protéines bɛ dilan cogo min na

flores_passage: Hali ni faamaw dalen t’a la ko o bagabagali in bɛ se ka da a la, Maryland Transportaion Authority ye o dadon in kɛ ni FBI ka delili ye. Dump trucks kɛra ka tubabukan dondaw datugu ani polisi 80 ka dɛmɛ tun bɛ yen walasa ka mobilibolila bila sira kan ka taa siraw fɛ. Jagokɛlaw ka kɔtigɛba si ma fɔ cɛsirilan kan, n’o ye dugu sira wɛrɛ ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, sigida polisiw jɔyɔrɔ ye mun kɛ o dadon in na?
mc_answer1: U ye FBI deli u ka dadon in kɛ
mc_answer2: U y’a latigɛ ka dadon in kɛ
mc_answer3: U ye mobilibolila bila sira wɛrɛw kan
mc_answer4: U y’a jira ko sirako bɛ mɛn sira wɛrɛ kan

flores_passage: Hali ni faamaw dalen t’a la ko o bagabagali in bɛ se ka da a la, Maryland Transportaion Authority ye o dadon in kɛ ni FBI ka delili ye. Jagokɛlaw ka kɔtigɛba si ma fɔ cɛsirilan kan, n’o ye dugu sira wɛrɛ ye.
question: Mun kɛra tubabukan dondaw la dadon waati la?
mc_answer2: U tun bɛ baara kɛ n’u ye i n’a fɔ sira min bɛ taa sira wɛrɛ fɛ
mc_answer4: Siraba tun bɛ yen min tun bɛ taa ɲɛfɛ

flores_passage: "Jalatigi in taara ni a ye Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center la, o kɔfɛ a sara yen. A fɔra ko a si tun bɛ san 20 la. A ka kunnafoni dɔ kɔnɔ, Bieber y'a fɔ ko ""[w]hile I was not present or directly involved with this tragic accident, my miirili ni delili bɛ jatigɛwalekɛla ka denbaya fɛ."" Ɲɛnajɛ kibaruyaw siti TMZ y'a faamu ko fototalan y'a ka mobili jɔ Sepulveda Boulevard fan dɔ fɛ, k'a ɲini ka polisiw jɔyɔrɔ ja ta ka sɔrɔ ka sira tigɛ ka taa ɲɛ, o kɛra sababu ye ka Kalifɔrini siraba ta Kɔlɔsili polisikɛla min bɛ siraba jɔli kɛ walasa k'a yamaruya a ka segin ka tɛmɛn, siɲɛ fila Polisiw ka fɔ la, mobili min ye fototalan gosi, a ka c'a la, a tɛna jalaki.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun ma kɛ sanni fototalan ka gosi mobili fɛ?
mc_answer1: Jalatigi in yamaruyara Highway Patrol fɛ ko a ka segin sira fan dɔ fɛ
mc_answer2: Fototalan y’a ka mobili jɔ Sepulveda Boulevard sira kan
mc_answer3: Jalatigi ye ja ta polisiw ka jɔyɔrɔ dɔ la
mc_answer4: Jalatigi sera ka Bieber ja sɔrɔ

question: Fototalan tun b’a ɲini ka mun kɛ sanni mobili ka a gosi?
mc_answer1: Park min bɛ Sepulveda Boulevard sira kan

mc_answer3: Aw ye siraba dɔ tigɛ min falen bɛ mɔgɔw la
mc_answer4: Aw ye polisikɛla dɔ lasun a k’a to a ka taa a fɛ ka marifa ci

flores_passage: "Arias ka sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛra ko banakisɛ in ka dɔgɔn, jamanakuntigi ka minisiri Rodrigo Arias y'o fɔ. Jamanakuntigi ka bana bɛ sabati, hali n'a bɛna a yɛrɛ mabɔ so kɔnɔ tile damadɔ kɔnɔ. ""Ni sumaya ni galaka dimi kɔfɛ, n fari bɛ kɛnɛya ani cogo ɲuman na walasa ka n ka baara kɛ telefɔni baara fɛ n b'a jira ko n bɛ segin n ka baara bɛɛ la jumadon,"" Arias y'o fɔ a ka kunnafonidisɛbɛn kɔnɔ."
question: Kuma jumɛn tɛ jamanakuntigi ka cogoya ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ, a kɛlen kɔ ka banakisɛ in sɔrɔ?

flores_passage: "Arias ka sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛra ko banakisɛ in ka dɔgɔn, jamanakuntigi ka minisiri Rodrigo Arias y'o fɔ. Jamanakuntigi ka bana bɛ sabati, hali n'a bɛna a yɛrɛ mabɔ so kɔnɔ tile damadɔ kɔnɔ. ""Ni sumaya ni galaka dimi kɔfɛ, n fari bɛ kɛnɛya ani cogo ɲuman na walasa ka n ka baara kɛ telefɔni baara fɛ n b'a jira ko n bɛ segin n ka baara bɛɛ la jumadon,"" Arias y'o fɔ a ka kunnafonidisɛbɛn kɔnɔ."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nin kuma minnu fɔra jamanakuntigi ko la, jumɛn ye tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer2: A bɛna to so kɔnɔ dɔgɔkun damadɔ kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: A ka kɛnɛ fo a bɛ se ka telefɔni baara kɛ
mc_answer4: Banakisɛ in bana jugumanba dɔ b’a la

flores_passage: A kuncɛtuma na, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, n’o tɔgɔ dara jirisun bulu foroko dɔ la Mali kan, o sera fiɲɛ sabatilen ma min bɛ se kilomɛtɛrɛ 240 ma lɛrɛ kɔnɔ (149 miles lɛrɛ kɔnɔ) Bi daminɛ na, fiɲɛ tun bɛ kilomɛtɛrɛ 83 ɲɔgɔn bɔ, wa a tun bɛ fɔ ko a bɛna to ka fanga dɔgɔya.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, waati jumɛn tun bɛ fɔ ko sanfiɲɛba min bɛ wele ko Tropical Cyclone Gonu, o bɛna taa a fɛ ka fanga dɔgɔya?
mc_answer1: Sani a ka se Mali la
mc_answer2: Tuma min na fiɲɛw Dɔgɔyara ka Se kilomɛtɛrɛ 83 ɲɔgɔn ma lɛrɛ kelen kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Sani a ka Se a dan na
mc_answer4: Sani a ka Se fiɲɛw ma minnu bɛ Taa kilomɛtɛrɛ 149 na lɛrɛ kelen kɔnɔ

question: Fɔɲɔw tun teliyalen don cogo di waati min na, o min tun bɛ wele ko Tropical Cyclone Gonu?

flores_passage: Ji bilenman bɛ sɔrɔ Karenia brevis hakɛ caya fɛ ka tɛmɛ a cogo kɔrɔ kan, o ye kɔgɔji kɔnɔ fɛnɲɛnama kelen ye min bɛ sɔrɔ a yɛrɛ la. Sigida fɛnw bɛ se ka ɲɔgɔn cɛ walasa ka cogoya ɲumanw dilan, o b’a to nin jɛgɛ ninnu ka caya kosɛbɛ. O jɛgɛw bɛ neurotoxin (banakisɛfagalan) dɔ Bɔ min bɛ Se ka hadamadenw ni jɛgɛw bɛɛ ka nɛrɛw Lajɔ. Jɛgɛw ka teli ka sa k’a sababu kɛ baga hakɛ caya ye ji la. Hadamadenw bɛ se ka tɔɔrɔ ni u fiyɛli ye ji min tɔɔrɔlen don, fiɲɛ ni jikuruw bɛ min ta fiɲɛ na.

mc_answer2: A bɛ se ka hadamadenw ka nɛrɛmuguma bali

flores_passage: Sani The Simpsons ka Kɛ Simon tùn ye baara Kɛ yiracogo caman na jɔyɔrɔ caman na. San 1980 waatiw la a ye baara kɛ ɲɛjiraliw la i n’a fɔ Taxi, Cheers, ani The Tracy Ullman Show. San 1989 a ye dɛmɛ don ka The Simpsons dabɔ ni Brooks ni Groening ye, wa a tun bɛ o jirali in sɛbɛnnikɛlaw ka kulu fɔlɔ ta baara la. Hali n’a bɔra o jirali la san 1993 a ye ɲɛmɔgɔba tɔgɔ to a la, wa a tora ka dɔrɔmɛ miliyɔn tan sɔrɔ waati o waati ka kɛ royalties ye.

flores_passage: t’a Jira dɔrɔn ko a dɔgɔyalenba la, dinɔsɔsi dɔw tun bɛ ni wuluw ye, o ye hakilina ye min jɛnsɛnnen dòn kaban, nka a bɛ kunnafoni dɔw Di minnu bɛ Se ka Kɛ fɛnɲɛnɛmaw ye caman na, i n’a fɔ u kulɛri ani u labɛncogo yɔrɔ saba. . Dɔnniyakɛlaw ko nin bagan in ɲɛw tun ye bulama ye i n’a fɔ shɔni a sanfɛ ni a jukɔrɔla ɲɛ ye bulama ye walima karotɛnɔyidi. O sɔrɔ in fana bɛ hakilina Di kɔnɔw ka wuluwuluw jiginni kan. Ikomi dinɔsɔsiw ka wuluw tɛ ni jiribolo ye min yiriwara kosɛbɛ, n’o bɛ wele ko rachis, nka u bɛ ni wuluw cogoya wɛrɛw ye — barbs ani barbules — ɲininikɛlaw y’a Jira ko a ka c’a la ko rachisw ye kɔfɛ-yɔrɔko ye ka Tɛmɛ o fɛn tɔw kan. O wuluw jɔcogo b’a Jira ko u tùn tɛ Kɛ ni u ye wulu la nka u tùn bɛ Kɛ funteni hakɛ labɛnni walima u jirali kama. Ɲininikalaw y’a Jira ko hali n’a y’a Sɔrɔ nin ye dinɔsɔsi denmisɛnnin dɔ kùnkolo ye, o misali in bɛ baliku ɲɛw Jira, a tɛ denmisɛnnin dɔ ka duguma-daminɛ Jira. Ɲininikalaw y’a Jira ko hali n’a y’a Sɔrɔ nin ye dinɔsɔsi denmisɛnnin dɔ kùnkolo ye, o misali in bɛ baliku ɲɛw Jira, a tɛ denmisɛnnin dɔ ka duguma-daminɛ Jira.

flores_passage: Hali n’a bɛ iko boloci kelen min kɛra k’a lajɛ, o bɛ se ka dɔ bɔ Ebola ka saya la, fo ka na se bi ma, fura si ma jira ka jɛya ko a bɛnnen don banakisɛ minnu bɛ yen, olu furakɛ. Banakisɛfagalanw ka cocktail kelen, n’o ye ZMapp ye, o ye layidu jira a daminɛ na foro la, nka sɛgɛsɛgɛli fɔlɔw y’a jira ko nafa ka dɔgɔ a la ka tɛmɛ a ɲininen kan saya balili la. PALM ka sɛgɛsɛgɛli la, ZMapp kɛra kɔrɔsilikɛlan ye, o kɔrɔ ye ko dɔnnikɛlaw y’a kɛ basigi ye, ka furakɛli saba tɔw suma n’a ye.
question: Nin kumasen ninnu na ZMapp ko la, jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: A dilannen don ni farikolo tangalanw ye
mc_answer2: A bɛ se ka banakisɛw furakɛ minnu bɛ yen nka a tɛ saya bali
mc_answer3: kɛra kɔrɔsili ye PALM ka kɔrɔbɔli la
mc_answer4: Sɛgɛsɛgɛliw y’a jira k’a nafaw ka dɔgɔ ni u tun bɛ miiri min na fɔlɔ

flores_passage: Hali n’a bɛ iko boloci kelen min kɛra k’a lajɛ, o bɛ se ka dɔ bɔ Ebola ka saya la, fo ka na se bi ma, fura si ma jira ka jɛya ko a bɛnnen don banakisɛ minnu bɛ yen, olu furakɛ. question: Nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn bɛ PALM ka kɔrɔbɔli ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: Kalanw y’a jira ko nafa caman bɛ se ka sɔrɔ a la ka tɛmɛ u tun bɛ miiri min na fɔlɔ
mc_answer2: Kɔlɔsili fura dɔ sumalen don ni furakɛli saba wɛrɛw ye, minnu dɔ ye ZMapp ye
mc_answer3: ZMapp kɛra kɔrɔbɔli in daminɛ ye

Ladonbaga minisiriɲɛmɔgɔ Julia Gillard y’a jira san 2010 fédéral kalata kanpaɲi senfɛ ko ale dalen b’a la ko Ɔsitarali ka kan ka kɛ jamana ye masakɛmuso Elizabɛti filanan ka masaya laban. flores_passage: Waati jan sani The Daily Show ni The Colbert Report ka se, Heck ni Johnson ye gafe dɔ miiri min bɛna kibaruyaw lafili — ani kibaruyaw lakali — k’a sɔrɔ u tun ye kalandenw ye UW la san 1988. Kabini a daminɛ na, The Onion kɛra kibaruya lafilili mansamara lakika ye, ni sɛbɛn bɔko dɔ, ɛntɛrinɛti yɔrɔ min ye mɔgɔ 5.000.000 sama ka na, mɔgɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw na Ɔkutɔburukalo la, mɔgɔ yɛrɛ ka piblisitew, kunnafonidisɛbɛn min bɛ sanga 24 kɔnɔ, podɔkasiw, ani diɲɛ atlas min daminɛna kɔsa in na, n’o tɔgɔ ye ko An ka diɲɛ bobow. Al Gore ni jenerali Tommy Franks bɛ u ka kunnafonidikunw fɔ minnu ka di u ye kosɛbɛ (Gore ta kɛra waati min na The Onion y’a jira ko ale ni Tipper tun bɛ cɛnimusoya kɛcogo ɲuman na u ka ɲɛnamaya kɔnɔ a ka san 2000 kalata kalanso dɛsɛlen kɔfɛ). U ka sɛbɛnnikɛla caman taara ɲɛ ka nɔba bila Jon Stewart ni Stephen Colbert ka kibaruyaw lafilili jirali la.

flores_passage: """An ye sosow sɔrɔ sisan minnu si bɛ kalo 4 la minnu tɛ sukarodunbana ye minnu tun ye sukarodunbanabagatɔ ye fɔlɔ,"" a y'a fara a kan. Dɔgɔtɔrɔ Ehud Ur, min ye furakɛli karamɔgɔ ye Dalhousie Iniwɛrisite la Halifax, Nouvelle-Écosse ani dɔgɔtɔrɔso ɲɛmɔgɔba ani... Kanada sukarodunbana tɔnba ka dɔnniya bolofara ye lasɔmini kɛ ko ɲinini in bɛ a daminɛ donw na hali bi i n’a fɔ dɔnnikɛla dɔw, a bɛ sigasiga ni sukarodunbana bɛ se ka furakɛ, k’a kɔlɔsi ko nin sɔrɔlen ninnu tɛ tali kɛ mɔgɔw la minnu ka sukarodunbana suguya fɔlɔ bɛ u la kaban.

mc_answer1: O nɔ bɛ se ka kɛ nafa ye banabagatɔw ma minnu ka sukarodunbana suguya fɔlɔ tun bɛ u la ka kɔrɔ
mc_answer2: Sogo minnu tun bɛ sukarodunbana na fɔlɔ, olu dɔw tɛ sukarodunbana sɔrɔ tuguni
mc_answer3: A jigi dalen b’a kan ko o sɔrɔlenw bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka fura sɔrɔ
mc_answer4: Sogo minnu tɛ sukarodunbana sɔrɔ, olu dɔw ye sukarodunbana ye sisan

flores_passage: """Hɛrɛ la foyi ma kɛ ne la, nka n ye ɲɛnajɛ kabakoma dɔ ye, k'a sɔrɔ mɔgɔw tun b'a ɲini ka finɛtiriw kari walasa ka bɔ. Mɔgɔw tun bɛ ka pankurunw gosi ni sigilanw ye, nka finɛtiriw tun tɛ se ka kari. Finɛtiri kelen labanna ka kari, ani u y'a daminɛ ka bɔ finɛtiri fɛ,"" Franciszek Kowal min ye ɲɛnamaya sɔrɔ, o y'o fɔ."
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, nin kuma minnu fɔra Franciszek Kowal ka ko kɛlen kan, jumɛn ye tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: A sera ka finɛtiri dɔ kari
mc_answer2: A laban na, foyi ma kɛ a la
mc_answer3: A ye sigilan dɔ kari k’a to a b’a fɛ ka bɔ
mc_answer4: A jogin na tuma min na a tun b’a fɛ ka finɛtiri dɔ kari

flores_passage: Sanfiɲɛba Danielle, min tɔgɔ dara naaninan na san 2010 Atlantiki sanfiɲɛba waati la, o dabɔra Atlantiki kɔgɔji kɔrɔnyanfan fɛ. O fɔɲɔba in, n’a ni Miami, Floride jamana cɛ ye kilomɛtɛrɛ 3000 ɲɔgɔn ye, fiɲɛ min bɛ to sen na, o hakɛ bɛ se kilomɛtɛrɛ 64 ma sanga kelen kɔnɔ. Dɔnniyakɛlaw minnu bɛ National Hurricane Center la, olu y’a jira ko Danielle bɛna fanga sɔrɔ ka kɛ sanfiɲɛba ye karidon na. Ikomi fɔɲɔba in yɔrɔ ka jan dugukolo kan, a ka gɛlɛn hali bi ka jateminɛ kɛ a bɛ se ka nɔ min bila Ameriki walima Karayibu jamanaw na.
question: Mun na a ka gɛlɛn ka a jateminɛ ko sanfiɲɛba Danielle bɛ se ka nɔ min bila mɔgɔw la?
mc_answer1: A fɔra ko fɔɲɔba in bɛna barika bonya fo ka se sanfiɲɛba ma
mc_answer2: Dɔnniyakɛlaw dalen tɛ o fɔɲɔba in ka fiɲɛ banbaliw la
mc_answer3: Fɔɲɔba in yɔrɔ ka jan dugukolo kan
mc_answer4: O fɔɲɔba in ni Miami cɛ ka jan kojugu

flores_passage: Sanfiɲɛba Danielle, min tɔgɔ dara naaninan na san 2010 Atlantiki sanfiɲɛba waati la, o dabɔra Atlantiki kɔgɔji kɔrɔnyanfan fɛ. O fɔɲɔba in, n’a ni Miami, Floride jamana cɛ ye kilomɛtɛrɛ 3000 ɲɔgɔn ye, fiɲɛ min bɛ to sen na, o hakɛ bɛ se kilomɛtɛrɛ 64 ma sanga kelen kɔnɔ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nin kuma minnu fɔra Tropical Storm Danielle ko la, jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: A nɔ min bɛ Karayibu jamanaw na, o ma Dɔn
mc_answer3: A bɛ se ka wuli ka kɛ sanfiɲɛba ye

flores_passage: Dɔgɔtɔrɔ Lee fana y’a hami jira kunnafoniw na minnu b’a jira ko denmisɛnw ye kɔnɔw ka mura banakisɛ A(H5N1) sɔrɔ sisan, k’a sɔrɔ u ma bana. A y’a jira ko sɛgɛsɛgɛli dɔw b’a jira ko bana in ka kan ka kɛ mɔgɔfagala ye dɔɔni sani a ka se ka bana juguba lase diɲɛ kɔnɔ. Jɔrɔ bɛ a la ko banabagatɔw bɛ se ka to ka bana caman minɛ ni u tɛmɛna u ka don o don kow fɛ ni mura taamasiɲɛw tora ka nɔgɔya.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, a fɔra ko mun ka kan ka kɛ ni bana in ye sani a ka kɛ sababu ye ka bana juguba dɔ lase diɲɛ kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: A ka kan ka kɛ fɛn ye min tɛ mɔgɔ faga kosɛbɛ
mc_answer2: A taamasiɲɛw ka kan ka to a cogo la
mc_answer3: Mɔgɔ caman ka kan ka bana in sɔrɔ
mc_answer4: Denmisɛnw ka kan ka bana taamasiɲɛw ye

flores_passage: Awirilikalo tile 9 su fɛ, Morakot ɲɛ tun bɛ kilomɛtɛrɛ biwolonwula ɲɔgɔn bɔ Sinuwa jamana Fujian mara la. A jate la, fɔɲɔba in bɛ ka taa Sinuwa fan fɛ ni kilomɛtɛrɛ tan ni kelen ye sanga kelen kɔnɔ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, fɔɲɔba in ni Fujian cɛ tun ka jan cogo di?

flores_passage: Ameriki jamanatigi George W. Bush sera Singapur Nowanburukalo tile 16 sɔgɔma, a ye dɔgɔkun kelen taama daminɛ Azi jamanaw na. A foli kɛra Singapur minisiriɲɛmɔgɔ kɔrɔ Wong Kan Seng fɛ, ka baro kɛ jago ni terrorisme koɲɛw kan ni Singapur minisiriɲɛmɔgɔ Lee Hsien Loong ye. Dɔgɔkun kelen bɔnɛ kɔfɛ cɛmancɛ kalataw la, Bush ye jago yiriwali ko fɔ jama ye Azi jamanaw na.
question: Jɔn ye George W. Bush fo a selen Azi jamana na?
mc_answer3: Wong Kan Seng ani Lee Hsien Loong ye ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ

flores_passage: Ameriki jamanatigi George W. Bush sera Singapur Nowanburukalo tile 16 sɔgɔma, a ye dɔgɔkun kelen taama daminɛ Azi jamanaw na. Dɔgɔkun kelen bɔnɛ kɔfɛ cɛmancɛ kalataw la, Bush ye jago yiriwali ko fɔ jama ye Azi jamanaw na.
question: Tuma jumɛn na jamanakuntigi kumana Azi jamana ka jago yiriwali kan?
mc_answer4: A ka dɔgɔkun kelen taama bɛɛ kɔnɔna na Azi jamana na

flores_passage: Bi laseli in fana ye gɔfɛrɛnaman ka layidu janya ɲinan marisikalo la, ka wari di wotoro wɛrɛw ma. Ni wotoro 300 wɛrɛ farala o kan, o bɛ na ni wotoro 1300 ye minnu ka kan ka sɔrɔ walasa ka mɔgɔw caya kojugu lajɔ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn ye gɔfɛrɛnaman ka laɲini bɛɛ lajɛlen ye?
mc_answer1: Aw bɛ wari di wotoro caman ma ɲinan marisikalo la
mc_answer2: Aw ye wotoro 300 sɔrɔ u bɛɛ lajɛlen na
mc_answer4: Aw bɛ wotoroninw ka caya kojugu nɔgɔya

flores_passage: Bi laseli in fana ye gɔfɛrɛnaman ka layidu janya ɲinan marisikalo la, ka wari di wotoro wɛrɛw ma. Ni wotoro 300 wɛrɛ farala o kan, o bɛ na ni wotoro 1300 ye minnu ka kan ka sɔrɔ walasa ka mɔgɔw caya kojugu lajɔ.
question: Gofɛrɛnaman ye mun laseli kɛ?
mc_answer1: U b’a fɛ ka wari di wotoro 300 wɛrɛw ma
mc_answer2: U cɛsirilen don ka wotoro gɛlɛya in nɔgɔya
mc_answer3: U b’a fɛ ka wari di wotoro 1300 wɛrɛw ma
mc_answer4: Mɔgɔw caya kojugu gɛlɛya bɛna ɲɛnabɔ Marisikalo la

flores_passage: "A ko ""Hakilila si t'a jira ko binkanni bɛna kɛ sɔɔni. Nka, bagabagali hakɛ dɔgɔyali ka se juguya ma, o kɔrɔ tɛ ko bagabagali bɛɛ lajɛlen banna."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, kunnafoni jumɛnw bɛ dɔn?
mc_answer4: Hakilila-tɔnw y’a Jira ko binkanni in bɛna juguya

flores_passage: Martelly ye kalifa waatilatigɛ kalata tɔn kura (CEP) la, mɔgɔ 9 bɛ min kɔnɔ kunun. O ye Martelly ka CEP duurunan ye san naani kɔnɔ. Kalo tɛmɛnen, jamanakuntigi ka komisiyɔn dɔ ye ladilikan di CEP kɔrɔ ka fanga bilali ma, k’a kɛ fɛɛrɛw dɔ ye walasa ka jamana bila ka taa kalata kura la. Komisiɔn in tun ye Martelly ka jaabi ye fanga kɛlɛli mɔgɔw ka ɲɔgɔnye caman na minnu daminɛna Ɔkutɔburukalo la. O jὲkafɔ minnu tùn bɛ Kɛ tuma dɔw la, olu sababu Bɔra kalataw kɛbaliya fɛ, dɔw ka kan ka Kɛ kabini 2011 sàn.
question: Kuma jumɛn min bɛ tali kɛ mɔgɔw ka sɔsɔliw la, o tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Jamanakuntigi ka komisiyɔn kɛra jaabi ye o mɔgɔw ka ɲɔgɔnyew kan
mc_answer2: Kalataw minnu tɛmɛna, olu de ye mɔgɔw ka ɲɔgɔn sɔsɔli daminɛ
mc_answer3: Kùnnafoni-cimago-tɔnw y’a ɲini CEP kɔrɔ ka jɔyɔrɔfalen na
mc_answer4: O mɔgɔw tun be mɔgɔw sɔsɔ tuma dɔw la ni fariyakow ye

question: Jɔn de y’a jira ko CEP laban ka a ka baara bila?
mc_answer4: CEP tɔndenw y’a hakilina di u yɛrɛ ma

flores_passage: USA Gymnastics bɛ Ameriki Olɛnpi jɛkulu ka bataki dɛmɛ, wa a sɔnna Olɛnpi denbaya magoba ma kosɛbɛ walasa ka sigida lakananen sabati an ka farikoloɲɛnajɛla bɛɛ ye. An bɛ sɔn USOC ka fɔ ma, ko an ka farikoloɲɛnajɛlamɔgɔw ni kuluw nafaw, ani u ka farikoloɲɛnajɛ, bɛ se ka baara kɛ ka ɲɛ, n’an taara ɲɛ ni fɛn caman yeli ye an ka jɛkulu kɔnɔ, sanni ka seereyaw bɔli kɛ. USA Gymnastics bɛ dɛmɛ don sɛgɛsɛgɛli yɛrɛmahɔrɔnyalen dɔ ma min bɛ se ka yeelen bɔ cogo min na, Larry Nassar ka mɔgɔ kisilenw ye hakɛ min ɲɛfɔ ni jagɛlɛya ye, o tiɲɛni tun bɛ se ka kɛ fɛn ye min ma dɔn kabini waati jan, wa a bɛ fɛn o fɛn minɛ, fɛn o fɛn ka kan ka Changé ani min bɛnnen don. USA Gymnastics ni USOC ka laɲini ye kelen ye — ka farikoloɲɛnajɛ farikoloɲɛnajɛ, ani fɛn wɛrɛw, kɛ fɛn ye min tɛ mɔgɔ tɔɔrɔ farikoloɲɛnajɛlamɔgɔw bolo walasa u ka tugu u ka sugo kɔ sigida lafiyalen, ɲuman ani fanga bɛ min na.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni kunnafoni in ye, mun tɛ dɛmɛn USA Gymnastics fɛ Nassar ka farikoloɲɛnajɛlamɔgɔw ka tɔɔrɔ kɔfɛ?

mc_answer1: Yeelen bɛ yeelen bɔ Larry Nassar ka tɔɔrɔ kan

flores_passage: "Amerika kɔgɔjidala sɔrɔdasikulu fana y'a jira k'u bɛ ka nin ko in sɛgɛsɛgɛ. U y'a fɔ fana kunnafoni dɔ kɔnɔ ko ""A baarakɛlaw bɛ baara la sisan walasa ka fɛɛrɛ ɲuman dɔn walasa ka kurun in bɔ lafiya la"". Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on a ka sira kan ka taa Puerto Princesa Palawan A bilala Ameriki kɔgɔjidala sɔrɔdasikulu wolonwulanan na ani a sigilen bɛ Sasebo, Nagasaki Japon."
question: Kurun tun bɛ taa min tuma min na o ko kɛra?

flores_passage: Dimansi don wula fɛ, Ameriki jamanatigi Donald Trump, a ka kunnafoni dɔ kɔnɔ min dira kunnafonidilaw ka sekeretɛri fɛ, a y’a jira ko Ameriki sɔrɔdasiw bɛna bɔ Siri jamana na. O laseli in Kɛra Trump ni Turquie jamanatigi Recep Tayyip Erdogan ka telefɔni kumaɲɔgɔnya kɔfɛ. Turquie fana tun bɛna ISIS kɛlɛcɛ minɛlenw kɔlɔsili baara ta minnu, kunnafoni in y’a jira ko Erɔpu jamanaw banna ka segin u ka jamana na.
question: Jɔn de ye kuma fɔ Ameriki sɔrɔdasiw ko la?

flores_passage: Barazi jɔlen kɔfɛ san 1963, waati kɔnɔ sanjiba minnu tun bɛna nɔgɔ jɛnsɛn baji bɛɛ kɔnɔ, olu jɔra. O nɔgɔ in tun ka kan ka kɛ cɛncɛnw ni kɔgɔjida laminiw dabɔli la, minnu tun bɛ kɛ kungosogow sigiyɔrɔ ye. O de kosɔn, jɛgɛ suguya fila tununna, ani fila wɛrɛw kɛra farati la, jɛgɛ suguya min bɛ wele ko humpback chub. Hali ni ji hakɛ bɛna wuli mɛtɛrɛ damadɔ dɔrɔn sanjiba in kɔfɛ, faamaw jigi b’a kan ko a bɛna se ka cɛncɛnw lasegin minnu sɔgɔlen don ji la.
question: Faamaw jigi bɛ mun na sanjiba in nɔfɛ?
mc_answer3: Dɔ farala humpback chubs hakɛ kan

flores_passage: "Gɛrɛsi sariyatigi tɔgɔba dɔw, Sakis Kechagioglou ani George Nikolakopoulos, bilala kaso la Atɛni kasobon kɔnɔ min tɔgɔ ye ko Korydallus, k'a sababu kɛ u jalakilen don nanbarako ni nanbarako la. flores_passage: "Bɛɛ ma musow ka kuluw donli dɛmɛ. San 2004 Olɛnpi warijɛ-medali sɔrɔla Amir Khan y'a fɔ ko ""Ne kɔnɔna na, ne hakili la musow man kan ka kɛlɛ. O ye ne hakilina ye."" Hali n'a ka kuma fɔra a ko ale bɛna tubabu dɛmɛ ɲɔgɔndanna minnu kɛra san 2012 Olɛnpi la min bɛ kɛ Lɔnduru."

mc_answer4: London min bɛ Olɛnpi ntolatanw kɛ

flores_passage: Peter Lenz, moto bolila min si bɛ san 13 la, o sara, a kɛlen kɔ ka pankurun boli Indianapolis Motor Speedway sira kan. K’a to a ka farikoloɲɛnajɛ-yɔrɔ la, Lenz binna ka bɔ a ka nɛgɛso kan, o kɔfɛ, a boliɲɔgɔn Xavier Zayat y’a gosi. Dɔgɔtɔrɔso minnu tun bɛ sira kan, olu y’a ladon o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ, ka taa n’a ye sigida dɔgɔtɔrɔso dɔ la, a sara yen kɔfɛ. Zayat ma jogin o kasaara in na.
question: Peter Lenz sara tuma jumɛn?
mc_answer2: A binna kɔfɛ ka bɔ a ka nɛgɛso kan
mc_answer4: K’a to dɔgɔtɔrɔso baarakɛlaw fɛ minnu bɛ sira kan
