question: Xavier Zayat ye jɔn ye?
mc_answer1: Dɔgɔtɔrɔso baarakɛla dɔ min bɛ sira kan

flores_passage: Avion taama bɛ se ka kɛ siranfɛn ye mɔgɔw bolo, u si hakɛ ni u bɔyɔrɔ bɛɛ la, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la n’u ma awiyɔn ta fɔlɔ walima n’u ye ko jugu dɔ sɔrɔ. O tɛ maloyako ye: a tɛ danfara bɔ ni mɔgɔ caman ka siran ni fɛn wɛrɛw diyanyekow ye minnu bɛ mɔgɔ caman na kosɛbɛ. Dɔw fɛ, ni u ye fɛn dɔ faamu awiyɔn baara cogo kan ani min bɛ kɛ awiyɔn bolituma na, o bɛ se ka dɛmɛ don ka se sɔrɔ siran kan min sinsinnen bɛ dɔnbaliya kan walima a tɛ se ka a yɛrɛ minɛ.
question: A ka c’a la, awiyɔn bolila jɔrɔlen bɛna nafa sɔrɔ cogo jumɛn na ni a ye awiyɔn kɔnɔna baarakɛcogo faamu?
mc_answer1: Ni mɔbili bolila maloyara u ka siran na
mc_answer2: Ni u ka pankurun boli kɔniya bɛ tali kɛ dɔnbali siran na
mc_answer3: Ni mɔbili bolila in bɛ bolifɛn suguya bɛɛ kɛlɛ
mc_answer4: Ni u ka jɔrɔnanko bɔra ko juguw la minnu ni awiyɔn bolicogo tɛ kelen ye

flores_passage: Bi bi in na, awiyɔn boli man teli ka sɛbɛn k’a ɲɛsin awiyɔn baarakɛlaw ma k’a sɔrɔ i ma fɔlɔ ka ɲinini kɛ ani ka sɔngɔw suma ɲɔgɔn na. Tuma dɔw la, bɛlɛn kelen bɛ se ka kɛ ni sɔngɔw ye minnu tɛ kelen ye kosɛbɛ agregator suguya caman na wa a bɛ sara ka ɲinini jaabiw suma ɲɔgɔn na ani fana ka awiyɔn bolila yɛrɛ ka siti lajɛ sani i ka jatebɔ kɛ.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, nin fɛn ninnu na, taamakɛla min bɛ sɔngɔko dɔn, o ka kan ka jumɛn kɛ ka mɛn?
mc_answer1: Aw ye taamako tɔn caman ka fɛnw ɲini
mc_answer2: Jate kɛ ka ɲɛsin awiyɔn baarakɛlaw ma
mc_answer3: Aw ye sɔngɔw suma taamako tɔn caman ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ
mc_answer4: Aw ye awiyɔn baarakɛlaw ka siti lajɛ

flores_passage: Bi bi in na, awiyɔn boli man teli ka sɛbɛn k’a ɲɛsin awiyɔn baarakɛlaw ma k’a sɔrɔ i ma fɔlɔ ka ɲinini kɛ ani ka sɔngɔw suma ɲɔgɔn na. Tuma dɔw la, bɛlɛn kelen bɛ se ka kɛ ni sɔngɔw ye minnu tɛ kelen ye kosɛbɛ agregator suguya caman na wa a bɛ sara ka ɲinini jaabiw suma ɲɔgɔn na ani fana ka awiyɔn bolila yɛrɛ ka siti lajɛ sani i ka jatebɔ kɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, taamakɛlaw ka kan ka mun kɛ fɔlɔ walasa ka awiyɔn sɔngɔ ɲumanw sɔrɔ?
mc_answer1: Aw ye awiyɔn baarakɛlaw ka siti lajɛ
mc_answer2: Aw bɛ sɔngɔw suma ɲɔgɔn na jatebɔlan suguya wɛrɛw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ
mc_answer3: Jatebɔ kɛ k’a ɲɛsin awiyɔn baarakɛlaw ma
mc_answer4: I ka jate kɛ ni taamakɛla dɔ ye

flores_passage: Cidenyabaarakɛlaw bɛ sara kosɛbɛ fɛnw lasecogo la joona. Tuma caman na, waati nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ ni jago sɛbɛnw ye, jagofɛnw walima fɛnw ye minnu bɛ kɛ ka fɛnw dilan joona. Sira dɔw kan, izinibaw b’u ka awiyɔnw sɔrɔ, nka sira wɛrɛw ni izini fitininw ta la, gɛlɛya tun bɛ yen. N’u ye fɛnw ci ni awiyɔn ye, sira dɔw kan, n’a sɔrɔ a ye tile caman ta walasa ka tɛmɛ doni jigincogo ni dumuniko fɛ. Fɛɛrɛ kelenpe min tun bɛ se k’a tɛmɛ joona, o tun ye k’a ci i n’a fɔ bagaji sɛgɛsɛgɛlen. Avion baarakɛlaw ka sariyaw tɛna a to u ka bagajiw ci ni mɔbili kɔnɔ mɔgɔ tɛ, o min ye i bɛ don yɔrɔ min na.
question: Tuma jumɛn na a ɲininen bɛ taamaɲɔgɔn fɛ ka taa ni jiginni ye?
mc_answer1: Ni fɛnw cilen don awiyɔn doni fɛ
mc_answer2: Ni sosiyete bɛ baara kɛ n’a yɛrɛ ka awiyɔnw ye
mc_answer3: Ni fɛnw bɛ ci i n’a fɔ bagaji sɛgɛsɛgɛlenw
mc_answer4: Ni jiginni bɛ ka ɲɛnabɔ baarakɛyɔrɔba dɔ fɛ

flores_passage: Aw ka kan k’aw ka Frequent Flyer awiyɔn baarakɛlaw sugandi jɛkulu dɔ kɔnɔ ka ɲɛ. Hali n’i bɛ se k’a miiri ko a bɛ se ka kɛ ko a bɛ se ka don i ka awiyɔn bolila la i bɛ min ta kosɛbɛ, i ka kan k’a dɔn ko nɛɛma minnu bɛ di i ma tuma caman na, olu tɛ kelen ye ani ko mɔgɔ minnu bɛ taa tuma caman na, olu ka yɔrɔw bɛ se ka kɛ bolomafara ye ka tɛmɛn awiyɔn bolila wɛrɛ kan, jɛkulu kelen kɔnɔ.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, n’i bɛ Frequent Flyer awiyɔn baarakɛlaw sugandi jɛkulu dɔ kɔnɔ, i ka kan ka ninnu la jumɛn bila jɔyɔrɔ fɔlɔ la?
mc_answer1: Avion compagnie min bɛ point caman di
mc_answer2: Afiriki pankurunbolitɔn min bɛ jɛkuluba kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: I bɛ taa awiyɔn baarakɛyɔrɔ min na ka caya
mc_answer4: Avion compagnie min bɛ se ka kɛ ka nafa wɛrɛw fara a kan

flores_passage: Aw ka kan k’aw ka Frequent Flyer awiyɔn baarakɛlaw sugandi jɛkulu dɔ kɔnɔ ka ɲɛ. mc_answer4: Afiriki pankurunba wɛrɛ min bɛ jɛkulu kelen kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Aw bɛ dɔlɔminnaw min ni hakɛ ye. Dɔlɔ bɛ nɔ bila mɔgɔ bɛɛ la cogo wɛrɛ la, wa i ka dan dɔnni nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ. Kɛnɛyako kuntaalajan minnu bɛ se ka kɛ ka bɔ dɔlɔmin kojugu fɛ, olu bɛ se ka kɛ sugunɛ tiɲɛni ye ani hali fiyentɔya ni saya. Farati min bɛ se ka kɛ, o bɛ bonya ni dɔlɔ min dilannen don sariya siratigɛ la. Nɔgɔ faratilen suguya caman bɛ se ka sɔrɔ dɔlɔw la minnu tɛ sariya kɔnɔ, i n’a fɔ mɛtanɔli, o bɛ se ka fiyentɔya bila mɔgɔ la walima ka mɔgɔ faga hali ni a tata hakɛ ka dɔgɔn.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nin dusukunnata ninnu na, jumɛn bɛ se ka tiɲɛ dɔlɔmin kojugu fɛ?

flores_passage: Aw bɛ dɔlɔminnaw min ni hakɛ ye. Dɔlɔ bɛ nɔ bila mɔgɔ bɛɛ la cogo wɛrɛ la, wa i ka dan dɔnni nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ. Kɛnɛyako kuntaalajan minnu bɛ se ka kɛ ka bɔ dɔlɔmin kojugu fɛ, olu bɛ se ka kɛ sugunɛ tiɲɛni ye ani hali fiyentɔya ni saya. question: I n’a fɔ a fɔra cogo min na tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, mun bɛ se ka dɔlɔ nɔ juguw dɔgɔya?

flores_passage: Kanal mara (Olandekan na: Grachtengordel) ye san kɛmɛda 17nan mara tɔgɔba ye min bɛ Binnenstad lamini Amsterdam. Distrik bɛɛ tɔgɔ Dara ka Kɛ UNESCO ka diɲɛ ciyɛn ye a ka laadalakow ni tariku nafa kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen kosɔn, wa a ka nafolo nafaw bɛ jamana ka nafaw cɛma.
question: Nafolo nafa bɛ min Amsterdam dugubaw cɛma?
mc_answer2: Yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ min latigɛra iko UNESCO ka diɲɛ ciyɛn yɔrɔ

flores_passage: Phnom Krom, kilomɛtɛrɛ 12 Siem Reap saheli-tlebi fɛ. Nin kulu sanfɛ batoso in jɔra san kɛmɛ 9nan laban na, masakɛ Yasovarman ka masaya waati. flores_passage: Antartiki ye nɛnɛba ye dugukolo kan, wa a bɛ Saheli Pol lamini. Turisiw ka taamaw musaka ka bon, u bɛ farikoloɲɛnajɛ de wajibiya, u bɛ se ka kɛ samiyɛ dɔrɔn de la Nowanburukalo-Feburuyekalo la, wa a fanba bɛ dan Peninsula, Islands ani Ross Sea ma. Baarakɛla ba fila-fila bɛ sigi yan samiyɛ fɛ basigi tan ni naani ɲɔgɔn na u fanba bɛ o yɔrɔw la; mɔgɔ damadɔ bɛ to yen nɛnɛ waati. Antartiki kɔnɔna ye dugukolo-yɔrɔ lakolon ye min datugulen don ni jikuruw ye kilomɛtɛrɛ 2-3. flores_passage: Kɔgɔjida caman bɛ yen, k’a sababu kɛ Auckland ka kurunbonkarila fila ye. Minnu ka di kosɛbɛ, olu bɛ yɔrɔ saba de la. North Shore kɔgɔjida la (North Harbor mara la) bɛ Pasifiki Kɔgɔji la ani u bɛ daminɛ Long Bay worodugu fɛ ka taa Devonport saheli fɛ. A bɛ se ka fɔ ko u bɛɛ ye cɛncɛn kɔgɔjida ye ni jibɔyɔrɔ ye min tɛ mɔgɔ tɔɔrɔ, wa u fanba bɛ ni biɲɛ ye min bɛ sɔrɔ pohutukawa jiriw fɛ. Tamaki Drive kɔgɔjida la, Waitemata kurunboli yɔrɔ la, Mission Bay ani St Heliers dugubaw kɔnɔ minnu ka bon kosɛbɛ, Central Auckland. Olu ye denbaya ka bajidabaw ye minnu falen bɛ mɔgɔw la tuma dɔw la, butiki suguya ɲumanw bɛ kɔgɔjida la. Najibɔ tɛ mɔgɔ tɔɔrɔ.

flores_passage: Aw k’aw hakili to a la ko aw bɛ taa jamaba kaburudo dɔ la tiɲɛ na, ka fara yɔrɔ kan min kɔrɔ bɛ se ka jate kosɛbɛ diɲɛ jamanaden fanba fɛ. Cɛ ni muso caman bɛ balo la hali bi minnu ye u yɛrɛ kisi u ka waati ma yan, ani mɔgɔ caman wɛrɛw minnu ka kanubagaw fagara walima ka baara kɛ yen fo ka se saya ma, Yahutuw ni Yahutu tɛ minnu na. Aw ka siti in minɛ ni bonya, bonya ani bonya bɛɛ ye, a ka kan ni min ye. Kana tulonko kɛ Holocaust walima Naziw ko la. Aw kana yɔrɔ tiɲɛ ni taamasiyɛn kɛli ye walima ka sɛbɛnniw sɔgɔ ka don fɛnw kɔnɔ.
question: K’i to taa bɔ yɔrɔ la min ɲɛfɔlen bɛ tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, ninnu la jumɛn bɛna jate ko a ma bɛn?
mc_answer2: Ka taamasiyɛn dɔ to yɔrɔ dɔ la yɔrɔ lamini na

flores_passage: Kan dɛmɛnanw ye kan dilannenw walima kan jɔlenw ye minnu dabɔra ni laɲini ye ka kumaɲɔgɔnya nɔgɔya jamanaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ minnu tun bɛna gɛlɛya sɔrɔ kumaɲɔgɔnya la. mc_answer1: U ye kanw ye minnu bɛ Kɛ ni fɛnɲɛnamaw ye minnu bɛ Kɛ ka kumaɲɔgɔnya nɔgɔya mɔgɔw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ, n’a sɔrɔla u tɛ ɲɔgɔn Faamu cogo wɛrɛ la
mc_answer2: U ye kanw ye minnu bɛ Kɛ dacogo la ani minnu jɔlen dòn
mc_answer3: U ye kanw ye minnu jɔra walasa ka kumaɲɔgɔnya gɛlɛnw ɲɛnabɔ
mc_answer4: U ye kanw dabɔlenw ye minnu bɛ fanga sɔrɔ kan wɛrɛw fɔbagaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ

flores_passage: Barselona ka kanw ye Katalan ni Ɛsipaɲɔlikan ye. Mɔgɔ tilancɛ ɲɔgɔn b’a fɛ ka Katalankan fɔ, u fanba b’a faamu, wa a bɛ se ka fɔ ko bɛɛ bɛ Ɛsipaɲɔlikan dɔn. Nka, taamaʃyɛn fanba bɛ Jira katalankan dɔrɔn na bawo a Sìgira sariya fɛ i n’a fɔ jamana ka kan fɔlɔ. O bɛɛ n’a ta, baara bɛ kɛ ni Ɛsipaɲɔlikan ye kosɛbɛ fana foroba bolifɛnw ni fɛn wɛrɛw la. Laseli minnu bɛ kɛ tuma bɛɛ Metoro kɔnɔ, olu bɛ kɛ katalankan dɔrɔn de la, nka tiɲɛni minnu ma labɛn, olu bɛ laseli kɛ ni otomatiki ye kan suguya caman na i n’a fɔ Ɛsipaɲɔlikan, Angilɛkan, Faransikan, Arabukan ani Zapɔnkan.
question: Mun na Catalankan bɛ fɔ tuma caman na taamasiyɛnw ni laseliw kama Barselona?
mc_answer1: A faamuyalen don kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛ Ɛsipaɲɔlikan kan
mc_answer2: O tun ye dugu ka kan fɔlɔ ye
mc_answer3: O ye kan ye min ka di kosɛbɛ Barselona
mc_answer4: Metoro ni foroba yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la, jamanaden minnu bɛ Katalankan fɔ, olu de bɛ taa yen kosɛbɛ

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, tuma jumɛn i ka ID bɛ se ka sɛgɛsɛgɛ dancɛ tigɛ tɛrɛn dɔw kɔnɔ?
mc_answer3: A tɛ sɔrɔ ka sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛ
mc_answer4: Tɛrɛn min bɛ boli, o kan

flores_passage: "Singapore ye caman na yɔrɔ ye min lakananen don kosɛbɛ ka kɛ yen wa a taama ka nɔgɔn kosɛbɛ, wa i bɛ se ka fɛn bɛɛ san i selen kɔfɛ. Nka n'i bilala ""yɔrɔ dumanba"" la, degere damadɔ dɔrɔn na equator worodugu fɛ i bɛna a ɲini ka o fila bɛɛ ɲɛnabɔ."(Alimankan na) funteni (tuma bɛɛ) ani tile barikama (ni sankolo jɛlen don, a man teli ka kɛ)."
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ye koɲɛw ye minnu ka teli ka wuli k’a sɔrɔ i tora Singapuri yɔrɔ la, yɔrɔ min ka timi kosɛbɛ?
mc_answer2: Ka sɔrɔ ka se ka butikiw sɔrɔ
mc_answer3: Tɔrɔ min bɛ kɛ funteni sɛgɛn na

flores_passage: Alemaɲi ka patisriw ka ɲi kosɛbɛ, wa Bavaria jamana na, u nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ ani u suguya ka ca, u ni u sigiɲɔgɔn saheliyanfan Ɔtirisi ta bɔlen don. Jiridenw ka patisri ka ca, pɔmuw bɛ tobi ka kɛ patisriw ye san bɛɛ kɔnɔ, ani seriw ni prunes bɛ u bɔ kɛnɛ kan samiyɛ waati. Alemaɲi ka tobilikɛminɛn caman fana bɛ ni amande, hazelnut ani jiribulu wɛrɛw ye. Tuma caman na, gato minnu bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ, olu bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la ni kafe barikama tasa ye. N’aw b’a fɛ ka patisri misɛnnin dɔw sɔrɔ hali ni u nafa ka bon, aw bɛ fɛnw lajɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni mara ye minnu bɛ wele ko Berliner, Pfannkuchen walima Krapfen.
question: Jɔn bɛ se k’a fɛ k’a yɛrɛ tanga Alemaɲi ka patisri dunni ma?
mc_answer1: Mɔgɔ min faritanabana jugumanba bɛ a la
mc_answer2: Mɔgɔ min ka di dumunifɛn nafamabaw ye
mc_answer3: Mɔgɔ min ka di sokola ye
mc_answer4: Mɔgɔ min bɛ dumuni dumanw fɛ ka tɛmɛ dumuni dumanw kan

flores_passage: Alemaɲi ka patisriw ka ɲi kosɛbɛ, wa Bavaria jamana na, u nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ ani u suguya ka ca, u ni u sigiɲɔgɔn saheliyanfan Ɔtirisi ta bɔlen don. question: Fɛn jumɛn bɛ jate Alemaɲi ka patisri waati kɔnɔfɛn ye?

flores_passage: N’i b’a fɛ ka diɲɛ ye sɔngɔ gɛlɛn na, wajibi kama, ɲɛnamaya kɛcogo walima gɛlɛya kama, o kɛcogo dɔw bɛ yen. A jɔnjɔn na, u bɛ don kulu fila la: I bɛ baara kɛ k’i to taama na walima k’a ɲini ka dan sigi i ka musakaw la. Nin barokun in sinsinnen bɛ o labanw kan. Minnu b’a fɛ ka dususalo, waati ani kofɔlenw saraka walasa ka musakaw jigin ka surunya zeru la, aw ye baarakɛnafolo hakɛ fitinin lajɛ. Ladilikan b’a jira ko taamakɛlaw tɛ sonyali kɛ, ka don u kɔnɔ, ka u sen don sugu la min tɛ sariya kɔnɔ, ka mɔgɔw deli, walima ka u nafa cogo wɛrɛ la u yɛrɛ ka nafa kama.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, ninnu la jumɛn tɛna kɛ laadilikan ye min bɛ fɔ ka taa taama na ni baarakɛnafolo ye?
mc_answer1: Aw ye baara gansanw ɲini aw ka taamaw senfɛ
mc_answer2: I ka kɛ mɔgɔ ye min bɛ se ka fɛn caman kɛ ni i ka dususalo hakɛ ye
mc_answer3: Aw ye wari ɲini mɔgɔw fɛ
mc_answer4: Aw bɛ musakaw dɔgɔya i n’a fɔ dumuni ni siyɔrɔ

flores_passage: N’i b’a fɛ ka diɲɛ ye sɔngɔ gɛlɛn na, wajibi kama, ɲɛnamaya kɛcogo walima gɛlɛya kama, o kɛcogo dɔw bɛ yen. A jɔnjɔn na, u bɛ don kulu fila la: I bɛ baara kɛ k’i to taama na walima k’a ɲini ka dan sigi i ka musakaw la. Nin barokun in sinsinnen bɛ o labanw kan. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, jɔn bɛ se ka gɛlɛya sɔrɔ ka taama ni baarakɛnafolo fitininba ye?
mc_answer1: Mɔgɔ min bɛ gɛlɛya dɔ bisimila
mc_answer2: Mɔgɔ min tɛ waati dantigɛli gɛlɛnw kɛ
mc_answer3: Mɔgɔ min b’a fɛ ka baara kɛ yɔrɔjan na k’a to taama na
mc_answer4: Mɔgɔ min ka di a ye ka tugu taama bolodalen dɔ kɔ

flores_passage: Point Marion ni Fairmont cɛ sira bɛ bolifɛn bolicogo gɛlɛnw jira Buffalo-Pittsburgh siraba kan, ka tɛmɛ tuma caman na kɔfɛ kungo yɔrɔw la minnu yɔrɔ ka jan. N’i ma deli ka bolifɛn boli jamana siraw kan, i k’i hakili to i ko la: jirisunba minnu ka jan, sira misɛnninw, ani siraba nɔgɔlenw de ka ca. Teliya dantigɛli minnu bilala sen kan, olu ka dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛ dakun tɛmɛnenw ni dakun nataw kan — a ka c’a la, kilomɛtɛrɛ 56-64 lɛrɛ kɔnɔ — wa kanminɛli gɛlɛn u ma, o nafa ka bon ka tɛmɛ yɔrɔ wɛrɛw kan yɛrɛ. Nka, a kabakoyara kosɛbɛ k’a ye ko telefɔni selilɛri baara barika ka bon kosɛbɛ yan ka tɛmɛ sira caman wɛrɛw kan, misali la, Pennsylvanie Wilds.
question: Nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn tɛ bolifɛnko ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ Point Marion ni Fairmont cɛ?
mc_answer1: Jamana sira janw bɛ yen minnu bɛ yɔrɔ jan
mc_answer3: Teliya dantigɛliw man teli ka labato
mc_answer4: Telefɔni selilɛri baara man kan ka kɛ ko ye

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn ka kan ka kɛ haminankoba ye bolifɛntigiw bolo minnu bɛ taa Buffalo-Pittsburg siraba kan?
mc_answer3: Ka wuli ka wuli joona kojugu
mc_answer4: Sirako baara minnu bɛ kɛ tuma caman na, olu kunbɛnni

flores_passage: Kanjon (walima: kanjon) ye ka taa kanjon dɔ duguma, min jalen don walima min falen bɛ ji la. Kanjon bɛ fɛnw fara ɲɔgɔn kan minnu bɛ bɔ jibɔ, jiginni ani panni na--nka a tɛ dege dɔɔnin dɔrɔn de wajibiya walima farikolo cogoya dɔɔnin walasa ka daminɛ (n’i y’a suma ni farakurun jiginni, scuba diving walima alpine skiing ye, misali la).
question: Ninnu la jumɛn man kan ka kɛ walasa ka kɔjida daminɛ?
mc_answer1: Se min bɛ mɔgɔ la ka jigin
mc_answer2: Farikolo cogoya min bɛ a kuncɛ

flores_passage: Kanjon (walima: kanjon) ye ka taa kanjon dɔ duguma, min jalen don walima min falen bɛ ji la. Kanjon bɛ fɛnw fara ɲɔgɔn kan minnu bɛ bɔ jibɔ, jiginni ani panni na--nka a tɛ dege dɔɔnin dɔrɔn de wajibiya walima farikolo cogoya dɔɔnin walasa ka daminɛ (n’i y’a suma ni farakurun jiginni, scuba diving walima alpine skiing ye, misali la).
question: Ninnu la jumɛn bɛ se ka kɛ wajibi ye walasa ka kɔjida taama ɲɛ?
mc_answer2: A ka kɔn ka dɔnniya sɔrɔ scuba diving la
mc_answer3: Seereyaw dɔ bɛ sɔrɔ kanjoli la

flores_passage: "Ka don i yɛrɛ ka mobili kɔnɔ ka taa sira jan taama na, o bɛ mɔgɔ kɔnɔnafili a nɔgɔya la. A tɛ i n'a fɔ mobili belebelebaw, n'a sɔrɔla i bɛ i ka mobili bolicogo dɔn kaban, wa i b'a danyɔrɔw dɔn. Ka fanibugu sigi mɔgɔ kelen ka yɔrɔ kan walima a kɔnɔ dugu bonya mana kɛ min o min ye, o bɛ se ka mɔgɔw hakili sama nɔgɔya la minnu t'a fɛ, n'o ye ka baara kɛ ni i ka mobili ye, o ye siraba taamacogo ɲuman ye nka a man teli ka kɛ sababu ye ka ""kanpaɲi" kɛ , Sedan walima Station Wagon ni sigilanw bɛ da duguma."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mɔgɔ min b’a fɛ ka sigi a ka mobili kɔnɔ, mun bɛna kɛ dɛmɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Faamuyali barikama i ka mobili danbe kan
mc_answer2: Mobili min b’a to sigilanw bɛ se ka da
mc_answer4: Mɔgɔ kelen-kelen ka yɔrɔ min ka kan ka sigi a kan

flores_passage: "Ka don i yɛrɛ ka mobili kɔnɔ ka taa sira jan taama na, o bɛ mɔgɔ kɔnɔnafili a nɔgɔya la. A tɛ i n'a fɔ mobili belebelebaw, n'a sɔrɔla i bɛ i ka mobili bolicogo dɔn kaban, wa i b'a danyɔrɔw dɔn. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mobili kanpaɲikɛlaw bɛ se k’a fɛ k’u yɛrɛ tanga mun ma n’u b’a fɛ ka to rada jukɔrɔ?
mc_answer1: Mobili belebeleba boli, i n’a fɔ SUV walima minivan
mc_answer3: Fanibugu sigili dugu kɔnɔ walima mɔgɔ kelen ka yɔrɔ la
mc_answer4: U bɛ baara kɛ ni mobili min ye, o dɔnbaliya

flores_passage: Bi dugu Casablanca sigira sen kan Berber mɔnikɛlaw fɛ san kɛmɛda 10nan na Krisita tile ɲɛ, ani Fenisikaw, Romɛkaw ani Merenidw tun bɛ baara kɛ ni a ye iko kurunbonkariyɔrɔ min bɛ wele ko Anfa. Pɔrtigalkaw y’a tiɲɛ ani k’a jɔ kokura tɔgɔ la Casa Branca, dɔrɔn k’a bila dugukolo yɛrɛyɛrɛ kɔfɛ san 1755. Maroc sultan ye dugu jɔ kokura ka kɛ Daru l-Badya ye ani a tɔgɔ dira a ma ko Casablanca Ɛspaɲi jagokɛlaw fɛ minnu ye jagokɛyɔrɔw sigi yen. Casablanca ye sannikɛyɔrɔ ye min man di kosɛbɛ Maroc jamana bɛɛ la. Madina kɔrɔ lamini na, a ka nɔgɔn ka yɔrɔw sɔrɔ minnu bɛ Maroko laadalafɛnw feere, i n’a fɔ tagines, bɔgɔdaga, jirifɛnw, nakɔfɛnw, ani geegaw suguya bɛɛ, nka o bɛɛ ye turisiw ta ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, jɔn de ye Kasablanka jɔ kokura siɲɛ filanan na?

question: Jɔn de ye bi dugu min tɔgɔ ye ko Casablanca, o kɔfɛ, balawu dɔ kɔfɛ?

flores_passage: Worodugu fɛ ani a bɛ se ka se yɔrɔ min na nɔgɔya la, Sintra dugu bɛ yen min bɛ kanuya jira ani min bɛ mɔgɔ ɲɛnajɛ, wa min tɔgɔ bɔra dunanw fɛ a nɔɔrɔw lakalilen kɔfɛ min bɛ yeelen bɔ, Lord Byron ye min sɛbɛn. Scotturb Bus 403 bɛ taa Sintra tuma bɛɛ, a bɛ jɔ Cabo da Roca. Fana worodugu fɛ, aw bɛ taa An ka Matigi Fatima ka yɔrɔ senumaba (Shrine) la, o ye Mariyama ka jirali tɔgɔba ye diɲɛ kɔnɔ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, Sintra ye dɔnniya sɔrɔ cogo di dunanw cɛma?

flores_passage: San 1994, Azerbaïdjan jamana na, Nagorno-Karabakh mara min siya ye Armeni ye, o ye kɛlɛ kɛ ni Azerbaïdjan ye. Armenikaw ka dɛmɛ fɛ, jamana kura dɔ dabɔra. Nka, jamana sigilen si - hali Armeni - t'a Sɔ̀rɔ foroba la. Diplomasi sɔsɔli minnu bɛ o mara in kan, olu bɛ ka taa a fɛ ka jɛɲɔgɔnyaw tiɲɛ Armeni ni Azerbaïdjan cɛ.
question: Mun ma Sɔn Armeni jamana ma?
mc_answer2: Kɛlɛ min kɛra ni Azeriw ye

flores_passage: San 1994, Azerbaïdjan jamana na, Nagorno-Karabakh mara min siya ye Armeni ye, o ye kɛlɛ kɛ ni Azerbaïdjan ye. Armenikaw ka dɛmɛ fɛ, jamana kura dɔ dabɔra. Nka, jamana sigilen si - hali Armeni - t'a Sɔ̀rɔ foroba la. Diplomasi sɔsɔli minnu bɛ o mara in kan, olu bɛ ka taa a fɛ ka jɛɲɔgɔnyaw tiɲɛ Armeni ni Azerbaïdjan cɛ.
question: Mun bɛ ka taa a fɛ ka nɔ bila jɛɲɔgɔnyaw la Azerbaïdjan ni Armeni cɛ?

flores_passage: Charlotte, Caroline du Nord, yɔrɔ barikama dɔ ye ko sugandili ɲumanw ka ca denbayaw bolo. Sigida wɛrɛw la, duguden minnu bɛ bɔ yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la, olu ka teli k’a fɔ ko denbaya ka teli ka kɛ sababu fɔlɔ ye ka taa yen, wa tuma caman na, a ka nɔgɔn dunanw bolo ka dugu diyabɔ ni denmisɛnw ye u lamini na. San 20 tɛmɛnenw kɔnɔ, denmisɛnw ka sugandiliw hakɛ cayara kosɛbɛ Uptown Charlotte. A ka c’a la, denbayaw tɛ baara kɛ ni taksi ye Charlotte dugu kɔnɔ, hali ni nafa dɔ bɛ se ka kɛ u la cogo dɔw la. Sara bɛ fara a kan ni mɔgɔ 2 ni kɔ bɛ yen, o la, nin sugandi in bɛ se ka kɛ sɔngɔ gɛlɛn ye ka tɛmɛ a wajibiyalen kan.
question: K’a sɔrɔ i bɛ taksi ta Charlotte, mun bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka wari wɛrɛ sara?
mc_answer2: Ka kɛ ni mɔgɔ saba ye

mc_answer3: Sigidamɔgɔw minnu bɛ bɔ yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la

flores_passage: Sani Ɛspaɲikaw ka na san kɛmɛda 16nan na, Chili worodugu tun bɛ Inka ka mara kɔnɔ k’a sɔrɔ Araucani jamanadenw (Mapuche) tun sigilen bɛ Chili cɛmancɛ ni saheli fɛ. Mapuchew fana tun ye Ameriki jamanadenw ka kulu yɛrɛmahɔrɔnyalen labanw dɔ ye, minnu ma don kosɛbɛ Ɛspaɲɔlikan fɔbagaw ka mara la fo Chili ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya kɔfɛ. Hali ni Chili ye yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya jira san 1810 (Napoléon kɛlɛw cɛma min ye Espaɲi to ni cɛmancɛ gɔfɛrɛnaman baarakɛbali ye san fila-fila), sebaaya latigɛlen ma sɔrɔ Ɛspaɲi kan fo san 1818.
question: Sani Ɛsipaɲɔlikaw ka na, jɔn de tun bɛ Sili worodugu fan mara?

flores_passage: Sani Ɛspaɲikaw ka na san kɛmɛda 16nan na, Chili worodugu tun bɛ Inka ka mara kɔnɔ k’a sɔrɔ Araucani jamanadenw (Mapuche) tun sigilen bɛ Chili cɛmancɛ ni saheli fɛ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn ma kɛ san 1810?
mc_answer2: Chili ye sebaaya Sɔrɔ Ɛspaɲikaw kan
mc_answer3: Napoléon ka kɛlɛw tun bɛ ka kɛ

flores_passage: Cinque Terre, min kɔrɔ ye Dugukolo Duuru ye, o ye kɔgɔjida dugu misɛnnin duuru ye minnu ye Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza ani Monterosso ye minnu bɛ Itali mara la Liguria. U tɔgɔ sɛbɛnnen bɛ UNESCO ka diɲɛ ciyɛn lisi kan. San kɛmɛ caman kɔnɔna na, mɔgɔw ye terasiw jɔ ni hakilisigi ye dugukolo gɛlɛnw ni yɔrɔ janw kan fo ka se faraw ma minnu bɛ kɔgɔji filɛ. A ka ɲɛnajɛ dɔ ye tɔnw ka yiriwali yelen dɛsɛ ye. Siraw, tɛrɛnw ani kurunw bɛ duguw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ, mɔbiliw tɛ se ka se u ma ka bɔ kɛnɛma.
question: Mɔgɔw bɛ se ka se dugu yɔrɔjanw na cogo di Liguria mara la?

question: Italikan daɲɛ min ye ko ‘Cinque Terre’, o bɛ mun de kofɔ?

flores_passage: Kasara sababu min ka teli ka kɛ nɛnɛ waati la, o ye siraw ye minnu bɛ sɔgɔsɔgɔ, siraba minnu bɛ kɛ sirada la (sɛnɛyɔrɔw) ani kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la sennasanbaraw. A dɔgɔyalenba la, aw mago bɛ sennasanbaraw la minnu senw bɛ bɛn. A ka c’a la, samiyɛ sanbaraw bɛ sɛgɛn kosɛbɛ jikuruw ni nɛnɛ kan, hali nɛnɛ sanbara dɔw dɛsɛlen don. A kɛcogo ka kan ka dun kosɛbɛ, milimɛtɛrɛ 5 walima ka tɛmɛ o kan, ani a fɛn ka kan ka nɔgɔya kosɛbɛ nɛnɛ waati. Butiki dɔw bɛ ni sɔgɔlanw ye ani fɛn dɔw bɛ yen minnu bɛ fara ɲɔgɔn kan, minnu bɛ kɛ ni sɛgɛn ye, minnu bɛnnen don sanbara ni butiki fanba ma, senkɔniw walima senkɔniw ni senkɔniw kama. Senkɔniw ka kan ka jigin ani ka bonya. A ka ca a la, cɛncɛn, kabakurun walima kɔgɔ (chlorure de calcium) bɛ jɛnsɛn siraw walima siraw kan walasa ka u samacogo ɲɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, butiki sugu jumɛn bɛnnen don nɛnɛ waatiw ma minnu bɛ se ka sɛgɛn?
mc_answer2: Butiki minnu bɛ ni minɛnw ye minnu bɛ ni sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛ ye
mc_answer3: Booti minnu bɛ ni sennasanbara janw ye
mc_answer4: Butiki minnu tɛ ni 1/5 inch juguman ye

flores_passage: "Kuki gunw ye gun jamana ye min bɛ jɛɲɔgɔnya hɔrɔnyalen na ni Nuwɛlika ye, min sigilen bɛ Polinezi, Pasifiki Saheli Kɔgɔji cɛmancɛ la. A ye gun ye min ka gun 15 bɛ yen minnu jɛnsɛnnen don kɔgɔji kilomɛtɛrɛ miliyɔn 2,2 kan. Ni waatibolodacogo ye kelen ye Hawaii, gunw bɛ miiri tuma dɔw la ko ""Hawaii down under" gun 15 danfaralenw na.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn de bɛ ɲɔgɔn bɔ tigitigi Hawayi ni Cook gunw cɛ?
mc_answer1: Lotɛli belebele caman bɛ u fila bɛɛ la
mc_answer3: U bɛ waatibolodacogo kelen de Kɛ
mc_answer4: Dugu si t'u fla bɛɛ fɛ

flores_passage: "Kuki gunw ye gun jamana ye min bɛ jɛɲɔgɔnya hɔrɔnyalen na ni Nuwɛlika ye, min sigilen bɛ Polinezi, Pasifiki Saheli Kɔgɔji cɛmancɛ la. mc_answer1: A ka dɔgɔ ni Hawayi ye
mc_answer3: Duguba minnu bɛ yen olu ye Rarotonga ni Aitutaki ye
mc_answer4: Gun jamana in ni Hawayi ka waatibolodacogo ye kelen ye

flores_passage: Permis ka kan ka kɔn ka mara. I ka kan ka kɛ ni permis ye walasa ka su kɛ Sirena. Sirena ye ranger station kelenpe ye min bɛ siyɔrɔ ni dumuni funtenimaw di ka fara kanpaɲi kan. La Leona, San Pedrillo ani Los Patos bɛ kanpaɲi dɔrɔn de di, dumuni tɛ kɛ yɔrɔ min na. A bɛ se ka kɛ ka parki permis sɔrɔ ka bɔ Ranger Station la Puerto Jiménez, nka u tɛ sɔn kartiw ma Park Service (MINAE) tɛ parc permis di ka tɛmɛ kalo kelen kan ka kɔn u nali makɔnɔnen ɲɛ. CafeNet El Sol bɛ jatebɔ baara kɛ ni Ameriki dɔrɔmɛ 30 ye, walima dɔrɔmɛ 10 tile kelen tɛmɛsira la; kunnafoni dɔw bɛ u ka Corcovado ɲɛ kan.

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, i bɛ se ka parki permis mara min n’i b’a fɛ ka baara kɛ ni warijɛ ye juru nɔ na?
mc_answer3: KafeNet El Sol ye baara kɛ

flores_passage: Backpacking ni ski: O baara in bɛ Weele fana ko backcountry ski, ski touring walima ski hiking. A bɛ tali kɛ nka a ka c’a la, a tɛ tali kɛ alpine style ski touring walima kulu jiginni na, o labanw bɛ kɛ yɔrɔ janw na ani u bɛ ski ni butiki gɛlɛnbaw de wajibiya. Miiri ski sira la i n’a fɔ o ɲɔgɔnna taama sira. Ni i bɛ cogo ɲuman na i bɛ se ka yɔrɔjanw kɛ minnu ka bon dɔɔnin ka tɛmɛ taama kan – nka a man teli kosɛbɛ ko i bɛna cross country ski teliya sɔrɔ k’a sɔrɔ i ma kɔfɛbagan girinman sɔrɔ sira labɛnnenw kan.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ski sugu jumɛn bɛ kɛ yɔrɔw la minnu ka jan?

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun bɛ se ka kɔkanna skikɛlaw dɛmɛ minnu b’a fɛ ka se teliya la?
mc_answer1: Buti minnu ka gɛlɛn ka tɛmɛ

flores_passage: Segin-ka-don-sɔgɔli bɛ na joona ka tɛmɛ ladamu-sɔgɔsɔgɔ kan (misɛnnin kalo waati ka dɔgɔn), a bɛ mɛn, wa a bɛ se ka juguya ka tɛmɛ. Taamakɛlaw minnu ye waati nɔgɔn sɔrɔ ka ladamu o laadalakow kura la, tuma dɔw la, a ka gɛlɛn kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la u ka ladamu kokura u faso ka laadalakow la. Ni i seginna so i sigilen kɔfɛ jamana wɛrɛ la, i ye i yɛrɛ dege o ladamu kura la, wa i bɔra i ka delinanko dɔw la ka bɔ i ka so ladamu la. Tuma min na i taara jamana wɛrɛ la a daminɛ na, n’a sɔrɔ mɔgɔw tun bɛ muɲu ani u tun bɛ faamuyali kɛ, k’a dɔn ko jamana kura taamabagaw ka kan ka ladamu. Mɔgɔw tɛ se k’a miiri ko muɲuli ni faamuyali fana ka kan taamakɛlaw bolo minnu bɛ segin u ka so.
question: Taamakɛlaw minnu bɛ segin-ka-bɔnye sɔrɔ, a ka gɛlɛn olu ma ka mun kɛ?
mc_answer1: Ka ladamu yɔrɔ kura ka laadalakow la
mc_answer2: Ka muɲu ani ka faamuyali kɛ
mc_answer4: Ka ladamu kokura u ka so ladamucogo la

flores_passage: Segin-ka-don-sɔgɔli bɛ na joona ka tɛmɛ ladamu-sɔgɔsɔgɔ kan (misɛnnin kalo waati ka dɔgɔn), a bɛ mɛn, wa a bɛ se ka juguya ka tɛmɛ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, segin-ka-bɔnye bɛ se ka gɛlɛya kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la taamakɛla sugu jumɛn ma?
mc_answer1: Taamakɛlaw minnu ye kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la ladamu jugu sɔrɔ, olu kabakoyara
mc_answer2: Taamakɛlaw minnu y’u yɛrɛ dege joona k’u to jamana wɛrɛ la
mc_answer3: Taamakɛlaw minnu bɛ misiri la hali bi
mc_answer4: Taamakɛlaw minnu ka muɲuli ka dɔgɔ

flores_passage: Moose (a bɛ fɔ fana ko elk) tɛ mɔgɔ farimanw ye u danma, nka u bɛna u yɛrɛ lafasa n’u ye bagabagali ye. Ni mɔgɔw t’a ye ko wulu bɛ se ka kɛ farati ye, u bɛ se ka gɛrɛ u la kojugu ani k’u yɛrɛ bila farati la.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ka kan ka kɛ mɔgɔw fɛ ni moose ye?
mc_answer2: Ka gɛrɛ a la dɔɔni dɔɔni kojugu
mc_answer3: U ka bagabagali hakɛ min bɛ se ka kɛ, o dɔgɔyali
mc_answer4: Ka u kɔlɔsi ka bɔ yɔrɔ jan

flores_passage: Moose (a bɛ fɔ fana ko elk) tɛ mɔgɔ farimanw ye u danma, nka u bɛna u yɛrɛ lafasa n’u ye bagabagali ye. Ni mɔgɔw t’a ye ko wulu bɛ se ka kɛ farati ye, u bɛ se ka gɛrɛ u la kojugu ani k’u yɛrɛ bila farati la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nin kuma minnu fɔra moose ko la, jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: U ye baganw ye minnu bɛ kɛlɛ kɛ u yɛrɛ la
mc_answer2: Tuma dɔw la, u tɛ jate bagabagali ye min bɛ se ka kɛ
mc_answer3: U tun bɛ se ka lawuli mɔgɔw fɛ minnu ka surun ɲɔgɔn na
mc_answer4: U bɛna u yɛrɛ lafasa ni a mago bɛ o la

flores_passage: Tile funteni na, taamakɛlaw bɛ se ka fɛn dɔw ye minnu bɛ ji (walima fɛn wɛrɛw) yecogo di u ma. Olu bɛ se ka kɛ farati ye ni taamakɛla tugura o miirili kɔ, ka fanga nafama ni ji tolenw tiɲɛ. Hali kungo minnu ka suma kosɛbɛ, olu bɛ se ka nɛnɛ kosɛbɛ su fɛ. Furakɛcogo jugumanba ye farati yɛrɛ ye ni fini sumalen don.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na, jumɛn de bɛna kɛ faratiba ye kungo kɔnɔ taamakɛla ma?
mc_answer1: Fini sumalenw dɛsɛ su fɛ nɛnɛ na
mc_answer2: Mira ye min bɛ ji namara di
mc_answer3: Fanga tiɲɛni k’a sɔrɔ i bɛ tugu miirili dɔ kɔ
mc_answer4: Ji tiɲɛni k’a sɔrɔ i bɛ tugu miirili dɔ kɔ

flores_passage: Dominikɛ jamana (Espaɲɔlikan: República Dominicana) ye Karayibu jamana ye min bɛ Hispaniola gun kɔrɔnfɛla tilancɛ minɛ, a ni Haiti bɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ Ka fara cɛncɛn finmanw ni kuluw kan, jamana in ye Erɔpu dugu kɔrɔba sigiyɔrɔ ye Ameriki, sisan a ye Santo Domingo dugu dɔ ye. O gun in sigira fɔlɔ Tainos ani Caribes fɛ. Karibikaw tun ye Arawakakan fɔbagaw ye minnu tun sera yen san 10 000 ɲɔgɔnna Krisita tile ɲɛ. San damadɔ kɔnɔ Erɔpu ɲininikɛlaw nali kɔfɛ, Tainos jamanadenw tun dɔgɔyara kosɛbɛ Ɛspaɲi minɛbagaw fɛ Ka da Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) kan san 1492 ni 1498 cɛ Ɛspaɲi minɛbagaw ye Taino 100.000 ɲɔgɔnna faga.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, kulu jumɛn ka jamanadenw hakɛ de tɔɔrɔla kosɛbɛ ɲininikɛlaw nali kɔfɛ?

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, kan jumɛn tun bɛ fɔ Karibiw fɛ?

flores_passage: "Sɛgɛsɛgɛli minnu bɛ dugujukɔrɔ, n'o ye ski ni snowboard ye, olu ye farikoloɲɛnajɛ ye min bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ, n'o ye ka jigin yɔrɔ la min falen bɛ nɛnɛ na ni ski walima snowboard sirilen ye i senw na. Ski ye taama baara belebele ye min ka di mɔgɔ caman ye, a bɛ fɔ tuma dɔw la ko ""ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location is very old — kɔdingɛ ja minnu bɛ skikɛlaw jira, olu bɛ bɔ san 5000 na Krisita tile ɲɛ, o bɛ taa san kɛmɛ 17nan na a dɔgɔyalenba la, ani san 1861 ɲɛnajɛ fɔlɔ ski kulu dabɔra Norvegekaw fɛ Ɔsitarali jamana na."
question: Jɔn bɛ se ka fɔ ko a ye ski kɛli kɛ ɲɛnajɛ ye?

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, waati jumɛn lamini na, ski kɛra farikoloɲɛnajɛ ye fɔlɔ?

flores_passage: Afiriki kɔrɔnyanfan gunw bɛ Ɛndi Kɔgɔji la Afiriki kɔrɔnyanfan kɔgɔjida la. Madagasikari ye farafinna ye min ka bon kosɛbɛ, wa a ye farafinna ye a yɛrɛ ma ni kungosogow ko don. Gun misɛnnin fanba ye jamana yɛrɛmahɔrɔnyalenw ye, walima minnu ni Faransi bɛ jɛ, wa u bɛ wele ko kɔgɔjida lafiɲɛbɔyɔrɔw cɛɲiw. Arabuw fana nana ni silamɛya ye jamanaw la, wa a ye siraba ta Komoro ni Mayotte. Erɔpu fanga ni koloniyali daminɛna san kɛmɛda 15nan na, iko Pɔrtigal ɲininikɛla Vasco da Gama ye Kapi sira sɔrɔ ka bɔ Erɔpu ka taa Ɛndujamana na.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn bɛ tali kɛ gunba la min bɛ Afiriki kɔrɔnyanfan kɔgɔjida la?

flores_passage: Afiriki kɔrɔnyanfan gunw bɛ Ɛndi Kɔgɔji la Afiriki kɔrɔnyanfan kɔgɔjida la. Madagasikari ye farafinna ye min ka bon kosɛbɛ, wa a ye farafinna ye a yɛrɛ ma ni kungosogow ko don. Gun misɛnnin fanba ye jamana yɛrɛmahɔrɔnyalenw ye, walima minnu ni Faransi bɛ jɛ, wa u bɛ wele ko kɔgɔjida lafiɲɛbɔyɔrɔw cɛɲiw. Arabuw fana nana ni silamɛya ye jamanaw la, wa a ye siraba ta Komoro ni Mayotte. Erɔpu fanga ni koloniyali daminɛna san kɛmɛda 15nan na, iko Pɔrtigal ɲininikɛla Vasco da Gama ye Kapi sira sɔrɔ ka bɔ Erɔpu ka taa Ɛndujamana na.
question: Mun tɛ Afiriki kɔrɔnyanfan gun fitininw jogo dɔ ye?
mc_answer4: Yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya ka bɔ jamana wɛrɛw la

flores_passage: Laada dɔ bɛ yen ka Paki su kɛ ka kunun yɔrɔ dɔw la minnu bɛ kɛnɛ kan walasa ka tile bɔli ye. Tiɲɛ na, kerecɛnya diinɛko ɲɛfɔliw bɛ yen o laadalakow kan, nka a bɛ se ka kɛ kosɛbɛ ko a kɛra sani Krecɛnw ka Sɔgɔma ni Bange laada ye. Tuma caman na, laadala egilisi caman bɛ Paskɛ Lajɛ kɛ sibiridon su fɛ Paki dɔgɔkun laban na, jɛkuluw bɛ to ka seli daminɛ su tilancɛ waati la walasa ka Krisita lakununni seli kɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, Paki seli bɛ kɛ cogo di kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la laadala egilisi dɔw fɛ?
mc_answer3: Ka foroba ɲɛnajɛ dɔ kɛ jɛkulu ye

flores_passage: Ekuwatɔrɔ b’a ɲini Kuba jamanadenw fɛ u ka welesɛbɛn sɔrɔ sanni u ka don Ekuwatɔrɔ jamana kɔnɔ jamana wɛrɛw ka awiyɔnbonda walima dankan dondaw fɛ. Nin bataki ka kan ka kɛ sariya ye Ekuwatɔrɔ jamana kɔkankow minisiriso fɛ, ani ka sariya dɔw labato. O wajibiw dabɔra walasa ka mɔgɔw ka bɔnɔgɔla labɛnni kɛ jamana fila ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ. Kuba jamanaden minnu ye Ameriki ka karti jɛlenw ye, olu ka kan ka taa Ekuwatɔrɔ jamana ka lasigidenso dɔ la walasa ka bɔ o wajibi in na. I ka pasipɔri ka kan ka kɛ kalo 6 kɔnɔ ka tɛmɛ i ka taama donw kan. I ka kan ka taa ni segin/ka taa ɲɛfɛ walasa k’a jira ko i ka sigi waati janya.
question: Walasa ka i yɛrɛ tanga wajibi dɔw ma n’a bɛ don Ekuwatɔrɔ jamana kɔnɔ, Kuba jamanaden ka kan ka fɔlɔ ka mun sɔrɔ?
mc_answer1: Pasipɔri min bɛ baara kɛ kalo 6 kɔnɔ ka tɛmɛ taama donw kan
mc_answer3: Tiketi min bɛ taa ni segin ka na walasa ka sigiyɔrɔ janya jira

question: Ekuwatɔrɔ jamana ka taama wajibiyalenw ma dabɔ mun kama?
mc_answer2: Ka mɔgɔw ka bɔnɔgɔla taabolo labɛnnen mara
mc_answer3: Taamakɛla dɔ ka sigi waati janya dantigɛli

flores_passage: Ɲɛkisɛw bɛ se ka sɔngɔ dɔgɔya jamana wɛrɛ la, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la jamana minnu ka sɔrɔ man bon, baara musakaw ka dɔgɔ yɔrɔ minnu na. Aw bɛ a lajɛ ka ɲɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛ so kɔnɔ, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la ni asiransi bɛ o sara, ani ka na ni furasɛbɛn ye walasa ka bila yɔrɔ wɛrɛ la. Marka tɔgɔla-kalansenw minnu bɛ sɔrɔ o yɔrɔ suguw la, olu bɛ se ka gɛlɛya fila sɔrɔ; dɔw bɛ se ka kɛ knock-offs ye, ani minnu bɛ na ni u ye jamana wɛrɛw la lakikaw bɛ se ka kɛ sɔngɔ gɛlɛn ye ka tɛmɛ so kɔnɔ.

question: Farati jumɛn bɛ se ka kɛ ka ɲɛsin karamɔgɔw sanni ma minnu ka bon jamana wɛrɛ la?
mc_answer1: A bɛ se ka kɛ ko ɲɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli wɛrɛ ka kan ka kɛ
mc_answer2: Furakɛcogo bɛ se ka kɛ ko a tɛ se ka kɛ karamɔgɔ dɔw la
mc_answer3: U bɛ se ka kɛ nkalontigɛlaw ye
mc_answer4: N’a sɔrɔ asiransi tɛna o musaka sara

flores_passage: Falkland wari ofisiyali ye Falkland pound (FKP) ye min nafa sigilen don ka bɛn Angletɛri pound kelen (GBP) ma. Wari bɛ se ka ɲɔgɔn falen banki kelenpe la gunw kan min bɛ Stanley FIC West magasin kɛrɛfɛ. A ka c’a la, Angilɛw ka lira bɛna sɔn gunw yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ la ani Stanley ka kartiw kɔnɔ ani Ameriki dɔrɔmɛw fana bɛ sɔn tuma caman na. Gunw kɔkanna na, n’a sɔrɔla kartiw tɛna sɔn, hali ni tubabu ni Ameriki wari bɛ se ka ta; kɔn ka lajɛ ni tigiw ye walasa k’a dɔn wari saracogo min bɛ sɔn. A bɛ ɲini ka kɛ ko a tɛ se ka kɛ ka Falklands wari falen gunw kɔkan, o la wari ɲɔgɔn falen sani i ka bɔ gunw na.
question: Ka ɲɛsin wariko baara ma Falkland jamana na, nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn ye tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Kartiw ni tubabu wari dɔrɔn de bɛ sɔn gunw kan minnu bɛ kɛnɛma
mc_answer2: Stanley kelenpe de ye yɔrɔ ye min bɛna sɔn Ameriki dɔrɔmɛ ma
mc_answer3: Falkland kilo ka kan ka ɲɔgɔn falen-falen gunw bɔlen kɔfɛ
mc_answer4: Falkland pound kɔ fɛ, a ka c’a la, tubabu pound ye wari ye min bɛ sɔn ka caya

mc_answer3: Gunw minnu bɛ kɛnɛma, olu la

flores_passage: Alabatoso fanba bɛ San o San seli kɛ tiɲɛ na k’a daminɛ Nowanburukalo laban na ka taa a bila Mɛkalo cɛmancɛ la, o seli bɛ ɲɔgɔn ta ka kɛɲɛ ni batoso kelen-kelen bɛɛ ka san kalolabɔ ye. Alabatoso seli fanba bɛ kɛ batoso sankɔrɔta dɔ walima ala ɲɛmɔgɔ wolodon dɔ ye walima ko belebele wɛrɛ min bɛ tali kɛ batoso la. Kerala batoso seliw yecogo ka di kosɛbɛ, ni waraw masirilenw bɛ taa tuma bɛɛ, batoso dɔnkilidalakulu ani seli wɛrɛw.
question: Ko jumɛn tɛ tali kɛ Alabatosoba seliw seli la?
mc_answer4: Koba minnu bɛ kɛ Alabatoso ko la

flores_passage: Alabatoso fanba bɛ San o San seli kɛ tiɲɛ na k’a daminɛ Nowanburukalo laban na ka taa a bila Mɛkalo cɛmancɛ la, o seli bɛ ɲɔgɔn ta ka kɛɲɛ ni batoso kelen-kelen bɛɛ ka san kalolabɔ ye. question: Wolo masirilenw bɛ se ka ye min?
mc_answer1: Yɔrɔ bɛɛ la k’a ta Nowanburukalo laban na ka taa a bila mɛkalo cɛmancɛ la

flores_passage: Fɛn min jɛlen don ka pankurun ta fɔlɔ walima jagokɛyɔrɔ la, o ye ka wariba dɔ foroko bɔ o nɛɛma kama (walima, min ka fisa, k’a to i ka sosiyete k’o kɛ i ye). Nka, o tɛ na ni sɔngɔ gɛlɛn ye : i n’a fɔ sariya gɛlɛnw, i bɛ se k’a jira ko i bɛ se ka sɔrɔko musaka gansan siɲɛ naani sara jago siratigɛ la, ani siɲɛ tan ni kelen sara fɔlɔ la ! A ka c’a la, nafa foyi t’a la hali ka jiginɛw ɲini jagokɛlaw walima sigiyɔrɔ fɔlɔw la, bɛlɛn tilennenw na ka bɔ A ka taa B. Fɛɛrɛbɔlaw b’a dɔn kosɛbɛ ko awiyɔn bolilaw kulu jɔnjɔn dɔ bɛ yen minnu bɛ sɔn ka dɔrɔmɛ sanfɛla sara o nɛɛma kosɔn ka se yɔrɔ dɔ la joona ani ka lafiya sɔrɔ, ka charge (sara) ka kɛɲɛ n’o ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na, jumɛn de bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka wari mara jago walima awiyɔn bolicogo fɔlɔ la?
mc_answer1: Ka musaka kɛ a la i ka sosiyete sababu fɛ
mc_answer2: Booking first class sanni ka jago kɛ
mc_answer3: Ka bɛlɛn fɔlɔ min tɛ tilennen ye, o bilasira

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun bɛna kɛ waati tiɲɛni ye ka ɲinini kɛ ni i bɛ bolifɛn bolicogo dɔw bilasira?

flores_passage: Afiriki pankurunbolitɔnw i n’a fɔ Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines ye u ka baara caya kosɛbɛ Afiriki, ani ka ɲɔgɔnyew di Afiriki duguba caman ma ni sɔngɔ ye min bɛ se ka ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ ka tɛmɛ Erɔpu pankurunso tɔw kan. Turki Airlines bɛ pankurun ta ka taa yɔrɔ 39 la Afiriki jamana 30 kɔnɔ kabini san 2014. Ni taama waati wɛrɛ b’i bolo, i k’a lajɛ i ka pankurun bolicogo bɛɛ lajɛlen min bɛ taa Afiriki, o bɛ tali kɛ cogo min na ni diɲɛ fan bɛɛ ta ye. Aw kana ɲinɛ ka musaka wɛrɛw fara visa wɛrɛw kan, bɔli impositi, dugukolo kan bolifɛnw, a ɲɔgɔnnaw o yɔrɔw bɛɛ la Afiriki kɔkan.
question: Mun man kan ka fara a kan k’a sɔrɔ i bɛ sɔngɔ bɛɛ lajɛlen hakɛ suma ni Afiriki ye ni diɲɛ fan bɛɛ sara hakɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Visa wɛrɛw musakaw ye yɔrɔw la minnu tɛ Afiriki kɔkan
mc_answer4: Dugukolo kan bolifɛnw musakaw yɔrɔw la Afiriki kɔkan

flores_passage: ka c’a la, dumuni sanni sugubaw la, o de ye balo sɔrɔcogo ye min sɔngɔ ka dɔgɔ. Ni tobili kɛcogo tɛ yen, sugandili bɛ kɛ dumuni labɛnnenw dɔrɔn de la. Ka taa a fɛ, sugubatigiw bɛ ka dumuni labɛnnenw yɔrɔ suguya caman sɔrɔ. Dɔw yɛrɛ bɛ mikro walima fɛɛrɛ wɛrɛ di walasa ka dumuni sumaya. Jamana dɔw la walima magan sugu dɔw la, dumunikɛyɔrɔ kelen bɛ yen a dɔgɔyalenba la, a ka c’a la, dumunikɛyɔrɔ min tɛ labɛn ye kosɛbɛ, a sɔngɔ ka nɔgɔn.

mc_answer3: Restorana minnu bɛ o yɔrɔ la

mc_answer1: Restorana minnu bɛ o yɔrɔ la
mc_answer2: Sugandili min tɛ ɲɔgɔn ta kosɛbɛ

flores_passage: Faransikan suguya minnu bɛ Fɔ Bɛliziki ani Suwisi, olu ni Faransikan minnu bɛ Fɔ Faransi, olu tɛ kelen ye dɔɔnin, hali n’u bɛ Taa ɲɔgɔn fɛ fo u bɛ Se ka Faamu ɲɔgɔn fɛ. Kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, jatebla kɛcogo min bɛ Faransikanfɔlaw Bɛliziki ni Suwisi jamana na, danfara dɔɔnin dɔw bɛ yen minnu ni faransikan fɔcogo tɛ kelen ye Faransi, wa daɲɛ dɔw fɔcogo tɛ kelen ye dɔɔnin. O bɛɛ n’a ta, Bɛlizikikaw ni Suwisikaw bɛɛ tun bɛna faransikan fɔbagaw bɛɛ dege lakɔliso la, o la u tun bɛna se k’i faamu hali n’i tun bɛ baara kɛ ni Faransikan fɔcogo jɔnjɔn ye.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn bɛ se ka faamuya Faransikan fɔbagaw fɛ Bɛlizikikaw ni Suwisikaw fɛ?
mc_answer1: Faransikan nimɔrɔko siratigɛ la min bɛ kɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni sariya ye

question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ kelen ye Faransi ni Bɛliziki walima Suwisi jamana na?
mc_answer3: Faransikan jɔnjɔn min bɛ kalan lakɔlisow la

flores_passage: Avion baarakɛlaw damadɔ dɔrɔn de bɛ dusukasi wari di hali bi, o min bɛ dɔ bɔ dɔɔnin sudon taama musakaw la miniti laban na. Fɛnɲɛnɛma-tɔn minnu bɛ o fɛnw Di olu ye Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa ye bɛlɛnw na minnu bɛ Bɔ Ameriki walima Kanada, ani WestJet. O bɛɛ la, i ka kan ka jatebɔ kɛ telefɔni fɛ k’a ɲɛsin awiyɔn baarakɛlaw ma.
question: Ko jumɛn na, a ka c’a la, dusukasi wari tɛna di i ma?
mc_answer1: Ni aw bɛ pankurun ta WestJet
mc_answer2: N’i y’a ɲini ka jatebɔ kɛ k’a ɲɛsin awiyɔn baarakɛlaw ma sanni ka kɛ mɔgɔ sabanan ka baarakɛyɔrɔ ye
mc_answer3: Ni i bɛ Lufthansa pankurun ta ka bɔ Pari ka taa Ameriki
mc_answer4: Ni i bɛ ka pankurun ta Delta

mc_answer1: U bɛ sudon taama musakaw sara
mc_answer2: U ka kan ka bila awiyɔn baarakɛlaw ka siti kan k’a ɲɛsin u yɛrɛ ma
mc_answer3: U bɛ miniti laban taama musakaw sara

flores_passage: Baara kɛli ni GPS taamasiyɛn porogaramuw ye i ka telefɔni seleke naani kan, o bɛ se ka kɛ taamacogo nɔgɔman ye ani min ka nɔgɔn kosɛbɛ ni i bɔra i ka jamana na. A bɛ se ka wari bɔ ka tɛmɛn karti kura sanni kan GPS kama, walima GPS minɛn jɔlen walima ka dɔ jate mobili bolifɛnw feerela dɔ fɛ. Ni kunnafoni-falen-falen tɛ i ka telefɔni na, walima ni a tɛ yɔrɔ la, u ka baara bɛ se ka dan walima u tɛ se ka sɔrɔ.

mc_answer1: Ni i b'a ɲini ka wari mara
mc_answer2: Ni i dalen b'a la ko i bɛna data connection sɔrɔ
mc_answer3: Ni i bɛ taa bɔ i ka yɔrɔ la
mc_answer4: Ni i t’a fɛ ka minɛn dɔ jate

flores_passage: Galapagos yɔrɔw ni kungosogow yecogo ka fisa ni kurun ye, i n’a fɔ Charles Darwin y’a kɛ cogo min na san 1835. Kurun 60 ni kɔ bɛ Galapagos ji la - u bonya bɛ daminɛ mɔgɔ 8 la ka se mɔgɔ 100 ma. Mɔgɔ fanba bɛ kɔn k’u ka yɔrɔ sɛbɛn kosɛbɛ (i n’a fɔ a ka c’a la, kurunw bɛ fa waatiba la). Aw ye aw jija ka a lajɛ ni ciden min sababu fɛ aw bɛ gafe sɔrɔ, o ye Galapagos kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen ye min bɛ kurun suguya caman dɔn kosɛbɛ. O bɛna a to i ka nafa kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw ani/walima i ka gɛlɛyaw bɛ bɛn kurun ma min bɛnnen don u ma kosɛbɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, i bɛ se k’a jira cogo di ko i bɛ bɛn kurun bɛnnen dɔ ma?
mc_answer1: Jatebɔ kɛli mɔgɔ 8+ kulu dɔ kɔnɔ minnu ka nafaw bɛ ɲɔgɔn ta
mc_answer3: Jatebɔ kɛli ni ciden dɔ ye min ka baara ɲɛsinnen bɛ Galapagos taama ma
mc_answer4: Jatebɔ kɛli ka kɔn o ɲɛ kosɛbɛ

flores_passage: "Diɲɛ yɔrɔ caman na, bolonɔbila ye teriya ye, min bɛ ""bonjour" jira ka ɲɛsin farikolo ma, o ye taamasiyɛn ye min bɛ kɛ tilebin jamana dɔw la, wa a ka kan ka kɛ o kun dɔrɔn de kama O cogo kelen na, tubabu taamakɛla min bɛ Ɛsipaɲi, o bɛ se ka fili ka foli kɛ ni bolokɔfɛfɛn ye min ɲɛsinnen bɛ jiginni ma (sanni a ka kɛ mɔgɔ ye min bɛ wuli). i n'a fɔ taamasiyɛn min bɛ kɛ walasa ka segin."

flores_passage: Glaciers tɛ sabati, nka u bɛ woyo ka jigin kulu la. O bɛna kɛ sababu ye ka faraw, kariw, minnu bɛ se ka datugu ni nɛnɛ bɔgɔlanw ye. Jikuruw kogow ni u sanfɛla bɛ se ka bin ani faraw bɛ se ka datugu. Glaciers da la, bloki belebelebaw bɛ kari, ka bin duguma ani laala u bɛ pan walima ka girin ka taa yɔrɔ jan ka bɔ da la.

flores_passage: Goma ye turisimu dugu ye Kongo Demokaratiki jamana kɔrɔn fɛ kosɛbɛ Rwanda kɛrɛfɛ. San 2002 Goma tiɲɛna ni lava ye min bɔra Nyiragongo tasuma-fanga la min ye dugu nbɛdaw fanba su don, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la dugu cɛmancɛ. Hali ni Goma lakananen don kosɛbɛ, taama o taama bɛ kɛ Goma kɔkan, o ka kan ka sɛgɛsɛgɛ walasa ka kɛlɛ min bɛ senna Kivu woroduguyanfan mara la, o cogoya faamuya. Dugu fana ye Nyiragongo tasuma-fanga jiginni jɔyɔrɔ ye ka fara kulu Gorila nɔfɛtaama sɔngɔ gɛlɛn dɔw kan Afiriki kɔnɔ. I bɛ se ka baara kɛ ni boda-boda (moto takisi) ye walasa ka Goma lamini. A sɔngɔ nɔrɔlen (sigida) ye ~500 Kongo Fransi ye taama surun in na.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, taamakɛlaw ka kan ka fɛɛrɛ wɛrɛw tigɛ sani u ka taa yɔrɔ jumɛn na?

question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛna kɛ laadilikan ɲuman ye turisiw bolo Goma?
mc_answer1: Kɛlɛ minnu bɛ kɛ Kivu woroduguyanfan fɛ, olu bɛ mɔgɔ ɲɛnajɛ
mc_answer2: ye yɔrɔ ɲuman ye Mountain Gorilla Tracking sɔngɔ gɛlɛn na
mc_answer3: Moto takisiw ye taamacogo ɲuman ye
mc_answer4: Nyiragongo tasuma-fanga dabɔyɔrɔ bɛ dugu kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Kanpaɲi o kanpaɲi bɛ rim jukɔrɔ Grand Canyon, o ka kan ka kɛ ni kɔkanna permis ye. Permis dan ye walasa ka kanjon lakana, wa u bɛ sɔrɔ kalo tile fɔlɔ la, kalo naani ka kɔn kalo daminɛ ɲɛ. O la, kɔkanna permis min bɛ sɔrɔ mɛkalo daminɛ don o don na, o bɛ sɔrɔ Zanwuyekalo tile 1. Yɔrɔ minnu bɛ kɛ yɔrɔ minnu ka di kosɛbɛ, i n’a fɔ Bright Angel Campground min bɛ Phantom Ranch kɛrɛfɛ, a ka c’a la, olu bɛ fa ni ɲininiw ye minnu sɔrɔla don fɔlɔ la u dabɔra yɔrɔ minnu na . Permis hakɛ danmadɔw bɛ yen minnu bilalen bɛ taama-taama ɲininiw kama, minnu bɛ sɔrɔ mɔgɔ fɔlɔ ka na, mɔgɔ fɔlɔ min bɛ na.

mc_answer1: Permis (sɛbɛn) min bɛ kɛ ka ɲɛsin mɔgɔ fɔlɔ ma, min bɛ baara kɛ fɔlɔ

flores_passage: Lotɛli dɔw ka ciyɛn bɔra nɛgɛso ni kɔgɔjila nɛgɛso sanu waati la; sanni diɲɛ kɛlɛba filanan ka kɛ, san kɛmɛ 19nan walima san kɛmɛ 20nan daminɛ na. O lotɛli ninnu tun ye tile nafolotigiw ni tɔgɔbatigiw tun bɛ sigi yɔrɔ minnu na, wa tuma caman na, dumunikɛyɔrɔ ɲumanw ni sufɛ ɲɛnamaya tun bɛ yen. Fitini kɔrɔw, fɛn kuraw dɛsɛ, ani kɔrɔya cɛɲi dɔ fana ye u jogo dɔ ye. Hali n’a ka c’a la, u bɛ kɛ mɔgɔ kelen-kelen ta ye, tuma dɔw la, u bɛ jamana ɲɛmɔgɔw ni mɔgɔba wɛrɛw ladon minnu bɛ na bɔ u ye. Taamakɛla min ka wari caman bɛ a bolo, o bɛ se ka jateminɛ kɛ awiyɔn boli la ka diɲɛ fan bɛɛ lajɛ, min tiɲɛna ni sigili ye o lotɛli caman kɔnɔ.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ka teli ka sɔrɔ lotɛli suguya minnu ɲɛfɔlen don tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ?
mc_answer2: Restoranɛ duman dɔ min bɛ o yɔrɔ la
mc_answer3: Dunanɲɔgɔn minnu bɛ dɔn kosɛbɛ walima minnu bɛ dɔn
mc_answer4: So minnu labɛnna kɔsa in na ni bi fɛnw ye minnu sɛmɛntiyalen don

question: Ka da kunnafoniw kan minnu jirala tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, nin fɛn ninnu na, lotɛli dunanw tɛna minnu bila jɔyɔrɔ fɔlɔ la kosɛbɛ?
mc_answer1: Fɛn kɔrɔw bɛ yɔrɔ bɛɛ la
mc_answer2: Restoranɛ min kɔnɔ, dumunikɛla ŋana dɔ bɛ yen
mc_answer3: Lafiɲɛbɔyɔrɔ min bɛ ɲɛnajɛ kɛ su o su
mc_answer4: So sɔngɔw bɛ se ka sɔrɔ

flores_passage: "Kɔgɔji jukɔrɔ fibre optique kabɔri minnu bɛ Erɔpu jamanaw cɛ ani sateliti la, Gronland bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ kosɛbɛ ni jamanaden 93% ye minnu bɛ ɛntɛrinɛti sɔrɔ. I ka lotɛli walima i ka jatigiw (n’i sigilen bɛ dunanw ka so walima mɔgɔ kelen ka so kɔnɔ) a ka c’a la, wifi walima ɛntɛrinɛti bɛna don u bolo."(Alimankan na) PC, ani sigida bɛɛ bɛ ni ɛntɛrinɛti kafe ye walima yɔrɔ dɔ ni foroba wifi bɛ yen I n'a fɔ a fɔra cogo min na sanfɛ, hali ni daɲɛ ""Eskimo"" bɛ to ka sɔn Ameriki, a bɛ jate mɔgɔ caman fɛ minnu tɛ Ameriki ye Artik jamanaw na, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la Kanada . Hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ i bɛ se ka daɲɛ min mɛn Gronland dugumɔgɔw fɛ, o ka kan k’i yɛrɛ tanga dunanw ma Gronland dugumɔgɔw b’u yɛrɛ wele ko Inuit Canada ani Kalaalleq (Kalaala), Gronland jamanaden, Juguya dunanw caman na, a bɛ fɔ ko a tɛ dɔn Gronland jamana na, hali dugubaw kɔnɔ, ""yɔrɔ gɛlɛnw" tɛ yen worodugu fɛ i bɛ taa, nɛnɛ bɛna kɛ cogo min na), a nafa ka bon ka na ni fini sumalenw ye. Tile janba minnu bɛ kɛ samiyɛ fɛ, olu bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka gɛlɛyaw lase mɔgɔ ma sunɔgɔ bɛrɛbɛrɛ sɔrɔli la ani kɛnɛyako minnu bɛ tali kɛ o la. Samiya waati, aw ye aw janto Nordik sosow fana na. Hali n’u tɛ bana si lase mɔgɔ ma, u bɛ se ka mɔgɔ dimi."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, taamakɛlaw minnu bɛ taa Gronland jamana na, olu ka kan ka u yɛrɛ tanga mun ma?
mc_answer1: Yɔrɔ dɔw minnu lakodɔnnen don kojugubakɛlaw ka caya la
mc_answer2: Ka na ni fini girinmanw ye, bawo a ka c’a la, waati bɛ sumaya san bɛɛ kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Jigiya ka baara kɛ k’a sɔrɔ yen, bawo ɛntɛrinɛti jɛɲɔgɔnya bɛ se ka kɛ yɔrɔnin kelen ye
mc_answer4: Ka Gronland dugutigi dɔ kofɔ ko “Eskimo” .

flores_passage: "Kɔgɔji jukɔrɔ fibre optique kabɔri minnu bɛ Erɔpu jamanaw cɛ ani sateliti la, Gronland bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ kosɛbɛ ni jamanaden 93% ye minnu bɛ ɛntɛrinɛti sɔrɔ. I ka lotɛli walima i ka jatigiw (n’i sigilen bɛ dunanw ka so walima mɔgɔ kelen ka so kɔnɔ) a ka c’a la, wifi walima ɛntɛrinɛti bɛna don u bolo."(Alimankan na) PC, ani sigida bɛɛ bɛ ni ɛntɛrinɛti kafe ye walima yɔrɔ dɔ ni foroba wifi bɛ yen I n'a fɔ a fɔra cogo min na sanfɛ, hali ni daɲɛ ""Eskimo"" bɛ to ka sɔn Ameriki, a bɛ jate mɔgɔ caman fɛ minnu tɛ Ameriki ye Artik jamanaw na, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la Kanada . Hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ i bɛ se ka daɲɛ min mɛn Gronland dugumɔgɔw fɛ, o ka kan k’i yɛrɛ tanga dunanw ma Gronland dugumɔgɔw b’u yɛrɛ wele ko Inuit Canada ani Kalaalleq (Kalaala), Gronland jamanaden, Juguya dunanw caman na, a bɛ fɔ ko a tɛ dɔn Gronland jamana na, hali dugubaw kɔnɔ, ""yɔrɔ gɛlɛnw" tɛ yen worodugu fɛ i bɛ taa, nɛnɛ bɛna kɛ cogo min na), a nafa ka bon ka na ni fini sumalenw ye. Tile janba minnu bɛ kɛ samiyɛ fɛ, olu bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka gɛlɛyaw lase mɔgɔ ma sunɔgɔ bɛrɛbɛrɛ sɔrɔli la ani kɛnɛyako minnu bɛ tali kɛ o la. Samiya waati, aw ye aw janto Nordik sosow fana na. Hali n’u tɛ bana si lase mɔgɔ ma, u bɛ se ka mɔgɔ dimi."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na, jumɛn de ka teli ka kɛ gɛlɛya ye taamakɛlaw bolo minnu ma labɛn ka taa bɔ Gronland?

flores_passage: Jardín de la Unión ye baara kɛ. O yɔrɔ in jɔra ka kɛ san kɛmɛ 17nan ka kɔɲɔso dɔ ka ɲɛnajɛyɔrɔ ye, min kɔnɔ Templo de San Diego kelenpe de ye boon ye min bɛ balo la. Sisan a bɛ baara kɛ i n’a fɔ cɛmancɛ kɛnɛba, wa fɛn caman bɛ kɛ tuma bɛɛ, su ni tile. Restoranɛ damadɔ bɛ nakɔ in lamini, wa wulada fɛ ni wula fɛ yen, fɔlifɛnw bɛ kɛ yen tuma caman na ka bɔ cɛmancɛ gazebo la. Callejon del Beso (Nɛgɛso min bɛ kɛ ni susuli ye). Balkɔni fila minnu ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ ye santimɛtɛrɛ 69 dɔrɔn ye, o ye kanuya nsiirin kɔrɔ dɔ sigiyɔrɔ ye. Ni warimisɛn damadɔ ye, denmisɛn dɔw bɛna o maana fɔ i ye.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn bɛ kɛ sisan cɛmancɛ kɛnɛba ye?
mc_answer1: Jardín de la Unión ye baara kɛ
mc_answer3: Templo de San Diego ka baarakɛyɔrɔ
mc_answer4: Callejon del Beso ye dugu ye

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn tɛ sɔrɔ Jardín de la Unión kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Gazebo cɛmancɛ dɔ ni kɔnsɛriw bɛ yen
mc_answer2: Kanuya maana kɔrɔ dɔ ka so
mc_answer3: Restoranɛ minnu ɲɛsinnen bɛ nakɔ ma

flores_passage: Taama ye kɛnɛyako ye min bɛ Kɛ ni taama ye sigida laminiw na, a ka c’a la taama siraw kan. Tile taama bɛ Kɛ ni yɔrɔjanw ye minnu tɛ kilomɛtɛrɛ kelen Bɔ fo ka Se yɔrɔ janw ma minnu bɛ Se ka Kɛ tile kelen kɔnɔ. Walasa ka tile kelen taama kɛ sira nɔgɔman kan, labɛn fitininw de ka kan ka kɛ, wa mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ farikolo ka ɲi kosɛbɛ, o tigi bɛ se k’u diyabɔ. Denmisɛn fitininw bɛ denbaya minnu kɔnɔ, olu mago bɛ se ka labɛn caman kɛ, nka tile kelen kɛnɛma bɛ se ka kɛ nɔgɔya la hali ni denmisɛnw ni denmisɛnninw ma minnu ma se lakɔli la.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, nin kuma minnu fɔra tile taama ko la, jumɛn bɛna jate ko tiɲɛ tɛ?
mc_answer1: Labɛn dɔɔnin man kan ka kɛ tile taamaw kama sira nɔgɔmanw kan
mc_answer2: Yɔrɔjanw tɛ kelen ye, nka u dabɔra ka tɛmɛ tile kelen kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Mɔgɔ minnu ka farikoloɲɛnajɛ hakɛ bɛ dantɛmɛ, a ka c’a la, olu bɛ se ka nin baara in diyabɔ
mc_answer4: Tile taama tɛ kɛnɛyako bɛnnen ye denw bɛ denbayaw kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Taama ye kɛnɛyako ye min bɛ Kɛ ni taama ye sigida laminiw na, a ka c’a la taama siraw kan. Tile taama bɛ Kɛ ni yɔrɔjanw ye minnu tɛ kilomɛtɛrɛ kelen Bɔ fo ka Se yɔrɔ janw ma minnu bɛ Se ka Kɛ tile kelen kɔnɔ. Denmisɛn fitininw bɛ denbaya minnu kɔnɔ, olu mago bɛ se ka labɛn caman kɛ, nka tile kelen kɛnɛma bɛ se ka kɛ nɔgɔya la hali ni denmisɛnw ni denmisɛnninw ma minnu ma se lakɔli la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, tuma jumɛn na tile taama bɛ labɛn fitininba de wajibiya?
mc_answer1: Ni taamakɛla farikolo bɛ kɛnɛya la
mc_answer2: Ni a bɛ tali kɛ sira nɔgɔman dɔ la
mc_answer3: Ni denmisɛnw bɛ taa taama na
mc_answer4: Ni taama in bɛ sigida la min ka bon kosɛbɛ

flores_passage: "Minnu bɛ Norvege jamana na, olu ye fjords ni kɔw ye minnu bɛ barika di yɔrɔ janba dɔ ma, ka caya walima ka dɔgɔya hali plateau. O plateau ninnu bɛ wele tuma caman na ko ""vidde"" kɔrɔ ye yɔrɔba ye, yɔrɔ min dabɔlen don, jiri tɛ min na, yɔrɔ min dan tɛ. Rogaland ani Agder u bɛ Weele tuma caman na ko ""hei"" kɔrɔ ye ko jiri tɛ min na, a ka teli ka datugu ni hɛrɛ ye."
question: Mun bɛ danfara don Rogaland walima Agder dugukoloyɔrɔw la ni i y’a suma ni Norvege jamana tɔ ye?
mc_answer3: Dugukolo-yɔrɔw fanba ye hali kelen ye
mc_answer4: Tuma caman na, u bɛ datugu ni hɛɛrɛ ye

flores_passage: "Minnu bɛ Norvege jamana na, olu ye fjords ni kɔw ye minnu bɛ barika di yɔrɔ janba dɔ ma, ka caya walima ka dɔgɔya hali plateau. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn tɛna kɛ Norvege jamana ka ko ye?

flores_passage: Turisidi waati min bɛ kuluw jɔyɔrɔw la, a ka c’a la, o bɛ Se a dan na Ɛnduw ka samiyɛ waati. Nka, u cɛɲi ni u ka cɛɲi suguya wɛrɛ bɛ u la nɛnɛ waati, kuluyɔrɔ caman bɛ nɛnɛ hakɛ kɛnɛmanw sɔrɔ ani ka baara dɔw kɛ i n’a fɔ ski ni snowboard.
question: Turisi minnu b’a fɛ ka ski kɛ, olu ka kan ka taa kuluw jɔyɔrɔw la tuma jumɛn?
mc_answer2: Waati min na mɔgɔw ka ca kosɛbɛ

flores_passage: Turisidi waati min bɛ kuluw jɔyɔrɔw la, a ka c’a la, o bɛ Se a dan na Ɛnduw ka samiyɛ waati. Nka, u cɛɲi ni u ka cɛɲi suguya wɛrɛ bɛ u la nɛnɛ waati, kuluyɔrɔ caman bɛ nɛnɛ hakɛ kɛnɛmanw sɔrɔ ani ka baara dɔw kɛ i n’a fɔ ski ni snowboard.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, tuma jumɛn na a ka c’a la, turisiw ka ca kuluyɔrɔw la?

flores_passage: Aw ye aw hakili to a la ko ni aw ye kurunbonkarilaw gosi dɔrɔn, fɛn bɛɛ bɛna jɛya kosɛbɛ. Aw bɛna kurun bolila tɔw kunbɛn ani u bɛna u ka kunnafoniw di aw ma. A jɔnjɔn na i bɛna kunnafoniw bila minnu b’i ka dɛmɛ jira, ka kurunbonkarilaw taama, ka gɛrɛ mɔgɔw la minnu bɛ u ka kurunw saniya, k’a ɲini ka jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ ni kurunbolilaw ye barokɛyɔrɔ la, a ɲɔgɔnnaw A ɲini ka kuma mɔgɔ caman fɛ. Waati dɔ tɛmɛnen kɔfɛ bɛɛ bɛna i dɔn, wa u bɛna hakilinaw di i ma kurun jumɛn bɛ mɔgɔ ɲini.
question: I ka kan k’i yɛrɛ tanga mun kɛli ma ni i jigi b’a kan ka kurun dɔ sɔrɔ min bɛ dɛmɛ ɲini?
mc_answer1: Taama kɛli sanfɛ ka jigin kurunboli yɔrɔw la
mc_answer3: Piblisite kɛli i ka baarakɛminɛnw na
mc_answer4: Ka i janto i jɛɲɔgɔnw la minnu bɛ kurun bolila

flores_passage: Aw ye aw hakili to a la ko ni aw ye kurunbonkarilaw gosi dɔrɔn, fɛn bɛɛ bɛna jɛya kosɛbɛ. Aw bɛna kurun bolila tɔw kunbɛn ani u bɛna u ka kunnafoniw di aw ma. A jɔnjɔn na i bɛna kunnafoniw bila minnu b’i ka dɛmɛ jira, ka kurunbonkarilaw taama, ka gɛrɛ mɔgɔw la minnu bɛ u ka kurunw saniya, k’a ɲini ka jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ ni kurunbolilaw ye barokɛyɔrɔ la, a ɲɔgɔnnaw A ɲini ka kuma mɔgɔ caman fɛ. question: Aw ka kan ka mun kɛ kurunbonkarilaw lamini na ni aw bɛ kurun ɲini min mago bɛ dɛmɛ na?
mc_answer1: Aw ye jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ ni kurunbolilaw ye
mc_answer3: Aw bɛ gɛrɛ mɔgɔw la dɔrɔn k’a sɔrɔ u bɛ u ka kurunba saniya
mc_answer4: Aw ye aw yɛrɛ tanga aw ka bolifɛnw boliɲɔgɔnw ma

flores_passage: Hong Kong gun bɛ Hong Kong mara tɔgɔ di a ma ani a ye yɔrɔ ye turisi caman bɛ min jate u ɲɛmajɔyɔrɔba ye. Sow ka parade min bɛ Hɔnkɔn sanfɛla kɛ, o sumalen don ni bar chart ye min bɛ manamana, min bɛ ye Victoria Harbour ji sɔrɔli fɛ. Walasa ka Hɔnkɔn yecogo ɲumanw sɔrɔ, i bɛ bɔ gun in na ka taa Kowloon jida la min bɛ a kɛrɛfɛ. Hong Kong gun dugu yiriwali fanba falen bɛ dugukolo laseginlen kan woroduguyanfan kɔgɔjida la. Tubabu jamanatigiw ye yɔrɔ min ta k’a kɛ u yɛrɛ ta ye nin ye o la n’i bɛ dalilu ɲini jamana in ka koloniyali tɛmɛnenw kan, nin ye daminɛyɔrɔ ɲuman ye.
question: Yɔrɔ jumɛn bɛna diya turisi ye min b’a fɛ ka gun in ka koloniya tariku dɔn?

flores_passage: Hong Kong gun bɛ Hong Kong mara tɔgɔ di a ma ani a ye yɔrɔ ye turisi caman bɛ min jate u ɲɛmajɔyɔrɔba ye. question: Yɔrɔ jumɛn bɛna diya turisi ye min bɛ yecogo kabakomaw bila jɔyɔrɔ fɔlɔ la?

flores_passage: Stirrups ye sotigi senw dɛmɛnanw ye minnu bɛ jɛngɛ ka jigin sɛgɛnlafiɲɛbɔlan fan fila bɛɛ la. U bɛ sabatiliba di sotigi ma nka lakana hami bɛ se ka kɛ u la k’a sababu kɛ bolibaga senw bɛ se ka nɔrɔ u la. Ni sotigi dɔ filila ka bɔ sow la nka a sen minɛna jirisunba la, u bɛ se ka sama ni so bolila. Walasa ka o farati dɔgɔya, lakana fɛɛrɛ damadɔ bɛ se ka kɛ. A fɔlɔ, sotigi fanba bɛ bolifɛnw don minnu sennasanbara don ani u senkɔniw bɛ nɔgɔya, minnu ka surun kosɛbɛ. O kɔfɛ, sɛgɛnlafiɲɛbɔlan dɔw, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la tubabukanw, lakanalanw bɛ u la minnu b’a to sɛgɛnlafiɲɛbɔlan dɔ bɛ bin ka bɔ sɛgɛnlafiɲɛbɔlan kan ni bolibaga min bɛ bin, o y’a sama ka segin kɔfɛ.
question: Mun bɛ ni sɛgɛnlafiɲɛbɔlan dɔw ye minnu bɛ dɛmɛ ka sotigi sen minɛ sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛ farati dɔgɔya?
mc_answer3: Stiriw minnu bɛ kɛ ni wuluwulu ye

flores_passage: Stirrups ye sotigi senw dɛmɛnanw ye minnu bɛ jɛngɛ ka jigin sɛgɛnlafiɲɛbɔlan fan fila bɛɛ la. question: Sotigi-buti yɔrɔ jumɛn bɛ dɛmɛ ka dɔ fara sotigi ka lakana kan ni a bɛ baara kɛ ni sɔgɔlanw ye?
mc_answer1: A senkɔni gɛlɛn, a ka surun

flores_passage: Jatigila ɲɔgɔnyeso ye jɛkulu ye min bɛ taamakɛlaw ni sigidamɔgɔw cɛsiri u bɛ taa dugu minnu na. A ka c’a la, ka don o rezo sugu la, o bɛ ɲini dɔrɔn ka ɛntɛrinɛti sɛbɛn dɔ dafa; hali ni rezo dɔw bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli wɛrɛw di walima u b’a ɲini u fɛ. O kɔfɛ, jatigila minnu bɛ sɔrɔ, olu tɔgɔw sɛbɛnnen bɛ di sɛbɛnw kɔnɔ ani/walima ɛntɛrinɛti kan, tuma dɔw la, taamakɛla wɛrɛw ka kunnafoniw ni seginnkanniw bɛ di u ma. Couchsurfing sigira senkan san 2004 Zanwuyekalo la, ɔridinatɛri porogaramukɛla Casey Fenton ye bɛlɛn sɔngɔ gɛlɛn sɔrɔlen kɔfɛ ka taa Islande nka a tun tɛ sigiyɔrɔ sɔrɔ. A ye bataki ci kalandenw ma sigida inivɛrisite la, wa a ye fɛn caman sɔrɔ ka ɲɛsin siyɔrɔ fu ma.
question: Mun bɛ di taamakɛlaw ma jatigila ɲɔgɔn falen-falen siraw fɛ?
mc_answer3: Tours minnu bɛ kɛ sigida ɲɛjirabagaw fɛ
mc_answer4: Jɛɲɔgɔnya ni taamakɛla tɔw ye minnu bɛ taa o yɔrɔ kelen na

flores_passage: Jatigila ɲɔgɔnyeso ye jɛkulu ye min bɛ taamakɛlaw ni sigidamɔgɔw cɛsiri u bɛ taa dugu minnu na. A ka c’a la, ka don o rezo sugu la, o bɛ ɲini dɔrɔn ka ɛntɛrinɛti sɛbɛn dɔ dafa; hali ni rezo dɔw bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli wɛrɛw di walima u b’a ɲini u fɛ. Couchsurfing sigira senkan san 2004 Zanwuyekalo la, ɔridinatɛri porogaramukɛla Casey Fenton ye bɛlɛn sɔngɔ gɛlɛn sɔrɔlen kɔfɛ ka taa Islande nka a tun tɛ sigiyɔrɔ sɔrɔ. A ye bataki ci kalandenw ma sigida inivɛrisite la, wa a ye fɛn caman sɔrɔ ka ɲɛsin siyɔrɔ fu ma.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, nin kuma minnu fɔra ka ɲɛsin jatigila ɲɔgɔn falen-falen siraw ma, jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Tuma bɛɛ, taamasiyɛnw bɛ di taamakɛlaw ma sigida jatigiw kan
mc_answer2: Rezo dɔw bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka taamakɛlaw ka sɛgɛsɛgɛli wɛrɛw kɛ
mc_answer3: Jatigila minnu bɛ sɔrɔ dugu kɔnɔ, olu tɔgɔw bɛna di taamakɛlaw ma
mc_answer4: Sigida jatigiw ka seginnkanniw bɛ sɔrɔ tuma dɔw la taamakɛlaw fɛ

flores_passage: Jatigila bɛ funankɛninw de dɛmɛ fɔlɔ – dunan gansan bɛ san mugan bɔ – nka tuma caman na, i bɛ se ka taamakɛla kɔrɔbaw sɔrɔ yen fana. Denmisɛnw bɛ denbaya minnu kɔnɔ, olu man teli ka ye, nka jatigila dɔw b’a to u ka don mɔgɔ kelen-kelen ka so kɔnɔ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, dunan sugu jumɛn ka teli ka sɔrɔ jatigila so jɛlen kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Dunan min si bɛ san mugan daminɛ na
mc_answer2: Dunan dɔ bɛ taama a kelen na
mc_answer3: Dunan min bɛ taama ni denmisɛnnin fitininw ye
mc_answer4: Dunan min si bɛ san bisaba cɛmancɛ la

flores_passage: Jatigila bɛ funankɛninw de dɛmɛ fɔlɔ – dunan gansan bɛ san mugan bɔ – nka tuma caman na, i bɛ se ka taamakɛla kɔrɔbaw sɔrɔ yen fana. Denmisɛnw bɛ denbaya minnu kɔnɔ, olu man teli ka ye, nka jatigila dɔw b’a to u ka don mɔgɔ kelen-kelen ka so kɔnɔ.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, jɔn de ka teli ka to jatigila la?

mc_answer2: San 22 denmisɛn saba bɛ taama ɲɔgɔn fɛ
mc_answer3: Furuɲɔgɔnma dɔ min si bɛ san 70 la
mc_answer4: Denbaya fila bɛ taa taama na n’u denw ye

flores_passage: Ni gun 17.000 bɛ yen i bɛ se ka minnu sugandi, Ɛndonezi dumuni ye parasol daɲɛ ye min bɛ mara dumuni suguya caman ɲɛfɔ minnu bɛ sɔrɔ jamana fan bɛɛ la. Fɔlɔ la, Smirna dugu kɔrɔ tun don, sisan a kɛra bi jagokɛyɔrɔ ye, min yiriwara, ani min falen bɛ mɔgɔw la, a sigilen bɛ bajiba dɔ lamini na ani kuluw y’a lamini. flores_passage: Jerusalɛm ye Israɛl faaba ani duguba ye, hali ni jamana tɔw fanba ani Duniya Kelenyatɔnba ma sɔn a ma ko Israɛl ka faaba. Dugu kɔrɔ min bɛ Jude kuluw kan, tariku bɛ mɔgɔ ɲɛnajɛ, a bɛ san ba caman bɔ. Dugu in ye senu ye Ala kelenpe diinɛ saba bolo - Yahutu diinɛ, kerecɛnya ani silamɛya, ani a bɛ kɛ hakilimaya, diinɛ ani laadala yɔrɔ ye. Dugu in nafa ka bon diinɛko la, ani kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la Dugu Kɔrɔ sigida yɔrɔ caman, Jerusalɛm ye turisimu yɔrɔba dɔ ye Israɛl. Tariku, fɛnkɔrɔw ani laadala yɔrɔ caman bɛ Jerusalɛm, ka fara sannikɛyɔrɔw, kafew ani dumunikɛyɔrɔw kan minnu ɲɛnama don ani minnu falen bɛ mɔgɔw la.

mc_answer2: A jɔyɔrɔ min ye Israɛl ka faaba ye
mc_answer4: Tariku yɔrɔ caman minnu bɛ yen

flores_passage: Kruger National Park (KNP) bɛ Afiriki Saheli worodugu-kɔrɔn ani a bɛ boli Mozanbiki dankan kɔrɔn fɛ, Zimbabwe worodugu fɛ, ani saheli dancɛ ye Crocodile baji ye. Nakɔ in bɛ kilomɛtɛrɛ 19500 bɔ, wa a tilalen don ekozoni 14 na, minnu kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ kungosogo suguya wɛrɛw dɛmɛ. A ye Afiriki tilebinyanfan ka ɲɛnajɛyɔrɔba dɔ ye ani a jatera Afiriki tilebinyanfan jamana nakɔsɛnɛyɔrɔw (SANParks) ka darapo ye. I n’a fɔ a bɛ kɛ cogo min na Afiriki tilebinyanfan jamana nakɔsɛnɛyɔrɔw bɛɛ la, don o don nakɔ in lakanani ni donko sara bɛ kɛ. A bɛ se ka kɛ fana ko nafa bɛ mɔgɔ la ka Wild Card san, o min bɛ don di Afiriki tilebinyanfan nakɔsɛnɛyɔrɔ sugandilenw ma walima Afiriki tilebinyanfan jamana nakɔsɛnɛyɔrɔw bɛɛ la.

Kɔlɔn fitinin dɔ bɛ a sanfɛla kɛrɛfɛ min ka kan ka tɛmɛ, a ka dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ wa a bɛ sɔgɔsɔgɔ dɔɔnin.
question: Nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn tɛ Machu Picchu kulu jiginni jira ka ɲɛ, min ɲɛfɔlen bɛ tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Hali jiginnikɛla minnu bɛ se kosɛbɛ, a ka c’a la, u ninakili bɛna bɔ
mc_answer2: Bololabaarakɛlaw tɛ yen yɔrɔw bɛɛ la minnu ka jan
mc_answer3: I ka kan ka tɛmɛ kɔdingɛ dɔ fɛ min bɛ sanfɛ
mc_answer4: Yɔrɔ minnu ka jan, olu bɛ kɛ farati ye ni u ɲiginnen don

flores_passage: Majorca dumuniw, i n’a fɔ yɔrɔ minnu bɛ bɔ ɲɔgɔn na Mediterane kɔgɔji la, olu bɛ bɔ buru, nakɔfɛnw ani sogo de la (kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la donsokɛ sogo), wa a bɛ kɛ ni oliviyetulu ye a bɛɛ la. Sufɛdumuni nɔgɔman min bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la samiyɛ waati, o ye Pa amb Oli ye: Buru ni oliviyetulu, tomati, ani fɛn o fɛn bɛ sɔrɔ i n’a fɔ foromazi, tunafish, a ɲɔgɔnnaw.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn tɛ Majorque dumuni nafamaba ye?

flores_passage: Hangi Dumuni dɔ bɛ tobi dingɛ funteniman dɔ kɔnɔ duguma. Dingɛ bɛ sumaya ni kabakurun funtenimanw ye minnu bɛ bɔ tasuma na, walima yɔrɔ dɔw la, dugukolo funteni bɛ dugukolo yɔrɔw kɛ funteni ye u yɛrɛ la. A ka c’a la, hangi bɛ kɛ ka laadala dumuni tobilen tobi. Yɔrɔ caman bɛ Rotorua, jisuma hangi bɛ dilan, ka sɔrɔ hangi wɛrɛw bɛ se ka lajɛ Christchurch, Wellington ani yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la.
question: Ka da kunnafoniw kan minnu bɛ tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, kuma jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye hangi dumuniw kan?
mc_answer1: Geothermal hangi bɛ baara kɛ ni kabakurun funtenimanw ye minnu bɛ bɔ tasuma na walasa ka dingɛ sumaya
mc_answer2: Hangi min bɛ baara kɛ ni kabakurun funtenimanw ye, o bɛ sɔrɔ Welington
mc_answer3: Tuma caman na, sufɛdumuni tobilenw bɛ tobi ni hangi ye
mc_answer4: Dugukolo-yɔrɔ-hangi bɛ Se ka Sɔrɔ Rotorua

question: Ninnu la jumɛn ma fɔ i n’a fɔ hangi dingɛ sumayacogo danma?

flores_passage: Ni musow bɛ taa bɔ mɔnikɛyɔrɔw la, u ka kan ka finiw don minnu bɛ gɛnɛgɛnɛw datugu ani k’u kamankunw datugu, olu fana. Monasteri fanba bɛ finiw di musow ma minnu bɛ na u labɛnbaliya la, nka n’i nana n’i yɛrɛ ta ye, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la ni kulɛri jɛmanw ye, i bɛ nisɔndiya sɔrɔ mɔnikɛ walima mɔnikɛ fɛ da la. O sira kelen in kan, cɛw wajibiyalen don ka pantalon don min bɛ gɛnɛgɛnɛw datugu. Nin fana bɛ se ka juru ta stock la da la nka o fini tɛ ko baarakɛla bɛɛ kɔfɛ o la n’a sɔrɔla i tɛna i yɛrɛ lafiya nin fini ninnu donli la. Bonya kelen bɛ bɛn cɛw bɛɛ ma!
question: Mun bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka dɔnniya kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen sɔrɔ mɔnikɛ walima mɔnikɛ dɔ fɛ?
mc_answer1: Ka finimugu dɔ don min datugulen don ni kɛnɛya ye
mc_answer3: Ka juru ta wrap dɔ la ka bɔ monastery la
mc_answer4: Ka fini dɔ don min tigɛlen don gɛnɛgɛnɛ sanfɛ

flores_passage: Ni musow bɛ taa bɔ mɔnikɛyɔrɔw la, u ka kan ka finiw don minnu bɛ gɛnɛgɛnɛw datugu ani k’u kamankunw datugu, olu fana. question: Nin finiko ninnu na, jumɛn tɛ se ka sɔrɔ ka juru ta mɔnikɛyɔrɔ dɔ la?

flores_passage: N'i taara Artik walima Antartiki yɔrɔw la nɛnɛ waati i bɛ polar su sɔrɔ, o kɔrɔ ye ko tile tɛ Bɔ san fɛ. O bɛ cogo ɲuman di ka Aurora borealis ye, bawo sankolo bɛna dibi ka caya walima ka dɔgɔya waati bɛɛ. Ikomi mɔgɔw man ca yɔrɔw la, wa o la, yeelen nɔgɔli tɛ gɛlɛya ye tuma caman na, i bɛna se fana ka dolow diyabɔ.
question: Tuma jumɛn na dunan bɛna cogo caman sɔrɔ ka dolow lajɛ k’a to Antartiki yɔrɔw la?
mc_answer2: Ni yɔrɔ in ma caya i n'a fɔ mɔgɔw
mc_answer4: Ni yeelen nɔgɔli hakɛ ka dɔgɔn

flores_passage: Yɔrɔ janw na, ni telefɔni selilɛri tɛ, telefɔni sateliti bɛ se ka kɛ i ka fɛɛrɛ kelenpe ye. Telefɔni sateliti tɛ telefɔni selilɛri nɔnabila ye caman na, bawo i ka kan ka kɛ kɛnɛma ni yecogo jɛlen ye sateliti fɛ walasa ka telefɔni wele. Baara in bɛ Kɛ tuma caman na kurunbokarilaw fɛ, ɲɛnajɛ-minɛnw fana sen bɛ o la, ka Fàra taamaw kan minnu ka yɔrɔjan kunnafoniw ni kumakan magow bɛ u la. Aw ka sigida telefɔni baarakɛyɔrɔ ka kan ka se ka kunnafoni wɛrɛw di o baarakɛyɔrɔ in jɛɲɔgɔnya kan.
question: Tuma jumɛn na telefɔni sateliti tɛna kɛ telefɔni selilɛri nɔnabila ye min bɛ se ka kɛ?
mc_answer1: Ni yeli sira min bɛ taa sateliti la, o bɛ se ka bali
mc_answer2: Ni yɔrɔ in yɔrɔ ka jan kojugu
mc_answer4: Ni taama dɔ bɛ data mago dɔw de wajibiya

flores_passage: Yɔrɔ janw na, ni telefɔni selilɛri tɛ, telefɔni sateliti bɛ se ka kɛ i ka fɛɛrɛ kelenpe ye. Telefɔni sateliti tɛ telefɔni selilɛri nɔnabila ye caman na, bawo i ka kan ka kɛ kɛnɛma ni yecogo jɛlen ye sateliti fɛ walasa ka telefɔni wele. Aw ka sigida telefɔni baarakɛyɔrɔ ka kan ka se ka kunnafoni wɛrɛw di o baarakɛyɔrɔ in jɛɲɔgɔnya kan.
question: Tuma jumɛn na telefɔni sateliti bɛna fisaya ni telefɔni selilɛri ye?
mc_answer1: K’a to lafiɲɛbɔ la dugu dɔ kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Ni yɔrɔjan kunnafoniw tɛ wajibi ye
mc_answer4: Ni a ka c’a la, telefɔni selilɛri bɛ i bolo ka ɲɛ

flores_passage: Moldavie jamana faaba ye Chişinău ye. Sigida kan ye Rumanikan ye, nka Irisikan bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ. Moldavie jamana ye siya caman ka jamana ye min tɔɔrɔla siyaw ka kɛlɛ fɛ. San 1994, o kɛlɛ in kɛra sababu ye ka Transnistria Repibiliki dabɔ a yɛrɛ la Moldavie kɔrɔnyanfan fɛ, min ka gɔfɛrɛnaman n’a ka wari bɛ a bolo nka ONU jamana si ma sɔn a ma. Sɔrɔko jɛɲɔgɔnyaw Sìgira kokura Moldavie jamana fla ninnu ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ hali n’a y’a Sɔrɔ politiki kumaɲɔgɔnyaw ma ɲɛ. Diinanba min bɛ Moldavie jamana na, o ye Ɔrɔmu Kerecɛn ye.
question: Kɛlɛ min kɛra ninnu na, jumɛn de kɛra sababu ye ka Transnistria Repibiliki da?

question: Ninnu la jumɛn bɛ Transnistria Repibiliki la min ni Moldavie jamana tɔ tɛ kelen ye?

flores_passage: "Komi Montevideo bɛ Equator saheli fɛ, samiyɛ bɛ yen ni fonɛnɛ bɛ Worodugu-yanfan fɛ ani a kɔfɛ. Montevideo bɛ subtropics la; samiyɛ kalow la, funteni ka ca ni +30°C ye. Nɛnɛ bɛ se ka kɛ nɛnɛ ye min bɛ mɔgɔ lafili." : funteni man teli ka taa nɛnɛ jukɔrɔ, nka fiɲɛ ni nɛnɛ bɛ fara ɲɔgɔn kan k'a kɛ nɛnɛ ye ka tɛmɛ funteni jateminɛnan bɛ min fɔ, ""sanji" ni ""ja"" waati kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw tɛ yen : sanji hakɛ bɛ to kelen ye a bɛɛ la san kɔnɔ."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, tuma jumɛn taamakɛla ka kan ka taa Montevideo n’u jigi b’a kan k’u yɛrɛ tanga fiɲɛ ma?
mc_answer3: Worodugu-yanfan jamanaw ka samiyɛ kalow la
mc_answer4: Montevideo dugu ka nɛnɛ kalow la

flores_passage: "Komi Montevideo bɛ Equator saheli fɛ, samiyɛ bɛ yen ni fonɛnɛ bɛ Worodugu-yanfan fɛ ani a kɔfɛ. Montevideo bɛ subtropics la; samiyɛ kalow la, funteni ka ca ni +30°C ye. Nɛnɛ bɛ se ka kɛ nɛnɛ ye min bɛ mɔgɔ lafili." : funteni man teli ka taa nɛnɛ jukɔrɔ, nka fiɲɛ ni nɛnɛ bɛ fara ɲɔgɔn kan k'a kɛ nɛnɛ ye ka tɛmɛ funteni jateminɛnan bɛ min fɔ, ""sanji" ni ""ja"" waati kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw tɛ yen : sanji hakɛ bɛ to kelen ye a bɛɛ la san kɔnɔ."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, tuma jumɛn taamakɛla ka kan ka taa Montevideo ni u yɔrɔ dɔ bɛ yɔrɔ nɛnɛman na?
mc_answer1: Ni samiyɛ donna Montevideo dugu kɔnɔ

flores_passage: "Murals walima scribble minnu man ɲi, olu bɛ dɔn ko graffiti. Hali n'a yɔrɔ ka jan bi ko la, n'a sɔrɔla mɔgɔ fanba b'a jɛ ni funankɛninw ka foroba ni dankan nafolo tiɲɛni ye ni penti fiyɛli ye. Nka, bi bi in na, graffiti dilannikɛlaw sigilen bɛ yen, graffiti ko kɛtaw ani ""sariya siratigɛ la " kogow. Ja minnu bɛ kɛ ni sɛbɛnniw ye nin ko in na, olu ka teli ka kɛ i n'a fɔ seko ni dɔnko baara sanni ka kɛ taamasiyɛnw ye minnu tɛ kalan."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn bɛna jɛ ni sɛbɛnnikɛla sabatilen ye, ka fara tiɲɛni kan?
mc_answer3: Murali minnu man ɲi foroba nafolo kan

flores_passage: Seli dɔw la, dɔnkilida ɲɛnajɛw lajɛbagaw fanba b’a latigɛ ka u ka sigiyɔrɔw kɛ o yɔrɔ la, wa ɲɛnajɛla fanba b’a jate ko o ye o ko kɛlenw yɔrɔ nafamaba ye. N'i b'a fɛ ka surunya wale la i bɛ taa don joona walasa ka kanpaɲi yɔrɔ dɔ sɔrɔ min ka surun fɔli la. Aw k’aw hakili to a la ko hali ni dɔnkiliw bɛ se ka ban sangabonbaw kan, seli yɔrɔ dɔw bɛ se ka kɛ minnu bɛna to ka dɔnkiliw da fo ka se su ma. Seli dɔw la, kanpaɲi yɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw bɛ denbaya minnu bolo, denmisɛnnin fitininw bɛ minnu bolo.
question: Misikili ɲɛnajɛw fan jumɛn de bɛ lajɛbaga dɔw jate ko o ye ko ye min nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ?
mc_answer1: Ka na ni denmisɛnnin fitininw ye
mc_answer3: Misikili bɛ fɔ fo ka se su fɛ

flores_passage: Seli dɔw la, dɔnkilida ɲɛnajɛw lajɛbagaw fanba b’a latigɛ ka u ka sigiyɔrɔw kɛ o yɔrɔ la, wa ɲɛnajɛla fanba b’a jate ko o ye o ko kɛlenw yɔrɔ nafamaba ye. Seli dɔw la, kanpaɲi yɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw bɛ denbaya minnu bolo, denmisɛnnin fitininw bɛ minnu bolo.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, selikɛla dɔ ka kan ka mun bila jɔyɔrɔ fɔlɔ la n’u b’a fɛ ka sigi ka surunya dɔnkilida la?
mc_answer2: Ka to yɔrɔ la denbayaw kama

flores_passage: Ni an y’a jateminɛ ko pueblo caman yɔrɔ ka jan cogo min na, i tɛna se ka sufɛla caman sɔrɔ n’i ma taa Albuquerque walima Santa Fe. Nka, kasino minnu kofɔlen don sanfɛ, a bɛ se ka fɔ ko u bɛɛ bɛ minfɛnw di, wa u damadɔ bɛ na ni ɲɛnajɛ ye min bɛ kɛ ni tɔgɔlafɛnw ye (kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, kasino belebele minnu bɛ Albuquerque ni Santa Fe lamini yɔrɔnin kelen). Aw k’aw janto: dugu misɛnninw ka dɔlɔminnanw yan, olu tɛ yɔrɔ ɲumanw ye tuma bɛɛ jamana kɔkan mɔgɔ bɛ se ka ɲɔgɔn lajɛ. O dɔ ye ko gɛlɛyabaw bɛ Nouvelle-Méxique woroduguyanfan fɛ bolifɛn bolicogo la dɔlɔmin na, wa bolifɛntigi minnu ye dɔlɔminna ye, olu hakɛ ka ca dugu misɛnninw ka dɔlɔminnanw kɛrɛfɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, dunanw ka kan k’u yɛrɛ tanga yɔrɔ jumɛn na ni u bɛ sufɛ ɲɛnamaya ɲini Nouvelle-Méxique woroduguyanfan fɛ?

flores_passage: Ni an y’a jateminɛ ko pueblo caman yɔrɔ ka jan cogo min na, i tɛna se ka sufɛla caman sɔrɔ n’i ma taa Albuquerque walima Santa Fe. O dɔ ye ko gɛlɛyabaw bɛ Nouvelle-Méxique woroduguyanfan fɛ bolifɛn bolicogo la dɔlɔmin na, wa bolifɛntigi minnu ye dɔlɔminna ye, olu hakɛ ka ca dugu misɛnninw ka dɔlɔminnanw kɛrɛfɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, a ka c’a la, dunan bɛ ɲɛnajɛ lakodɔnnenw sɔrɔ yɔrɔ jumɛn na Nouvelle-Méxique woroduguyanfan fɛ?
mc_answer1: Kasino dɔ la, sanga fila bɛ bɔ Albuquerque
mc_answer3: Kasino dɔ la, Sante Fe kɛrɛfɛ
mc_answer4: Dugu fitinin dɔ ka dɔlɔminnan dɔ la

flores_passage: "Sigida biyɛriba ye 'Number One' ye, a tɛ biyɛri gɛlɛn ye, nka a ka di ani a bɛ mɔgɔ lafiya. Sigida biyɛri tɔ kelen tɔgɔ ye ko ""Manta"". Faransi diwɛn caman bɛ yen ka sɔrɔ, nka Nuwɛlika ni Ɔsitarali diwɛn." diwɛnw bɛ se ka taama ka ɲɛ.Sigida la pɔnpeji bɛ se ka min kosɛbɛ, nka buteli kɔnɔ ji sɔrɔli ka nɔgɔn ni i bɛ siran Ɔsitaralikaw fɛ, kafe ‘finman fla’ hakilina ye dunan ye bɛ na ni krema ye (a tɛ kɛ ni nɔgɔ ye), wa te bɛ dilan ni nɔnɔ tɛ, Sokola funteni bɛ bɛn Bɛliziki sariyaw ma.
question: Taamakɛlaw minnu bɛ u janto u ka baarakɛnafolo la, olu bɛ se k’a fɛ k’u yɛrɛ tanga minfɛn suguya jumɛn ma?

flores_passage: "Sigida biyɛriba ye 'Number One' ye, a tɛ biyɛri gɛlɛn ye, nka a ka di ani a bɛ mɔgɔ lafiya. Sigida biyɛri tɔ kelen tɔgɔ ye ko ""Manta"". question: Ka da yɔrɔ kan min ɲɛfɔlen don tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, minfɛnko yamaruya ninnu na, jumɛn bɛ se ka ɲagami baarakɛla dɔ fɛ?
mc_answer1: A surun dɔ ye nɛrɛmuguma ye
mc_answer3: Sauvignon Blanc dɔ min bɔra Nuwɛlika

flores_passage: "Guraníw tun ye jamanadenw ka kulu nafamaba ye min sigilen bɛ yɔrɔ la min bɛ wele sisan Paraguwe kɔrɔnyanfan fɛ, u tun bɛ balo i n'a fɔ kungokɔnɔfɛnw ɲininikɛlaw minnu tun bɛ balo sɔrɔ fana. Chaco mara tun ye jamanadenw ka kabila kulu wɛrɛw sigiyɔrɔ ye i n'a fɔ Guaycurú ani Payaguá, minnu ye ɲɛnamaya sɔrɔ sogo ɲinini fɛ."(Alimankan na) , lajɛ ni mɔni. san kɛmɛ saba Kabini Asunción sigira sen kan san 1537, Paraguwe sera k'a ka jamanadenw ka jogo n'a ka danbe caman mara."
question: A kɛra san kɛmɛ saba kɔnɔ, koloniyali waati daminɛna kulu jumɛn fɛ?

flores_passage: "Parisikaw tɔgɔ bɔra u yɛrɛma, mɔgɔ maloya ani kuncɛbaya la. Hali n'a ka c'a la, nin ye fɛn ye min tɛ tiɲɛ ye, Pari ka bɛn cogo ɲuman hali bi, o ye ka kɛ i ka kɛwale ɲumanw kan, ka kɛ i n'a fɔ mɔgɔ min ye ""bien élevé" ye. (a lamɔna koɲuman).
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, fɛɛrɛ ɲuman jumɛn bɛ se ka kɛ walasa Parika dɔ ka a yɛrɛ sumaya i la?
mc_answer1: A ɲini ka Parikaw ka miiriya ladege
mc_answer3: Aw ye wale kɛ ni bonya ye
mc_answer4: Taamacogo minnu bɛ bɔ kɛnɛma, olu jira

flores_passage: "Parisikaw tɔgɔ bɔra u yɛrɛma, mɔgɔ maloya ani kuncɛbaya la. Hali n'a ka c'a la, nin ye fɛn ye min tɛ tiɲɛ ye, Pari ka bɛn cogo ɲuman hali bi, o ye ka kɛ i ka kɛwale ɲumanw kan, ka kɛ i n'a fɔ mɔgɔ min ye ""bien élevé" ye. (a lamɔna koɲuman).
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na, jumɛn tɛ jate Parikaw ka jogo ye?

flores_passage: MetroRail bɛ ni kalan fila ye tɛrɛnw na minnu bɛ taa ni mɔgɔw ye Kapi dugu kɔnɔ ani a lamini na: MetroPlus (a bɛ fɔ fana ko First Class) ani Metro (a bɛ fɔ a ma ko Third Class). MetroPlus ka di kosɛbɛ ani a man ca nka a sɔngɔ ka gɛlɛn dɔɔnin, hali ni a sɔngɔ ka dɔgɔ hali bi ka tɛmɛ metoro bileti gansanw kan Erɔpu jamanaw na. Tɛrɛn bɛɛ bɛ ni MetroPlus ni Metro pankurun fila bɛɛ ye; MetroPlus ka pankurunw bɛ tɛrɛn laban na tuma bɛɛ min ka surun Kapiwɛri la.
question: Nafa jumɛn bɛ First Class la Cape Town MetroRail kan?
mc_answer2: Mɔgɔ caman tɛ i n’a fɔ
mc_answer3: A sɔngɔ ka dɔgɔ ni Third Class ticket ye
mc_answer4: O sɔngɔ ni Metro bileti sɔngɔ ye kelen ye

flores_passage: MetroRail bɛ ni kalan fila ye tɛrɛnw na minnu bɛ taa ni mɔgɔw ye Kapi dugu kɔnɔ ani a lamini na: MetroPlus (a bɛ fɔ fana ko First Class) ani Metro (a bɛ fɔ a ma ko Third Class). MetroPlus ka di kosɛbɛ ani a man ca nka a sɔngɔ ka gɛlɛn dɔɔnin, hali ni a sɔngɔ ka dɔgɔ hali bi ka tɛmɛ metoro bileti gansanw kan Erɔpu jamanaw na. mc_answer1: Metro bolifɛn min tɛ mɔgɔw caya kosɛbɛ
mc_answer2: Bilɛti sɔngɔ ye kelen ye kalan fila bɛɛ la
mc_answer4: Kalanso fɔlɔ ni sabanan fila bɛɛ ka lakɔlidenw

flores_passage: Taamakɛlaw bɛ se ka baganw ka fɛnɲɛnamaw sɔrɔ u tɛ minnu dɔn u ka sigidaw la. Banakisɛw bɛ se ka dumuni tiɲɛ, ka dimi bila mɔgɔ la, walima ni a ka jugu ni faritanabana ye, ka baga jɛnsɛn, walima ka banakisɛw lase mɔgɔ ma. Banakisɛfagalanw yɛrɛ, walima bagan faratilenw minnu bɛ se ka mɔgɔw jogin walima ka u faga fanga la, a ka c’a la, olu tɛ se ka kɛ fɛnɲɛnamaw ye.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn de ka teli ka kɛ baganw ka banakisɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Aw bɛ kurukuru bila mɔgɔ la
mc_answer4: Aw bɛ joginni fangamaw lase mɔgɔ ma

flores_passage: Nkɔni magasin bɛɛ falen bɛ telefɔni kartiw la minnu bɛ sara ka kɔn, minnu bɛ se ka baara kɛ ni telefɔni saralenw ye walima telefɔni gansanw ye, minnu bɛ mɔgɔ hakili ɲagami. Hali ni karti fanba ka ɲi ka weleli kɛ yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ, dɔw kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen don ka weleli hakɛ ɲumanw di jamana kulu kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw ma. Tuma caman na, o baara ninnu sɔrɔli bɛ kɛ telefɔni nimɔrɔ dɔ fɛ min tɛ sara, telefɔni nimɔrɔ min bɛ se ka wele ka bɔ telefɔni fanba la, k’a sɔrɔ wari tɛ sara.
question: Telefɔni karti minnu bɛ sara ka kɔn, olu bɛ se ka san min?

flores_passage: Nkɔni magasin bɛɛ falen bɛ telefɔni kartiw la minnu bɛ sara ka kɔn, minnu bɛ se ka baara kɛ ni telefɔni saralenw ye walima telefɔni gansanw ye, minnu bɛ mɔgɔ hakili ɲagami. question: Karti dɔw bɛ weleli hakɛ ɲuman minnu di, olu bɛ sɔrɔ cogo di?
mc_answer1: U bɛ se ka sɔrɔ jamana kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw dɔrɔn de la
mc_answer4: Ni i bɛ baara kɛ ni telefɔni saralen ye ani ka wari wɛrɛ sara

flores_passage: Plitvice Lakes jamana nakɔsɛnɛyɔrɔ la, kungo caman bɛ yen, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, beech, spruce ani fir jiriw bɛ yen, wa Alps ni Mediterane jiriw ɲagaminen don a kɔnɔ. Fɛnɲɛnɛmaw ka jɛkulu suguya caman b’a la kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, k’a sababu kɛ a ka waati misɛnninw ye, a dugukolow tɛ kelen ye ani a sanfɛla tɛ kelen ye. Bagan ni kɔnɔ suguya caman fana bɛ yen o yɔrɔ in na. Bagan minnu man ca i n’a fɔ Erɔpu ursi bulama, waraba, wulu, wulu, ʃɛ, kungo-kɔnɔ-wulu ani kapɛri bɛ Se ka Sɔrɔ yen, ka Fàra suguya caman wɛrɛw kan minnu bɛ Sɔrɔ yen
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nin jiri ninnu na, jumɛn man ca Plitvice Lakes jamana nakɔsɛnɛyɔrɔ la?

question: Nin bagan minnu man ca, jumɛn bɛ se ka sɔrɔ Plitvice Lakes jamana nakɔsɛnɛyɔrɔ la?
mc_answer4: Capercaillie ye a ka baara ye

flores_passage: "Kunnafoni-cimago-tɔnw bɛ nkalon tigɛ tuma bɛɛ nin kun in na, k'a fɔ ko a ye ""ka jagokɛlaw bali"". Tiɲɛ na, marabolow ka kodew tɛ nɔ foyi bila abada kopi kɛcogo jugu la; disiki dɔ kopi dɔɔnin-dɔɔnin bɛna tulon kɛ dɔrɔn fine on any device where the original will.Kun yɛrɛ ye ka fanga caman di o sosiyetew ma u ka suguw kan;
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, marabolow ka kodew bɛ dɛmɛ don mun na tiɲɛ na?
mc_answer4: Kopi kɛcogo min tɛ sariya kɔnɔ

flores_passage: "Kunnafoni-cimago-tɔnw bɛ nkalon tigɛ tuma bɛɛ nin kun in na, k'a fɔ ko a ye ""ka jagokɛlaw bali"". mc_answer1: U ka kan walasa ka suguya caman sɔrɔ
mc_answer2: U bɛ dɛmɛ don walasa u kana kopi kɛ cogo la min tɛ sariya kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: U nafa ka bon wariko la
mc_answer4: U man teli ka dɛmɛ don ka jagokɛlaw bali

flores_passage: Hali ni a ka c’a la, immigration check tɛ yen walima a bɛ kɛ cogo la min bɛ kɛ n’i sera i faso la, dumuniko kɔlɔsili bɛ se ka kɛ gɛlɛya ye. Aw ye aw jija k’a dɔn aw bɛ se ka min na ani aw tɛ se ka min na ani ka fɛn dɔ fɔ min tɛmɛna sariya dan kan.
question: Ni i sera i faso la, a ka c’a la, taabolo jumɛn tɛ kɛ cogo labɛnnen na?

flores_passage: Hali ni a ka c’a la, immigration check tɛ yen walima a bɛ kɛ cogo la min bɛ kɛ n’i sera i faso la, dumuniko kɔlɔsili bɛ se ka kɛ gɛlɛya ye. Aw ye aw jija k’a dɔn aw bɛ se ka min na ani aw tɛ se ka min na ani ka fɛn dɔ fɔ min tɛmɛna sariya dan kan.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ka kan ka dɔn sani i ka se i faso la?
mc_answer1: Ni immigration checkpoint bɛna kɛ yen
mc_answer2: Ni aw mago bɛ ka fɛnw jira ka tɛmɛ sariya danw kan
mc_answer4: Ni i bɛ na ni fɛn minnu ye, ni olu ma sɔn

flores_passage: Cochamó Valley - Chili ka jiginni yɔrɔ fɔlɔ, min bɛ wele ko Yosemite Ameriki Saheliyanfan fɛ, ni granit kogo belebele suguya caman ye ani faraw. Lajɛba dɔw bɛ yen minnu bɛ yeli kɛ ka bɔ kuluw kan minnu bɛ mɔgɔ ninakili bɔ. Yɛlɛnbaga minnu bɛ bɔ diɲɛ fan bɛɛ la, olu bɛ ka sira kuraw sigi sen kan tuma bɛɛ a ka kogow seko danma cɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, fɛn caman bɛ yen minnu b’a to jiginnikɛlaw bɛ se ka sira kuraw sɔrɔ tuma bɛɛ Cochamó kɔdingɛ kɔnɔ?

flores_passage: N’i b’a fɛ ka pankurun ta diɲɛ fan bɛɛ la Saheliyanfan fɛ, bɛlɛnw ni taayɔrɔw sugandili dan ye k’a sababu kɛ kɔgɔjida siraw dɛsɛ ye. Afiriki pankurunbonda jɛkulu si tɛ kɔgɔji tɛmɛsira saba bɛɛ lajɛlen dafa Saheliyanfan fɛ (wa SkyTeam tɛ tɛmɛsira si dafa). Nka, Star Alliance bɛ fɛn bɛɛ Dabɔ fo Pasifiki Saheli kɔrɔnyanfan fɛ k’a Tà Santiago de Chile la ka Taa Tahiti, o min ye LATAM Oneworld ka pankurun ye. Nin pankurun in dɔrɔn tɛ sugandi ye n’i b’a fɛ ka Pasifiki Saheliyanfan ni Ameriki saheliyanfan tilebin yanfan kɔgɔjida tɛmɛ. (aw ye sɛbɛn ɲɛ jukɔrɔ lajɛ)
question: Ka da kunnafoniw kan minnu dira tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, jɔn de bɛ tɛmɛsira caman ɲɛfɔ Saheliyanfan fɛ?
mc_answer2: Star Alliance (Alliance) min bɛ wele ko Star

mc_answer1: Star Alliance (Alliance) min bɛ wele ko Star

flores_passage: Dugukolo kan, boli-taama-jɛkulu 200 ɲɔgɔn bɛ yen. U fanba bɛ baara kɛ u yɛrɛma. Global Running Tours nɔnabila, Go Running Tours bɛ sightrunning dilanbaga tan ni caman rezow dilan farafinna naani kan. Ni a ju bɔra Barselona ka boli taamaw la Barselona ani Kopɛnhagɛni ka boli Kopɛnhagɛni na, a farala a kan joona ni Running Tours Prague ye min sigilen bɛ Prague ani mɔgɔ wɛrɛw.
question: Tournée jɛkulu jumɛn de ye Global Running Tours nɔ bila?

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, Go Running Tours bɛ dɛmɛ don ka ɲɛnajɛ jɛkulu suguya joli siri ɲɔgɔn na?

flores_passage: "Laala, safariw ye turisimu ɲɛnajɛba ye Afiriki kɔnɔ, wa taamakɛla caman ka koba ye. Safari daɲɛ min bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ, o bɛ tali kɛ dugukolo kan taama na walasa ka Afiriki kungosogo kabakomaw lajɛ, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la savana kan. Bagan dɔw, i n'a fɔ waraw ni jirafew, olu ka teli ka gɛrɛ."(Alimankan na) ka surunya mobili ni minɛnw na minnu bɛ kɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni sariya ye, o bɛna kɛ sababu ye ka filɛli ɲuman kɛ Warabilenw, wuluwuluw ani nɛgɛsotigiw bɛ maloya tuma dɔw la wa i bɛna u ye ka ɲɛ ni binoculars ye (a bɛ fɔ fana ko ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", walima taa ""sen"") bɛ Kɛ taama ye, sanga damadɔ walima tile damadɔ."
question: Turisikɛla ka kan ka mun kɛ n’u jigi b’a kan ka wuluwulu yecogo jɛlen sɔrɔ?
mc_answer1: Aw bɛ taa taama safari la
mc_answer2: Aw bɛ taa kungo taama dɔ la
mc_answer3: Aw bɛ baara kɛ ni binocule ye
mc_answer4: Aw bɛ mobili ta ka baara kɛ ni minɛnw ye minnu bɛ kɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni sariya ye

question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, a ka c’a la, taamakɛla bɛ se ka bagan sugu jumɛn sɔrɔ safari taama senfɛ mobili kɔnɔ?

flores_passage: Tours (taama) sɔngɔ ka dɔgɔ kulubaw fɛ, o la n’i bɛ i kelen na walima n’i teri kelen dɔrɔn bɛ yen, i k’a ɲini ka mɔgɔ wɛrɛw kunbɛn ani ka kulu dɔ sigi mɔgɔ naani fo mɔgɔ wɔɔrɔ kan walasa ka mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ ta hakɛ ɲuman sɔrɔ. Nka, o man kan ka bɔ i haminanko la tiɲɛ na, bawo tuma caman na, turisiw bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɛgɛsɛgɛ walasa ka mobili fa. A bɛ iko tiɲɛ na, a ka ca ni mɔgɔw lafilicogo ye walasa u ka da a la k’u ka kan ka wari caman sara.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun bɛna dɔ bɔ taama musakaw la?
mc_answer3: Ka taa ni mɔgɔ kelen wɛrɛ ye
mc_answer4: Ka kulu dɔ sɔrɔ min kɔnɔ mɔgɔ wɔɔrɔ walima ka tɛmɛ o kan
