A bɛ iko tiɲɛ na, a ka ca ni mɔgɔw lafilicogo ye walasa u ka da a la k’u ka kan ka wari caman sara.

mc_answer1: Turisiw minnu bɛ sɔn ka mobili ɲagami ɲɔgɔn na
mc_answer2: Jɛkulu min ye mɔgɔ saba ye
mc_answer3: Teri fila bɛ ka taama ɲɔgɔn fɛ
mc_answer4: Jɛkulu min kɔnɔ mɔgɔ duuru bɛ yen

flores_passage: Hali ni San Fransisko sɔrɔko bɛ tali kɛ a la ka kɛ diɲɛ seleke naani turisiw ɲɛnajɛyɔrɔ ye, a sɔrɔko bɛ danfara. Baarakɛyɔrɔ minnu ka bon kosɛbɛ olu ye baarakɛlaw ka baarakɛyɔrɔw, gɔfɛrɛnaman, wariko, jago ani turisimu ye. A jirali tuma caman na dɔnkiliw, filimuw, sɛbɛnniw ani jamanadenw ka laadalakow la, o ye dɛmɛ don ka dugu n’a taamasiyɛnw dɔn diɲɛ fan bɛɛ. San Fransisko ye turisimu yɔrɔba dɔ yiriwa ni lotɛli caman ye, dumunikɛyɔrɔw ani jamalajɛ kɛyɔrɔ ɲumanw. flores_passage: Aw bɛ aw ka so fa ni kafe nafama ye sɔgɔma ani ka camomile te dɔ min bɛ aw lafiya su fɛ. Ni i bɛ sigiyɔrɔ la, i bɛ waati sɔrɔ k’i yɛrɛ furakɛ ani ka miniti damadɔ wɛrɛw ta ka fɛn kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ labɛn. Ni aw b’a fɛ ka fɛn caman kɛ, aw bɛ sababu ta ka ji kɛ walima ka sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛ dɔw ɲagami ɲɔgɔn na: laala aw bɛna minfɛn nɔgɔman dɔ sɔrɔ aw bɛ se ka min dilan sɔgɔmada dumuni na ni aw seginna aw ka don o don kow la. N’i sigilen bɛ dugu dɔ la, minko kɛcogo tɛ kelen ye, i ka taa dɔlɔminnanw walima dɔlɔminnanw na sigida minnu na i tɛ taa tuma caman na.
question: I ka kan ka taa nin ninnu na jumɛn na sigiyɔrɔ la ni i ka dugu lakodɔnnen don a ka minniko la?
mc_answer1: Kafefeerelaw minnu bɛ aw ka sigida kɔkan
mc_answer3: Pub minnu na i tɛ taa tuma caman na
mc_answer4: Restoranɛ minnu bɛ kamiyɔn te dila

flores_passage: Haldarsvík dugu bɛ se ka Eysturoy gun min bɛ a kɛrɛfɛ, o ye ani egilisi dɔ bɛ yen min bɛ kɛ ni kɛrɛ wolonwula ye, min tɛ deli ka kɛ. Eglisi kɔnɔ, tuganin ja cɛɲiw bɛ yen minnu dilalen don ni marbre ye kaburu dɔw kan. A bɛ se ka kɛ lɛri tilancɛ ye ka taama dugu kɔnɔ min bɛ mɔgɔ kɔnɔnafili.
question: Tuganin ja ninnu bɛ min?
mc_answer1: Lɛrɛ tilancɛ ni dugu cɛ ye

flores_passage: Hali n’a sɔrɔla i mago tɛ visa la walasa ka taa bɔ jamana dɔw la waati kunkurunnin kɔnɔ i n’a fɔ turisi walima jago kama, ka taa yen i n’a fɔ jamana wɛrɛw ka kalanden, a ka c’a la, o bɛ waati jan de wajibiya ka tɛmɛ ka taa yen i n’a fɔ turisi gansan dɔrɔn. A ka c’a la, ka to jamana wɛrɛ la jamana wɛrɛ la waati jan kɔnɔ, o bɛna a ɲini i fɛ i ka kɔn ka visa sɔrɔ. A ka c’a la, kalandenw ka visaw ka wajibiw ni u ɲinini kɛcogo tɛ kelen ye ni turisiw walima jagokɛlaw ka visaw ye minnu bɛ kɛ cogo la. Jamana fanba ta fan fɛ, i mago bɛna kɛ ni sɛbɛn ye min bɛ bɔ i b’a fɛ ka kalan kɛ kalanso min na, ani fana nafolo daliluw kan walasa k’i yɛrɛ balo i ka kalan san fɔlɔ la a dɔgɔyalenba la. I b’a fɛ ka kalan kɛ jamana min na, i k’a lajɛ ni baarada ye, ani fana, i b’a fɛ ka kalan kɛ jamana min na, o ka bɔ jamana wɛrɛw la.
question: Visa sugu jumɛn bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye mɔgɔ dɔ ka dalilu di min b’a jira ko wari bɛ se ka dɛmɛ?

question: Jɔn de ka teli ka visa janyalen ɲini?
mc_answer1: Turisikɛla min bɛ kɛ tuma bɛɛ

flores_passage: Kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, samiyɛ fɛ, i bɛna i janto sosow la n’i y’a latigɛ ka taama kɛ sanji-kungo kɔnɔ. Hali n’i bɛ bolifɛn ta sanjiba kungo kɔnɔ, segin damadɔ ni da wulilen don k’i to mobili kɔnɔ, o ye waati bɛ se sosow ma u ka don mobili kɔnɔ n’i ye.
question: Tuma jumɛn na aw ka kan ka aw hakili to sosow la kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la?

flores_passage: Kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, samiyɛ fɛ, i bɛna i janto sosow la n’i y’a latigɛ ka taama kɛ sanji-kungo kɔnɔ. Hali n’i bɛ bolifɛn ta sanjiba kungo kɔnɔ, segin damadɔ ni da wulilen don k’i to mobili kɔnɔ, o ye waati bɛ se sosow ma u ka don mobili kɔnɔ n’i ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, i ka kan k’i yɛrɛ tanga mun kɛli ma walasa ka i yɛrɛ tanga sosow ma n’i bɛ bolifɛn boli sanjiba kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Ka mobili da wulilen to ka mɛn kojugu
mc_answer2: Bololabaara kɛli ka tɛmɛ samiyɛ waati la
mc_answer3: Bololabaara kɛli ka tɛmɛ yɔrɔw fɛ minnu ka timi
mc_answer4: Ka mobili to mɔgɔ tɛ min na, n’i bɛ taama senfɛ

flores_passage: Sundarbans ye kɔgɔjida la mangrove cɛsirilan belebeleba ye diɲɛ kɔnɔ, a bɛ kilomɛtɛrɛ 80 (50 mi) ka don Bangaladeshi ani India kɔkanna na ka bɔ kɔgɔjida la. Sundarbanw jatera UNESCO ka diɲɛ ciyɛn ye. Kungo yɔrɔ min bɛ Ɛndu jamana kɔnɔ, o bɛ Weele ko Sundarbans jamana nakɔsɛnɛyɔrɔ. Kungow tɛ mangɔrɔw dɔrɔn ye hali ni o kɛra — kungo barikamaw jɔyɔrɔ laban dɔw bɛ u la minnu tun bɛ Gangetic kɛnɛba datugu fɔlɔ. Sundarbanw bonya ye kilomɛtɛrɛ 3850 ye, o tilancɛ kelen ɲɔgɔn bɛ ji/kɔgɔjida yɔrɔw la. Kabini san 1966 Sundarbans kɛra kungosogow sigiyɔrɔ ye, wa a jate la, sisan Masakɛ Bɛngali saga 400 ani saga 30.000 ɲɔgɔn bɛ yen min ye nɛrɛmuguma ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nin kuma minnu fɔra Sundarbankaw kan, jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: A bɛ kungo barikama damadɔ minnu tora, olu dɔw jira
mc_answer2: A yɔrɔ bɛɛ tilancɛ bɛ Dabɔ nɔgɔ la
mc_answer3: O ye diɲɛ kɔnɔ mangrove cɛsirilanba ye
mc_answer4: Sagaw nɔgɔlenw ka ca yen ka tɛmɛ Bɛngali sagaw kan

flores_passage: Sundarbans ye kɔgɔjida la mangrove cɛsirilan belebeleba ye diɲɛ kɔnɔ, a bɛ kilomɛtɛrɛ 80 (50 mi) ka don Bangaladeshi ani India kɔkanna na ka bɔ kɔgɔjida la. question: Kungo yɔrɔ jumɛn bɛ Ɛndu jamana kɔnɔ?

flores_passage: Kan suguya 5000 ni kɔ bɛ diɲɛ kɔnɔ, kan mugan ni kɔ bɛ yen minnu fɔbaga miliyɔn 50 walima ka tɛmɛ o kan. Daɲɛ sɛbɛnnenw faamuyali ka nɔgɔn tuma caman na ka tɛmɛ kuma fɔlenw kan, fana. O bɛ kɛ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la ladɛrɛsiw la, minnu fɔli ka gɛlɛn tuma caman na ni faamuyali ye. Jamana kuuru caman bɛ tubabukan fɔ pewu, wa hali ka tɛmɛ o kan, i bɛ se ka dɔnniya danma makɔnɔ - kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la funankɛninw cɛma. Miiri k’a filɛ, n’i b’a fɛ, Mancuni, Bostoni, Jamayika ani Sidney duguden dɔ sigilen bɛ tabali lamini na ka sufɛdumuni kɛ Toronto dumunikɛyɔrɔ dɔ la. U bɛ ka ɲɔgɔn ɲɛnajɛ ni maanaw ye minnu bɔra u ka duguw la, minnu bɛ fɔ u ka fɔcogo danfaralenw na ani u ka sigida argot.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, jɔn de ka teli ka tubabukan faamuyali danma sɔrɔ a dɔgɔyalenba la?
mc_answer1: Mɔgɔ minnu bɛ kan fila wɛrɛw fɔ a dɔgɔyalenba la

flores_passage: Kan suguya 5000 ni kɔ bɛ diɲɛ kɔnɔ, kan mugan ni kɔ bɛ yen minnu fɔbaga miliyɔn 50 walima ka tɛmɛ o kan. Daɲɛ sɛbɛnnenw faamuyali ka nɔgɔn tuma caman na ka tɛmɛ kuma fɔlenw kan, fana. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun fɔli bɛ se ka gɛlɛya?
mc_answer1: Daɲɛ minnu bɛ fɔcogo danfaralenw na
mc_answer4: Sigida argot (argot) min bɛ sigida la

flores_passage: Busiw bɛ bɔ marabolow ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ bisiw jɔyɔrɔ la (ba kɛrɛfɛ) tile bɛɛ kɔnɔ, hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ u fanba, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la minnu bɛ taa kɔrɔn fɛ ani Jakar/Bumthang, olu bɛ bɔ 06h30 ni 07h30 cɛ. Ikomi marabolow ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ bisiw bɛ fa tuma caman na, a ka ɲi i ka tikiti san tile damadɔ ka kɔn o ɲɛ. Distrik fanba bɛ taa ni Japon Coaster Bus misɛnninw ye, minnu bɛ mɔgɔ lafiya ani minnu barika ka bon. Takisi jɛlenw ye fɛɛrɛ teliyalen ye min bɛ mɔgɔ lafiya ka taa yɔrɔw la minnu ka surun, i n’a fɔ Paro (Nu 150) ani Punakha (Nu 200).
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ko jumɛn bɛna kɛ ko ɲuman ye taamakɛla fɛ min b’a fɛ ka bisi ta ka bɔ marabolow ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ gare la?
mc_answer1: Taamakɛla in bɛ taa Jakar, a ye tikiti san kaban ka kɔn o ɲɛ
mc_answer2: Taamakɛla bɛ taa Bumthang, a ka kan ka bɔ yen ka se 7 ma
mc_answer3: Taamakɛla bɛ taa Paro, a ka kan ka bɔ 11 kɔfɛ
mc_answer4: Taamakɛla bɛ taa kɔrɔn fɛ, a bɛ se gare la ka kɔn 6h20 ɲɛ

flores_passage: Busiw bɛ bɔ marabolow ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ bisiw jɔyɔrɔ la (ba kɛrɛfɛ) tile bɛɛ kɔnɔ, hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ u fanba, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la minnu bɛ taa kɔrɔn fɛ ani Jakar/Bumthang, olu bɛ bɔ 06h30 ni 07h30 cɛ. question: Turisikɛla min b’a fɛ ka taa kɔrɔn fɛ ka bɔ marabolow ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ bisiw jɔyɔrɔ la, o ye laadilikan ɲuman jumɛn ye?
mc_answer2: Aw ye tikiti dɔ san ka kɔn o ɲɛ
mc_answer3: Bisi caman bɛ bɔ tile bɛɛ kɔnɔ
mc_answer4: Takisi jɛlen bɛ se ka kɛ taama fɛɛrɛ hakilitigi ye

flores_passage: "Ni a farala a ka sebaliya kan, ""Timbuktu"" nana kɛ misali ye dugukolo wɛrɛw kan, minnu ka jan. Bi, Timbuktu ye dugu faantan ye, hali n'a tɔgɔ b'a kɛ turisiw ka ɲɛnajɛyɔrɔ ye, wa awiyɔnbonda b'a la. In 1990, a farala diɲɛ ciyɛn yɔrɔw kan minnu bɛ farati la, k’a sababu kɛ kungo kɔnɔ cɛncɛnw ka bagabagali ye A kɛra jɔyɔrɔba dɔ ye Henry Louis Gates ka PBS kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen Wonders of the African World waati la jamana dugu tɔw , bawo arabukan fɔcogo ka ca a la ka tɛmɛ farafinna kan ».
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ Timbuktu ɲɛfɔli tigitigi ye?
mc_answer1: A ka Arabukan fanga ka ca ni jamana tɔ ye
mc_answer3: A tɛ Se ka Sɔrɔ ni awiyɔn ye
mc_answer4: A tora turisiw ɲininikɛlaw ka ɲɛnajɛyɔrɔ ye

flores_passage: "Ni a farala a ka sebaliya kan, ""Timbuktu"" nana kɛ misali ye dugukolo wɛrɛw kan, minnu ka jan. Bi, Timbuktu ye dugu faantan ye, hali n'a tɔgɔ b'a kɛ turisiw ka ɲɛnajɛyɔrɔ ye, wa awiyɔnbonda b'a la. question: Nin ko ninnu na Timbuktu ko la, jumɛn ye tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Dugu in bɛ Se ka Taa ni awiyɔn ye
mc_answer2: A ka ca ni jamana wɛrɛw ye ka tɛmɛ faantanya kan
mc_answer3: ka farafinna ka dɔgɔn ka tɛmɛ a lamini duguw kan

flores_passage: Paralimpiki bɛna Kɛ k'a Tà awirilikalo tle 24 na ka Taa Se sɛtanburukalo tle 5 ma 2021. Ko dɔw bɛna Kɛ yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la Zapɔn jamana bɛɛ la. Tokyo bɛna kɛ Azi dugu kelen ye min ye samiyɛ Olɛnpi fila kɛ, a kɛlen ka tulonw kɛ san 1964. N’i y’i ka pankurunw ni sigiyɔrɔw bila san 2020 kɔnɔ sanni o kɔfɛta ka fɔ, i bɛ se ka kɛ ni ko gɛlɛn ye. Dankarili sariyaw tɛ kelen ye, nka kabini marisikalo laban na, korona banakisɛw tiɲɛni politiki fanba tɛ taa fo san 2020 zuluyekalo la, waati min na Olɛnpi tun bolodara. A jirala ko ko kɛlenw ka bilɛti fanba bɛna kɛ ¥2500 ni ¥130000 cɛ, ni bileti gansanw bɛ ¥7000 ɲɔgɔn bɔ.
question: Samiya Olɛnpi tun bolodara tuma jumɛn fɔlɔ?

flores_passage: "Fɔɲɔba ye fiɲɛ ye min bɛ wuli ka wuli, fiɲɛ min ka dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ, min bɛ lamini fiɲɛ sama ka taa kɔnɔna na ka taa san fɛ. U bɛ fiɲɛba lawuli (a ka c'a la, kilomɛtɛrɛ 100-200/lɛrɛ kɔnɔ) wa u bɛ se ka fɛn girinmanw kɔrɔta fiɲɛ na, k'u ta i n'a fɔ fɔɲɔba." bɛ lamaga.U bɛ daminɛ i n'a fɔ funteni minnu bɛ jigin ka bɔ sanfiɲɛba sankaba la, ka kɛ ""fɔɲɔba"" ye n'u magara dugukolo la."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, waati jumɛn na funteni bɛ kɛ fɔɲɔba ye?
mc_answer1: Ni fiɲɛ bɛ Se kilomɛtɛrɛ 100 ɲɔgɔn ma lɛrɛ kelen kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Ni fiɲɛ kolonw bɛ daminɛ ka wuli
mc_answer3: K’a sɔrɔ a bɛ jigin ka bɔ sanfiɲɛba sankaba la

flores_passage: "Fɔɲɔba ye fiɲɛ ye min bɛ wuli ka wuli, fiɲɛ min ka dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ, min bɛ lamini fiɲɛ sama ka taa kɔnɔna na ka taa san fɛ. U bɛ fiɲɛba lawuli (a ka c'a la, kilomɛtɛrɛ 100-200/lɛrɛ kɔnɔ) wa u bɛ se ka fɛn girinmanw kɔrɔta fiɲɛ na, k'u ta i n'a fɔ fɔɲɔba." bɛ lamaga.U bɛ daminɛ i n'a fɔ funteni minnu bɛ jigin ka bɔ sanfiɲɛba sankaba la, ka kɛ ""fɔɲɔba"" ye n'u magara dugukolo la."
question: Olu la jumɛn ye fɔɲɔba jogo tigitigi ye?
mc_answer1: U bɛ fiɲɛ Bɔ tuma bɛɛ kilomɛtɛrɛ 100-200 ɲɔgɔn na lɛrɛ kelen kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Tuma caman na, u bɛ taa ni fɛn girinmanw ye
mc_answer3: U bɛ Kɛ funteni ye u magalen kɔ duguma
mc_answer4: U ye jɔlanw ye minnu bɛ wuli ka fiɲɛ sama ka taa kɛnɛma

flores_passage: Ni i bɛna taa bɔ jamana min na, o kɛra taama ladilikan dɔ ye, i ka taama kɛnɛyako asiransi walima i ka taama tiɲɛni asiransi bɛ se ka nɔ bila o la. Aw bɛ se fana ka gɔfɛrɛnaman wɛrɛw ka laadilikanw lajɛ minnu tɛ aw yɛrɛ ta ye, nka u ka laadilikanw dabɔra u ka jamanadenw de kama. Misali dɔ la, Ameriki jamanaden minnu bɛ Moyen-Orient, olu bɛ se ka kow sɔrɔ minnu tɛ kelen ye ni Erɔpukaw walima Arabuw ta ye. Ladilikanw ye jamana kelen ka politiki koɲɛw lajɛlen surun dɔrɔn de ye. Tuma caman na, hakilina minnu bɛ jira, olu bɛ kɛ fɛn fitininw ye, u bɛ kɛ fɛn bɛɛ ye ani u bɛ nɔgɔya kojugu ni i y’u suma ni kunnafoni caman ye minnu bɛ sɔrɔ yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, taamakɛla ka kan ka laadilikan sɔrɔ min ka ɲɛsin politiki ko ma u ka taa dugu kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Ka bɔ jamana gɔfɛrɛnaman na u bɛna taa bɔ min na
mc_answer2: Ka bɔ hakilinaw la minnu jirala taama ladilikan kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Ka bɔ jamana jamanadenw na u bɛna taa bɔ min na
mc_answer4: Ka bɔ u yɛrɛ ka gɔfɛrɛnaman na

flores_passage: Ni i bɛna taa bɔ jamana min na, o kɛra taama ladilikan dɔ ye, i ka taama kɛnɛyako asiransi walima i ka taama tiɲɛni asiransi bɛ se ka nɔ bila o la. Aw bɛ se fana ka gɔfɛrɛnaman wɛrɛw ka laadilikanw lajɛ minnu tɛ aw yɛrɛ ta ye, nka u ka laadilikanw dabɔra u ka jamanadenw de kama. Misali dɔ la, Ameriki jamanaden minnu bɛ Moyen-Orient, olu bɛ se ka kow sɔrɔ minnu tɛ kelen ye ni Erɔpukaw walima Arabuw ta ye. Ladilikanw ye jamana kelen ka politiki koɲɛw lajɛlen surun dɔrɔn de ye. Tuma caman na, hakilina minnu bɛ jira, olu bɛ kɛ fɛn fitininw ye, u bɛ kɛ fɛn bɛɛ ye ani u bɛ nɔgɔya kojugu ni i y’u suma ni kunnafoni caman ye minnu bɛ sɔrɔ yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la.
question: Ni taama ladilikan dɔ kɛra, a ka c’a la, jamana wɛrɛ jamanaden tɛna mun sɔrɔ?
mc_answer1: Asiransi min bɛ kɛ ka ban
mc_answer2: Kuma surun minnu nɔgɔyara kojugu ka ɲɛsin jamana politiki cogoya ma
mc_answer3: Kɛnɛyako asiransi min bɛ nɔ bila o la
mc_answer4: Kunnafoni caman bɛ sɔrɔ jamana politiki cogoya kan

flores_passage: Taama baaradaw bɛ yen kabini san kɛmɛ 19nan. A ka c’a la, taamakɛla ye sugandi ɲuman ye taama na min bɛ tɛmɛ taamakɛla ka dɔnniya kɔrɔ kan, min ye sigida, laadalakow, kanko walima sɔrɔ dɔgɔya jamanaw ye. Hali ni baarada fanba bɛ sɔn ka jatebɔ kɛ tuma bɛɛ, ciden caman kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen don taama suguya kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw na, baarakɛnafolo hakɛw walima taayɔrɔw la. A bɛ se ka fisaya ka baara kɛ ni ciden ye min bɛ to ka taamaw sɛbɛn minnu ni i ta bɔlen don ɲɔgɔn fɛ. Aw ye a lajɛ ciden bɛ taama minnu laseli kɛ, a kɛra siti dɔ kan wo, a kɛra butiki finɛtiri dɔ la wo.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, taama sugu jumɛn de ka teli ka kɛ ni dɛmɛ ye ka bɔ taamakɛla dɔ fɛ ka jatebɔ kɛ?
mc_answer1: Taama dɔ ka taa baarakɛjɛkulu dɔ la dugu dɔ la, taamakɛla taara bɔ min na ka kɔrɔ
mc_answer2: Dɔgɔkun fila taama jan min kɛra ni baarakɛnafolo kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenba ye
mc_answer3: Taama min bɛna kanko gɛlɛya jira
mc_answer4: Taamakɛla dɔ ka taama fɔlɔ min kɛra jamana kɔkan

mc_answer1: Ni taamakɛla bɛ ka awiyɔnw bila ka taa ni ka segin ka taa bɔ u ka dugu la
mc_answer2: Ni taamakɛla b’a fɛ ka taama kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ sɛbɛn a siɲɛ fɔlɔ la
mc_answer3: Ni taamakɛla bɛ lafiɲɛbɔyɔrɔ fasokan fɔ ka ɲɛ

flores_passage: "Fɛn caman bɛ yen i ka kan ka minnu jateminɛ sani i ka taa yɔrɔ dɔ la ani n'i bɛ taa yɔrɔ dɔ la. Ni i bɛ taa, i k'a jira ko fɛnw kana kɛ i n'a fɔ u bɛ ""segin so"". Taamacogo, sariyaw, dumuni, sirako, siyɔrɔ, sariyakolow, kan ani o ɲɔgɔnnaw bɛna danfara don fo ka se hakɛ dɔ ma ni i sigiyɔrɔ ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun bɛ se ka taamakɛla dɛmɛ a kana jigitigɛ sɔrɔ tuma min na a bɛ taa yɔrɔ kuraw la?
mc_answer1: Ka sariyakolo kelenw makɔnɔ i n’a fɔ u bɔra yɔrɔ min na
mc_answer2: Dumuni minnu tɛ deli ka kɛ, olu sɔnni ka kɛ k’a lajɛ
mc_answer3: Ka tugu sariya kelenw na ni u bɔra yɔrɔ min na
mc_answer4: Ka i yɛrɛ tanga ɲininiw ma minnu kɛra ka kɔn siyɔrɔko kan

question: Ka da kunnafoniw kan minnu bɛ tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, mɔgɔ sugu jumɛn bɛ se ka jigitigɛ sɔrɔ ni a bɛ taa jamana wɛrɛ la?
mc_answer1: Mɔgɔ min ka di dumuni wɛrɛw ye
mc_answer2: Mɔgɔ min bɛ ɲɛtaa sɔrɔ fɛn caman Changement kan
mc_answer4: Mɔgɔ min ka di kalan ye

flores_passage: Ni i bɛ taa jamana yiriwalen dɔ la i siɲɛ fɔlɔ la – walima diɲɛ yɔrɔ kura dɔ la – i kana ladamu sɛgɛn min bɛ se ka kɛ, o dɔgɔya. Taamakɛla sabatilen, setigi caman ye se sɔrɔ diɲɛ taama yiriwalenw ka kura ye, yɔrɔ min na laadalakow ladilanni fitinin caman bɛ se ka fara ɲɔgɔn kan joona. Kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, i ka don fɔlɔw la, i k’a lajɛ ka musaka caman kɛ tilebin yanfan fɛ lotɛliw, dumuniw ani baarakɛyɔrɔw la minnu ka ɲi walasa ka dɛmɛ don ka i yɛrɛ dege. Aw kana sunɔgɔ matirili walima padi kan duguma yɔrɔw la aw tɛ sigida baganw dɔn yɔrɔ minnu na. N’aw bɛ taa kanpaɲi kɛ kɛnɛma, aw bɛ na ni kanpaɲi dilan walima hamakɛ ye walasa aw kana aw yɔrɔ janya sa, wuluw ani o ɲɔgɔnnaw na.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ ladilikan ɲuman ye taamakɛlaw ma minnu bɛ taa jamana yiriwalen dɔ la u siɲɛ fɔlɔ la?
mc_answer1: Aw ye sigida baganw dɔn sani aw ka sunɔgɔ duguma
mc_answer2: Aw bɛ aw yɛrɛ tanga musaka caman kɛli ma dumuni na aw ka tile fɔlɔw la
mc_answer3: A ka ɲi ka dilan walima hamakɛ don ni aw bɛ ka kanpaɲi kɛ
mc_answer4: Aw ye wari bila lotɛli ɲuman dɔ la n’aw sera yen fɔlɔ

mc_answer3: Matirisi walima pad min bɛ kɛ ka kanpaɲi kɛ

flores_passage: So kɔnɔ, ka da nin sigida banakisɛw sɔrɔli kan tuma bɛɛ, a ka ca a la kosɛbɛ ko i farikolo tanga u ma kaban. Nka diɲɛ yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la, banakisɛw ka baganw ye fɛn kuraw ye i bolo yɔrɔ minnu na, a ka c’a la, i bɛ gɛlɛyaw sɔrɔ kosɛbɛ. Ani fana, yɔrɔ minnu ka suma, banakisɛw fila bɛɛ bɛ bonya joona ani u bɛ mɛn farikolo kɔkan. O cogo la, Deli kɔnɔbara ka tɔɔrɔw, Faraon ka danga, Montezuma ka Revenge, n’u teri caman. flores_passage: Erɔpu ye farafinna ye min ka dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ nka jamana yɛrɛmahɔrɔnyalen caman bɛ a la. Ni ko bɛnnen don, ka taama jamana caman kɔnɔ, o kɔrɔ bɛna kɛ ko i ka kan ka tɛmɛ visa ɲininiw ni pasipɔri kɔlɔsili fɛ siɲɛ caman. Nka, Schengen zone bɛ baara kɛ dɔɔnin i n’a fɔ jamana kelen o siratigɛ la. Ni i tora o yɔrɔ in na, a ka c’a la, i bɛ se ka dancɛw tigɛ k’a sɔrɔ i ma tɛmɛ pasipɔri kɔlɔsili yɔrɔw fɛ tugun. O cogo kelen na, ni Schengen visa bɛ i bolo, i man kan ka visa ɲini Schengen jamana kelen-kelen bɛɛ la kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, o la, i bɛ waati, wari ani sɛbɛnw bɔ.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ye nafa ye taama na Schengen zone kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Ka i yɛrɛ tanga visa ɲinini caman ma
mc_answer3: Ka i yɛrɛ tanga pasipɔri kɔlɔsili yɔrɔ caman ma

flores_passage: Tutankhamun ka kaburu (KV62). KV62 bɛ se ka kɛ kaburu tɔgɔba ye Vallée kɔnɔ, Howard Carter ye masakɛ kamalennin in ka masakɛ sudon min tun bɛ ɲini ka ban san 1922, o sɔrɔyɔrɔ ye. Nka, n’i y’a suma ni masakɛ ka kaburu tɔw fanba ye, Tutankhamun kaburu man kan ka lajɛ, a ka dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ, wa a masiricogo man ca. Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ b’a fɛ ka daliluw ye minnu b’a jira ko tiɲɛni min kɛra mumɛ la, k’a ɲini k’a bɔ sanubɔlan kɔnɔ, o tigi jigi tigɛlen don bawo a kunkolo ni a kamankunw dɔrɔn de bɛ ye. Kaburu nafolo kabakomaw tɛ a kɔnɔ tugun, nka u bɔra Misira misiri la Kayira. Dunan minnu ka waati ka dɔgɔ, a ka fisa u k’u ka waati kɛ yɔrɔ wɛrɛ la.
question: Mun tɛ se ka sɔrɔ Tutankhamun kaburu kɔnɔ tugun?

flores_passage: Bowen gun ye tile kelen taama walima dɔgɔkun laban taama ye min bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ, min bɛ kayaki, taama, butikiw, dumunikɛyɔrɔw ani fɛn wɛrɛw di. Nin sigida lakika in bɛ Howe Sound dugu kɔnɔ Vankuburu kɛrɛfɛ dɔrɔn, wa a bɛ se ka sɔrɔ nɔgɔya la ji takisi bolodalenw fɛ minnu bɛ bɔ Granville gun kan Vankuburu dugu cɛmancɛ la. Kɛnɛyako ka di mɔgɔ minnu ye, taama ka wuli Kɔgɔji ka taa Sankolo sira kan, o nafa ka bon. Whistler (lɛrɛ 1,5 taama ka bɔ Vancouver) sɔngɔ ka gɛlɛn nka a bɛ dɔn kosɛbɛ k’a sababu kɛ san 2010 tlema Olɛnpi ye. Nɛnɛ waati, i ka Ameriki Woroduguyanfan ski kɛcogo ɲuman dɔw diyabɔ, ani samiyɛ fɛ, i ka kulu nɛgɛso boli lakika dɔw kɛ k’a lajɛ.

mc_answer4: Whistler ye a ka baara kɛ

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, yɔrɔ jumɛn de ka teli ka kɛ sababu ye ka taamakɛlaw dɛmɛ u ka Vankuburu ka ko kɛlen lakika sɔrɔ?
mc_answer2: Whistler ye a ka baara kɛ

flores_passage: Victoria Falls ye dugu ye min bɛ Zimbabue tilebin fɛ, Livingstone, Zanbi, ani Botswana kɛrɛfɛ. Dugu in bɛ jidagayɔrɔw kɛrɛfɛ o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ, wa u de ye fɛnba ye, nka nin turisimu yɔrɔ min ka di kosɛbɛ, o bɛ cogo caman di ɲɛnajɛ ɲininikɛlaw ni taamakɛlaw bɛɛ ma walasa u ka se ka to yen ka mɛn. Sanji waati (Nowanburukalo fo Marisikalo), ji hakɛ bɛna caya ani Jiginɛw bɛna kɛ fɛn ye min bɛ mɔgɔ kabakoya. I bɛ se ka jigin ni i ye bɔlɔn tigɛ walima n’i bɛ taama siraw kan minnu bɛ wuli ka wuli Falls kɛrɛfɛ. Faan wɛrɛ fɛ, a bɛ kɛ tigitigi bawo ji hakɛ ka bon kosɛbɛ fo i ka Jiginɛ yɛrɛ filɛli bɛna datugu—ji bɛɛ fɛ!
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, tuma jumɛn taamakɛlaw ka kan ka taa bɔ Jibɔyɔrɔ la n’u bɛ yɔrɔw ɲini minnu tɛ bali?

flores_passage: Victoria Falls ye dugu ye min bɛ Zimbabue tilebin fɛ, Livingstone, Zanbi, ani Botswana kɛrɛfɛ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nafa jumɛn bɛ sɔrɔ ka taa Victoria jibɔyɔrɔ la Nowanburukalo ni Marisikalo cɛ?
mc_answer4: Ka i yɛrɛ tanga sanji waati ma

flores_passage: Sariya minnu bɛ fototacogo kan tuma bɛɛ, olu fana bɛ tali kɛ videyo tacogo la, n’a sɔrɔ o bɛ tali kɛ o la ka tɛmɛ o kan yɛrɛ. Ni fɛn dɔ foto ta dɔrɔn tɛ se ka kɛ, o tuma na fɛ, i man kan ka miiri hali k’a wideyow ta. Ni i bɛ baara kɛ ni dron ye, i ka kɔn k’a lajɛ kosɛbɛ k’a dɔn i bɛ se ka filimu minnu kɛ ani permis walima lase wɛrɛw minnu ka kan ka di. Ka dron pan awiyɔnbonda kɛrɛfɛ walima jama kan, a bɛ se ka kɛ ko o ye hakilina jugu ye, hali n’a tɛ sariya sɔsɔli ye i ka sigida la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu la jumɛn man ɲi ni i bɛ baara kɛ ni dron ye ka filimu kɛ?
mc_answer1: I bɛ se ka min filimu, i ka kɔn k’o lajɛ
mc_answer4: Filimu kɛli dɔrɔn yɔrɔw la minnu falen don mɔgɔw la, dron tɛna kɔlɔsi yɔrɔ minnu na

flores_passage: Sariya minnu bɛ fototacogo kan tuma bɛɛ, olu fana bɛ tali kɛ videyo tacogo la, n’a sɔrɔ o bɛ tali kɛ o la ka tɛmɛ o kan yɛrɛ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, yɔrɔ jumɛnw ka fisa ka filimu kɛ ni dron ye?
mc_answer1: Jamaba kɛrɛfɛ min tɛna tɔɔrɔ dron in sɔrɔli fɛ
mc_answer2: Yɔrɔ minnu na, fototalan tɛ se ka kɛ tuma bɛɛ
mc_answer3: Yɔrɔ minnu na mɔgɔw ka ca, dron tɛ ye kosɛbɛ yɔrɔ minnu na
mc_answer4: Yɔrɔ minnu na i ye permis sɔrɔ ka kɔn o ɲɛ

flores_passage: I tɔgɔ sɛbɛnni ye wajibi wɛrɛ ye min bɛ kɛ ka ɲɛsin visa baara ma. Jamana dɔw la, i ka kan k’i ka sigiyɔrɔ n’i sigiyɔrɔ ladɛrɛsi sɛbɛn sigida ɲɛmɔgɔw fɛ. O bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka sɛbɛn dɔ dafa sigida polisiw fɛ walima ka taa bɔ jamanadenw ka bɔnɔgɔla birow la. Jamana caman na, o sariya sugu bɛ yen, sigida lotɛlibaw bɛna mɔgɔ tɔgɔ sɛbɛnni ɲɛnabɔ (aw k’aw jija ka ɲininkali kɛ). Ko wɛrɛw la, minnu bɛ to turisiw ka sigiyɔrɔ kɔkan, olu dɔrɔn de ka kan k’u tɔgɔ sɛbɛn. Nka, o bɛ sariya kɛ fɛn ye min tɛ jɛya kosɛbɛ, o la sa, i ka kɔn k’o dɔn.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, kuma jumɛn min bɛ tali kɛ mɔgɔ tɔgɔ sɛbɛnni wajibiyalen na visa taabolo la, o tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: N’i bɛ to turisiw ka sigiyɔrɔw la, n’a sɔrɔ i tɛna i tɔgɔ sɛbɛn
mc_answer2: Jamana bɛɛ b’a ɲini ka i tɔgɔ sɛbɛn sigida ɲɛmɔgɔw fɛ
mc_answer3: A bɛ se ka kɛ ko a ka kan ka taa bɔ jamana wɛrɛw ka birow la
mc_answer4: Yɔrɔ dɔw la, sigida lotɛliw bɛ se ka mɔgɔ tɔgɔ sɛbɛnni ɲɛnabɔ

flores_passage: I tɔgɔ sɛbɛnni ye wajibi wɛrɛ ye min bɛ kɛ ka ɲɛsin visa baara ma. Jamana dɔw la, i ka kan k’i ka sigiyɔrɔ n’i sigiyɔrɔ ladɛrɛsi sɛbɛn sigida ɲɛmɔgɔw fɛ. Ko wɛrɛw la, minnu bɛ to turisiw ka sigiyɔrɔ kɔkan, olu dɔrɔn de ka kan k’u tɔgɔ sɛbɛn. Nka, o bɛ sariya kɛ fɛn ye min tɛ jɛya kosɛbɛ, o la sa, i ka kɔn k’o dɔn.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn tɛ yɔrɔ ye turisi bɛ se ka taa yɔrɔ min na walasa k’u tɔgɔ sɛbɛnni ɲɛnabɔ?
mc_answer2: U bɛ sigi lotɛli min na

flores_passage: Ka i yɛrɛ di ka taa taama na, o ye fɛɛrɛ ɲuman ye min bɛ se ka fɛn caman kɛ nka a tɛ kɛ nili dɔrɔn ye. Ka sigi ani ka baara kɛ ni i yɛrɛ sago ye jamana wɛrɛ la, o ye fɛɛrɛ ɲuman ye walasa ka ladamu wɛrɛ dɔn, ka mɔgɔ kuraw kunbɛn, ka i yɛrɛ dɔn, ka hakilina sɔrɔ ani ka seko kura yɛrɛ sɔrɔ. A bɛ se ka kɛ fana fɛɛrɛ ɲuman ye walasa ka baarakɛnafolo dɔ janya walasa ka sira di mɔgɔ ma ka mɛn yɔrɔ dɔ la bawo bolomafara baara caman bɛ yɔrɔ ni dumuni di ani dɔw bɛ sara fitinin sara.
question: Jɔn tɛna nafa sɔrɔ n’u y’u yɛrɛ di ka taa taama na?
mc_answer1: Mɔgɔ min jigi b’a kan ka teri kuraw sɔrɔ, o bɛna kɛ jamana wɛrɛ la
mc_answer3: Mɔgɔ min jigi b’a kan ka seko kura sɔrɔ
mc_answer4: Mɔgɔ min bɛ se ka diya so ni dumuni ye

flores_passage: Ka i yɛrɛ di ka taa taama na, o ye fɛɛrɛ ɲuman ye min bɛ se ka fɛn caman kɛ nka a tɛ kɛ nili dɔrɔn ye. Ka sigi ani ka baara kɛ ni i yɛrɛ sago ye jamana wɛrɛ la, o ye fɛɛrɛ ɲuman ye walasa ka ladamu wɛrɛ dɔn, ka mɔgɔ kuraw kunbɛn, ka i yɛrɛ dɔn, ka hakilina sɔrɔ ani ka seko kura yɛrɛ sɔrɔ. A bɛ se ka kɛ fana fɛɛrɛ ɲuman ye walasa ka baarakɛnafolo dɔ janya walasa ka sira di mɔgɔ ma ka mɛn yɔrɔ dɔ la bawo bolomafara baara caman bɛ yɔrɔ ni dumuni di ani dɔw bɛ sara fitinin sara.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ka baara kɛ ni bolomafara ye k’a sɔrɔ i bɛ jamana wɛrɛ la, o bɛ nafa jumɛn lase taamakɛla ma min ka baarakɛnafolo ka dɔgɔ?
mc_answer1: A bɛ se ka fɔ ko sara bɛ di tuma bɛɛ
mc_answer2: A ka c’a la, o bɛ na ni baarakɛyɔrɔw ye
mc_answer3: So ni dumuni bɛ di tuma dɔw la
mc_answer4: A bɛ se k’i dɛmɛ ka hakilinata sɔrɔ

flores_passage: "Ka taa Walt Disney World la, o bɛ Ameriki denbaya caman ka taamaba jira. Taama ""typical"" bɛ kɛ ni awiyɔn ye ka don Orlando jamana ka pankurunbonda kɔnɔ, ka bisi ta ka taa Disney lotɛli dɔ la min bɛ o yɔrɔ la, ka dɔgɔkun kelen ɲɔgɔn kɛ k'a sɔrɔ i ma bɔ Disney ka nafolo la, ka segin so."(Alimankan na) .Dan tɛ fɛn caman ɲɔgɔnna caman na, nka o tora mɔgɔw fanba b'a fɛ ka min fɔ n'u bɛ kuma ""taama Disney World" kan. Hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ nin ye baara ye min bɛ kɛ kosɛbɛ, a dagalen don Disney fɛ: tikitiw tɛ se ka wuli."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun bɛ se ka jate ko a tɛ kɛ Walt Disney World taama hakɛ danmadɔ la?
mc_answer1: Ka dɔgɔkun kelen kɛ ka nakɔsɛnɛyɔrɔw sɛgɛsɛgɛ
mc_answer2: Ka to lotɛli dɔ la min tɛ o yɔrɔ la
mc_answer3: Ka taama in bɛɛ kɛ Disney ka yɔrɔ la
mc_answer4: Bus ta ka bɔ awiyɔnbonda la ka taa lotɛli la

flores_passage: "Ka taa Walt Disney World la, o bɛ Ameriki denbaya caman ka taamaba jira. Hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ nin ye baara ye min bɛ kɛ kosɛbɛ, a dagalen don Disney fɛ: tikitiw tɛ se ka wuli."
question: Nin kuma minnu fɔra Walt Disney World ko la, jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Park-hopper biletiw bɛ se ka bila taamakɛla tɔw ma
mc_answer2: Jatigila bɛ sɔrɔ o yɔrɔ la
mc_answer3: Busiw bɛ yen minnu bɛ se ka taamakɛlaw ta ka bɔ awiyɔnbonda la ka taa o yɔrɔ la
mc_answer4: Tile caman biletiw bɛ se ka sɔrɔ tuma caman na sannifeere sitiw kan

flores_passage: Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ ka taama boloda jamana dɔ la min bɛ se ka jate kɛlɛyɔrɔ ye, o tigi ka kan ka baarakɛlaw ka kalan sɔrɔ. Ni i ye ‘Hostile environment course’ ɲinini kɛ ɛntɛrinɛti kan, n’a sɔrɔla o bɛna sigida ka baarakɛyɔrɔ dɔ ka ladɛrɛsi di. A ka c’a la, kalan dɔ bɛna kuma ko minnu bɛɛ kan yan, olu bɛna ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ kosɛbɛ, a ka c’a la, ni dɔnniya bɛ sɔrɔ a la. A ka c’a la, kalan dɔ bɛna kɛ tile 2-5 kɔnɔ, wa a bɛna kɛ ni jɔyɔrɔfalen ye, dɛmɛ fɔlɔ caman ani tuma dɔw la marifaw dege. Gafew ni zurunali minnu bɛ kuma kungo kɔnɔ ɲɛnamaya kan, olu ka ca, nka gafe minnu bɛ kuma kɛlɛyɔrɔw kan, olu man ca.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nin ko ninnu na, jumɛn de ka teli ka ɲɛfɔ baarakɛlaw ka kalanso kɔnɔ walima sɛbɛnw kɔnɔ?

flores_passage: Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ ka taama boloda jamana dɔ la min bɛ se ka jate kɛlɛyɔrɔ ye, o tigi ka kan ka baarakɛlaw ka kalan sɔrɔ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, nin kalansen jumɛnw de ka teli ka kɛ baarakɛlaw ka kalanso kɔnɔ?

flores_passage: Ji saniyacogo tɛ kelen ye, dɔw bɛ nɔ bɔ ka tɛmɛ bagabagali kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw kan. Yɔrɔ dɔw la, ji tobi miniti kelen kɔnɔ, o bɛ se, yɔrɔ dɔw la, miniti damadɔ de ka kan ka kɛ. Filɛriw nafa tɛ kelen ye, wa ni haminanko dɔ bɛ aw la, o tuma na, aw ka kan ka jateminɛ kɛ ka aw ka ji san buteli datugulen kɔnɔ ka bɔ baarakɛyɔrɔ tɔgɔba dɔ la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, fɛɛrɛ ɲuman jumɛn bɛ yen walasa ka i yɛrɛ tanga ji nɔgɔlen ma min bɛ se ka kɛ?
mc_answer1: Aw bɛ ji tobi miniti damadɔ kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Aw bɛ buteli kɔnɔ ji san
mc_answer3: Aw bɛ ji tobi miniti kelen kɔnɔ
mc_answer4: Aw bɛ ji jateminɛ ni bagabagali kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw tɛ a la

flores_passage: Rip currents ye jibɔ ye min bɛ segin ka bɔ jikuruw la minnu bɛ kari ka bɔ kɔgɔjida la, tuma caman na, kɔji dɔ la walima o ɲɔgɔnna. K’a sababu kɛ ji jukɔrɔla topidiya ye segin-ka-bɔnye bɛ kɛ yɔrɔ damadɔw la minnu ka dun, wa jikuru teliyalen bɛ se ka kɛ yen ka taa ji jugumanw na. Saya fanba bɛ sɔrɔ sɛgɛn fɛ k’a ɲini ka segin ka naji kɛ jikuruw kama, o bɛ se ka kɛ ko o tɛ se ka kɛ. Ni aw bɔra jikuruw la dɔrɔn, ka segin ka jigin, o tɛ gɛlɛya ka tɛmɛ a cogo kɔrɔ kan. Aw bɛ a ɲini ka yɔrɔ dɔ laɲini, aw tɛ minɛ tugun yɔrɔ min na walima ka kɛɲɛ ni aw ka seko ye ani ni aw kɔlɔsira, aw bɛ se ka kisi makɔnɔ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, mun bɛ se ka kɛ hali ni nɛgɛso bolila ŋanaw ye?
mc_answer1: Najibɔ kɛli ka surunya kɔw la
mc_answer3: Ka jigin ka kɛɲɛ ni jikuru ye

flores_passage: Rip currents ye jibɔ ye min bɛ segin ka bɔ jikuruw la minnu bɛ kari ka bɔ kɔgɔjida la, tuma caman na, kɔji dɔ la walima o ɲɔgɔnna. K’a sababu kɛ ji jukɔrɔla topidiya ye segin-ka-bɔnye bɛ kɛ yɔrɔ damadɔw la minnu ka dun, wa jikuru teliyalen bɛ se ka kɛ yen ka taa ji jugumanw na. Saya fanba bɛ sɔrɔ sɛgɛn fɛ k’a ɲini ka segin ka naji kɛ jikuruw kama, o bɛ se ka kɛ ko o tɛ se ka kɛ. Ni aw bɔra jikuruw la dɔrɔn, ka segin ka jigin, o tɛ gɛlɛya ka tɛmɛ a cogo kɔrɔ kan. Aw bɛ a ɲini ka yɔrɔ dɔ laɲini, aw tɛ minɛ tugun yɔrɔ min na walima ka kɛɲɛ ni aw ka seko ye ani ni aw kɔlɔsira, aw bɛ se ka kisi makɔnɔ.
question: Ni i minɛna jikuruba dɔ fɛ, i ka kan ka mun kɛ?
mc_answer1: Aw bɛ aw jija ka bɔ jikuruw la ni aw ye aw ɲɛsin sira wɛrɛ ma, o kɔ aw bɛ segin ka jigin ka taa kɔgɔjida la cogo bɛnnen na
mc_answer2: Aw bɛ naji teliya ka tɛmɛ jikuruw kan
mc_answer3: Aw bɛ naji kɛ ka taa fan wɛrɛ fɛ
mc_answer4: Aw bɛ naji kɛ dugukolo jukɔrɔ

flores_passage: Kɔnɔna jibolisiraw bɛ se ka kɛ barokun ɲuman ye walasa ka seli sinsin a lamini na. Misali la, ka taa bɔ dugubaw la Loire kɔdingɛ kɔnɔ, Rhin kɔdingɛ kɔnɔ walima ka kurun ta ka taa dugu dumanw na Danube baji kan walima ka kurun boli Erie kanal kɛrɛfɛ. U bɛ siraw fana ɲɛfɔ taama ni wotoro sira minnu bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ka taa bɔ masadugu dɔ la yɔrɔ jumɛn na, o bɛ se ka kɛ seli taama nafama ye?
mc_answer1: Dugu min bɛ Danube baji da la

flores_passage: Worodugu fɛ mara in bɛ danbɔ ni Sahel ye, ani saheli ni tilebin fɛ ni Atlantik Kɔgɔji ye. Musow : A ka ɲi muso taamabaga o muso ka kan k’a fɔ k’u furula, furu cogoya yɛrɛ mana kɛ min o min ye. A nafa ka bon ka bololanɛgɛ don fana (a tɛ kɛ dɔrɔn min bɛ i n’a fɔ a sɔngɔ ka gɛlɛn kojugu. Musow ka kan k’a dɔn ko laadalakow danfara bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye u bɛna min jate tɔɔrɔ ye ani a man teli ka tugu u kɔ, ka bolo minɛ, a ɲɔgɔnnaw. Aw ka jɔ a la ka cɛw ban, ani kana siran ka jɔ i ka jɔyɔrɔ la (ladamu danfara walima danfara tɛ, o t’a kɛ ok!).
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na, jumɛn tɛna kɛ laadilikan ɲuman ye musow bolo minnu bɛ taa o yɔrɔ la?
mc_answer1: Aw ye aw yɛrɛ tanga baro ma kɛlɛko cogoya kan
mc_answer2: Aw k’a dɔn ko danfara minnu bɛ laadalakow la, olu bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka sigidamɔgɔw bila ka wale kɛ ni fanga ye
mc_answer3: Aw kana biyew don minnu bɛ yeelen bɔ
mc_answer4: Aw bɛ baara kɛ ni gɛlɛya ye ni a mago bɛ a la

flores_passage: Worodugu fɛ mara in bɛ danbɔ ni Sahel ye, ani saheli ni tilebin fɛ ni Atlantik Kɔgɔji ye. Musow : A ka ɲi muso taamabaga o muso ka kan k’a fɔ k’u furula, furu cogoya yɛrɛ mana kɛ min o min ye. A nafa ka bon ka bololanɛgɛ don fana (a tɛ kɛ dɔrɔn min bɛ i n’a fɔ a sɔngɔ ka gɛlɛn kojugu. Musow ka kan k’a dɔn ko laadalakow danfara bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye u bɛna min jate tɔɔrɔ ye ani a man teli ka tugu u kɔ, ka bolo minɛ, a ɲɔgɔnnaw. Aw ka jɔ a la ka cɛw ban, ani kana siran ka jɔ i ka jɔyɔrɔ la (ladamu danfara walima danfara tɛ, o t’a kɛ ok!).
question: Ka da yɔrɔ kan min ɲɛfɔlen don tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, laadilikan jumɛn bɛ se ka kɛ dɛmɛ ye musow taamabagaw bolo?
mc_answer1: Aw k’a dɔn ko a man teli ka tugu a kɔ
mc_answer2: Aw bɛ bololanɛgɛ belebele dɔ don walasa ka kɛlɛ cogoya jira
mc_answer3: A faamu ko danfara minnu bɛ laadalakow la, olu b’a jira ko i k’i yɛrɛ tanga ka jɔ i jɔyɔrɔ la
mc_answer4: Ni ɲɛtaa t’a fɛ, i ka jɔ cɛw la minnu bɛ ban

flores_passage: Kungosogow bɛ fototalan gɛlɛnw cɛma, wa u mago bɛ ɲɛnajɛ ɲuman, muɲu, ko kɛlenw ani minɛn ɲumanw faralen ɲɔgɔn kan. A ka c’a la, kungosogow fotota bɛ jate fɛn ye min tɛ fosi ye, nka i n’a fɔ fototacogo caman, ja nafa ka bon daɲɛ ba kelen na. Tuma caman na, kungosogow fotota bɛ telefɔni ɲɛkisɛ jan de wajibiya, hali ni fɛn minnu bɛ i n’a fɔ kɔnɔw ka kulu walima danfɛn fitinin dɔ, olu mago bɛ ɲɛkisɛ wɛrɛw la. Bagan caman sɔrɔli ka gɛlɛn, wa tuma dɔw la, sariyaw bɛ nakɔsɛnɛyɔrɔw la fotow tacogo kan jago kama. Kungosogow bɛ se ka maloya walima ka kɛ mɔgɔ farimanw ye. Lamini bɛ se ka kɛ nɛnɛ, funteni, walima juguya ye cogo wɛrɛ la.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, ko jumɛn bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka kungosogow fototalan dɔ wajibiya ka baara kɛ ni lensɛri kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen ye?
mc_answer1: N'u bɛ foto ta kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la danfɛn misɛnninw
mc_answer2: Ni fotow bɛ kɛ jago kama
mc_answer3: Ni bagan minnu bɛ foto ta, olu bɛ maloya
mc_answer4: Ni nakɔsɛnɛyɔrɔ dɔ bɛ ni sariya kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw ye kungosogow fotota ko la

flores_passage: Kungosogow bɛ fototalan gɛlɛnw cɛma, wa u mago bɛ ɲɛnajɛ ɲuman, muɲu, ko kɛlenw ani minɛn ɲumanw faralen ɲɔgɔn kan. A ka c’a la, kungosogow fotota bɛ jate fɛn ye min tɛ fosi ye, nka i n’a fɔ fototacogo caman, ja nafa ka bon daɲɛ ba kelen na. Tuma caman na, kungosogow fotota bɛ telefɔni ɲɛkisɛ jan de wajibiya, hali ni fɛn minnu bɛ i n’a fɔ kɔnɔw ka kulu walima danfɛn fitinin dɔ, olu mago bɛ ɲɛkisɛ wɛrɛw la. Bagan caman sɔrɔli ka gɛlɛn, wa tuma dɔw la, sariyaw bɛ nakɔsɛnɛyɔrɔw la fotow tacogo kan jago kama. Kungosogow bɛ se ka maloya walima ka kɛ mɔgɔ farimanw ye. Lamini bɛ se ka kɛ nɛnɛ, funteni, walima juguya ye cogo wɛrɛ la.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ma fɔ tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ ko gɛlɛya min bɛ se ka kɛ kungosogow fototalaw bolo?
mc_answer1: Bagan dɔw sɔrɔli minnu tɛ jamana wɛrɛw la
mc_answer2: Ka ko kɛ ni bagan farimanw ye
mc_answer3: Lensɛri suguya minnu ka kan ka sɔrɔ, olu sɔrɔli
mc_answer4: Baara kɛli sigidaw la minnu bɛ se ka kɛ juguya ye

flores_passage: Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛna bolifɛn ta latitude sanfɛtaw la walima kulu tɛmɛsira kan, o tigi ka kan ka jateminɛ kɛ ni nɛnɛ, jikuru walima nɛnɛ bɛ se ka kɛ. Sira minnu bɛ ni nɛnɛ ye ani nɛnɛ bɛ minnu na, ɲɔgɔnkanu tɛ kɛ, wa i tɛ se ka bolifɛn boli i n’a fɔ i bɛ nɛgɛso gansan kan. Sanfiɲɛba waatiw la, nɛnɛ bɛ se ka bin waati dɔɔnin dɔrɔn kɔnɔ. Yeli bɛ se ka dankari fana ni nɛnɛ binna walima ni nɛnɛ bɛ fiyɛ walima ni nɛnɛ walima jikuruw bɛ mobili finɛtiriw kan. Faan wɛrɛ fɛ, nɛnɛ ni nɛnɛ bɛ kɛ jamana caman na, wa sirako fanba bɛ taa ɲɛ san bɛɛ kɔnɔ, k’a sɔrɔ a ma tigɛ.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn bɛna gɛlɛya fitinin lase bolifɛntigi ma min bɛ taa kulu tɛmɛsira fɛ?

flores_passage: Fo n’i ye diplomasikɛla ye, baara kɛli jamana kɔkan, a ka c’a la, o kɔrɔ ye ko i bɛna sɔrɔta impositi bila jamana kɔnɔ i sigilen bɛ min kɔnɔ.Sɔrɔko impositi sigicogo tɛ kelen ye jamana wɛrɛw la, wa impositi hakɛw ni a hakɛw tɛ kelen ye jamana kelen-kelen bɛɛ la. Fɛdɛrali jamana dɔw la, i n’a fɔ Ameriki ani Kanada, sɔrɔta impositi bɛ bɔ fédéral ta fan fɛ ani sigida la, o la, a hakɛw ni a hakɛw bɛ se ka ɲɔgɔn ta mara ni mara la.
question: A ka c’a la, mun bɛ to ka kɛ kelen ye sɔrɔko impositi ko la jamana suguya caman kɔnɔ?
mc_answer3: I bɛ filen yɔrɔ min na

flores_passage: Fo n’i ye diplomasikɛla ye, baara kɛli jamana kɔkan, a ka c’a la, o kɔrɔ ye ko i bɛna sɔrɔta impositi bila jamana kɔnɔ i sigilen bɛ min kɔnɔ.Sɔrɔko impositi sigicogo tɛ kelen ye jamana wɛrɛw la, wa impositi hakɛw ni a hakɛw tɛ kelen ye jamana kelen-kelen bɛɛ la. Fɛdɛrali jamana dɔw la, i n’a fɔ Ameriki ani Kanada, sɔrɔta impositi bɛ bɔ fédéral ta fan fɛ ani sigida la, o la, a hakɛw ni a hakɛw bɛ se ka ɲɔgɔn ta mara ni mara la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, n’i bɛ baara kɛ jamana kɔkan nka n’i sigilen bɛ yɔrɔ wɛrɛ la, a ka c’a la, i bɛna i ka sɔrɔta impositi di min?
mc_answer1: A ka c’a la, i sigilen bɛ yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ
mc_answer3: I bɛ baara kɛ jamana min na sisan
mc_answer4: Yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ, sara bɛ dɔgɔya yɔrɔ min na

flores_passage: Diɲɛ ɲɛnajɛba (a bɛ fɔ a ma kosɛbɛ ko Diɲɛ jirali, walima dɔrɔn Expo) ye diɲɛ seko ni dɔnko seliba ye. Jamana minnu sen bɛ o la, olu bɛ seko ni dɔnko jirali kɛ jamana ka paviliw kɔnɔ walasa ka diɲɛ koɲɛw walima u ka jamana ka laadalakow n’a tariku jira. Duniya nakɔko jirali ye ko kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw ye minnu bɛ falenfɛnw jirali, jiriforo ani fɛn o fɛn bɛ tali kɛ jiriw la. Hali n’a y’a Sɔrɔ u bɛ Se ka Kɛ sàn o sàn (ni u bɛ jamana wɛrɛw la), tiɲɛ na, u tɛ Kɛ. A ka c’a la, o ko ninnu bɛ kɛ yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ la kalo saba ni kalo wɔɔrɔ cɛ, wa u bɛ kɛ yɔrɔw la minnu tɛ dɔgɔya ni hectare 50 ye.
question: Nin kumasen ninnu na, jumɛn tɛ diɲɛ kɛnɛba dɔ ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: Ɲɛjiraliw bɛ se ka jamana dɔ ka tariku walima a ka laadalakow jira
mc_answer2: Fɛnɲɛnɛmako jirali bɛ jira seko ni dɔnko jirali kɛrɛfɛ
mc_answer3: Kow bɛ se ka kɛ fo kalo wɔɔrɔ
mc_answer4: Jamana tɛ wajibiya ka u sen don a la

flores_passage: Diɲɛ ɲɛnajɛba (a bɛ fɔ a ma kosɛbɛ ko Diɲɛ jirali, walima dɔrɔn Expo) ye diɲɛ seko ni dɔnko seliba ye. Jamana minnu sen bɛ o la, olu bɛ seko ni dɔnko jirali kɛ jamana ka paviliw kɔnɔ walasa ka diɲɛ koɲɛw walima u ka jamana ka laadalakow n’a tariku jira. Duniya nakɔko jirali ye ko kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw ye minnu bɛ falenfɛnw jirali, jiriforo ani fɛn o fɛn bɛ tali kɛ jiriw la. Hali n’a y’a Sɔrɔ u bɛ Se ka Kɛ sàn o sàn (ni u bɛ jamana wɛrɛw la), tiɲɛ na, u tɛ Kɛ. A ka c’a la, o ko ninnu bɛ kɛ yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ la kalo saba ni kalo wɔɔrɔ cɛ, wa u bɛ kɛ yɔrɔw la minnu tɛ dɔgɔya ni hectare 50 ye.
question: Ninnu la jumɛn ye diɲɛ kɛnɛba walima diɲɛ kɛnɛba dɔ sariya ye?
mc_answer1: Ɲɛjiraliw ka kan ka jamana dɔ ka tariku ni diɲɛ koɲɛw bɛɛ jira
mc_answer2: Jamana kelen tɛ se ka kɛwalew kɛ san o san
mc_answer3: Kow ka kan ka kɛ fo kalo wɔɔrɔ
mc_answer4: Walasa kɛnɛ in ka kɛ, jamana bɛɛ ka kan k’u sen don a la

flores_passage: Hali ni nakɔ in kɔnɔ bagan caman delila ka hadamadenw ye, o bɛɛ n’a ta kungosogow ye kungo ye, wa u man kan ka balo walima ka jɔrɔ. Nakɔko ɲɛmɔgɔw ka fɔ la, aw ka aw yɔrɔ janya ursi ni waraw la ni mɛtɛrɛ 100 ye a dɔgɔyalenba la ani ka bɔ kungosogo tɔw bɛɛ la ni mɛtɛrɛ 25 ye! U mana kɛ mɔgɔ koloma ye cogo o cogo, bison, elk, moose, ursi ani bagan belebelebaw bɛɛ bɛ se ka bin. San o san, dunan tan ni caman bɛ jogin bawo u ma yɔrɔ janya cogo bɛnnen na. O bagan ninnu ka bon, kungo kɔnɔ, wa u bɛ se ka kɛ farati ye, o la aw ka yɔrɔ di u ma. Ka fara o kan, aw k’a dɔn ko kasaw bɛ ursi ni kungosogo wɛrɛw sama, o la aw kana dumuni kasa dumanw ta walima ka u tobi ani ka kanpaɲi saniyalen to.
question: Ni aw ye ninnu la jumɛn kɛ, o bɛna dɔ bɔ baganw ka binkanni na?
mc_answer2: Nɔgɔ bɔli ka bɔ kanpaɲi yɔrɔ dɔ la
mc_answer3: Ka a ni waraw cɛ janya ye mɛtɛrɛ 25 ye
mc_answer4: Baganw balili ni dumuni tiɲɛnenw ye

flores_passage: Hali ni nakɔ in kɔnɔ bagan caman delila ka hadamadenw ye, o bɛɛ n’a ta kungosogow ye kungo ye, wa u man kan ka balo walima ka jɔrɔ. Nakɔko ɲɛmɔgɔw ka fɔ la, aw ka aw yɔrɔ janya ursi ni waraw la ni mɛtɛrɛ 100 ye a dɔgɔyalenba la ani ka bɔ kungosogo tɔw bɛɛ la ni mɛtɛrɛ 25 ye! question: Ninnu la jumɛn ma fɔ tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ ko a bɛ se ka kɛ kungosogow ka binkanni sababu ye?
